Within four to six weeks हो जाती हैं starts budding and after लगभग 100 दिन बाद of sowing पौधे starts अतिसंवेदनशील फूल white or light dark yellow गहरे पीले रंग very sensitive अतिसंवेदनशील फूल . 
बीजकोष grow very fast and after पकने इसका becomes 2.5 cm in width and 3.8 cm in length . 
बीजकोष ruptures after 80 दिन and during इस समय of वर्ष -LRB- November -RRB- when यह completely opens we get to देखने this sight . 
टेंट of रेशों are generally plucked in दिसंबर माह of November with प्रायः हाथ in भारत and with the help of मशीन in abroad . 
अध्यापक said that silk worm rearing in भारत started in the year 400 . 
Now भारत leads रेशम उत्पादन देशों of the world . 
यह is a small industry where 50,000 गाँव are engaged in कार्य of sericulture . 
भारत ही is एक ऐसा देश where कई प्रकार of रेशम are procured by पालन कई प्रकार of silk worms . 
Golden colored Munga silk is grown only in our county . 
Like agriculture , पालन भी is also एक मुख्य साधन of earning livelihood where many thousands of कई हजार श्रमिक produce यह बहुमूल्य रेशा while काम . 
Silk is prepared by रेशम कई प्रकार of worms but बांबिक्स मोरी is रेशम among them and रेशम is produced in विशेष वातारण of फार्म . 
The larva of this worm खाते हैं mulberry leaves . 
Silkworm looks like तितली from whose eggs initially caterpillar is built . 
Then कैटरपिलर प्यूपा builds a cyst across itself for सुरक्षा in प्रक्रिया of क्राइसेलिस which is known as कोकून . 
क्राइसेलिस पूरा comes out of the cocoon in the form of मॉथ after मॉथ and then मॉथ lays eggs . 
Thus चक्र of रेशम completes . 
They said that they rear पालन of मोरी जाति ही only . 
मॉथ of these insects देती है approximately 700 eggs after coming out of the cocoon and then मर जाती है . 
While silkworms of अन्य जाति देते हैं 350-400 eggs . 
आकार of every egg is equal to आकार of a pin head which has a soft point . 
Because of this soft point कोकून breaks easily . 
These eggs are very light . 
वजन of around 40,000 eggs is just approximately an ounce . 
According to जलवायु these eggs turn into larva within 7 दिन भीतर . 
एक कैटरपिलर eats 7,000-9 ,000 times mulberry leaves of वजन . 
While growing कैटरपिलर frequently changes त्वचा so that it covers आकार . 
Further यह कैटरपिलर becomes a light pink colored transparent worm after which इसकी starts losing रुचि in eating . 
Every worm has two glands which are स्थित in भाग of the worm below its jaw . 
रेशम compresses both its gland and continuously makes two fibers of रेशम . 
If we देखें तो रेशे through microscope then we will know that रेशे is made of रेशे . 
These thin fibers are called brin . 
These two thin silk brins come out coherently with serene in the spinning head which is known as bave . 
रेशे are triangular which have organized molecular chains in the form of micro and macro fibrils . 
एक रेशम makes एक रेशम with the speed of 46 m . 
यह will होगा more appropriate to कहना that while making a complete fibril यह writes the digit 8 for about 12 lakh number of करीब 12 लाख बार . 
While making रेशा the worm loses वजन and the caterpillar chrysalis turns into कैटरपिलर क्राइसेलिस ( प्यूपा ) inside कोकून भीतर and becomes मॉथ in two weeks . 
Now in this condition silkworm takes out क्षारीय पदार्थ and makes pores by dissolving कुछ भाग of कोकून with its help and रेशम कीट come out of कोकून through this pore . 
But in सेरीकल्चर फार्म we do not let क्राइसेलिस come out . 
रेशम कीट is kept in हल्की भाप and मार देते हैं inside कोकून before it comes out . 
इस क्रिया is known as स्टोविंग . 
In क्रिया रेशम is killed inside कोकून भीतर ही but रेशे or कोकून भीतर ही does n't get harmed because of भाप . 
रंग and आकार of कोकून depends upon the diet and जलवायु of the silkworm . 
The cocoon obtained from रेशम in चीन are mostly white in सफेद रंग because कैटरपिलर there eats white mulberry leaves . 
In जापान and यूरोप the cocoon are कोकून क्रीम and light yellow हल्के पीले रंग because there कैटरपिलर there eats castor oil plants and absorbs पदार्थ नामक tannin inside होते . 
In Japan light कोकून भी are also grown whose caterpillars खाते हैं green leaves . 
Apart from सफेद कोकून , gray and light सफेद कोकून are found in भारत . 
In order to differentiate between the luster and softness of प्रत्येक रेशा यह is essential to know that प्रत्येक रेशा is made of दो महीन तंतुओं and दो महीन तंतुओं are joined with saricin glue . 
Thus we can कह सकते हैं that प्रत्येक रेशा is primarily made of दो रासायनिक पदार्थों : दो रासायनिक पदार्थों is fibrin , in the form of liquid which comes out of जो स्पिनरेट and get dried after आकर in संपर्क with हवा and the other is saricin glue . 
Every thread contains approximately 75 % करीब 75 % फिब्रॉयन and 25 % 25 % सैरिसिन . 
चार प्रकार of रेशम are पैदा in ऐरी and मूंगा . 
केवल भारत ही is देश where रेशम is पैदा . 
पालन are reared at कई स्थानों in भारत such as hilly regions of देहरादून and हिमाचल प्रदेश . 
यूनिवोल्टाइन and Bivoltine silkworm in कश्मीर , good quality Multivoltine silkworm in पश्‍चिम बंगाल and कर्नाटक . 
देश produces approximately 90 शेष 10 % mulberry silk and the rest of the 10 % is ऐरी and मूंगा . 
Since when सिल्क बोर्ड has been स्थापना in India , there has been काफी तरक्की in scientific methods of सिल्क उत्पादन . 
The silk worms from which टसर रेशम is obtained are पैदा in warm and temperate climatic regions of देश . 
The cocoons are mostly oval , tough and रंग . 
कैटरपिलर eats oak tree leaves at जगह of mulberry leaves , रंग of कोकून is because of tannin absorption of leaves . 
One does n't needs to kill the tasar silkworm inside कोकून भीतर and लंबे रेशे are easily available . 
But रेशे are thick and tough as compared to रेशे and मात्रा भी of सैरिसिन found in them is also more than moonga and मल्बरी सिल्क . 
रेशम is obtained from मल्टीवोल्टाइन वर्ग of silkworms . 
This silkworm is particularly found in असम . 
कोकून of इस रेशम is closed and the shell is very thin . 
भार of एक कोकून is approximately 6.3 करीब 6.3 ग्राम where पतली परत weighs just 0.5 करीब 6.3 ग्राम . 
यह is a white or red रेशम which is obtained from silkworms of मल्टीवोल्टाइन वर्ग . 
Such worms are reared in Assam , Bihar , Bengal , Manipur , Orissa and Tripura . 
कोकून of such worms are somewhat long . 
भार of a cocoon is just 3 केवल 3 ग्राम . 
विशेषता of such cocoons is that they change colors . 
Because of खुले मुंह of ऐरी सिल्क they can not होने reeled . 
क्रिया of extracting रेशे from cocoon is called reeling . 
इस क्रिया requires sound knowledge of सूझ - बूझ and a good reeling अच्छी रीलिंग मशीन so that रेशम पर्याप्‍त मात्रा of silk is extracted from the cocoon . 
Since रेशा extracted from एक कोकून is very thin and which is difficult to reel therefore रेशा of एक कोकून are together reeled . 
For उदाहरण in order to make a multifilament yarn of 20-22 danier 7 कोकून are sufficient . 
प्रतिकूल असर of भूमंडलीकरण and विश्‍व व्यापार संगठन on किसानों of विकासशील देशों has been विषय of चिंता in वर्षों , the reasons of चिंता regarding कपास producing किसानों are very clear . 
20,000 किसानों were helped with 470 करोड़ डॉलर in the year 2005 , यह is equal to बाजार मूल्य of इस फसल . 
Because of इस कारण कीमत of कपास in विश्‍व बाजार has fallen down to 13 प्रतिशत , despite this about 1 of world 's कपास निर्यात is received by अमेरिका . 
There has been शिकायत विशेषकर भूमंडलीकरण especially by किसानों भी and also at other places in भारत . 
एक अग्रणी किसान कार्यकर्ता of विजय जावंघिया recently कहा that during 1997 and 2003 110 लाख बेल कपास has been आयात . 
आयात शुल्क has been बहुत कम to 10 प्रतिशत . 
The garment mills that export cotton do not need to pay even this . 
That is why सब्सिडी based विदेशी कीमतें are directly पहुंचा रही है किसानों . 
According to the available figures 412 किसानों committed आत्महत्या in विदर्भ in the year 2005 , while in 2006 संख्या of 412 किसानों committing आत्महत्या पहुंच गईं 1050 : In पहले महीने of 2007 412 किसानों committed आत्महत्या in vidarbha . 
In जुलाई , , 2006 the Prime minister visited this place and घोषणा विशेष सहायता of 3750 rupees . 
In जुलाई , , 2006 the Prime minister visited this place and घोषणा विशेष सहायता of 3750 rupees . 
Thus the analysis प्रस्तुत by '' ' इकोनॉमिस्ट पत्रिका does not come up with कोई असरदार समाधान despite seriously गंभीरता the problems of किसानों . 
यह असरदार समाधान तो can only हो सकता है achieved through किसानों association . 
On आधार of which they can हो सकते हैं successful in rejecting tactics of various lobbying and achieving judicious न्यायसंगत मूल्य . 
समाज should comprehensibly व्यापक समर्थन इस प्रयास of किसानों . 
Further for दीर्घकालीन समाधान on this issue we should pay ध्यान to the views of महात्मा गांधी which is related to आत्मनिर्भरता of villages . 
In संबंध Hathkargha Julahas and किसानों have close and complementary relations . 
The indigenous varieties of कपास are made available to the Julahas by किसान . 
Handloom weavers do not मिल जाता है worried about कच्चे माल in इस व्यवस्था and उगानेवाले किसानों growing indigenous varieties at low prices मिल जाता है market near क्षेत्र पास ही . 
किसान can grow the food-grains of his choice and कपास together and कपास can be grown on relatively less fertile कम उपजाऊ भूमि भी . 
In इस स्थिति the possibility for छोटे किसानों to ज्यादा मुमकिन would होगा more . 
आज in the midst of increasing problems due to भूमंडलीकरण हो गया है has हो गया है necessary to keep वैकल्पिक सोच alive . 
According to the bulletin of विश्‍व बैंक कार्यकाल of growth and विकास आयोग would होगा of दो वर्ष . 
वह is उम्मीद from आयोग that it will increase its understanding in कमी and विकास from the perspective of विकास . 
बैंक claims that आयोग is independent and unbiased . 
Whatever हो , दावा at surface level but यह is far away from यथार्थ . 
If we देखें तो भाषणों , , articles , books etc of the committee then हो जायेगा will हो जायेगा clear that they all are सराबोर in एक ही वैचारिक रंग . 
They all are completely committed to नव - उदारवादी रणनीति साथ of economic growth . 
What was क्या मजबूरी of विश्‍व बैंक that it पहल स्थापना of इस आयोग . 
In order to know this we have to go back a little into the past . 
During आरंभ of 90s जॉन विलियम्सन rendered '' Washington consensus '' which became वैचारिक आधार of भूमंडलीकरण . 
One need not कहना that सक्रिय भूमिका of राज्य in the economic system was नकार and this notion was created that the market forces shall wisely and skillfully allocate संसाधनों with which there will न होगा great economic growth . 
Consequently automatically there will होगा आर्थिक विकास . 
After the defeat of सोवियत संघ , , socialist camp and अमेरिका लगा था that होने बाद could run दुनिया according to its will . 
But वर्षों series of events have disappointed अमेरिका . 
One after देश kept refuting Washington consensus . 
In अनेक देशों there the leftist have आ गये हैं , into power who are against भूमंडलीकरण based on Washington consensus . 
वामपंथ ओर towards वामपंथ ओर continues . 
पश्‍चिमी देशों भी like इटली and जर्मनी are vocal against it . 
The romantic ideas of Thomas Fridman , ' न्यूयार्क टाइम्स ' '' columnist has been wasted . 
The economic differences between countries is incessantly बढ़ती जा रही हैं instead of reducing . 
Perpetually promoted '' चिर प्रचारित ' अमेरिका स्वप्न '' within which there were talks of raising oneself through अंतर्गत प्रतिभा , , लगन and hard work is now in dustbins . 
हैरिस in British newspaper '' Observer '' -LRB- 8th June -RRB- writes that its a regret that स्वप्न ) पुराना तर्क -LRB- American dream -RRB- no more remains correct . 
The gap between the rich and the poor has perpetually increased . 
Consequently क्षमता to cross this bridge has decreased . 
While the salary of अमेरिकी परिवार has increased 18 प्रतिशत in पिछले पचीस वर्षों , there has been 18 प्रतिशत increase in 18 प्रतिशत richest families . 
One does n't आवश्यकता to mention स्थिति of भारत . 
The custom of genetically modified संशोधित आनुवांशिक खाद्य is incessantly increasing in दुनिया . 
अमेरिका is कोशिश hard to निर्यात these food items because उत्पादकों of इन खाद्य पदार्थों have put tremendous pressure on अमेरिका to increase निर्यात as much as possible . 
But after मिलने बाद अनेक तरह of जानकारियां one gets to पता that these processed food is not fit for यह संशोधित खाद्य मानव उपयोग . 
After knowing सच्चाई about इसकी भारत should हतोत्साहित आयात . 
While अमेरिका is भरपूर कोशिश hard for निर्यात through world trade विश्‍व व्यापार संगठन . 
Henry Miller , who has been मुख्य नियंत्रक of American food and drug administration since 1979-1994 says that in this concern the government agencies of अमेरिका did what बड़े कृषि व्यापारियों expected them to do . 
The federal regulation analyst of genetically processed food in फेडरल रेगुलेशन समीक्षक डेविड स्कबर्ट says that most of ज्यादातर खाद्य नियंत्रक of america are trusting सूचनाओं of those who खुद are उत्पादक of बायोटेक फसलों : And the figures given by them have not been प्रकाशित in any of the journals nor have they been analyzed seriously . 
Our governments are also taking कई कदम to सुगम प्रक्रिया of yielding जमीन to the companies . 
Land ceiling acts are being loosely held and बाजार is being विकसित . 
किसान are खुद भी or being मजबूर ) to sell the lands due to नुकसान in खेती and because of the way हो रहा है is continuously being खेती of नुकसान . 
If कृषि is not कृषि सुधार then यह will pose बाधा in रास्ते भी of औद्योगिक विकास because industries are dependent on कृषि and मजदूरी ही for उद्योग कच्चे माल . 
although विकास of कृषि in देश is असंतुलित because of which छोटे किसान कम उत्पादन less and later पलायन from इससे . 
इन समस्याओं of जनसंख्या also adds to these problems . 
Because of this दर among farmers has increased . 
परिणाम of these things in agriculture is that अंतर between किसानों and corporate professionals increases . 
नींव of India-America knowledge was ज्ञान पहल in 2005 when डॉ . मनमोहन सिंह and जार्ज बुश had signed the Agriculture technology agreement . 
While संबोधित both the houses of अमेरिकी संसद during डॉ . मनमोहन सिंह कहा that in भारत हरित क्रांति helped लाखों लोगों get rid of गरीबी : ' मुझे am glad to कहा that me and राष्‍ट्रपति बुश have फैसला to initiate दूसरा चरण of भारत - अमेरिका सहयोग in कृषि क्षेत्र of agriculture . 
After the agreement , a team of कृषि वैज्ञानिकों from भारत went to अमेरिका गया था on December , 2005 to तय the methods of the implementation of इस कार्यक्रम . 
ज्ञान पहल in कृषि क्षेत्र of कृषि has been शुरू at ऐसे समय when कृषि is undergoing tough times . 
Under इस पहल there is व्यवस्था for कृषि क्षेत्र therefore इसलिए is absolutely important for भारत : एक बात which nobody is realizing is that how will इस नवीनतम अमेरिकी टेक्नोलॉजी नहीं हो रहा इस्तेमाल in a country like भारत where 80 % of अस्सी फीसदी जनता is somehow leading life . 
The complete weft of दूसरी हरित क्रांति is हितों इर्द - गिर्द near the benefits of अमेरिकी कृषि - व्यापार . 
The multinational companies -LRB- and भारतीय कृषि अनुसंधान परिषद भी ) also -RRB- who are are planning to देने new technologies are so ultra modern that किसान at large will not be able to get फायदे . 
Although परिषद has publicly कहा है that from लायक खेती आगे यह is leading towards लायक खेती आगे but the truth is that बहस is held in देश on the socio-economic and political कीमत on earning through लायक खेती आगे . 
आमदनी of a farmer in 1993 was just Rupees 211 . 
In other words if we assume that there are पांच सदस्य in परिवार then 99 % of 99 फीसदी किसान fall in वर्ग of poor and weak वर्ग . 
And the most surprising बात is that during the last few years वास्तविक आमदनी of दैनिक मजदूर has fallen down even from the minimum wages of daily workers . 
Is मिले समय that किसान भी also मिले a fixed amount of money हर महीने for एक निश्‍चित धनराशि e ? 
Altogether वह is उत्पादन economic resources for देश and वह needs sufficient compensation . 
There is एक ही रास्ता of आर्थिक स्थायित्व in कृषि क्षेत्र , that is the boundaries of छठे वेतन आयोग should be increased and either किसानों भी should be शामिल in it or छठे वेतन आयोग should be framed for them . 
न्यूनतम भूमि should be made आधार and उत्पादन should be ignored . 
On एक तरफ there are लोग who have a romantic notion of villages where everything is going perfectly well . 
They do not want यह सीन to change . 
From the old kind of naxalites to the new kinds of NGOs सब is कह रहे हैं the same thing . 
पोस्टर , , बुकलेट , , songs , processions , demonstrations are being led by them . 
विरोध is itself a big trade . 
इन्हें can not see that आमदनी is perpetually कम from खेती . 
Raising the lifestyle though खेती is very far , it is even difficult to keep it safe . 
यह are unable to देखने that जिस दुनिया that आज generation of किसानों are सामना does not have romantic kind of villages but बाजार circulated trade . 
On अतिवादिता there are लोग who assume that सरकार should only होना चाहिए the agent of bureaucrats and उद्योगपतियों . 
If टाटा wants जमीन चाहिए , , सरकार should get it . 
If किसी उद्योगपति of इंडोनेशिया needs जगह सरकार should get it . 
Giving lands might हो , जिम्मेदारी of सरकार but हो , is whose responsibility to set proper conditions . 
The industrialists are not doing काम of कोई खैरात . 
They are asking for land to set up factories . 
The rate of जिस जमीन that उद्योगपति procure reach आसमान in कुछ ही वर्षों only . 
किसानों are not इस्का from नहीं होता . 
उनके is necessary to make किसानों understand that how giving जमीन would be सौदा for t m ? 
Therefore कुछ रचनात्मक सुझाव should जा सकते हैं सोचे . 
लोगों have started शुरु to other sectors छोड़कर खेती . 
According to एक सर्वे 57 % of 57 प्रतिशत लोग want to get rid of खेती . 
Will होगा होगा fair to let anyone मर जाने देना taking away their unproductive land or taking advantage of urbanization . 
लोग are trying दूसरे विकल्प everywhere . 
Therefore adopting विशेष आर्थिक क्षेत्र as an elective wo n't नहीं होगा inappropriate . 
While निर्माण sage millions of लाखों युवाओं will मिलेगा job in गैर कृषि क्षेत्र . 
The villagers can चुन सकते हैं बेहतर रोजगार - धंधा in शहर by बेचकर गैरउपयोगी भूमि for सेज . 
Seeing the plight of खेती and बढ़ती problems of किसानों राष्‍ट्रीय किसान आयोग has made अनेक अहम सिफारिशें . 
But सवाल is that up to which extent will सरकार implement them . 
आयोग had दी थी पहली रिपोर्ट in अप्रैल इस साल . 
Now it has given even the fifth that is रिपोर्ट भी to केंद्रीय कृषि मंत्रालय . 
आयोग was स्थापना during the regime of पिछली सरकार ही . 
With काफी उत्साह यूपीए सरकार पुनर्गठन इसका in 2004 under अध्यक्षता of एमएस स्वामीनाथन and the responsibility of framing its strategic format to save the interest of किसानों was assigned . 
But the draft of राष्‍ट्रीय किसान आयोग consists of कई ऐसे सुझाव which can असुविधाजनक to हो सकते हैं difficult for सरकार . 
During 1994-95 खपत of खाद्यान्न थी , 180 किलो which घटकर to 176.5 kgs in 2001 . 
संपन्न लोगों मिलती है , 2100 to 2636 कैलोरी of खुराक while खुराक of poor has घटकर to 2636 कैलोरी . 
According to योजना आयोग 23.62 of 23.62 प्रतिशत लोग live below गरीबी रेखा नीचे in शहरी आबादी while in ग्रामीण क्षेत्र it is just 27.09 प्रतिशत . 
सारे दावे of आर्थिक तरक्की of जिस देश are false whose 27 27 करोड़ आबादी can not even fulfill four square meal . 
Therefore सरकार should keep a sharp eye on कृषि उत्पादन and विपणन of भारत . 
उसकी is the duty of राज्य to provide सभी with सेहतमंद खुराक therefore इसलिए needs to maintain a balance between लाभकारी मूल्य of किसान उपज and आपूर्ति of खाद्यान्न according to खरीद क्षमता भीतर of the poor . 
There are many government schemes that are आधारित on खाद्यान्न such as राशन कार्ड , , midday meal for poor children , employment guarantee रोजगार गारंटी स्कीम etc. . 
Because of this सरकार has to खरीद खाद्यान्न - There are a total of कुल 11 राज्य in देश where abundance of धान , and गेहूं are अतिरिक्‍त उत्पादन and the food corporation buys खाद्यान्न from कुल 11 राज्य . 
The rest of राज्य are राज्य . 
For विगत तीन वर्षों उत्पादन of गेहूं has 7 करोड़ मीट्रिक तन आसपास to 7 crore metric tonnes . 
In नयी विश्‍व व्यवस्था it is not only mandatory for किसानों to खरीदना केवल बीज from the multinational companies but it is also बड़ी वजह भी behind their plight . 
If Reliance buys सेबों of रिलायंस हिमाचल , किसानों will होगा , फायदा from this , the intermediaries will end but will इससे फायदा ? ? 
कश्मीरी सेब of हिमाचल are popular among आम लोगों since होने is relatively cheaper than कश्मीरी सेब of Kashmir . 
After खरीद बाद of रिलायंस wo n't ये सेब नहीं हो जायेंगे expensive and beyond पहुंच बाहर of common peo e ? 
Undoubtedly इस is जिम्मेदारी of सरकार to keep an eye on this but भूमिका as प्रबंधक now is not satisfying . 
It is remarkable that WTO is एक ऐसा संगठन of देशों of डब्ल्यूटीओ दुनिया which believes in making व्यापार and वाणिज्य intuitive and easy . 
Though डब्ल्यूटीओ became effective since 1st January ,1995 but in reality हुआ , आया है into अस्तित्व in यह वर्ष by the signatories of '' एक बहुपक्षीय व्यापारिक व्यवस्था , General agreement on ' प्रशुल्क and व्यापार -LRB- ( गैट ) -RRB- through the Urugway round of वार्ताओं . 
गैट वार्ता were सीमित to tariff reductions for व्यापार and पहुंच of commodities to बाजारों . 
The members of सदस्य देशों started व्यापार वार्ता in 2001 for subsidies tariff reductions , other obstacles of व्यापार and अर्थव्यवस्था of सदस्य देशों . 
इस वार्ता has to end in the year 2004 but the various governments of सदस्य देशों could not अनुपालन to इस समय सीमा . 
Consequently यह वार्ता kept moving forward and in December , 2005 in Hong Kong फैसला was taken in बैठक that a new agreement in कटौती of कृषि and commodities व्यापार . 
If we मूल्यांकन the profits of विकासशील देशों under डब्ल्यूटीओ we see that विकासशील देशों of दुनिया are hardly getting प्राप्‍त लाभों . 
Majority of ज्यादातर विकासशील देश have now रह गये हैं शुद्ध खाद्य आयातक . 
आजीविका related to खेती has suffered भारी हानि . 
In भारत उन्होंने had reviewed the Urugway round of GATT negotiations as a major economist of विश्‍व बैंक , since then उन्होंने has found that both the agenda and consequences of डब्ल्यूटीओ are against विकासशील देशों . 
विकासशील देश can not be dumb for not seeing ठोस लाभ from व्यवस्था , they should डगर on the path of open market agreements -LRB- ( एफटीए ) -RRB- . 
Currently there are more than 400 FTA in the world . 
Now it is necessary for संगठनों like G-20 to warn विकासशील देशों like अमेरिका and संगठनों for हितों of विकासशील देशों including भारत is if at all अधिकार of विकासशील देशों regarding lowering शुल्क on औद्योगिक उत्पादों under डब्ल्यूटीओ are हनन , किसी प्रकार of बातचीत संबंधित to कार्य सूची of दोहा वार्ता shall be stopped . 
It is remarkable that with the vision of making डब्ल्यूटीओ दुनिया a global village WTO , is एक ऐसा वैश्‍विक संगठन which aims to make व्यापार and वाणिज्य intuitive and easy . 
Though WTO became effective since 1st डब्ल्यूटीओ 1 जनवरी , , 1995 but in reality हुआ , आया है into अस्तित्व in the year 1947 by the signatories of '' एक बहुपक्षीय व्यापारिक व्यवस्था , General agreement on ' प्रशुल्क and व्यापार -LRB- ( गैट ) -RRB- through the Urugway round of trade negotiations . 
While गैट वार्ताएं were सीमित to tariff reductions for व्यापार and पहुंच of goods to बाजारों , while डब्ल्यूटीओ seems to move ahead and make प्रयास for the effectiveness of world व्यापार व्यापारिक नियमों and make agricultural services and बातचीतों more extensive . 
Till now विकासशील देश were putting huge taxes on आयात of औद्योगिक उत्पादों and services while these taxes are less on agricultural goods . 
In the Doha round , विकसित देशों asked विकसित देशों that if they कम आयात on industrial produce and services , विकसित देशों would कम आयात on agricultural goods in विकसित देशों . 
Agriculture is ताकत and कृषि आपकी will मिल जायेगा , बड़ा बाजार for agricultural produce with this , while we will मिल जायेगा , बड़ा बाजार for industrial produce and services . 
विकसित देश are persistently नामा ) that विकसित देश should curtail the tax on गैर कृषि उत्पादों , in short इसे is कहा गया है non agricultural market exchange . 
For विश्‍व व्यापार , वार्ता between जी - 4 देशों has शुरू . 
Once again आर्थिक रस्साकशी of war between the rich and गरीब देशों बीच has शुरू . 
There are disagreements on the issue of giving रियायतों in कृषि क्षेत्र between developing and देशों बीच . 
While विकासशील देश want विकासशील देश to reduce फार्म सब्सिडी being दी जा रही to किसानों so that the goods of विकासशील देश could be बिक सकें , in विकासशील देश , वहीं developed विकासशील देश want to मिल सके more and more बाजारों of विकासशील देश . 
During Kankun World trade meeting in 2003 , the then commerce minister of तत्कालीन वाणिज्य मंत्री अरुण जेटली घोषणा that वह will not हुए ready for any agreement until सब्सिडी being बरकरार to अमीर देशों persists . 
But while पहुंचते - पहुंचते अंतिम चरण -LRB- which was finally unsuccessful due to बहिष्कार of अफ्रीकी देशों -RRB- of वार्ता India compromised for many inappropriate agreements . 
कमलनाथ भी is also walking on the footprints of his antecedent . 
After wrapping up the July 2004 framework hastily , in which अमीर देशों were allowed to increase कृषि सहयोग , Kamalnath थे , against reconsidering the agreement because it only contained the issues of विकास of अमीर देशों . 
Right before the ministerial level meeting आयोजित in Hong Kong in 2005 , कमलनाथ had घोषणा that there will not नहीं होगी कोई वास्तविक कटौती in कृषि सब्सिडी through जो प्रस्ताव put by अमेरिका . 
It will होगी असली कटौती when the amount of government treasure that अमेरिका gets will reduce . 
For टिकाऊ कृषि विकास छोटे किसानों are needed , rather यह can be कहा जा सकता है that a secure stable टिकाऊ कृषि विकास for a longer from the point of view of पर्यावरण time without छोटे किसानों is not possible . 
खेती done with मदद of machines is able to देने तो अधिक उपज in less time but it fails to maintain the fertility of मिट्टी . 
विकास of कृषि in मानव सभ्यता was basically done by छोटे किसान ही . 
Generations after generations they ploughed किसी भूमि to maintain the fertility of किसी भूमि . 
यह is very essential that छोटे किसान मिले मजबूतम भूमिका in किसान संगठनों , if यह does not happens छोटे किसान can also आरंभ किसान संगठनों . 
There should होना चाहिए आपसी तालमेल between संगठनों of विभिन्न देशों so that they strengthen their voices against अनुचित कृषि , , food grain , व्यापर नीतियों and rules and regulations . 
यह is unfortunate that until now both capitalist and communist systems have been doing अन्याय to छोटे किसानों . 
In ऊतक संवर्धन प्रयोगशाला पौधों are grown in totally controlled पूर्ण नियंत्रित वातावरण . 
Before निर्माण पहले इस प्रयोगशाला one should determine आकार and आकार of व्यावसायिक and इस प्रयोगशाला . 
Further यह भी should also be determined that how many कितने पौधे can be तैयार with इस प्रयोगशाला . 
Generally शोध and व्यावसायिक प्रयोगशाला are similar . 
Generally ऐसे स्थान with less fluctuation in तापमान and moderate climate is chosen for स्थापना of प्रयोगशाला . 
In ऐसी स्थिति hilly and क्षेत्र are suitable . 
Further electricity arrangements should be primarily taken ध्यान of . 
उस स्थान where बिजली is available at cheaper rate should हो , preferred . 
ऊतक संवर्धन कक्ष is ऊतक संवर्धन कक्ष of प्रयोगशाला . 
The size and shape of संवर्धन depends upon the growth of पौधे . 
फर्श and walls of साधारण संवर्धन कक्ष should have tiles . 
In संवर्धन कक्ष , there should होनी चाहिए facility of लैमिनारफ्लो and nutritive medium and grown medium to growth संवर्धन कक्ष . 
Further छत of कक्ष should have two ultraviolet tube light . 
Generally माध्यम कक्ष is made in the middle of प्रयोगशाला . 
ऊतक संवर्धन कक्ष should be bigger than ऊतक संवर्धन कक्ष and ऊतक संवर्धन कक्ष so that पर्याप्‍त जगह is there to build संवर्धन माध्यम . 
There should हो a wooden table with टॉप लगी where संवर्धन माध्यम making कार्य could हो safely done . 
There should be arrangements for अल्मारियों on the walls of कक्ष where रसायन आदि could be रखा जा सके . 
pH meter : पीएच and the alkalinity of माध्यम could be examined and brought to पीएच . 
रेफ्रिजरेटर : It is helpful in saving heat संवेदी रसायन and हार्मोन while तैयार : संवर्धन माध्यम . 
दो रेफ्रिजेरेटर should be उपयोग as per the requirement . 
Electronic balance : This इस तोलक machine is primarily उपयोग to weigh ऐसे रसायनों which are उपयोग in अति सूक्ष्म मात्रा . 
इस कक्ष is primarily उपयोग in व्यावसायिक प्रयोगशाला . 
यह कक्ष should be built in अन्तिम हिस्से of प्रयोगशाला adjoining the nutritive medium यह कक्ष of प्रयोगशाला भवन . 
आकार of इस कक्ष should be रखा जाना चाहिए smaller than the above mentioned three sections . 
छत of इस कक्ष should have दो अल्ट्रावाइलेट , 3 feet long tube lights . 
There should होनी चाहिए medium light according to the requirement . 
इस कक्ष should have दो एयरकंडीशनर which should work automatically after every 15 hours . 
आटोक्लेविंग कक्ष is भाग of प्रयोगशाला where पोषक माध्यम is made germ free through this equipment . 
यह भाग of कक्ष should be built bigger as compared to other sections . 
दोमुखी ऑटोक्लेव should be placed in इस प्रकार in कक्ष that एक हिस्सा should be towards माध्यम भण्डारण and एक हिस्सा of दोमुखी ऑटोक्लेव should open in कक्ष , एक हिस्सा should be completely sealed . 
There should be a 6 feet long fiber window beside इस कक्ष of प्रयोगशाला which could be opened and closed . 
इसका is प्रयोग to make the nutritive vehicle microbe-free and filtration of निर्जमीकृत . 
Through पिछले हिस्से of ऑटोक्लेव , the vehicle is loaded with सहायता of trolley . 
इस ऑटोक्लेव can be run through LPG and बिजली both . 
The filtered vehicle can be directly ले जा सकते हैं to भण्डारण कक्ष through अगले द्वार . 
There has been महत्वपूर्ण प्रभाव of उदारीकरण of भारतीय अर्थव्यवस्था on विकास of जैव - प्रौद्योगिकी उद्योग . 
सूक्ष्म - प्रवर्धन of पौधों through ऊतक संवर्धन has सिद्ध to हुआ है excessive successful and popular माध्यम of जनप्रिय आर्थिक विकास . 
There has been व्यावसायीकरण of सूक्ष्म - प्रवर्धन तकनीक at विश्‍व - स्तर , , in countries with औद्योगिक कृषि . 
According to the received figures more than 796 commercial companies of the world are associated with such activities that संख्या are persistently बढ़ती ही जा रही है . 
Approximately 90 crore saplings are annually वार्षिक उत्पादन . 
आज ऊतक संवर्धन उद्योग is primarily fulfilling the requirements of पुष्प - कृषि and उद्यान - कृषि क्षेत्रों . 
In fact tissue ऊतक संवर्धन उद्योग ही is the backbone of पुष्प - कृषि and ऊतक संवर्धन उद्योग ही . 
There is उपभोग , primarily in developed countries and होता है is mostly dependent on social , economic and cultural factors . 
Tissue culture companies are बढ़ रही है in the world and around 90 लगभग 90 करोड़ पौधों are being उत्पादन in इस क्षेत्र . 
संभावित मांग of seeds for agriculture , agriculture-flowers and वानिकी फसलों in the world is 160 billion 160 खरब पौध प्रतिवर्ष . 
सकल बाजार is 40 billion 40 खरब annually . 
There are around 120 registered companies in भारत but only 30 are available with उत्पादों in बाजार . 
वार्षिक उत्पादन is approximately 5 5 करोड़ . 
उत्पादन क्षमता in tissue culture depends on many factors such as multiplication rate , स्थानांतरण चक्र , , दक्षता , of workers , लागत मूल्य incurred etc. . 
लागत मूल्य could be कम by अनुसंधान एवं विकास लाभप्रद तकनीक professionally with persistent research and अनुसंधान एवं विकास . 
प्रवर्धन is very beneficial in the places where other methods of स्ट्रॉबेरी do not work such as स्ट्रॉबेरी or उन पौधों where उपज of उन पौधों is more than उन पौधों like केला and cardamom . 
For गुणन of अति विशिष्‍ट जातियों at बड़े स्तर , with लक्ष्य of presenting ऊतक - सवर्धन प्रौद्योगिकी , in 1989 जैव - प्रौद्योगिकी विभाग had स्थापित two tissue culture pilot machines , टाटा ऊर्जा शोध संस्थान , नई - दिल्ली -LRB- T.E.R.I. -RRB- and राष्‍ट्रीय रासायनिक प्रयोगशाला , Pune -LRB- N.C. . 
These two services as national services were स्थापित with मुख्य उद्देश्य of गुणन through ऊतक - संवर्धन of अति विशिष्‍ट वन - वृक्ष . 
Every pilot plant had क्षमता to उत्पादन 10 million saplings . 
The initial figures say that in 95-98 % micro-amplified प्रवर्धन पौध सफलतापूर्वक वृद्धि भी is successful . 
मुख्य लक्ष्य of running field testing at many places was to अध्ययन उपयोगिता of various clones in अनेक कृषि - जलवायु क्षेत्रों . 
With प्राप्‍त परिणामों , , best श्रेष्‍ठतम वृद्धि highly specialized clones were identified at a particular place . 
ऊतक संवर्धित पौधों are seen to have cloning क्लोनीय समानता up to 90 प्रतिशत in almost all matters . 
The chief objective of जातियों , फील्ड मूल्यांकन especially of विशेषतया वन - वृक्षों is to test genetic integrity of ऊतक संवर्धित पौधों . 
दशानुकूलन प्रक्रिया is एक मुख्य बाधा from the perspective of विशिष्‍ट आवश्यकताओं concerning विभिन्न कृषि - जलवायु क्षेत्रों in गुणन , of वन - वृक्षों and अन्य पौधों through संवर्धन . 
For प्रभावी निस्तारण of these matters विभाग has दी है प्रमुखता to relatively smaller acclimation units fulfilling the requirements in विशिष्‍ट कृषि जलवायवीय क्षेत्रों . 
But six acclimation units have been स्थापित in जम्मू and Guwahati . 
In the beginning कार्यक्रम प्रारंभ , on जातियों of वन वृक्षों which later विस्तृत to कृषि and फसलों . 
अध्ययन centers roughly 65 लगभग 65 विभिन्न जातियों and for approximately 20 लगभग 65 विभिन्न जातियों , protocols of संपूर्ण प्रौद्योगिकी have been standardized . 
कुछ प्रोटोकालों of कुछ प्रोटोकालों is still going on and roughly 10 लगभग 10 जातियां are being grown successfully at व्यावसायिक स्तर . 
उद्योग have been transferred for व्यावसायिक उत्पादन of इन जातियों through संवर्धन . 
Though तकनीक of vegetative propagation was विकसित through somatic embryo but the plats thus विकसित could not गया acclimatized . 
Therefore शोध on इस विषय has been stopped . 
Amplification protocol for चाय and मसालों have been विकसित and there is आवश्यकता to नियंत्रित the biological and non-biological stress of इन फसलों , Also procreation liquid is being listed through molecular sign . 
एक प्रमुख प्राथमिकता of विभाग has been स्थापना of acclimatization units which पूरा आवश्यकताओं of विभिन्न कृषि जलवायु क्षेत्रों . 
According to an estimate roughly 300 लगभग 300 व्यावसायिक प्रयोगशालाएं are कार्यरत in the world . 
क्षमता of majority of अधिकांश नई प्रयोगशालाओं is 2 million plants . 
In भारत roughly 125 प्रयोगशालाएं were स्थापित out of which प्रयोगशालाएं are कार्यरत and 44 were have been बंद . 
Roughly 25 4 प्रयोगशालाएं in Maharashtra , 9 in कर्नाटक , 6 in आंध्र प्रदेश , 7 in गुजरात and तमिलनाडु and 4 in केरल are चल रही हैं . 
छोटी प्रयोगशालाएं are चल रही हैं in उत्तर प्रदेश -LRB- 4 -RRB- , Sikkim , Panjab -LRB- 1 -RRB- , हरियाणा -LRB- 3 -RRB- and असम but उत्पादक क्षमता is less . 
Roughly 15 laboratories are प्रवर्धन फसलों . 
Anthuriam , Kailanthe , Dieffenbachia , Ficus , cardiline , orchid , gerbera are शोभाकारी पौधों . 
समुचित इस्तेमाल of कृषि भूमि is एक महत्वपूर्ण पहलू of भौगोलिक अध्ययन . 
इसका are primarily संबंध with भौगोलिक कृषि . 
भूमि उपयोग is automatically clear . 
But in उपयोग and व्याख्या of the purpose of their options poses many complexes . 
उसे has been considered the best as उपयोग is small . 
According to the natural characteristics of भूमि , उपयोग is the real and उपयोग of land surface . 
अध्ययन is primarily concerned with आच्छादन of vegetation cover . 
यह is एक औपचारिक संकल्पना in क्षेत्र of भूगोल . 
Land plan is प्रक्रिया of दोहन of भू - योजना - भूमि उपयोग that is भूमि is applied for a specific theme . 
अविकसित क्षेत्र by humans are negative from the perspective of भू - योजना . 
परीक्षण without coordinating the works of आवरण from the point of view of उपयोग is considered to be a nonsensical and insignificant practice . 
Land use-It is एक क्रिया . 
That is उपयोग the land surface through भूमि आवरण . 
The '' Land Cover '' is उपयोग in इस ग्रंथ for '' तत्त्वों , whether they are natural or man निर्मित . 
भूमि उपयोग is अर्थ of Land-plan . 
इसमें includes भूमि आवरण . 
It would होगा appropriate to incorporate all kinds of भूमि उपयोग in व्यापक अध्ययन of भूमि उपयोग . 
सर्वेक्षणों of भूमि उपयोग should always be noted for जरूरतों of experts and also the unaware because भूमि उपयोग सर्वेक्षणों is एक महँगा उपक्रम and भूमि उपयोग is affects everybody in किसी रूप or another . 
Using भूमि विभिन्न प्रयोगों विभिन्न प्रयोगों is as ancient is संबंध of कृषि with humans . 
उपनिवेश was ली गई in interval estimation of भूमि संसाधनों because of the investment in नये देशों . 
In 1919 for the first time maps expressing भूमि उपयोग in systematic manner was considered . 
Forests have been classified in the form of गुल्म वनों , , गुल्म वनों , and clusters . 
इसमें includes ऐसे वन which do not have any pre planted harvesting whether they are conical , deciduous or mixed ऐसे वन . 
हेरफेर चरागाहों from the point of view of भूमि प्रबन्ध in the form of भूमि is appropriate but इससे as led to some problems in व्याख्या . 
चरागाह were रखा गया है , in एक ही वर्ग after सर्वेक्षण done in 1938 in northern Ireland , whether होता हो has changes or चरागाह is found . 
Because of पर्याप्‍त विस्तार एक श्रेणी was आरंभ for the below mentioned green land . 
Though विस्तार of बाग is not significant in ग्रेट ब्रिटेन . 
अनेक प्रतिवेदन were written to describe every kind of land in ब्रिटेन . 
It was also प्रकाशित भी in मध्य भागों during 1936-1946 . 
Thus समय between आरम्भ क्षेत्रीय कार्य and प्रतिवेदन of प्रतिवेदन seems more . 
Gardens are लिखा गया है with चरागाह and tree-crops are लिखा गया है together . 
Because of the problems of grass field सभी तरह of fodders are kept in एक ही श्रेणी . 
कुछ सुधार for भूमियों with युक्‍त घास or युक्‍त घास have been done . 
उपयोग सर्वेक्षण is एक आयोजना तैयार by अन्तर्राष्‍ट्रीय भौगोलिक संघ . 
Its objective is to तैयार land use report and मानचित्र for the entire world . 
One of the objectives of भूमि उपयोग is to प्रोत्साहित मानचित्रण of भूमि उपयोग on the standard of 1:1,000,000 . 
The objective of सीमित संख्या was to achieve आवश्यक श्रेणी of ध्येय in सर्वेक्षण and arranging desired subsections for स्थानीय विवरणों . 
Though मुख्य वर्गीकरण of nine categories presents numerous problems in साधारणीकरण of सर्वेक्षणों for पुननिर्माण maps . 
The main land use maps of ब्रिटेन were reduced on 1:625,000 standards to get सामान्य निष्कर्ष . 
At least क्षेत्रफल of 100 acres could be shown on this standard . 
That is why निकटवर्ती खेतों were broken into pieces and तथावत was made as इसके was before . 
It था necessary to have at least 200 acre or क्षेत्रफल to get सामान्य निष्कर्षों on 1:1,000,000 standards . 
so far कई देश have तैयार land use maps on various standards . 
Certainly काम भी is going on in these countries on this issue . 
There is अभाव of प्रामाणिकता because of the association of कई अधिकारियों , different issues and adopting many methods in एकैक राष्‍ट्रीय सर्वेक्षणों . 
शासन gives शासन of राष्‍ट्रीय योजना on contract to निजी कम्पनियों . 
इन सर्वेक्षणों do not aim at publication . 
In वर्तमान परिप्रेक्ष्य विस्तृत क्षेत्रों could be surveyed through air photography . 
No one raise ऊंगली on महत्त्व of भूमि सर्वेक्षण for practical works . 
There are many examples of अनुप्रयोग in भौतिक नियोजन . 
एक रोचक ग्रंथ has been तैयार with the work details of Anglo-Polish Geographical Seminar . 
इसमें has potential scope from ब्रिटिश सर्वेक्षण for मानचित्रण विकास in एक नियोजित अर्थव्यवस्था . 
उद्देश्य is to अध्ययन those methods with which मानवीय व्यवस्था uses प्राकृतिक पर्यावरण . 
Necessarily यह is एक भौगोलिक अध्ययन which can only be completed through सर्वेक्षण ही . 
यह सर्वेक्षण presents आधार for अधिक विवेकशील प्रयोग भौगोलिक परिवेश with more intellect . 
यह इसका is its more practical व्यावहारिक महत्त्व . 
कृषि भूगोल is still विकास . 
कुछ वर्ष पूर्व back इसमें also शामिल विज्ञान especially Phytosocilogy . 
Thus Polish survey majorly views उद्देश्य of पोलिश सर्वेक्षण and क्षेत्र . 
वह clarifies the meanings of words like भूमि आवरण and भूमि उपयोग -LRB- with what ( जिन अर्थों they are भूमि उपयोग here -RRB- . 
वह also clarifies the figures of the background and also the shapes of the farms . 
Generally such figures are प्रस्तुत using various maps . 
इनका is essential for them to होना like glass coverings . 
In order to explain सुविधापूर्वक with ease they should be प्रयोग with coverings such as physical conditions , परिवहन क्षमता and outlay . 
Presenting ऐसे विवरणों on basic land use maps has been predefined purpose of Poland maps so that व्यावहारिक नियोजन could हो सके helped . 
In land use maps it is essential to emphasize the association of presented product with वास्तविक चित्रण . 
Since उपयोग मानचित्र marks भूमि उपयोग of किसी समय , basically they can not do anything other than drawing general picture of land views . 
Since एक वर्ष घास is grown in एक खेत for दूसरे वर्ष , cereals can होने पहले ही grown in इसलिए दूसरे वर्ष therefore मानचित्र becomes untimely before publication . 
यह असफलता of भूमि उपयोग comes up because of not न समझने ही such maps . 
इस तकनीक is आलोचना on इस आधार . 
Interchange of फसलों in any of the seasons expresses Rotation and this interchange compensates this shortcoming because of the thus बदलावों in अन्य खेतों . 
The stability patterns of technologically changing देशों like ग्रेट ब्रिटेन could be explained in comparison to maps of various dates . 
Thus मानचित्र can be assumed to be एक प्रामाणिक दस्तावेज for अनेक वर्षों . 
The duration of प्रामाणिकता depends on प्रकृति and दर of परिवर्तन . 
यह आशय of recording physical beauty is that there is ऐसा कोई संकेत in मानचित्र which proves whether उपयोग is according to its quality or not . 
कुछ विशिष्‍ट प्रकरण could हो सकते हैं , उच्चावचन such as fluctuation relation . 
Using पीले रंग to show संतोषप्रद भूमि and चरागाह in highlands of Scotland expresses that satisfying उपयोग is found at ऊँचाई . 
मृदा is not एकमात्र भौतिक घटक in the fertility of मृदा . 
Many plans of वर्गीकरण for estimating साधनों of भूमि have been विकसित . 
उद्देश्य of संभाव्यता is to propose प्रस्थापित of उत्पादकता or non-productivity of every tested land section . 
Such a separation could हो सकता है to निर्धारित that the particular land area is प्रयोग for कम सघन चरागाह and यह should हो सकता है अविकसित ही for पुनर्वनरोपण योजनाओं , reformed खेती or यह should हो सकता है अविकसित ही undeveloped . 
While as पथ - प्रदर्शक यह clarifies whether that land area should be संरक्षित for क्या वर्तमान उपयोग or अनुमति should be allowed to construct भवन निर्माण there . 
It is तैयार for कृषि विकास or a species of वृक्ष or crop . 
वर्गीकरण is उदाहरण presented by United Nations soil Conservation which is primarily आधारित on erosion hazards . 
संरक्षण उद्देश्यों is गुणात्मक प्राक्कलन of भूमि for कृषि and separator conservation . 
इसने has स्वीकार eight categories within इसने . 
Its primary category is '' appropriate उपयुक्‍त भूमि ' for प्राथमिक वर्गीकरण ' खेती . 
उपयुक्‍त भूमि appropriate for कृषि . 
First category - प्रथम श्रेणी - अति उत्तम भूमि , , which is जोता जाता है through simple agricultural methods in अक्षत रूप . 
Second Category - द्वितीय श्रेणी - ऐसी भूमि which is जोता जा सकता है with सीमित पूर्वावधान साथ in अक्षत रूप . 
Third Category-Under the third kind of तृतीय श्रेणी - तृतीय भूमि there are restrictions in उपयोग but they can होते हैं , जोता जा सकता है regularly by keeping precaution in संकटों . 
Fourth Category - श्रेणी - एसी भूमि which is उपयोग in too harsh restricted methods . 
खेतों can be सीमित to प्रासंगिक फसलों ही by keeping strict monitoring . 
इसके needs सस्यावर्तन in छह वर्ष . 
पश्‍चात अनाज or रिजका ( is often practical . 
पंचम श्रेणी - पंचम श्रेणी - पंचम श्रेणी - पंचम श्रेणी consists of ऐसी भूमि which is roughly plain but because of पथरीलेपन and other reasons कृषि was not possible on हो . 
Because of some restrictions forest वन व्यवस्था and चराई is not possible in ऐसी भूमि . 
श्रेणी - इस श्रेणी consists of ऐसी भूमि which is dry , rugged and wet or which is unfit for खेती . 
इस प्रकार of भूमि can be जोता जा सकता है most adequately for स्थापित चरागाह . 
फसलें can be sown in few lands . 
Seventh category - अन्तर्गत चराई or वन व्यवस्था under harsh restrictions or कठोर अपरदन संकट is लक्षण of उपयोग . 
In श्रेणी erosion rate is more fast as compared to श्रेणी because of अपक्षय of आवरण . 
Because of उद्देश्यों , वन व्यवस्था is preferred over चराई . 
Eighth category - भूमि is considered inappropriate for forest system pasture and खेती . 
इसमें consists of दलदल , , बेहड़ भूमि , , मरुस्थल and high hills . 
भूमि is useful only for wild animals , परिरक्षण and water course if उचित जलविभाजन संरक्षण उपायों are taken . 
महत्त्व of इस वर्गीकरण is seen where मृदा अपरदन and अन्य संकट limit खेती . 
For व्यापक नियोजन of भूमि प्रयोग यह is essential to भूमि प्रयोग प्रमुख कारकों deduced from the major factors of पर्यावरण . 
वर्गीकरण योजना generally tries to express natural qualities hidden in एक भूमि . 
Regarding मृदा यह can होते हैं assumed that while निर्धारित मूल्य of रासायनिक तत्वों of मृदा are more helpful as compared to रासायनिक तत्वों . 
The nutritional status of मृदा can हो सकती है completely artificial which means हो सकती है depends on प्रणाली and प्रयोग of manures . 
If गठन drainage etc. characteristics are satisfying then the nutritional status of such land which is inborn worst can हो built up . 
उत्पादकता lowers because of specific soil status or काफी विपरीत प्रभाव of one or more factors of मृदा . 
While निर्धारण भूमि वर्गीकरण प्रणाली for land प्रयोग in tropical area one should वहां that they have opposite conditions as compared to शीतोष्ण कटिबंध area . 
वर्गीकरण in शीतोष्ण कटिबंध has बहुत अधिक विकसित a lot . 
The methods उपयोग in शीतोष्ण भूमियों could guide the surveyors in ऊष्णकटिबंधीय भूमि as simple principles . 
Some factors have completely different अलग प्रभाव there . 
For example progress in ऊँचाई in temperate regions generally has हानिप्रद प्रभाव . 
While in tropical regions इसका is beneficial . 
Definitely जलवायु and मृदा are popular as significant indicator . 
If one knows about the habitat factors of जातियों and its associates then हो can हो इस्तेमाल in a simple way . 
While शीतोष्ण कटिबंध the soil fertility in temperate regions भौतिक लक्षण are more significant as compared to chemical status . 
नाइट्रोजन , , फॉस्फेट पोटाश and चूना can be regularly चूना in विशाल मात्रा to वाणिज्य फसलों . 
From economic perspective ऐसा this is possible because ऐसा for वाणिज्य खेती is available there . 
It is known through various sources that there has been उर्वरकता in the fertility of ऊष्णकटिबंधीय मृदाओं under कृषि . 
The depreciation is especially fast in wet forests . 
There was नियमित द्विवर्षीय सस्यावर्तन of मक्का and cassava in घाना for 8 वर्षों . 
यह was undertaken in अनुपस्थिति of प्रभावों of उर्वरकों . 
After चौथे चक्र बाद of पैदावार of चौथे चक्र बाद , the mature accessories were removed . 
It is यह अनुमान that in the serial order in Malaya , भूमि produces 1500-200 , 1200 and 820 pounds of 820 पौण्ड धान . 
लाभ of प्रयुक्‍त खाद used in खेतों is only for few months while in temperate regions मिलता है yields लाभ for roughly three तीन वर्षों . 
Therefore व्यावहारिक वर्गीकरण of ऊष्ण कटिबंधीय भूमियों should have class differences . 
गोरु has लिखा है that if गठन of मृदाओं is appropriate then ऊष्ण कटिबंधीय कृषि can fulfill its requirements through मृदाओं only . 
By that उनके meant to कहने that गठन is completely in पर्याप्‍त रूप there . 
यह is एक ऐसा सामान्य निष्कर्ष which can not नहीं हो सकता है completely applicable to समस्त ऊष्ण कटिबंधीय पौधों but यह should follow the criteria of वर्गीकरण . 
It is difficult to bring परिवर्तन in मृदा for लम्बे काल later . 
But होता है is related to आयु and maturity of मृदाओं . 
गौरु has mentioned that very special high quality soils are riverine alluvium . 
ये are extremely new accumulation . 
They flow and आती हैं from ये उन क्षेत्रों where there is no tropical season corrosion . 
योग्य जमीन should न हो kept away from योग्य जमीन where there is कोई भी संभावना of सुधार . 
Laterite and such soils in which laterite elements are not so developed should be considered worst . 
Because of उपलब्धता of पानी फसलों grow in तटीय पट्टी of sterile sand . 
But यह has been स्वीकार that विकास of वन संसाधनों चारा कृषि will take समय . 
इस समयावधि of उत्पादन should be विकसित during this time . 
ऐसा is essential to ऐसा this keeping आवश्यकता of आर्थिक स्थिति in mind . 
It has been suggested that for अधिक दशकों or चावल वंशीय फल , , वंशीय फल , and for उत्पादन special efforts should be undertaken . 
इन्हें are sold in पण्य क्षेत्रों of निर्यात to get financial aid for लम्बे समय . 
Certainly जमीन should n't be badly used intentionally for saving समय . 
For such problems used soils under systematic pasture would होंगी more productive . 
For विकास of इस क्षेत्र यह has been सुझाव that for नियोजन of इस क्षेत्र one should केन्द्रित on पशुधन पालन and यह is clarified with examples of land scope mapping . 
Though किसान will जरूरत seed sowing concerning directions while sowing seeds . 
For this commodity systems are also आवश्यक here then only self confidence among किसानों regarding भविष्य of इस उद्योग could होंगी activated . 
But तात्कालिक जरूरत of यहाँ is of a reliable cash crop which should n't get अधिक महत्त्व except executor crop in अर्थव्यवस्था of this region . 
Planting उच्च स्थलीय चावल has been recommended to इस लक्ष्य the target in this region . 
There is दक्षिणी भाग in south where there was लाभ in उत्पादन पहले of केला and अनन्नास but they could not नियमित पण्यक्षेत्र एक ऐसा क्षेत्र . 
चावल is grown near the coastal pit of Varanako . 
Attention should be paid to संभावनाओं of building चरागाह for पशुपालन पशुपालन in इस क्षेत्र भी . 
निर्यात of acrobat , cattle wealth and चावल will होगी easy with निर्माण of घाट for ships . 
Attention should होता हो paid on उत्पादन of ऐसी फसलों where there is कम नुकसान in transportation . 
भूमि could हो सकती है more productive there . 
पैदावार clarifies पैदावार in the remote and well developed मृदा क्षेत्रों of संयुक्‍त राज्य where paddy are पैदावार . 
According to स्थानीय महत्त्व of every crop , the simple percentage weighting equal to the production section crop gradation could be deduced . 
Such soils whose average weight is between 100-90 are रखा जाता है in section 1 , those between 90-80 are रखा जाता है in section 2 and accordingly . 
The Storie Index is एक आगमनिक विधि . 
इस विधि is उपयोग in संयुक्‍त राज्य and अन्य देशों . 
यह विधि depends upon the soil quality . 
परिच्छेदिका of quality are determined in three factors . 
One of those factors is धरातलीय गठन . 
Everything is उद्धरित in the form of अनुमानित प्रतिशत of optimum conditions of उस पौधे growth . 
Now होती है is assumed in सोवियत संघ that for अत्यधिक उत्पादन from the state and collective farms होती है is essential to pay ध्यान on अत्यधिक उत्पादन of various land classes and outlays . 
The lands are classified together with विविध भूमि प्रकारों of भूमि on आधार of विभेद in different classes but distinction in fertility and work ability . 
कृषि is divided into two classes on आधार of आपूर्ति of कृषि योग्य भूमि . 
खेती - गहन कृषि - इस प्रकार of खेती are found in those lands where there is विस्तार of कृषि योग्य भूमि and घनत्व is more . 
Because of भार of जनसंख्या in these areas the per भूमि is very less . 
With सहायता of गहरी जुताई , , अधिक आपूर्ति of उर्वरकों and साधन , more than one फसलें can be grown in वर्ष and प्रयास are undertaken to increase per अधिकाधिक उत्पादन . 
सस्यावर्तन , , उत्तम बीज , , कीट संरक्षण आदि etc. are व्यवस्था to get achieve ज्यादा उत्पादन . 
इन क्षेत्रों have खेत and बल is बल on उत्पादन of food grains with which more and more people are sustained . 
These areas with गहन कृषि are populated since ancient times and with centuries of प्रयोगों किसानों have विकास this dense cultivation technique and प्रयोगों . 
ये क्षेत्र are centers of rivers-valleys and more rich ज्यादा धनी जनसंख्या . 
Because of ज्यादा जनसंख्या there is बहुतायत of cheap labor . 
Therefore किसानों have adopted गहन कृषि . 
चावल is मुख्य फसल in कृषि which is grown twice or thrice वर्ष in कुछ क्षेत्रों . 
विस्तृत खेती is found in उन भू -झौईण् क्षेत्रों where there are जमीने or घनत्व आबादी is relatively low . 
उद्देश्य of किसानों in इन क्षेत्रों are obtaining more and more उत्पादन from the big farms . 
उत्पादन of फसलों in these extended cultivation regions is done from the perspective of व्यापार . 
The specialization of फसलों takes place on farms . 
Two or एक फसल could होती है , grown in वर्ष for यापन where एक फसल dominated an extensive cultivated area . 
कमी of श्रम is fulfilled through machines . 
विस्तृत कृषि is popular in मध्य क्षेत्र of रुस -LRB- ( स्टेपीज ) , -RRB- , प्रेयरी , -LRB- कनाडा -RRB- , southern and middle United states of संयुक्‍त राज्य अमेरिका and पंपास -LRB- अर्जेन्टाइना -RRB- . 
Wheat is फसल which is sown in सर्दी or मौसम . 
Wet cultivation - कृषि क्षेत्र are those where there is 200 सेमी . or ज्यादा वर्षा . 
आपूर्ति of पौधों is fulfilled by वर्षा . 
चावल leads in आर्द्र कृषि . 
In इस पद्धति there is पानी in खेतों for several months . 
Because of बहुलता of नमी तीन फसलें of चावल are obtained round वर्ष -LRB- ( अमन , , आस and Boro -RRB- . 
In कृषि क्षेत्रों , कृषि क्षेत्रों of एशिया are accumulated where बंग्लादेश and श्रीलंका are प्रमुख . 
There is more and more reliability in उत्पादन of फसलों . 
Majority of ज्यादातर क्षेत्र in अमेरिका and एशिया are सम्बन्धित with आर्द्र कृषि . 
सिंचाई क्षमता युक्‍त कृषि क्षेत्र capable of irrigation . 
उन क्षेत्र where there is low rainfall अधिक जरूरत सिंचाई such as यथा and उन क्षेत्र . 
Because of मौसम and अविश्‍वसनीय बारिश सिंचाई occupies स्थान in कृषि of these areas . 
The places where there is वर्षा or होती है is limited to किसी विशेष मौसम ही , तापमान is appropriate for साधारणतः पूरे वर्ष . 
Therefore सिंचाई is essential and obligatory for ज्यादा उत्पादन . 
Irrigation is also done through ponds , wells , rivers and canals . 
Tube wells are also प्रयोग for सिंचाई . 
सबसे अधिक विकास of सिंचाई is highest in भारत and चीन . 
There is प्रचलन of सिंचित कृषि in देशों like United States of America , Turkey , Mediterranean region and रुस आदि etc. . 
कृषि with वर्षा . 
इसका refers to उस कृषि where वर्षा is less than 50 50 सेमी . and साधन of सिंचाई are not available . 
इस पद्धति first came into existence in ग्रेट बेसिन , of USA , ग्रेट बेसिन , and ग्रेट बेसिन , . 
Under इस प्रविधि खेतों are plowed deep -LRB- 20-25 ( 20-25 सेमी . ) . 
So वर्षा gets absorbed in मिट्टी and there is ह्रास of नमी through vaporization . 
Therefore फसलें of सूखी कृषि are dependent on मौजूद in मृदा . 
For नमी large beds are build to regulate the flow of rainwater . 
Thus Jetzold , 1979 calls इसे water concentrating culture . 
फसलें which could resist सूखे , got prepared soon and could save themselves from harmful insects are planted in this area . 
मृदा is made नम with the help of खादों and खादों . 
गेहूँ is the most appropriate सबसे उपयुक्‍त फसल for this area . 
Apart from राई , , जौ and जौ are also उत्पादन . 
बाजरा , , ज्वार , , जौ , , चना आदि are फसलें of शुष्‍क कृषि क्षेत्रों of भारत . 
कृषि refers to उत्पादन एक फसली from भूमि in वर्ष . 
यह कृषि is carried in बड़े बागानों . 
कृषि in that particular area is helped by economic , physical and other factors of विकास . 
Though appropriate conditions are not salient for केवल एक ही फसल but from the perspective of management , labor and बाजारों आदि बागान of केवल एक ही फसल are found in abundance . 
फसलों obtained from एक ही क्षेत्र is known as कृषि . 
Densely populated आबाद क्षेत्रों with भौगोलिक दशाएँ have आबाद क्षेत्रों . 
सर्दी and ( रबी -LRB- ( रबी and खरीफ ) -RRB- फसलें are found in the river built निर्मित मैदानों of दक्षिणी पूर्वी एशिया . 
कृषि - फसलीय कृषि - इस प्रकार of कृषि is carried in those land areas where more than two दो फसलों are काटी जाती है in साल . 
बहुफसली कृषि is possible in developed and क्षेत्रों . 
इस तरह of कृषि requires उत्तम खाद , , बीज , irrigation facility , शस्यावर्तन , , उपयुक्‍त जलवायु and mechanics . 
प्रचलन of ऐसी खेती is popular in अनेक भागों of चीन and United States of संयुक्‍त राज्य अमेरिका . 
खेती - व्यावसायिक कृषि - इस प्रकार of खेती is देन of आधुनिक विकास . 
The physical conditions are most favorable if अनेक फसलों is grown at a large level at the place of growing अनेक फसलों in व्यावसायिक कृषि in travel and संसाधनों as a result of विस्तार of science and technology . 
Majority of उत्पादित पदार्थ is निर्यात . 
व्यावसायिक कृषि is सम्मिलित रूप of extensive , dense and व्यावसायिक कृषि . 
Crop production and पशुपालन are parallely carried in मिश्रित कृषि . 
Because of कमी of मनुष्य श्रम there is सबसे ज्यादा उपयोग of machines in कृषि . 
इस तरह of कृषि is found in तटीय भागों of northern hemisphere and तटीय भागों of southern hemisphere where USA and प्रेयरी -LRB- कनाडा -RRB- , यूक्रेन and यूराल क्षेत्र are famous for कृषि . 
ऐसी खेती जाती है is found in the valleys of Parana-Paraguay in दक्षिणी अमेरिका and Mare - पराना - पराग्वे in आस्ट्रेलिया . 
खेती - खेती - यह खास तरीका of खेती - खेती is special and relatively new which began in tropical and subtropical regions of southern hemisphere . 
Broadly the characteristics of रोपण कृषि is prominence of एक फसल , विशिष्‍ट कृषि पद्धति -LRB- plantation and एक फसल -RRB- . 
Under this बड़े -झौईण् बड़े बागान of रबर , are planted . 
समस्त फसलें in इस तरह हैं of इस कृषि is such that औद्योगिक संशोधन is essential . 
औद्योगिक स्थान are स्थापित near आर्थिक लाभ हेतु बागानों नजदीक ही for economic benefits . 
समूचे उत्पादन of ऐसे बागानों are निर्यात to temperate शीतोष्ण कटिबंधीय देशों where there is माँग for them . 
कृषि 5˚ - इस तरह of कृषि 5˚ is especially popular in 5 degree-10 degree latitude in कांगो बेसिन , -LRB- मध्य अफ्रीका -RRB- , कांगो बेसिन , -LRB- South america -RRB- , south east Asia and highlands of eastern islands . 
इसे is also known as खेती , खेती and खेती . 
सबसे पहले of all for the preparation of खेत , क्षेत्र of वन are चुनाव and burnt . 
श्रम is mostly ज्यादा उपयोग in खेती . 
खाद and investment is not प्रयोग . 
कृषि कार्य is possible only for दो वर्ष ही after which खेत are prepared छोड़कर the previous one , Because rate of soil erosion is more due to ज्यादा वर्षा and उर्वरता soon becomes poor . 
There is उत्पादन in this kind of इस कृषि , labor is more and उपयोग of produced goods is local . 
Only food grains are उत्पादन where ज्वार , and बाजरा are major . 
कृषि has योगदान in the economy of देश . 
Currently हिस्सा of राष्‍ट्रीय आय of देश is continuously decreasing . 
According to एक अनुमान the total GDP of कृषि in देश in सन् 1998-99 , ,1999 -2000 , 2000-01 was 6.3 , 6.1 , 4.0 and 5.4 5.4 % respectively . 
इससे is clear that despite योगदान of of कृषि in राष्‍ट्रीय आय , इससे is gradually कम . 
महत्त्व of कृषि in देश could be understood in इस बात भी that it supplies कच्चा माल to उद्योगों . 
The major industries of देश are dependent only on उद्योग कृषि ही . 
Majority of अधिकांश कच्चा माल for कृषि क्षेत्र ही is obtained from कृषि क्षेत्र ही . 
Jute , सूती , चीनी , vegetables etc are directly and उद्योग are indirectly dependent on agriculture . 
Because of the population expansion in देश व्यापकता has become एक मूल आवश्यकता . 
इस जरुरत could only be fulfilled by सिर्फ कृषि ही . 
पशु is the priceless asset of भारतीय किसानों . 
पूर्ण of agricultural tasks in अभाव of पशुओं is not possible . 
पशु and कृषि पूरक each other . 
देश has संख्या of cattle . 
कृषि has योगदान in Indian economy . 
अत्यधिक of देश mostly depends on अत्यधिक of कृषि . 
मुख्य कारण is that कृषि ही provides कच्चा माल to मुख्य उद्योगों . 
If उत्पादन increases then उद्योगों will मिलेगा , अधिक कच्चा माल which will lead to विकास . 
If उत्पादन will increase , आय of कृषकों will increase and when आय will increase their buying capacity will increase . 
कृषि is significant in obtaining royality . 
उत्पादन affects परिवहन , , विपणन , , & अन्य पहलुओं and उपयोग has गहरा प्रभाव on the economic system of the country . 
केन्द्र सरकार earns by निर्यात and the state governments earns through tax on सिंचाई and इत्यादि . 
Agriculture is आधार of livelihood of more than half population of the country . 
64 % share of जनसंख्या of देश gets आजीविका from कृषि . 
Characteristic of खाद्यान्न फसलों - 64 % share of सकल कृषि भूमि of देश is used in the production of खाद्यान्न फसलों . 
उतना in कमी - भारत does not उत्पादन as much उत्पादन in कृषि as होना चाहिए should उत्पादन . 
It is low both from यह हैक्टेयर and per labor perspective . 
According to the received figures the average wheat production of भारत in क्षेत्रफल is उत्पादन इंग्लैण्ड of England and 1 of फ्रांस and पूर्वी & जर्मनी . 
भारत occupies स्थान in the world in क्षेत्र . 
It has been 53 साल of management for भारत but still there is निर्भरता on मानसून . 
Because of the irregularity , uncertainty and insufficiency of भारतीय कृषि is also known as जुआ भी of वर्षा . 
Still 33.3 % of कुल कृषि भूमि is सिंचित , the rest 66.7 % is dependent on शेष 66.7 प्रतिशत मानसून . 
As a means of जीवन - यापन - Majority of अधिकांश किसान do not cultivate from commercial point of view but यह is a means of धंधा जीवन - यापन . 
प्रधानता - Labor has प्रधानता in comparison to investment in श्रम प्रधानता - भारतीय कृषि . 
Because of small holdings कृषक is unable to fully भरपूर उपयोग the investments and agricultural equippments . 
First five प्रथम पंचवर्षीय योजना and agriculture - First प्रथम पंचवर्षीय योजना in देश was introduced on कृषि - 1 अप्रैल , , 1951 . 
उद्देश्य of इस योजना was to develop कृषि . 
दो कारण were primarily responsible for this - Because of विभाजन of देश there थे - बहुत बुरा प्रभाव on व्यापारिक फसलों like खाद्यान्न , jute and कपास . 
यह was अनुभव that पूर्ण विकास of कृषि is essential for औद्योगिक प्रगति भी . 
During इस योजना दौरान there were three major characteristics concerning इस योजना दौरान which are . 
Long term schemes were अधिक बल . 
उद्देश्य of योजना था only केवल कृषि उत्पादन but समग्र विकास . 
कार्य of organizing agriculture schemes and सिंचाई and संबंधी साधनों were completely दिया गया to the state governments . 
The responsibility of केन्द्रीय सरकार was to स्थापित समन्वय in schemes run by various state governments . 
Second द्वितीय पंचवर्षीय योजना and agriculture - द्वितीय पंचवर्षीय योजना शुरुआत in 1956 . 
Under this विकास of उद्योग were दी गई प्रमुखता yet महत्त्व of increasing उद्योग was not lowered . 
From the perspective of कृषि नियोजन इस योजना had following characteristics . 
कृषि नियोजन should हो सके done in इस ढंग that जनसंख्या should मिल सके खाद्यान्न with हो सके and उद्योगों should मिल सके कच्चा माल . 
कृषि उत्पादन should be diversified which means ध्यान should be paid in increasing व्यापारिक फसलों along with खाद्यान्न साथ - साथ . 
कृषि उत्पादकता should be increased with साधन and advanced techniques . 
Third five year तृतीय पंचवर्षीय योजना and agriculture - Under तृतीय पंचवर्षीय योजना कृषि विकास was made प्रमुख उद्देश्य . 
Fourth five year चौथी योजना and agriculture - कृषि विकास has been दी गई उच्च प्राथमिकता in चौथी योजना . 
Not only this in बल was बल on विकास भी of उन उद्योगों also which उपलब्ध agricultural inputs , कृषि आदान उर्वरक , etc. . 
Fifth पाँचवीं पंचवर्षीय योजना and कृषि - In पाँचवीं पंचवर्षीय योजना विकास of कृषि got पर्याप्‍त महत्व and प्रतिवर्ष लक्ष्य of 4.67 प्रतिशत विकास was set in कृषि क्षेत्र . 
In छठी पंचवर्षीय योजना दौरान निम्न कदम for कृषि विज्ञान were primarily taken . 
Dry land farming - During भूमि कृषि विकास कार्यक्रम was initiated . 
In छठीं योजना विशेष बल was विशेष बल on increasing अन्तर्गत कृषि उत्पादन under इस कार्यक्रम . 
Research in कृषि शिक्षा - There should be मध्य समन्वय between विभागों and agricultural universities . 
The agricultural universities will have to play विशिष्‍ट भूमिका in the form of essential systematic research from the perspective of उत्पादन and कृषि विकास in agriculture . 
Use of उर्वरकों - प्रयोग of उर्वरकों प्रयोग दिया गया अधिक महत्त्व so that there could हो सके वृद्धि in कृषि उत्पादन . 
आठवीं पंचवर्षीय योजना and agriculture - आठवीं पंचवर्षीय योजना was सम्बन्धित था to आठवीं पंचवर्षीय योजना . 
There था प्रावधान of spending 22,467 billion rupees in विकास of कृषि . 
Here 34,425 billion rupees on ग्रामीण विकास , , 6750 billion rupees on कार्यक्रम , 35,525 billion rupees on 35,525 करोड़ रुपये सिंचाई and कार्यक्रम were खर्च . 
Thus 22.2 % share of कुल व्यय था for सम्बन्धित कार्यक्रमों . 
मुख्य लक्ष्य of इस योजना था वृद्धि in निर्यात with आत्म - निर्भरता in खाद्यान्न and विविधिकरण of कृषि उत्पादन . 
नौवीं पंचवर्षीय योजना and agriculture - Under नौवीं पंचवर्षीय योजना the agricultural development program थी आधारित on the '' Food घोषित नीति declared by अन्तर्गत कृषि विकास कार्यक्रम सरकार whose prime objective थी to दुगुना the agricultural development with which भारत could be freed from '' hunger '' in अगले दस वर्षों . 
In नौवीं पंचवर्षीय योजना वार्षिक दर of कृषि विकास was set 4.5 प्रतिशत . 
There were सुझाव also for उत्थान भी of marginal and किसानों . 
Special emphasis was also laid on अधोसंरचना and सिंचाई भी . 
क्षेत्रीय कार्यक्रम were run for विकास of hilly backward and tribal क्षेत्रों . 
Remedies to improve कृषि साख were also told . 
Suggestions concerning निर्यात of विकास and promoting cooperation in विकास of agricultural sectors such as मछली पालन , and डेयरी were also देने . 
दसवीं पंचवर्षीय योजना and कृषि - During दसवीं पंचवर्षीय योजना there था प्रावधान of spending 58,933 billion rupees on कृषि and other related areas . 
For कृषि विकास of agriculture under इस योजना there will be more public investment in सिंचाई , , बीजों , , power and streets . 
But आर्थिक सहायता given on जल and power would be lowered . 
नहर प्रणाली would be kept properly . 
न्यूनतम समर्थन कीमतों of खाद्यान्न and other products would be co-ordinated in इस प्रकार that विविधिकरण , in कृषि and संबंधी सुरक्षा gets प्रोत्साहन and खाद्यान्न खाद्यान्न अनुदान is lowered . 
The 76 % share of कृषि योग्य भूमि is with सीमान्त किसानों पास in देश . 
Further जो छोटे किसान have very less बहुत कम कृषि योग्य भूमि . 
They earn जीविका only with कृषि मात्र . 
कृषि is एक ऐसा कार्य which is entirely dependent on प्रकृति . 
किसान becomes helpless during प्राकृतिक प्रकोप such as बाढ़ , , drought etc. . 
Mostly small and marginal farmers are suffering due to the incessant increase in मूल्य of उर्वरकों , and कृषि यन्त्रों and accidental natural calamities but their problems have not changed much from the past few decades . 
If we तो to increase कृषि उत्पादन in सही दिशा then we तो to pay विशेष ध्यान on agricultural problems . 
उत्पादन in देश in the year 2001-02 was 731 million 731 लाख टन . 
Uttar Pradesh is प्रथम राज्य of उत्तर प्रदेश देश to have उत्पादन . 
पंजाब and हरियाणा come sequentially after इसके बाद . 
राज्य are there in भारत to have कृषि उत्पादकता . 
Because of निम्मलिखित कारणों कृषि उत्पादकता is les . 
Majority of अधिकांश किसान in देश are less educated and they have a traditional perspective towards धर्म , , जाति आदि etc. because of which they are afraid of adopting modern techniques . 
There are two major problems of कृषि in देश . 
The first is that भार on पहली कृषि should be lowered and दूसरी लोगों should be engaged in दूसरे उद्योगों than पहली कृषि . 
Majority of ज्यादातर किसान in भारत are poor . 
Further because of spending अधिक समय in कृषि उत्पादन , ill-effects of divine outbreaks on कृषि and seasonal employment of कृषि they could not नहीं मिल पाता है वित्त in पर्याप्‍त मात्रा . 
कमी of वित्त affects कृषि and reduces पैदावार . 
Some institutional causes are also found which are responsible in bringing कमी in कृषि उत्पादकता . 
Because of the small land holdings the per hectare production of agriculture is very low . 
आकार of average land holdings in अन्य देशों is 1.51 hectare while in अन्य देशों such as in आस्ट्रेलिया , it is even less than 188 1.51 हेक्टेयर and 32 % holdings are within 1.51 हेक्टेयर . 
कृषि उत्पादकता has also reduced because of some major techniques . 
यह is एक सच्चाई that फसल could not be grown properly on भूमि without बिना पानी . 
That is why कृषि उत्पादन भी gets प्रभावित because of lack of सुविधायें . 
Only 33.3 % share of कृषि योग्य भूमि in our country is सिंचित , the rest 66.7 % share is unirrigated and dependent on monsoons , that is why there is कमी in उत्पादकता . 
एक प्रमुख कारण behind निम्न कृषि उत्पादकता in our country is inability to protect फसलों from insects and रोगों . 
16 % share of कुल खाद्यान्नों gets कीड़ो - मकोड़ो by insects प्रतिवर्ष . 
महत्त्वपूर्ण कारण of reduction in भारत is that because of the less availability of अच्छे उन्नतशील बीजों in देश , किसान are unable to utilize होने properly . 
Secondly , because of the orthodox belief of भारतीय किसान they make प्रयोग भी of good and useful रासायनिक खादों . 
देश is also making प्रयोग भी of रासायनिक खादों . 
कृषि उत्पादकता of देश gets lowered also because of प्राकृतिक कारणों भी . 
Indian agriculture is dependent on भारतीय कृषि प्रकृति especially on वर्षा , , वर्षा , are uncertain , untimely and uncommon which affects उत्पादन . 
Because of अधिक वर्षा the fertile मिट्टी of खेत gets बह जाती है , away into rivers which reduces उर्वरा of भूमि . 
Consequently स्वरुप कृषि उत्पादन gets affected . 
There are कुछ दोष in मिट्टी भी which reduces उत्पादकता . 
Defects like कमी , of नाइट्रोजन , कटाव , of भूमि , पानी and excess wasteland are found in मिट्टी of देश . 
There is विशेष महत्त्व of सिंचाई and multipurpose river valley projects in देश like भारत . 
विकास is only possible in a place which has वातावरण ही fir इसके such as वातावरण ही and वर्षा according to आवश्यकता . 
सिंचाई is एक महत्त्वपूर्ण कारक in कृषि . 
Providing जल through कृत्रिम साधनों is known as सिंचाई in खेती . 
वर्षा in भारत is through monsoon winds . 
Amount , timings and स्थान of वर्षा are all uncertain . 
Thus प्रगति on आधार of वर्षा is not possible . 
In a country like भारत where सम्पूर्ण अर्थव्यवस्था is dependent on कृषि . 
Irrigation means have महत्त्व at such such places . 
भारतीय केन्द्र सरकार has गठन some major organizations for विकास of water means . 
राष्‍ट्रीय जल विकास परिषद् - - इसकी was स्थापना in जुलाई , 1982 . 
कार्य is to determine the scope of सदुपयोग of पानी by aligning rivers . 
So पानी , reaches क्षेत्रों from क्षेत्रों . 
केन्द्रीय जल आयोग - - केन्द्रीय जल आयोग - स्थापित in 1985 is एक उच्च प्रौद्योगिक संस्था for गणित वृद्धि of water means . 
कार्य of this council is to make schemes regarding उपयोग , of water resources , संरक्षण and नियंत्रण and to co-ordinate and develop those schemes . 
उन्हें thinks and gives suggestions to the state governments for यह बाढ़ सिंचाई and shipping . 
केन्द्रीय भूमिगत जल बोर्ड - इस बोर्ड - केन्द्रीय भूमिगत जल बोर्ड - इस बोर्ड was established in 1952 but इसके साथ was पुनर्गठन with भूगर्भ सर्वेक्षण of भूमिगत जल - इकाई of भारत in 1972 . 
कार्य of इस बोर्ड is to do सर्वेक्षण concerning भूमिगत जल , determining the possibilities , मूल्यांकन and मानीटरिंग गुणवत्ता and पद्धति of भूमिगत जल . 
यह बोर्ड prepares रणनीति and कार्यक्रम related to विकास of भूमिगत जल in पूरे देश . 
The major means of agriculture in भारत are canals , विशाल मैदान are कृषि सिंचाई using canals . 
पंजाब and Haryana are प्रमुख क्षेत्र where सिंचाई is done using canals . 
There is जाल of सिंचाई using canals in इन राज्यों . 
Apart from them कुछ भागों of राजस्थान and पश्‍चिमी बंगाल are सिंचाई जाती है using canals . 
कुछ सिंचाई जाती है through canals are also done in डेल्टा क्षेत्रों of दक्षिणी भारत and river valleys . 
देश basically has दो प्रकार होती है of canals . 
Flood canals and twelve months canal - The flood canals have पानी only during ऋतु दौरान ही and the twelve months canals have पानी throughout the year . 
संख्या of twelve months canals is greater in भारत . 
There are following निम्नलिखित लाभ from सिंचाई through canals . 
It takes away अतिरिक्‍त पानी of floods . 
Agriculture becomes possible in dry areas . 
It is स्थायी व्यवस्था of यह सिंचाई . 
It increases उर्वरा of यह भूमि . 
It presents sooner and cheaper rates of सिंचाई on समतल मैदानों . 
सुविधा could be obtained . 
भय of अकाल ends . 
The following are the harms of सिंचाई using canals . 
मलेरिया spreads in नहरी क्षेत्रों . 
किसानों have dispute over नहरी पानी . 
निकटवर्ती क्षेत्रों get flooded when the canals टूटने . 
इनमें do not नहीं मिलता है required and पानी . 
Wells have been प्रयोग for सिंचाई in भारत since ancient times and today also होता आ रहा है is सबसे लोकप्रिय साधन of सिंचाई . 
Wells are primarily of two kinds-surface wells or subsurface wells or tube wells . 
The following are निम्नलिखित लाभ . 
The wells could be dug at कम लागत . 
उर्वरा of भूमि increases . 
किसान becomes self dependent in पानी . 
The following are निम्नलिखित हानियाँ भी . 
The wells also सूखा with सूखा . 
अधिक लागत of कुआ is high at the places where water level is low . 
Saline खारा पानी which is mostly found in wells . 
It is harmful for फसल . 
कृषि सिंचाई is a significant means of agriculture , पानी for कृषि सिंचाई is drawn with electricity . 
The following are निम्नलिखित लाभ of सिंचाई using tube wells . 
श्रम is बच जाता है , and they do not need to keep many cattle . 
The tube wells act as complementary at जिन स्थानों where there is less amount of पानी . 
Well पानी is more profitable in comparison to पानी because होता है , contains कई तत्त्व and रसायन which maintain the fertility of भूमि . 
व्यय is less here . 
इससे will lead to certain and सिंचाई . 
It is appropriate for खेती . 
यह is अन्तर्गत एक कमजोरी of कृषि सिंचाई under tube wells is that यह requires अत्यधिक वित्त which किसान could not have done . 
Many significant organizations concerning कृषि विज्ञान and कृषि विज्ञान have been स्थापित . 
Which is working on व्यापक स्तर for विकास of कृषि . 
Indian council of agricultural research was गठित during कार्यकाल of भारतीय कृषि अनुसंधान परिषद् - लार्ड इरविन -LRB- 1926-1931 -RRB- in अध्यक्षता of लिनलिथगो in 1926 by शाही कृषि आयोग . 
On सिफारिशों of the council , Imperial council of ' इम्पीरियल काउन्सिल ऑफ एग्रीकल्चरल रिसर्च ' '' was स्थापना on 23 मई , , 1929 for विकास of कृषि विज्ञान and कृषि विज्ञान . 
After स्वतन्त्रता इस काउन्सिल was नाम इस काउन्सिल of agricultural research '' . 
भारतीय कृषि अनुसंधान परिषद् of agricultural research '' is a leading organization in the field of कृषि विज्ञान & प्रौद्योगिकी विकास . 
भारतीय कृषि अनुसंधान परिषद् , of agricultural research itself does कार्य of अनुप्रयोग and मत्स्यपालन आदि related to कृषि , , पशुपालन , fishery and gives सहायता and encouragement for इसके and also maintains समन्वय between them . 
There is व्यापक योगदान of agricultural University in विकास of कृषि . 
Here research and निदान related on agricultural problems are done . 
Agricultural University and कालेज are extremely important from the perspective of कृषि शोध . 
During 1901-05 कृषि कालेज were स्थापित in Pune , Kanpur , Sabaur , Nagpur , Coimbatore and ल्यालपुर -LRB- ( पाकिस्तान -RRB- in भारत . 
Then after there was सशक्‍त श्रृंखला of कृषि कालेजों . 
On the suggestion of इन्डो - अमेरिकन टीम first agricultural university was स्थापना in भारत in पंतनगर in 1960 . 
Then after संख्या increased . 
Now there are a total of 33 state agricultural universities in भारत and Imphal University is a central agricultural university . 
The research work concerning rubber , coffee and फसलों are done by the respective councils . 
As a result of हरित क्रान्ति आत्म - निर्भरता that has been achieved in फलस्वरुप खाद्यान्नों is mainly because of सफलता in विज्ञान and प्रौद्योगिकी क्षेत्र . 
Now कृषक भी of दुर्गम क्षेत्रों have also हुयी aware of लाभों of कृषि विज्ञान and कृषि विज्ञान and new and reformed techniques of agriculture and are also प्रयोग them . 
कृषि क्षेत्र has हुयी है competent because of प्रयोग of आधुनिक विज्ञान and agricultural investments and आधुनिक विज्ञान and निर्भरता of कृषि on monsoons has कम . 
The profound consequences of प्राकृतिक प्रकोपों have reduced with प्रयोग of new techniques and methods in agricultural works . 
There is relatively less श्रम on per unit production because of प्रौद्योगिकी प्रभाव of विज्ञान and विज्ञान . 
यह can हो गया है कहा जा सकता है , that यह has now हो गया है possible to have relatively more अपेक्षाकृत अधिक उत्पादन because of प्रयोग of समान श्रम . 
दूसरा प्रभाव of विज्ञान and विज्ञान on कृषि is seen in the form of क्षमता to बचत भूमि . 
किसी फसल or at least अधिक उपज of किसी फसल could be achieved on किसी भूमि इकाई . 
This means that कम भूमि is required for मात्रा of उपज than before . 
The third and तीसरा प्रमुख प्रभाव of विज्ञान and विज्ञान is seen in क्षमता to बचत समय . 
Now there is प्रचलन of बीजों with relatively less mature अवधि . 
Initially अवधि of धान , , गेहूँ , , ज्वार , , बाजरा , फसलों थी more because of which हो जाता था थी difficult to लेना फसलों in इन खेतों . 
There is सकारात्मक प्रभाव on कृषि उत्पादन and कृषि उत्पादन and तत्व of जोखिम has कम . 
There has been समावेश of new agricultural investments and परिवर्तन in संरचना . 
Soil is देन of मृदा प्रकृति in which significant properties are present . 
The crop gets प्रभावित by नत्रजन , , फास्फोरस and potash and घुलनशील लवण आदि . 
The element which lacks in मिट्टी . 
उपज स्तर of production can be वृद्धि with अतिरिक्‍त आपूर्ति . 
मृदा परीक्षण is एक महत्त्वपूर्ण साधन in intelligent balanced and कुशल प्रयोग of उर्वरकों and take अधिकतम लाभ from them . 
विज्ञान and विज्ञान has महत्त्वपूर्ण योगदान in that उस सम्बन्ध therefore soil test is a integral element of किसी योजना of परीक्षण कृषि विकास . 
There are 454 प्रयोगशालायें हैं in देश out of which 106 are चल प्रयोगशालायें हैं . 
In भारत 454 soil testing research institutions have been स्थापित at विभिन्न क्षेत्रों out of which 106 are चल research institutions . 
Currently विज्ञान and विज्ञान has become एक सशक्‍त माध्यम of testing ground water source . 
यह कार्य can be easily done with प्रयोग . 
तकनीक of detecting भूमिगत जल by seeing the figures and pictures भेजे गए by satellites has been विकास . 
अंतरिक्ष विभाग have तैयार जल विज्ञान मानचित्र of सम्पूर्ण देश with सहायता of pictures given by satellites . 
Beneficiary and immunity '' Genes '' could जा सकते हैं supplied to पौधों with सहायता of जैव प्रौद्योगिकी . 
पौधों can be made capable to उगने in सूखाग्रस्त and other severe conditions with प्रवेश of लाभकारी genes '' . 
संरचना of genes could be desirable changed through genetic engineering in biotechnology . 
Apart from कृषि विकास they greatly contribute in कृषि विकास . 
India has संख्या of गाय and भैंस in the world but उत्पादकता is very low . 
नस्ल सुधार जो कार्य that been undertaken so far . 
That has developed great scope of नस्ल सुधार with विदेशी जाति of cattle . 
Biotechnology has presented अच्छे परिणामों in दिशा of भ्रूण परिवर्तन . 
इसके will सहायता is विकसित पशुधन according to विकसित देशों of the world . 
For increasing उत्पादन of दलहन and फसलों now यह is essential to प्रयोग शोध and तकनीकी . 
Thus बीजों should be विकास according to the conditions of विभिन्न स्थानों . 
शुष्क कृषिक्षेत्रों should also be made to make शुष्क कृषिक्षेत्रों capable of कृषि . 
The scientific methods that conserve संसाधनों and agricultural inputs should be कृषि विकास for कृषि विकास now . 
With this अधिक उत्पादन could be achieved through less agricultural inputs . 
There has been सुधार in कृषि with सक्षम प्रयोग of विज्ञान and विज्ञान . 
But one should also pay ध्यान to its negative points . 
समावेश of महिलाओं in modern technological agricultural works is reducing . 
Various agricultural works which were done by पुरुषों and महिलाओं initially are today being done using विभिन्न प्रकार of agricultural equippments . 
Because of which पुरुषों and women laborers are suffering and कार्य अवसर are getting finished . 
प्रयोग भी of विभिन्न कीटनाशक is also leading to हानिकारक प्रभाव . 
कुछ अंश of these insecticides gets absorbed in अनाजों . 
इसका is adversely affecting स्वास्थ्य . 
In the contemporary scenario majority of अधिकतर ग्रामीण आबादी and families engaged in खेती have stood up with सहकारिता आन्दोलन साथ . 
सहकारी आन्दोलन has propagated in लगभग सभी गाँवों of केरल and तमिलनाडु . 
Though co-operative committees , ऋण are उपलब्ध not only for agricultural development but it also provides ये अन्य बहुत - सी सुविधायें भी . 
सहकारी आन्दोलन could be made successful by paying ध्यान to below mentioned suggestions . 
along with निर्माण and वृद्धि साथ of personal funds , प्रबन्धन should be जोर . 
Rather than emphasizing on increasing संख्या of co-operative committees , it is essential to pay अधिक ध्यान to गुणात्मक पक्ष of the committees . 
व्यापक कार्यक्रम on सहकारी शिक्षा and सहकारी शिक्षा should जायें run . 
Honest , intellect and hard नेतृत्व should be तैयार by getting rid off the feeling of निजी स्वार्थ . 
The principles of सहकारिता should be obeyed strictly and consciously . 
महिलाओं should जाये made interested towards आन्दोलन so that they also fully सहकारिता in विकास of सहकारिता . 
कृषि साख should be primarily दिया जाये for production and कुछ ऋण should also be दिया जाये for unproductive works . 
In order to कम जटिलता of सहकारिता कानूनों there is तीव्र आवश्यकता to पुनर्मूल्यांकन them . 
सहकारिता आन्दोलन should be freed from सरकारी हस्तक्षेप . 
There should be समुचित नियोजन for विकास of सहकारी आन्दोलन . 
स्थिति of dis-balance of विकास and works in विभिन्न राज्यों should be removed . 
आन्दोलन should be विस्तार to rural and ग्रामीण क्षेत्रों .
