सरकारी संगठनों should be cooperative with निर्यात and सरकारी संगठनों . 
The National and regional governments from समय -झौईण् समय to समय -झौईण् समय have undertaken कदम to gather जानकारी regarding दोषों of कृषि विपणन and their prevention . 
For the first time the major suggestions given by सर्वप्रथम शाही कृषि आयोग in 1928 for सुधार of विपणन प्रणाली are as follow . 
Appointment of trained and skilled प्रशिक्षित कुशल विपणन अधिकारियों . 
सर्वेक्षण विभिन्न कृषि उत्पादों . 
Establishing regulated markets . 
To get rid off सहकारी विपणन restrictions किसानों should first organize their co-operative marketing committees . 
The committees save कृषकों from शोषण of व्यापारियों , reduces the monopoly of mediators and increase the power of कृषकों bargaining . 
They उपलब्ध परिवहन and सुविधायें of कृषि उत्पादों . 
विपणन and निरीक्षण निदेशालय was स्थापना in 1935 by भारतीय प्रशासन . 
The royal agricultural commission -LRB- 1928 -RRB- and केन्द्रीय बैंकिंग जाँच समिति had संस्तुति for स्थापना of इस निदेशालय . 
Since July , 1958 कार्यालय of निदेशालय has been transferred from नागपुर to Faridabad . 
Currently यह is कार्यरत as अन्तर्गत विपणन and निरीक्षण निदेशालय under ministry of rural reconstruction . 
सुविधाओं on आधार of agricultural productions is very essential in भारत so that produced goods are imported and exported at low cost . 
Then only होगा will होगा possible to कम कृषि विपणन व्यय . 
The second thing to be noted is that the speed of निर्माण of streets joining गाँव and शहर being used in प्रत्येक ऋतु should be increased . 
पर्याप्‍त संख्या of light weight bullock carts with टायर and diesel and चालित ट्रकों also seems essential . 
The significance of bullock carts in the age of science has not कम . 
Majority of the agricultural marketing depends on bullock carts . 
In द्वितीय पंचवर्षीय योजना an all India एक अखिल भारतीय बाजार सेवा has been व्यवस्था to उपलब्ध सूचना regarding परिवर्तनों of कृषि उत्पादों . 
आकाशवाणी of कृषि उत्पादों were broadcast प्रतिदिन on the radio . 
Market reviews were प्रकाशित in the daily , weekly and monthly journals . 
For रेडियों and television has been व्यवस्था in gram panchayats . 
The everyday various market figures are एकत्रित and they are published . 
स्थिति of Indian agricultural laborers is very deplorable . 
Because of very less न्यूनतम मजदूरी काफी निम्न of these laborers is very low . 
ये लोग arrange their two square meal by काम in खेतों from सुबह till night . 
इनके सामने face विभिन्न प्रकार of problems . 
कृषि मजदूर spends his life in गन्दगी and mud . 
वह works with hungry stomach and वह is not even aware of relief in आँधी and धूप . 
वह grows चावल for us but वह खुद remains hungry . 
वह feeds गायों but वह does n't नहीं मिलता anythings except काँजी and पानी . 
वह fills our granaries with grains but भरता वर्ष भर asks for राशन . 
वह persistently cuts wood and fills पानी for them . 
Who have become rich because of his hard work . 
दशा is shocking and lamentable story . 
There is scarcity of associate domestic industrial affairs in गाँवों . 
If फसल gets destroyed because of बाढ़ , , famine etc. then हो जाए , becomes difficult for the farmers to survive . 
Majority of the farmers in भारत शोषण to निम्न वर्ग . 
That is why सामाजिक स्तर always remains low . 
During नियोजन काल दौरान there was व्यापक विकास of तकनीकी in क्षेत्र , Because of प्रयोग of machines in कृषि unemployment among अशिक्षित कृषि श्रमिकों is बढ़ जाने which is एक गंभीर समस्या for them . 
Housing problem - समस्या - भूमिहीन श्रमिकों do not have their own houses . 
They take अनुमति of the land owners and built huts on बेकार भूमि and stays . 
As a return they have to be forced laborers at the land owner 's यहाँ . 
Physical , social , moral and मर्यादा end when several persons stay under the same hut . 
Lack of संगठन - There is संगठन of Indian agricultural laborers . 
that is why that are unable to make any deals with their land owners regarding मजदूरी आदि . 
Seasonal employment - रोजगार - कृषि श्रमिक do not नहीं मिल पाता है काम throughout पूरे साल . 
according to द्वितीय कृषि जाँच समिति a temporary male labor gets औसतन of 197 दिन काम annually out of which for 197 दिन वह works for himself and the rest 197 दिन वह remains unemployed , Thus in वर्ष children मिलता हैं , 197 दिन and women मिलता हैं , 197 दिन काम respectively . 
Thus औसत of वार्षिक आय remains low . 
स्तर of मजदूरी - स्तर of औद्योगिक श्रमिकों is very less than औद्योगिक श्रमिकों . 
There are दो कारण behind इसके Increase in संख्या of landless laborers and अभाव of non agricultural jobs in ग्रामीण क्षेत्रों . 
कम मजदूरी leave a bad impact on स्वास्थ्य and कार्यक्षमता of the laborers . 
Indebtedness - भार of ऋण keeps बढ़ता जा रहा है on the laborer as आय is not according to ऋणग्रस्तता - आवश्यकता . 
Because of the indebtedness वह hesitates in dealing with the land owners for मजदूरी . 
Despite working for श्रमिक जीवन भर for the land owner 's , the labor does n't get freed from the debt . 
नारी of बाल श्रम and बाल श्रम - The children and wives of laborers are compelled to मजबूरन कार्य to पूरा their needs . 
The women and बाल श्रमिकों are दी जाती है कम मजदूरी after making them काम for extra hours . 
Thus शोषण of child and woman laborers is समस्या of कृषि क्षेत्र . 
निम्न सुझाव are दिए जा सकते हैं to improve the economic and social स्थिति of कृषि श्रमिकों . 
Establishment of co-operative committees - Co-operative committees should be set up for landless laborers and and they should ऐसे कार्य in such a manner so that laborers मिल सके , रोज़गार , For दुग्धशाला उद्योग , , शहद hatching दुग्धशाला उद्योग , . 
All these can improve आर्थिक स्थिति . 
न्यूनतम मजदूरी - न्यूनतम मजदूरी should be set for सभी राज्यों to वृद्धि आय of न्यूनतम मजदूरी - कृषि श्रमिकों , By passing the minimum wages act in 1984 केन्द्र सरकार has taken कई कदम to raise न्यूनतम मजदूरी - कृषि श्रमिकों . 
न्यूनतम मजदूरी has been fixed . 
Arrangement of co-operation - योजना आयोग has संस्तुति that low cost , airy dwelling house should be built for कृषि श्रमिक where they काम . 
Advancement in कृषि कला - उन्नति - उत्तम बीज and खाद should हो , arranged , there should हो , an expansion of साधनों , साधनों of यातायात should हो , विकास , the useless and barren भूमि should हो , made arable . 
There should हो , सुधार in बिक्री of उपज , खेतों should हो , consolidated and खेतों should हो , made able for आर्थिक जोत , धन should हो , सुधार and किसानों should हो , उपलब्ध पूँजी at दर of सस्ते ब्याज . 
विकास - of small and cottage उद्योगों - There is आवश्यकता to redevelop उद्योगों of देश . 
It will employ बेरोजगार लोगों . 
Establishment of कार्यालयों in गाँवों - कार्यालयों which we have now are in शहरों . 
केवल पढ़े - लिखे लोग are getting लाभ from it . 
They can हो जाएं , सिद्ध to हो जाएं , helpful in fetching jobs for the laborers if ऐसे कार्यालय are set in गाँवों भी also . 
Therefore it should be noted . 
विभिन्न प्रकार of प्रयास were made after स्वतंत्रता by भारतीय प्रशासन to improve स्थिति of laborers which as as follows . 
Distribution of भूमि - वितरण - सरकार has बल इस प्रयास that भूमि will होगी , available as फलस्वरुप of of सुधारों such as उच्चतम सीमा of खेतों which means the useless and barren भूमि will होगी , made arable , will होगी , distributed among कृषि श्रमिकों ही . 
So far they have received 69 million hectare भूमि . 
5.6 million भूमि received as फलस्वरुप of उच्चतम सीमा of भूमि has been distributed among कृषि श्रमिकों ही only . 
दासता of slavery - उन्मूलन - भारतीय संविधान has done दासता of the slavery of कृषि श्रमिकों . 
Assistance is being provided to improve अवस्था of कृषि श्रमिकों and to help them lead स्वतंत्रतापूर्वक जीवन . 
In 1976 bonded labor system act was passed . 
With which India became free from समस्या of bonded labor . 
आन्दोलन - Acharya Vinova bhave started आन्दोलन for भूमिहीन कृषि श्रमिकों in 1951 . 
उद्देश्य of इस आन्दोलन was to लेकर lands from the land owners as per their wish and बाँट it to कृषि श्रमिकों . 
As फलस्वरुप of इस आन्दोलन roughly 68 million लगभग 68 लाख एकड़ भूमि was collected out of which 15 million लगभग 68 लाख एकड़ भूमि was वितरित among भूमिहीन कृषकों . 
ग्रामीण औद्योगिकीकरण भी - ग्रामीण औद्योगिकीकरण भी was also दिया गया है काफी महत्त्व in the schemes . 
It is also essential in the current scenario . 
Assistance is दी जाती है in गाँवों for स्थापना of कुटीर उद्योगों . 
Rural industrial settlements have been build in many development boards . 
As a result फलस्वरुप कृषि श्रमिकों मिल जाते हैं , अधिक अवसर of रोजगार and निर्भरता of खेती reduces . 
Basic credential committees were just fulfilling 3 % share of बुनियादी साख in 1954 , Then after the share of co-operative committees in बुनियादी साख increased to 25 % till 1969 and till 1985 इसके became 25 % . 
It is clear that still the money lenders have great belief in ग्रामीण साख व्यवस्था . 
कारण for majority of the drawbacks of primary agricultural credit committees are . 
The management board of अकुशल प्रबन्ध समितियों do not have ज्ञान ही of co-operative principles . 
The exploiter section grows when there is no check on the lordship of निहित स्वार्थों and sets प्रभाव . 
निरीक्षण and auditing work of the committees are not adequate and satisfying . 
किसान of weaker section are mostly neglected . 
The feeling of मितवययिता and बचत has not विकास in सदस्यों of समितियों . 
ऋणों are less used in productive works which is दुष्परिणाम of not keeping eye on ऋणों . 
There is अभाव of co-ordination among the credit organizations . 
The doubt of competition among the government institutions and व्यापारिक बैंकों is बढ़ती जा रही है , while it is utmost essential to keep तालमेल between both the institutions . 
विकास of committees in विभिन्न राज्यों have been uneven . 
प्रदत्त ऋण are inadequate . 
Looking at ऋण आवश्यकताओं of the debts the debt amount is even less than the minimum credit needs . 
Thus निर्भरता of कृषकों on exploiting money lenders still exists . 
ऋण नीति adopted by most of the committees is contaminated . 
The committees न तो adopted फसल ऋण प्रणाली nor न तो they made ऋण नीति liberal and practical . 
प्रचलन of ऋण on जमानत of भूमि is deeply rooted . 
There is unnecessary delay in ऋण वितरण . 
There is अभाव of समन्वय between कृषि साख and marketing practices . 
केन्द्रीय and राज्य सहकारी बैंकों should be quickly reformed and the weak committees should be stopped . 
The committees should emphasize on quickening deposits . 
ऋण प्रणाली should be सुधार . 
There should be व्यवस्था of ऋण in the form of वसूली उपज and व्यवस्था should be adopted . 
ऋणों should be उपयोग in productive works and they should be checked . 
The personal treasures of co-operative committees should be मजबूत . 
साख should be associated to उत्पादन and marketing works . 
The volunteer management board of the committees should be properly educated and trained . 
पारस्परिक समन्वय should be set between co-operative credit committees and व्यापारिक बैंकों . 
तीव्र आवश्यकता of पर्याप्‍त वृद्धि in सुरक्षित कोष should be बल . 
These committees should जायें विकसित in the form of ग्रामीण बैंकों from time to time so that they उपलब्ध विभिन्न प्रकार of banking services to both agriculturists and non-agriculturists . 
निरन्तर गंभीर प्रयास are required to कम ऋण . 
For this , व्यवस्था of associating उत्पादक ऋणों and credit with विपणन and उत्पाद उत्पादक ऋणों in the form of उत्पाद can हो सकता है effective . 
At any cost the moneylenders and अन्य निहित स्वार्थी तत्वों with vested interests should not be made सदस्य of committees and the intelligent leaders should be given समुचित अवसर दिये जायें . 
सदस्यों of smaller and weaker sections should be प्रोत्साहित so that they are सेवा in बेहतर ढंग . 
किसानों should जाये provided with new and best प्रकार of उपभोक्‍ता सामग्रियो , उपभोक्‍ता सामग्रियो should जाये नियमित आपूर्ति regularly at cheap rates . 
ऋण प्रणाली should be simple , useful and workable in कम से कम समय . 
In October , 1985 a meeting was held in अध्यक्षता of central agriculture minister in order to केन्द्रीय कृषि मन्त्री the problems of co-operative institutions and कृषि ऋण . 
Here discussions were held on विशेष कार्यक्रमों and providing ऋण for weaker sections and debt related crimes in co-operative institutions . 
The important resolutions consisted of strengthening primary agricultural debt committees , कठोर कार्यवाही against those who intentionally do not return ऋण and कम्प्यूटराइजेशन of figures in co-operative institutions . 
इस नये कार्यक्रम was prepared and प्रस्तुत in 1964 by the food & agricultural society and co-operative ministry . 
On परामर्श of reserve bank of India उसी वर्ष , it was भेज दिया गया था to the state governments . 
For पूर्ति of उद्देश्य हुये was directed that ऋण will हुये provided evaluating their production needs in the form of cash or check . 
The major characteristics of पद्धति or पद्धति can be clarified through the lines given below . 
उत्पादक आवश्यकताओं and उत्पादक प्रयोग are बल for अल्पकालीन साख . 
That is किसान are given कर्ज according to कर्ज or ability of फसल or क्षमता . 
Not on the backing of their property . 
The supply of good and new नवीनतम कृषि आदानों are made regular and fixed . 
कृषि साख is connected to विपणन . 
कृषक is made to वचनबद्ध in written that वह will sell फसल only through निर्दिष्‍ट विपणन समिति and वह accepts the debt amount of बेचेगा विक्रय मूल्य . 
Majority of अधिकांश ऋण are दिये जाते हैं in the form of कृषि -झौईण् आदानों . 
Debts are provided before फसल the seeds and they are recovered on the harvesting . 
Following problems erupt while running ऋण पद्धति . 
The arrangement of वितरण was not done in accordance to उत्पादन of प्रत्येक सदस्य . 
सदस्यों ले लिया , a much more अधिक ऋण beyond क्षमता to ऋण वापसी because the maximum standard बनकर न्यूनतम . 
निर्धारण of commercial standards can not be done differently for फसलों . 
कृषकों are more interested in नकद ऋण , they are less fond of taking नकद ऋण in the form of कृषि आदानों . 
The repayment of ऋणों generally can not be done by बिक्री अधिकतर उपज . 
खाद्य सुरक्षा gets promoted . 
It makes ऋण free by doing ग्रामीण विकास . 
Energy resolves ऊर्जा समस्या . 
प्रकृति and पर्यावरण remains clean . 
They save the animals and birds from getting harmed by making पानी and विष free . 
जरूरत more than उर्वरक reduces उर्वरता and उत्पादकता of जमीन . 
उत्पादक समूह of बीज आदि and खाद , are in collaboration with सरकार साथ and मार्ग the way of जैविक कृषि . 
वित्तमंत्री श्री पी.चिदम्बरम has assured in Lok Sabha that सरकारी बैंकों would provide more and more ऋण to जैविक कृषकों . 
उन्होंने explained that बैंक do not keep a distinction between organic and खाद . 
जैविक खाद्यों मिलती है सभी प्रकार of रियासत . 
जैविक खाद and bio-fertilizers fall under बायोखाद खाद नियंत्रण नीति and नियंत्रण . 
एक समिति has made प्रावधान for 2500 crore rupees in 11 वीं पंचवर्षीय योजना in order to प्रोत्साहन जैविक खाद . 
Welfare works have been आरंभ by various service providers . 
There are arrangements to set up agricultural-clinic and agricultural-trade centers for agriculture graduates . 
There are प्रावधान of 25 % 25 % अनुदान , , दो साल of ब्याज , 50 % marginal amount for ऋण of 10 million for हर कृषि स्नातक of agriculture . 
कृषि स्नातक can set up जैविक कृषि केन्द्र . 
केवीके trains कृषकों for कृषि which is कृषि ( जोड़ियक प्रणाली ) of कृषि -LRB- आधार ) on the movement of planets & शिक्षण -RRB- . 
किसान has to लेना पड़ता है अक्रेडेशन in order to get लेबल of जैविक कृषि . 
लेबल contains नाम of product , weight , price , property etc. . 
In पंजाब किसानों मिलता है , certificates from आर्गेनिक काउंसलिंग and किसानों मिलता है , 15 % more profit by बेचकर their organic products to आर्गेनिक काउंसलिंग . 
According to अनुसंधान of Tamil Nadu Agriculture University , गुणवत्ता in पैदावार and enhancement in मात्रा is found in जैविक कृषि . 
The regions where कृषि is depended on वर्षा ऊपर , there is consistent increase in पैदावार . 
Organic farming is भाग of जैविक कृषि नागरिक समाज उद्योग . 
It does not exists in public sector . 
Organic farming is the basis of human rights . 
Mahua Organics is helping किसान . 
They are selling organic rice , potato , spice after buying them from the farmers . 
Ambuja Cement Foundation -LRB- A.C.F. -RRB- is contributing in जैविक कृषि by following its C. S. R. polic . 
For doing organic farming in 9 acres बाकी किसानों , वहन an A. C. F. worth one fourth of 7000-8000 rupees . 
The rest was spent by the farmers . 
More organic food was produced and there was premium selling in market . 
50 farmers with 50 acres of land came forward to do organic farming in the success story of A. C. F. . 
Organic farming promotes indigenous seeds . 
Organic farming does not depend on seed marketing company . 
Deccan Development Society -LRB- D.D.S. -RRB- , Hyderabad got the permission from P. G. S. Organic Council of India for labeling its product as organic goods . 
100 farmer groups have been made in Tamil Nadu , Karnataka , Maharashtra , Andhra Pradesh and Uttar Pradesh under their auspices . 
Women are doing significant work in organic farming . 
Prince of Wales import organic-foods , coffee , tea , spices , pulses , milk , eggs and herbs from India and them exports them to middle east , Japan , America and England . 
Garbage to Gold - G2G : - In Mumbai slum dwellers keep wet garbage in a pit and vermi-compost gets prepared after garbage collection . 
In Andhra Pradesh S.H.G are selling organic red chili powder in international market with premium with the help of export agency . 
Conferences , seminars , workshops , are organized for the awareness of किसान . 
Here special discussions are held to resolve various problems of farmers . 
Organic farming is based on knowledge and technology . 
Information and agencies play important role in that . 
The World bank has made a policy for food security for all countries . 
Now India is heading towards food insecurity . 
जैविक किसान can increase food production by carrying organic farming . 
Organic farmer is a sensible person . 
He provides an opportunity for others to get healthy food , decent environment and happiness through his power of thinking . 
Seeing the intense competition the current policy is to provide organic food to ordinary people at modest prices . 
Industry gives benefit to the organic farmers by working in this direction and provides an opportunity to move forward . 
देश can होता है said to होता है a sovereign state until इसलिए imports food for its people . 
Therefore जय किसान , is the food security guard of the country . 
Shastriji 's slogan '' Jai Jawan , Jai Kisan '' applies to organic farmers . 
After the completion of 60 years of 20th century , fast growing population and up to some extent capitalism pressurized to develop a system of उत्पादन . 
During 1960 decade , अन्य उत्पादकता लगभग rapidly increased because of the use of hybrid seeds , chemical fertilizers , pesticides and means of irrigation in हरित क्रांति बाद adopted for food . 
After the green revolution other productions almost became double and हो गई became able to fulfill the requirements of growing population . 
But because of the use of chemical fertilizers soil fertility started decreasing . 
Hybrid Varieties were sensitive for ये कीट . 
Initially इन कीटों were in control because of उपयोग of traditional methods . 
In order to reduce the effect of कीटों , pesticides were used in more quantity . 
Because of which our atmosphere started मिलने लगे polluted and pests developed the resistance towards Pesticide . 
The quality of water was also effected severely as the chemical elements got dissolved with water combined into water sources . 
आधुनिक कृषि started depending more on external inputs such as chemical fertilizers , pesticide , herbicide and machinery . 
The major ill effects of modern farming include soil erosion , कमी of water availability , soil salinity , chemical fertilizers and pollution due to pesticides . 
Quality of food has reduced because of the use of pesticides and polluted water . 
The solution of these all problems lies in परम्परागत खेती only . 
Crop producers no more have the same taste which producers of परम्परागत कृषि had . 
Man has been stabilizing रासायनिक कृषि by following the traditional knowledge of रासायनिक कृषि , correcting previous errors and also on the basis of his experience . 
The negative and harmful aspects of chemical farming were first identified by the farmers of European countries like - Germany , France etc. . 
In 1923 Dr. Rudolf Steiner , an Austrian scientist was the first person to tell that chemical farming along with agriculture destroys the thinking power of human . 
Drugs prepared by micro-organisms are used in प्रबंधन . 
The enemy pests are efficiently managed . 
Hybrid disease-free crops and animal species are प्रयोग . 
Green manure and nitrogenous plants are used . 
In India poor small and medium यही किसान carry the Rain-fed farming , which does not require much chemical inputs . 
Only these farmers are suitable for organic farming . 
Day by day माँग of organic products is बढ़ती in some super markets . 
अधिकतम किसान have a golden chance to fulfill this fast increasing demand . 
Majority of the farmers in India belong to middle class . 
Initial investment at high rates for modern farming is beyond reach for him . 
While all the inputs organic farming have been provided by the nature , कृषकों can get more benefit at less investment . 
यह उद्देश्य of 11th five year plan -LRB- 2007-12 -RRB- is to elevate the standard of living of our farmers and strengthen the economy . 
खेती is a tool through which this objective can be accomplished . 
Today when both the farmers and आर्गेनिक खेती are in danger , आर्गेनिक खेती is the only alternative . 
Some people have a doubt that they will not मिलेगी उपज ही with organic farming what they मिलेगी by using chemical fertilizers . 
Regarding this it can be said that till the first 3-4 year only average production could be availed but after that both productivity and production will increase . 
Therefore without wasting time organic farming should be popularized . 
The cost incurred is low and the soil quality also remains intact . 
Insects do not get destroyed because of the increased amounts of bacteria and production capacity increases . 
Today we are talking about second green revolution , which will be based on soil . 
Soil is the life saver of the farmers . 
Like industries , today ' knowledge management ' is utterly जरूरत in agriculture . 
Meanwhile our country needs to move towards ' soil revolution ' from ' green revolution ' , only the future of mankind will be secured . 
Today while होती है is necessary to fulfill the increasing consumer demand for organic food , the big worry for agricultural development is to maintain consistent sustainable production . 
जैविक कृषि is quite different from जैविक कृषि . 
Actually organic farming can होती है said to होती है a sub section of sustainable agriculture . 
The only difference is that it requires a certification of a recognized institution according to legal standards . 
Currently more than 95 % organic agricultural products are consumed by developed countries . 
The main producers and importers of जैविक कृषि are European Union , USA and Japan . 
In देश like भारत where still farmers use traditional farming methods and where the farmers of small agricultural land holdings are in large number , जैविक कृषि is most appropriate . 
several kinds of organic nutrients are naturally available in क्षेत्रों of India which can prove to be a boon for organic farming in देश . 
Including सिंचित पूर्वोत्तर क्षेत्र with 100 to 10,000 वर्षा in देश there are mountainous and deserts also . 
In fact in the hilly and यह सभी क्षेत्र of the northeast in country the use of chemical fertilizers is almost negligible . 
All these areas naturally fall under जैविक कृषि . 
According to an estimation India has approximately 76 , 000 hectares of कृषि भूमि under जैविक कृषि and 2.4 million hectares are forest , which are the sources of wild herbs . 
But in reality the agricultural land under organic farming is much more than this . 
Among Indian states Uttaranchal and Sikkim have declared themselves as organic farming states . 
According to an estimation during 2006-07 भारत निर्यात जैविक उत्पादों worth 301.24 billion . 
Excluding the herbs निर्यात from UP and MP निर्यात of अन्य उत्पादों भी from भारत is estimated to be around 85 % . 
India occupies a special place in निर्यात of organic tea , इसके साथ ही also has great potential for other products . 
Similarly spices , fruits etc. are some other products which have good export potential . 
The Indian companies certifying organic foods will have status equivalent to European Commission -LRB- EC -RRB- . 
With this the Indian organic products would not require to होगी certified by European agencies and the export value for organic agricultural products will होगी less . 
According to an estimation during प्रमाणन only 500-1000 euro per hectare would be saved . 
Indian government has formed 6 institutions for the certification and authentication -LRB- domestic or international -RRB- of organic agricultural products . 
National organic standards have been fixed for organic production under national program . 
Currently 11 accredited certification agencies are functioning in India . 
INDOCERT located in Kerala is also one of the domestic certifying agencies . 
Europe is the second biggest यूरोपीय जैविक कृषि बाजार of organic food products in the world , and half of whole production of world is consumed here only . 
सबसे बड़ा जैविक खाद्य बाजार of organic agriculture is estimated to be around 9 billion US Dollars and its annual growth is approximately 20 % depending upon the market situations . 
Japan is the biggest organic food market in Asia . 
In 2003 , the retail sales of organic food and beverages थे 2.5-3 .0 billion यूएस डॉलर . 
Out Of this , import was worth around 360 billion U. S. dollars . 
Saudi Arabia , U. A. E. and South Africa are जैविक कॉफी बाजार for organic foods . 
Currently भारत share in global organic coffee market is 1 % out of 150 million U. S. dollars and its share in the global organic spice market is 3 % out of 3.2 million dollars . 
In the context of increasing production in भारत it is assumed that it will keep increasing . 
The organic fruits and vegetables exports from भारत to U. S. and European Union is approximately 40 % . 
If the post-harvest initial infrastructure and cold storage chain are effectively strengthen , then there would होता है huge potential for भारत in एक अन्य क्षेत्र . 
Dairy is another sector where sufficient potential exists for भारत because majority of he fodder fed to the animals is free of chemicals in भारत . 
भारत has certainly become successful in exporting agricultural genes to major organic food markets of the world . 
India 's इतनी बड़ी आबादी is more than one billion and out of this 400 million people belong to middle-class . 
Neighborhood grocery shops are dominating the retail market of foods for such a large population . 
There are 11 small shops available for every thousand person . 
In this system price of food increases during the channelization of food products from field processor - distributor - retailer - customer and quantity and quality also decreases . 
Supply chain is very weak in भारत . 
There are more than 50 % उत्पादों among उत्पादों of retail market in India . 
the percentage of brand less products are greater in number . 
Therefore in भारत , there is tremendous opportunity for such kind of branded marketing . 
Recently big corporates of भारत have come forward in this sector and are trying to increase खुदरा व्यापार by opening their retail chains . 
97 % of India 's retail business is occupied by hawkers , push cart vendors and grocery stores . 
Hawkers and pushcart vendors are said to be moving supermarkets and these belong to self organized sector . 
They are seen on every street . 
These retail marketers of low cost neither have their native village nor city . 
They sell खाद्य पदार्थों by going streets to street . 
Grocery stores consists of small , medium-sized shops , retail shops of edible products and family shops . 
These shops are available in the vicinity to fulfill everyday needs of people . 
In U. S. such shops are known as mum and pop stores . 
Grocery shopkeeper - It is such a powerful system which is not seen anywhere else in असंगठित क्षेत्र . 
Vendors are main components of unorganized sector . 
They have खुदरा प्रणाली which is quite appropriate for भारत . 
This wing of retail system is good for the poor public of India . 
Any kind of permanent location is not good for them . 
So मिल जाए is difficult to assess their financial input into व्यापार . 
They set their business with little investment and taking little loan Where there is place for a person to sir at the footpath and they will also more or less visit their homes . 
This system is long lasting and is spread in whole India . 
This is a primary source of employment for poor . 
Weekly marts are held in rural areas of दक्षिण भारत . 
Retail trade of grocery goods for the first time began in South India . 
श्रृंखलाओं was Nilgiri ' s. Later कार्पोरेटों such as बिग बाज़ार , , Reliance Fresh etc. स्थापना their chains in चेन्नई , and Bangalore . 
Along with big , medium and small शहरों साथ -झौईण् साथ and even in आबादी ranging from 1 million - 5 million कार्पोरेटों पास have Organized retail chains . 
प्रौद्योगिकी can be reduced by प्रयोग ज्ञान . 
With प्रयोग of inventory management and I. T. instruments in आपूर्ति श्रृंखला , consumption pattern or जायजा can be determined . 
With the help of two innovative technical systems such as क्रास डाकिंग and electronic data inter chains direct connection of head quarters is established with बिक्री टर्मिनल साथ . 
Sellers are analyzed here . 
Besides the detailed analysis of customers could be done with the help of data warehousing . 
NGO services are being प्रयोग at स्तर in corporate farm management so that essential rights products are availed at आवश्यक सही उत्पाद समय . 
There are several brokers between the supplier and retailer in परम्परागत प्रणाली . 
But in आधुनिक खुदरा प्रणाली they are directly related to उत्पादक साथ . 
यातायात plays बहुत बड़ी भूमिका in आपूर्ति of खाद्य पदार्थों . 
कार्पोरेट get logistics from external sources . 
Cold chains spread all across the country has सुविधा , व्याप्‍त शीतल श्रृंखला , रेफ्रिजेरेटेड वैन and other special services are provided by लाजिस्टिक कम्पनियों . 
This is बहुत बड़ी सुविधा for आधुनिक खुदरा व्यापार . 
With this unique delivery बेहतरीन वितरण प्रणाली has been विकसित . 
भारतीय ग्राहक have पर्याप्‍त जानकारी about गुणवत्ता and कीमत of उत्पादों and they only want to खरीदना the best things . 
Customer 's favorite things are easily found in organized chains . 
श्रेणीकरण and standardization methods are performed at various stages of तैयारी , of खाद्य उत्पादों , संसाधन and भंडारण . 
The employment in retail business establishments in rural areas is 39.28 % and in शहरों it is 39.28 % . 
After the invasion of बड़े कार्पोरेट in इस खुदरा व्यापार , the small shopkeepers will नुकसान नुकसान . 
Their financial sources will disappear . 
They would not be able to मुकाबला with बड़े कार्पोरेटों साथ . 
कार्पोरेटों of कार्पोरेटों will वृद्धि the and the आय of किसानों will reduce . 
खुदरा बाज़ार is worth Rs 1 , 500 billion . 
Out of this हिस्सा of organized retail shoppers is only 2.5 मात्र 2.5 % . 
कीमतों of goods should be decreased in order to increase इस हिस्से . 
After the establishment of यह प्रणाली these stores will हो जाने बाद a threat for लेबल ब्राण्ड खाद्य उद्योग . 
It is difficult to be हिस्सा of उत्पादन प्रक्रिया of small and मार्जिनल किसानों for लम्बे समय . 
स्वायत्तता of किसान ends due to खेती and थोक खरीदी . 
On सुझाव of क्षेत्रीय विशेषज्ञता by बिग कार्पोरेटों , किसानों might नुकसान भी नुकसान भी because of the impractical crop production by growing एक ही फसल in वर्ष . 
किसानों only will नुकसान ही नुकसान ही because of एकाधिकार in purchasing power and नियंत्रण over किसानों and उत्पादों . 
Currently around 40 million unemployed people are dependent on करीब 40 मिलियन बेरोज़गार इसी क्षेत्र . 
Their livelihood will be lost . 
According to एक सर्वे , there has been decline in 4.2 % of annual turnover of असंगठित खुदरा क्षेत्र but according to them its cause is not असंगठित खुदरा क्षेत्र but the competitiveness of असंगठित खुदरा क्षेत्र . 
इस सर्वे stated that by प्रवेश of संगठित खुदरा क्षेत्र प्रवेश of किसानों will 60 % वृद्धि by 60 % . 
Because of संगठित खुदरा क्षेत्र किसानों will मिलेगा फायदा by directly बेचकर उपज to the purchasers . 
They will be able to उपयोग नई प्रौद्योगिकी , , बीज आदि etc. and वृद्धि उत्पादकता . 
According to इस रिपोर्ट one can लिया जा सकता है the help of खेती for थोक खरीदी which is now being used by बड़े कार्पोरेट like Nestle . 
According to एक रिपोर्ट because of प्रवेश of बड़े कार्पोरेटों into खुदरा बाजार , किसानों , , customers and छोटे अनौपचारिक खुदरा व्यापारियों will be benefitted . 
विशेषतया कृषि क्षेत्र is more likely to increase with this . 
Despite the projected merits of the organized retail chain , छोटे व्यापारियों across the country raised voice against संगठित खुदरा चैन . 
आंदोलन were carried in कई शहरों . 
It was अनुमान that because of इन बड़े रिटेल चैनों 20 million 20 करोड़ लोगों lost their jobs and livelihood . 
Small shopkeepers फैसला not to sell एयरटेल सिम कार्डों in Mumbai against the Bharti - Walmart joint venture . 
Many freedom fighters , समर्थन these movements of small vendors . 
इन छोटे व्यापारियों कहना that the big corporates want to have एकाधिकार over बड़े कार्पोरेट बाज़ार by being producer , wholesaler and retailer . 
मशहूर एनजीओ नेताओं कहना that पूरी दुनिया is जा रही है towards corporate-to-cooperative . 
In such a situation रिटेल चैन of बड़े कार्पोरेटों will be detrimental for the people of भारत . 
Thus strong protest प्रकट in सभी क्षेत्रों against चैनों . 
According to them , globalization is not only applicable to केवल बहुल जातीय कम्पनियों but also to गरीब जनता भी . 
असंगठित खुदरा व्यापार was मजबूत in दक्षिण एशियाई देशों and इसमें काफी वृद्धि significantly . 
Traditional shops and vendors were सीमित to क्षेत्रों with कम आबादीवाले and भौतिक संरचना was वृद्धि . 
Preventing प्रवेश of बड़े कार्पोरेटों is like preventing the sunrise . 
असंगठित खुदरा क्षेत्र might be helped through Cash and कैश एंड कैरी प्रणाली . 
According to एक सर्वे यह भी was also revealed that because of the coalition of किसानों and corporate , intermediaries have disappeared and there has been 40 % 40 % वृद्धि in लाभों of किसानों . 
बस to be kept in यह ध्यान is that along with large corporate अस्तित्व of the small shops should also be ensured . 
भारत occupies नौवाँ स्थान in large retail trade marketing . 
इतिहास gives us जानकारी about our interchange and business relationships with अनेक देशों साथ . 
इस देश was देखा जाता था as इस देश . 
समृद्धि ही only आकर्षित व्यापारियों from अनेक देशों to आकर here and start व्यापारियों . 
After the invasion of मध्यकाल during medieval period यह देश got destroyed . 
Later , instead of promoting व्यापारिक अवसरों here , the British also followed the strategy of looting . 
After freedom इस देश has touched new heights by doing hard work . 
बाजार paying reasonable values of products is एक प्रमुख आवश्यकता of किसान . 
Enhancement in कृषि व्यवसाय and purchasing power of किसान is possible only when he gets सही दाम of his product . 
थोक व्यापारियों in भारत खरीद the products from wholesalers . 
As a result there is भारी वृद्धि in कीमतों till इसके reaches the consumer . 
Because of जहाँ at एक ओर उत्पादक gets less value on the other side consumer has to pay more amount . 
so far विपणन व्यवस्था at यहाँ was mostly carried by असंगठित पारम्परिक क्षेत्र . 
According to इंडियन रीटेल रिपोर्ट भारत खुदरा बाजार is worth 270 billion 270 बिलियन डॉलर which is growing at दर of 5.7 % प्रतिवर्ष . 
485 billion or 4.7 % 485 बिलियन हिस्सा of इस खुदरा बाजार is नियंत्रित by big corporations . 
The rest 95.3 % शेष 95.3 % खुदरा व्यापार is carried by पारम्परिक खुदरा व्यापारियों . 
But खुदरा व्यापार carried by corporations increases at वृद्धि -झौईण् दर of 28 to 30 % 30 % प्रतिवर्ष . 
It is अनुमान that around 6600 mega stores would होने स्थापित with निवेश of 40,000 billion rupees by 2011 . 
It is अनुमान that for आबादी पीछे there are 11 retail shops which do not include shops of साप्‍ताहिक बाजार .

कई बड़े परिवर्तन would be seen in the near future in इस क्षेत्र through समामेलन and acquisitions . 
Subhiksha : This society was initiated in 1997 in चेन्नई , whose founder is श्री आर सुब्रमणियम , and who has educated from IIT and IIAS . 
यह संस्था deals with किराना माल , , fresh and frozen food , किराना माल , and books . 
It is prevalent in the form of subsidized store . 
Saving is ' बचत मेरा अधिकार ' ' is their motto .

स्पेन्सर्स : - : यह is also known as RPG Enterprises , which is a very large professional association and its annual turnover is worth Rupees 7500 billion .

इनका also have an outlet नाम भी by Tata Kisan Sansar .

Many multinational companies - such as टेस्को , Metro are looking forward to come to मेट्रो भारत . 
Under मौजूदा दिशा निदेर्शों of सरकार FDI is allowed only in होलसेल कैश एंड कैरी मॉडल ही but इसकी is not allowed in multi-brand retail stores . 
In एकल ब्रांड retail shop FDI is सीमित to 51 % but multibrand international retailers may trade with franchisee route where their Indian partner will run their business operations . 
Future joint venture between भारती and मार्ट साथ is famous which is being extensively raged . 
While at one place प्रदूषण spreads because of उपयोग of vehicles by institutional retailers at the other place पर्यावरण gets contaminated by उपयोग of प्लास्टिक and packing materials . 
Pollution on original sources increases with खपत , also स्तर भी in पर्यावरण gets dis-balanced because of air-conditioning systems . 
Mediators have एक बड़ी भूमिका in मौजूदा व्यवस्था and thus they get रोजगार at large scale . 
यह भी is एक मिथ्याभास that किसानों will मिलेंगे good prices . 
The entrance of effective chains like FDI and Wal mart in खुदरा बाजार will होगा very harmful and होगा will अंत पारम्परिक खुदरा व्यापार व्यवस्था . 
एक बड़ा हिस्सा of profit coming from इस क्षेत्र will go to foreign countries . 
Organized retail business is beneficial for consumers , उत्पादकों as well as mediators . 
In southern and पूर्वी भागों of देश , there was no bad impact on संगठित खुदरा व्यापार because of संगठित खुदरा व्यापार but इससे वृद्धि ही रोजगार . 
Traditional merchants sell their goods to customers on credit , of which बड़ी संख्या of clients are still with them . 
44 % of the customers in पूर्वी भाग and 44 % of the customers in पूर्वी भाग of देश are still with traditional merchants . 
Lack of बैंकिंग सुविधाओं to पारम्परिक व्यापारियों are अवरोधक प्रगति . 
Low-income consumers have gained most by खरीद from organized retailers as संगठित खुदरा व्यापारियों providing डिस्काउंट belong to संगठित संस्थागत क्षेत्र . 
89 % of the mediators have decided to continue पारम्परिक खुदरा व्यवसाय . 
Only 3 % of the mediators have chosen to परिवर्तन व्यवसाय . 
There has been 60 % वृद्धि in the profit of जिन किसानों who have directly sold उत्पाद to institutional shops . 
Cash and मॉडल like that of चीन should be adopted for getting fresh food products from किसानों . 
एक समान कानून should be made in पूरे देश to प्रदान licenses and permits and there should be comfortable arrangements to avail ये सुविधाएँ . 
Competition commission of India ' should be empowered to curb अवसर of संगठित क्षेत्र to increase कीमतें . 
संस्थागत व्यापारियों in ब्राजील get अनुमति to व्यापार with city councils by dealing and guidelines are निर्धारित at राष्‍ट्रीय स्तर . 
For आधुनिकीकरण of सिंगापुर खुदरा बाजारों बोर्ड has been स्थापित in Singapore which manages संगठन , and आधुनिकीकरण of small stores . 
In तैवान सुपर बाजारों have been declared as fully modern and they have been तब्दील into सुपर बाजारों . 
In व्यवस्थापन the management of बाजारों is handed over to private managers . 
Most of अधिकतर देश are now सदस्य of WTO and as per the treaty with organization संकल्पना of open economy has हुए real . 
Therefore this is the best idea to overcome the risks of खतरों and हासिल success by using प्राप्‍त अवसरों evolved from इस प्रक्रिया . 
Globalization is a reality , इसमें has अवसर भी as well as risks . 
If we अध्ययन the various issues of the agricultural problems then gist of all these studies gets stuck to केवल एक महत्त्वपूर्ण बात , which is - विपणन of कृषि उत्पादों . 
If कृषि needs any supportive किसी सहयोगी कारक then that is - पर्याप्‍त रोजगार based on सुव्यवस्थित बाजार and आर्थिक उन्नति of rural areas of देश . 
कृषि विपणन पद्धति has been परिभाषित in many ways . 
Still if इसे is to हो defined precisely then इसे can हो कहा जा सकता है that this is एक मूर्त संस्थागत व्यवस्था which एवं various activities ranging from स्रोत of कृषि उत्पाद , availability of the produced good in the hands of consumer , transportation and several other services . 
In the activities of modern marketing of कृषि उत्पादों , कृषि उत्पादों पहुँच पाते हैं their last consumer by passing through the hands of several mediators . 
Current scenario - In India organized marketing of कृषि उत्पादों has been promoted through नेटवर्क . 
Most of the state governments and शासित have passed 2 कानून for the regulation of कृषि उत्पाद बाजार belonging to agricultural products . 
During दशक only केवल 286 नियमित बाजार were available in देश , but by march 2006 संख्या पहुँच गई to 7566 . 
Besides this there are 21780 rural marts in भारत , but only 15 % of them काम under परिधि of organized and 21780 ग्रामीण हाट -झौईण् बाजार हैं . 
The transportation of उत्पादों and goods is carried through a large chain of mediators and agencies . 
उत्पादन , , ग्रामीण व्यापारी or mediators , ठेकेदार , before कमीशन एजेंट , and कमीशन एजेंट , are मुख्य घटकों in प्रारम्भिक बाजार . 
Thus processing and उत्पादन एजेंट भी also include as an additional mediators in secondary market . 
In प्रक्रिया of marketing all the mediators get हिस्सा of मार्जिन with कुछ योगदान . 
Therefore , दाम of उत्पादों increases unnecessarily . 
प्रकृति of कृषि उत्पादों and their state of being deteriorated makes उपलब्धता more complex . 
Suppliers have the weaknesses of infrastructural management . 
Many problems have evolved due to fast बेतहाशा वृद्धि in agricultural products such as additional marketing of अतिरिक्‍त खाद्यान्नों etc. . 
At the same time there is जरूरत to face challenges due to उदारीकरण in विश्‍व बाजार and to take लाभ of अवसरों also . 
दौर - - In नई कृषि नीति of India it has been कहा गया है that भागीदारी of निजी क्षेत्र will be promoted by contract farming and भागीदारी of निजी क्षेत्र will be encouraged through leasing of भूमि whereby प्रौद्योगिकी अंतरण , , निजी प्रवाह and सुरक्षित बाजार of फसल उत्पादन could be increased . 
A partnership between the Indian corporate and ग्रामीण भारत बीच is flourishing with व्यापक समन्वय . 
E-Chaupal ' has महत्त्वाकांक्षी ई -झौईण् चौपाल परियोजना आरम्भ an ambitious ' E-Chaupal project ' which aims at enabling भारतीय कृषि at अंतरराष्‍ट्रीय स्तर and व्यापक सुधार in अंतरराष्‍ट्रीय स्तर of ग्रामीण भारत . 
The main target of इस योजना is to ensure नियमित आपूर्ति of कच्चे माल by स्थापित नियंत्रण on this supply chain . 
In सुदूर गाँवों of मध्य प्रदेश , , मध्य प्रदेश , and मध्य प्रदेश , , e - Choupal has been स्थापित by किसान with मदद of computers having इंटरनेट and प्रिंटर through portal . 
इन किऑस्क are run by अग्रणी किसानों of गाँव which are called ' संचालक ' . 
संचालक are trained to run computers . 
The current market values of all state markets are displayed at इन किऑस्क simultaneously . 
इसमें also contains संबंधी जानकारी भी and provides संबंधी जानकारी भी of various scientific systems to किसानों . 
E-Chopal has provided अवसर to खरीद चावल and अन्य फसलों to I.T.C directly from किसानों . 
Undoubtedly with इन तरह of व्यवस्था किसानों have got एक ऑन लाइन बाजार in सुदूर गाँवों ही as विकल्प of एक ऑन लाइन बाजार . 
लागत are reduced with इस व्यवस्था . 
Currently e-chopal has पहुँच गया है 3 lac 50 thousand 3 लाख 50 हजार किसानों through 650 किओस्क with which 3 लाख 50 हजार किसानों interchange चावल , and दालों . 
There are भारत of contract farming in देश like भारत . 
Seeing their welfare , companies are also analyzing सुविधाओं provided by राज्यों . 
प्रसिद्ध कम्पनी has started contract farming in हरियाणा for उत्पादन of जौ . 
SAB Miller India is a world known कम्पनी which has provided their famous brands FOSTERS , CARTLE , HAYWARDS to बाजार and इसने has associated 400 किसानों through contract farming in 2500 acres . 
Bangalore based Global Green Company has achieved बेहतर सफलता though contract farming and now it is बेंगलूर आधारित ग्लोबल ग्रीन कम्पनी of भारत . 
The fertile भूमि of देश is favorable for several kinds of फलों and सब्जियों in हर मौसम . 
मौजूदा फल उत्पादन of देश is 32 million metric ton which is % है of मौजूदा फल उत्पादन of the world . 
With 15 % of उत्पादन , भारत is the second largest vegetable producer . 
In order to make a modern and effective विपणन पद्धति , किसानों are required to make large investments in cold storage houses near खेतों पास ही after कटाई बाद . 
बड़ा हिस्सा of इस निवेश can only आ सकता है from निजी क्षेत्र ही . 
Therefore समुचित नीतिगत निर्णय must be लिया जाना . 
Further प्रक्रिया of directly खरीदने कृषि उत्पाद from किसानों should be encouraged . 
So that एक प्रभावी अंतर्संबंध between कृषि उत्पादन and retail chain is स्थापित . 
Recently सरकार has taken कुछ कदम to promote modern terminal markets for फलों , , सब्जियों and अन्य कृषि उत्पादों in important city centers of भारत . 
इस प्रकार of markets will also प्रदान affordable as well as modern अत्याधुनिक ढाँचागत सुविधा भी to मार्केट किसानों . 
कार्य प्रणाली of these terminal markets is आधारित on '' HUB AND मॉडल where terminal markets in the form of hub are connected with spoke-like collection centers . 
Along with removing all quantitative restrictions on imports , the merging of भारतीय अर्थव्यवस्था with भारतीय अर्थव्यवस्था seems to होना more practical . 
We जरूरत to take ample advantages of the competitive scenarios in अंतरराष्‍ट्रीय व्यापार . 
सरकार has followed '' Region and उत्पाद विशेष नीति '' to promote निर्यात of विभिन्न कृषि उत्पादों . 
इस परिकल्पना is known as Agri Export Zones . 
Two tasks are done in वायदा बाजार , मूल्य and प्रबंधन . 
By विनिर्धारण कार्य , participants are helped in समझने market conditions and taking व्यापारिक निर्णय accordingly . 
मुख्य आर्थिक कार्य of वायदा बाजार is to promote पहुँच so that लागत are कम . 
According to एक अनुमान प्रतिवर्ष नुकसान of Rs 80 , 000 billion is suffered . 
वार्षिक उपभोग भी of जितने फल and सब्जियाँ in U. K is even less than जितने फल that are wasted प्रतिवर्ष in भारत . 
Therefore होने is extremely important to do पश्‍चात् प्रबंधन , such as focusing on cold storage and good पश्‍चात् प्रबंधन , so हानियों may होने removed . 
Production is incomplete until यह reaches the hands of last consumer in अपेक्षित अवस्था , , on समय and at अपेक्षित स्थान . 
Therefore बाजार occupies an extremely important अत्यंत महत्त्वपूर्ण स्थान in अत : उत्पादन प्रक्रिया of production . 
Generally 5-6 mediators are found in कृषि मूल्य चैन . 
किसान तो only get 25-30 % share of कीमत paid by consumers . 
This is एक बड़ी चुनौती before भारतीय कृषि समक्ष . 
इसका needs to be resolved . 
किसानों पास have an average land even less than भूमि दो हेक्टेयर भी which is also the root cause of किसानों पास problems . 
दौर has brought क्रांति in information transaction at वैश्‍विक स्तर . 
किसान can not लिये जाने लाभ of current market prices and किसान always असफल ही in taking निर्णय in their favor . 
कुछ कार्यवाही has हो सकी है possible in इस दिशा by शुरू e-chopal by कुछ कार्पोरेट like आई.टी.सी and कुछ सकारात्मक परिणाम भी are also observed . 
There are unlimited opportunities for सूचना प्रौद्योगिकी in क्षेत्र . 
By the execution of मानक हो गया है has हो गया है mandatory to maintain अंतर्राष्‍ट्रीय गुणवत्ता of फसलों for निर्यात . 
सर्व of किसी भी बाजार is to do the pricing of goods and services on आधार of माँग and पूर्ति . 
वर्तमान कीमत of वस्तु in स्पॉट बाजार depends on वास्तविक माँग and पूर्ति . 
आज कीमत depends on आज माँग and पूर्ति and कीमत will निर्भर on माँग and पूर्ति . 
खण्ड निर्धारित कीमत of वस्तु in बाजार is known as बाजार . 
In any economy कीमत performs an important function of efficient allocation of संसाधनों . 
Unlike किसी साधारण बाजार , कार्य of किसी साधारण बाजार is not only limited to pricing but also to प्रदान risk management solutions to लोगों . 
The Future market paves way to manage जोखिम संबंधित to कीमत through वायदा and डेरिवेटिव उत्पादों etc. . 
बाजारों has एक महत्त्वपूर्ण स्थान in आर्थिक विकास and आर्थिक विकास of देशों . 
अनिश्‍चित मौसम , , वैश्‍विक असंतुलन and fast increase in demand is responsible for rapid fluctuation in कीमतों of commodities and this raises the risk management requirements . 
प्रादुर्भाव of institutions like बाजार is because of these factors only . 
In 2002 मल्टी कमोडिटी एक्सचेंज was स्थापना at राष्‍ट्रीय स्तर . 
At अंतर्राष्‍ट्रीय स्तर major commodity exchanges exists in जापान and England . 
अंतरराष्‍ट्रीय स्तर of बाजार is five to twenty times more than बाजार . 
फ्यूचर्स are bought and sold in बाजार . 
Thus , commodity futures is उत्पाद of फ्यूचर्स डेरिवेटिव श्रृंखला where कमोडिटी is कमोडिटी rather than a security . 
Price fluctuation of फ्यूचर्स depends on underlying commodity price fluctuation . 
While on the analysis of परिभाषा , commodity futures looks like फ्यूचर्स फारवर्ड प्रसंविदा , लक्षण भी of its distinction with फ्यूचर्स फारवर्ड प्रसंविदा also appear . 
Evidently , in the case of फ्यूचर्स not only कमोडिटी , कीमत or volumes are preset , but गुणवत्ता and location of their delivery etc. are also preset . 
One of the two parties is definitely एक्सचेंज . 
Thus एक्सचेंज acts as a central counter-party . 
कोश भी is also संपोषित by the Commodity Exchange , which is similar to the fund , संपोषित by कमोडिटी एक्सचेंज . 
प्रत्येक ऐसी प्रसंविदा represents एक निश्‍चित मात्रा of वस्तु whose transaction is done at a predetermined location . 
यह प्रसंविदा is transferable and with the passage of समय , due to परिवर्तनों , in माँग and पूर्ति of वस्तु , कीमत of यह प्रसंविदा also varies , with परिवर्तनों , in कीमत . 
इस प्रसंविदा can be freely bought and बेचा जा सकता है in the secondary market with मूल्य . 
मूल्य ही of the object during किसी भी समय also determines मूल्य ही of प्रसंविदा . 
इस प्रकार of फ्यूचर्स , always happens through कमोडिटी एक्सचेंज rather than being directly between any two individuals . 
Only कमोडिटी एक्सचेंज ही is responsible for भुगतान or डिलीवरी of वस्तु . 
Actually फ्यूचर्स is प्रयोग for speculation or प्रबंधन , and वास्तविक डिलीवरी are non-existent . 
Due to बाजार उत्पादक of commodities can sell उत्पाद at निर्धारित मूल्य before उत्पाद . 
On दूसरी ओर , consumers can buy the commodities at preset prices before तारीख पहले ही of consumption . 
Thus not only the producer escapes from जोखिम भी of संभावित वृद्धि in prices but consumers also बचता from जोखिम भी of संभावित वृद्धि in prices . 
बाजार presents a very scientific and just प्रक्रिया of न्यायपूर्ण जोखिम प्रबंधन which fulfills जरूरतों of उत्पादकों and consumers . 
By putting संबंधित वस्तु in go-downs approved by एक्सचेंज for longer period , transaction to sell at बेहतर कीमतों in वायदा बाजार can be carried . 
Fluctuation in फ्यूचर्स बाजार are not so intense as they are in फ्यूचर्स बाजार . 
Hence , commodity market transaction is relatively safe . 
By balancing माँग and पूर्ति of various commodities , यह बाजार determines an undisputed and acceptable कीमत very transparently . 
If किसी सौदे is निबटान without delivery opposite to किसी सौदे then sales tax does not apply . 
Sales tax applies only in those cases where डिलीवरी is ली or दी जाती है . 
Usually it is जिम्मेदारी of यह विक्रेता to collect and भुगतान the sales tax . 
From 1 जून , , सरकार has provided व्यवस्था of commodity transaction tax . 
The covenants in NCDEX expires on the 20th of हर महीने . 
If there is a holiday on 20th then तारीख will होगी एक दिन before तारीख . 
In the case of वस्तु with greater fluctuation values , margin amount is increased . 
In addition to प्रबंधन , डेरिवेटिव उत्पादों are largely प्रयोग by speculators . 
The truth is that वर्ग is the backbone of any future-market . 
बाजार can not be imagined without speculators . 
सटोरिया वर्ग is सटोरिया वर्ग which manages निहित जोखिम inherent in the actual commercial transactions but assesses निहित जोखिम and दिशा already present in बाजार , प्रयास to get benefits out of होने . 
The class of प्रबंधन is ignorant of वर्ग माँग and पूर्ति and other subtle factors affecting कीमतों , and does not have the skills to analyze concerning data . 
वह is engaged in commercial transactions and रुचि lies only in the prevention of जोखिमों संबंधित to those transactions . 
In contrast , speculator class has गहरी समझ of वर्ग बाजार and the various factors that influencing इसके . 
By closely studying the ever-changing conditions of माँग and पूर्ति of किसी भी वस्तु at regional , national and अन्तरराष्‍ट्रीय स्तर , वर्ग क्षेत्रीय , gets skilled in the accurate assessment आधारित on its solid inferences . 
लाभ or हानि made by him depends on शुद्धता of market values estimates . 
So अत : वह does इस कार्य with पूरी व्यावसायिक लगन . 
वह deals in बाजारों on आधार of these estimations . 
Since सटोरिया वर्ग is सटोरिया वर्ग and 90 % of 90 % बाजार is संचालित by सटोरिया वर्ग only , therefore , market values and भावी दिशाओं indicated by the transactions done by सटोरिया वर्ग can be considered as संकेत . 
वर्ग ही only provides वांछित तरलता to बाजार and freedom to सौदे on different prices to actual business risk managers . 
वर्ग provides संतुलन to बाजार rather than imbalance . 
Thus we देखते हैं that spectacular class actually saves बाजार from rapid and असंतुलनों and provides it संतुलन and presumability . 
In राय of experts कारण behind ever increasing inflation is वृद्धि in कीमत of आयातित कच्चे तेल and कमी in पूर्ति . 
The common people suffering from continuously rising prices , estimate that the high levels of betting in बाजार is responsible for इसके . 
अभिजीत सेन कमेटी appointed by Parliament has made यह clear in रिपोर्ट that फ्यूचर्स व्यवसाय and कीमतों have no correlation . 
कीमतों are concerned with rapidly rising माँग than पूर्ति , which is एक विश्‍व स्तरीय मुद्दा सीमित only to भारत ही . 
In addition to the various segments of समाज , विभिन्न वर्गों also gets फायदों from बाजार . 
The banks providing बैंक ऋण can save themselves up to काफी हद from एनपीए by dealing equivalent to मूल्य of बैंक ऋण in futures वायदा बाजार . 
ऐसा is specifically possible in those situations when उधारकर्ता fails in विशेषकर ऋण due to हानि because of the fall in prices . 
After passing of प्रस्तावित संशोधन in Banking Regulation Act , बैंकों will get अनुमति to trade in वायदा बाजार . 
In उस स्थिति बैंक would not only be able to do proper diversification of their investment portfolio on behalf of clients but also by proprietary deals . 
Through such transactions आय भी can also be obtained by बैंकों . 
As a result of तरलता thus witnessed in बाजार बैंक may transfer जोखिम by हस्तांतरण the warehouse receipts in बाजार . 
Globally , आकार is दस गुना more than आकार of वस्तु बाजार . 
धारणा of people may differ but experts believe that generally future trade is not responsible for the fluctuation of कीमतों in बाजार . 
कदम hurriedly taken to prevent the activities of वस्तु बाजार appear like killing प्रतिबंधित who brings bad messages . 
उत्पादन in भारत is 108.2 million 108.2 मिलियन टन -LRB- 2005-06 -RRB- which is second highest in the world . 
Being देश with विभिन्न प्रकार of suitable climate plenty of प्रचुर प्राकृतिक संसाधन , विभिन्न प्रकार of फल and विभिन्न प्रकार of vegetables are पैदा in भारत . 
Despite all these factors , निर्यात of देश is just केवल 1.0 % of the total agricultural and निर्यात of the world . 
There is only 2-3 % प्रसंस्करण in फल and vegetables . 
59 % हिस्सा of भारत in आम उत्पादन of the world is 59 % 59 % हिस्सा but it has only 13.55 % 59 % हिस्सा in निर्यात and आम फल are processed . 
निर्यात has become negligible due to कम उपज , , अधिक आंतरिक खपत , , कम गुणवत्ता , and अभाव आदि of योग्य उत्पाद in large quantities . 
घरेलू उद्योग has to तैयार उत्पाद at reasonable prices in order to make it suitable for निर्यात बाज़ार . 
By cultivating and निर्यात off फलों we can कमा सकते हैं अधिक लाभ . 
प्रसंस्करण क्षेत्र भी of देश is also the largest in terms of निर्यात and growth prospects . 
Export of processed foods has crossed Rs 15 , 000 billion . 
However , seeing the potential in प्रसंस्करण and volume of fruits production , still lot of work has to be be done . 
ताजा फूल of भारत are exported to 87 देशों of the world , mainly , नीदरलैण्ड and United Arab Emirates . 
There has been प्रमुख वृद्धि in cut flowers . 
For निर्यात of पुष्प more than 150 pro-export units are being विकसित in पूरे देश , near पुणे , , बंगलौर and दिल्ली आसपास . 
Agricultural export zone was परिकल्पना to enhance योग्य कृषि उत्पाद , and to give उचित कीमत of the commodities to किसान समुदाय . 
So far , 60 such agricultural export zones have been स्थापित . 
निवेश of 17 billion rupees था प्रस्तावित for these agricultural export zones and so far 8 billion rupees are spent on them . 
Several agricultural exports zones are कृषि निर्यात more than required target . 
34 applications are under consideration for स्थापित agricultural export zones . 
Under the various schemes of state and राज्य सरकारों various economic and सहायता are being provided in these agricultural export zones . 
Under its various schemes and provisions , APDA would play भूमिका in state governments ' प्रयासों to increase निर्यात of agricultural and खाद्य पदार्थ . 
According to अनुमान of international consultant Dunn and Bradstreet , agricultural and दुग्ध उत्पाद worth around 13 billion यूएस डॉलर -LRB- Rs 52 , 000 crore -RRB- are wasted in भारत . 
There are कई उत्पाद in फ़ूड क्षेत्र which yield अच्छी कीमत after कटाई बाद and by शाम they रह जाते हैं fit only to होते -झौईण् होते fed by cattle . 
The farmers can बच सकते हैं नुकसान by बेचकर ऐसे उत्पादों from फ़ूड पार्कों on किसान समय . 
In अभाव of प्रसंस्करण and बिक्री there may हो सकती है up to 25 to 35 % ऐसी हानि in फल and vegetables . 
The big Indian and कम्पनियों पास have क्षमता of 30 tons per hour . 
There has been उल्लेखनीय वृद्धि in इस उद्योग due to उदारीकरण and removal of excise on फलों and उत्पादों . 
For समग्र विकास of कृषि क्षेत्र there था प्रस्ताव to विकसित सॉफ़्टवेयर पार्कों like सॉफ़्टवेयर पार्कों . 
Each of them has अनुदान of Rs 50 billion . 
There is संभावना to provide रोजगार to 75 million people through पार्कों . 
फ़ूड पार्कों are being विकास to प्रदान सहयोग to कृषि क्षेत्र . 
This will प्रोत्साहन खाद्य प्रसंस्करण उद्योग and सपना of reaching reasonable quality foods from खेत to थाली will हो सकेगा possible . 
खाद्य मंत्रालय has रखा है प्रावधान of Rs 1 , 500 billion for फ़ूड पार्कों through special purpose vehicle . 
NAFED , स्पाइसिस बोर्ड and the State Trading Corporation has पहल the making of कृषि फ़ूड पार्क by building a special purpose vehicle and कृषि फ़ूड पार्क is being made in मध्य प्रदेश . 
State Trading Corporation has already स्थापित पार्क in ट्रेडिंग कॉर्पोरेशन कर्नाटक , one for chili and another for एक मिर्च . 
नेशनल हॉर्टीकल्चर बोर्ड and APDA , are प्रदान आकर्षक आर्थिक प्रोत्साहन for establishing chilling and पैकेजिंग उद्योग . 
भारत सरकार of India is giving 25 % 25 % अनुदान on निवेश -LRB- Maximum Rs 50 million -RRB- for establishing प्रसंस्करण उद्योग in फ़ूड पार्क . 
निर्माणपूर्व अवधि of उत्पादन for पार्कों will होगी of 3 to 5 5 वर्ष . 
Cold Chain and खाद्य प्रसंस्करण तकनीक will play एक महत्त्वपूर्ण भूमिका in विकास of फ़ूड पार्कों . 
किसान can also do ग्रेडिंग and प्रसंस्करण आदि of फ़सल according to the daily need of फ़ूड पार्कों , फ़ूड पार्कों will get एक निश्‍चित गुणवत्ता of कच्चा माल at उचित समय . 
This will फायदा किसानों as well as फ़ूड पार्कों . 
किसानों will मिलेगा a fair amount for फसल . 
They will also get ज्यादा लाभ भी by फसलों . 
फ़ूड पार्क should होने चाहिए स्थापित away from towns and शहरों in the remote areas so that लाभ ग्रामीण जनता gets benefits from them and शहरों do not मिल सके overcrowded . 
Brokers will not play भूमिका in all these works so that किसानों मिले उचित मूल्य for उपज . 
उपज of किसानों can also be एकत्रित in खेतों भी as per the requirement . 
पार्क can be पार्क for one or दो विशिष्‍ट उत्पादों or for दो विशिष्‍ट उत्पादों . 
This is a very good move for सर्वांगीण विकास of कृषि . 
Contract farming will also develop through फ़ूड पार्कों . 
Through contract farming , किसानों will receive बीज , , खाद , तकनीक आदि , from कम्पनी . 
उत्पाद will होगी sold at पूर्व निश्‍चित मूल्य . 
कीमत भी will also होगी reasonable . 
The immediate selling of उत्पाद will eliminate संभावना of नुकसान . 
Hence , उत्पादक of अत : इस कच्चे माल will get उचित कीमत for अत : इस कच्चे माल at समय . 
Agri Export zones and food फ़ूड पार्क up फ़ूड पार्क कुछ हद can also do कार्य of पूरक भी each other . 
उत्पाद बचा from निर्यात can be उपयोग in स्थानीय फ़ूड पार्क . 
Seeing भारत आज almost every major corporate of भारत is investing in high-tech agriculture projects . 
With 2.5 % सिर्फ 2.5 % भौगोलिक विस्तार on this globe of earth our country India is more rich in medicinal -LRB- therapeutic -RRB- पौधों and holds 25 % of the world 's 25 % जैव विविधता . 
The mountains of देश are its treasure , फूल or बीज definitely has कोई औषधीय उपयोग or another . 
The main cause of इस जैव विविधता is देश diverse geographic position . 
Annual rainfall is measured between 2 इंच to 2 इंच . 
The country India which contributed an excellent discipline like आयुर्वेद to the world is now more popular for एकता in विविधता . 
The saying ' भारत महान ' सूत्र ' seems to be true when we देखते हैं महत्त्व of Yoga , प्राणायाम , , आयुर्वेद and औषधीय वनस्पतियों in पाश्‍चात्य देशों . 
But the herbal medicines वर्णन in our 3500 साल old Ayurveda science are still effective . 
There has never been फर्क in फार्मूले of रसायन चूर्ण and Rasayans . 
Their inventor saints had no desire to get पेटेंट . 
Due to the adverse impact of chemical pharmaceuticals , माँग for medicinal herbs has increased in the west as well as पाश्‍चात्य देशों . 
लोगों झुकाव towards आयुर्वेद and unconventional medicinal practices has even increased in विकसित देशों भी . 
This factor only increases the likelihood of progression of Indian medicines and पौधों . 
During ancient times , जीवन था extremely simple , regular and full of hard work . 
वह था constantly in touch with प्रकृति . 
आज स्थिति is quite opposite . 
Human is getting miles away from प्रकृति . 
Irregularity in diet has become a way of जीवन . 
Due to प्रदूषण and मानसिक तनावयुक्‍त जीवन रोगों are triggered . 
Therefore माँग for harmless drugs is बढ़ती जा रही है before the doctors . 
मनुष्य has been इस्तेमाल medicinal herbs since ancient times . 
It is very essential to save इस समृद्ध वानस्पतिक विरासत of देश , because nearly 200 करीब 200 औषधीय वनस्पतियाँ are on the verge of extinction . 
Less developed कम विकसित देश such Malaysia , Thailand , and फिलीपीन्स are engaged in निर्यात of वनों . 
भारत भी also has खोए हैं many acres of वन in this lust . 
According to राष्‍ट्रीय वन नीति there should होने चाहिए वन on one third of भूमि . 
पहल for नई कृषि क्रांति in the world is being पहल . 
रास्ता of समृद्धि in गाँव will now go from शहर to गाँव . 
If किसान want to be connected with वैश्‍विक बाजार then they तो to उत्पादन these things . 
आयुर्वेद has बाजार of Rs 300 , 000 billion in दुनिया . 
बाजार is expected to soon expand to Rs 10 million crore . 
भारत has हिस्सा -LRB- 2.5 % -RRB- in इस बाजार . 
For कृषि क्रांति after आयुर्वेद बाद , कृषि will now then with processing . 
चीन is ahead of भारत in हर्बल बाजार . 
Indian forest dwellers gather herbs and sell them in स्थानीय बाजार , and दाम depends on the local merchants . 
भारत has nearly 10,000 licensed pharmacies . 
स्थानीय वैद्य and हर्बल चिकित्सक भी also माँग for इन वनस्पतियों . 
मुख्य कारण behind negligible participation of भारत in निर्यात of medicinal plant is माँग for उत्तम गुणवत्ता by विदेशी व्यापारियों . 
किसान here are not able to fulfill this demand . 
The reason why किसान adopt परम्परागत खेती over परम्परागत खेती is a matter to be considered at राष्‍ट्रीय स्तर . 
दाम of औषधीय वनस्पति are mainly concerned with गुणवत्ता साथ . 
They keep fluctuating . 
किसानों does not want to adopt ऐसी अनजान खेती unless वह gets adequate assurance . 
दाम of पौधों and herbs collected in forests are less than पौधों grown through खेती . 
Like फल and सब्जियों herbs are not easily नहीं बिकतीं in स्थानीय बाजार . 
किसानों have to निर्भर on दया of स्थानीय हर्बल व्यापारियों . 
कई औषधीय वनस्पतियाँ are उद्योग आधारित . 
Amla , Ashok , Bilwa , Neem etc. trees take ज्यादा अवधि to पहुँचने उत्पादन स्तर . 
That is why किसान neglect them . 
पहचानना correct plant with शाब्दिक वर्णन in classical texts is कठिन कार्य , which किसान can not do . 
This is इस कारण drugs are adulterated . 
उपेक्षा of सरकारी तंत्र is an important issue . 
That is why खेती of औषधीय वनस्पति do not नहीं मिलता योग्य प्रोत्साहन . 
कई औषधीय वनस्पतियों are not properly classified . 
खेती of fragrant flowers require ज्यादा जमीन because पौधों contain 0.5 % 0.5 % तेल . 
सरकारी तंत्र has to function to प्रोत्साहन खेती of medicinal and fragrant flowers . 
For this इसके is essential to make कृषि नीति . 
It is extremely important for राष्‍ट्रीय औषधीय वनस्पति निगम to प्रोत्साहित किसानों for खेती of इन वनस्पतियों . 
It is essential to train किसानों about खेती , of herbs , संरक्षण , , बाजार व्यवस्था , , parameters of quality etc. . 
There is जरूरत to cultivate कई औषधीय पौधों which grow in forests and अनउपजाऊ जमीन . 
उनको is very easy to एकत्र them from वीरान जमीन . 
They grow in अमर्यादित मात्रा in forests . 
There is कोई संभावना of their extinction . 
It is very essential for वनवासी वन औषधीय पौधे from वन fix निम्नतर कीमत for औषधीय पौधे and उपलब्ध them . 
The agricultural University should do महत्त्वपूर्ण कार्य of correctly सही पहचान ऐसी कई वनस्पतियों that have been वर्णन in Indian classical texts . 
There is a debate among the scholars regarding सही पहचान of the significant plant Som . 
प्रतिबंध on उपयोग of chemical insecticides while cultivating medicinal and fragrant पौधों is essential so that they are निर्यात overseas and they fetch more money . 
इनकी is very essential for the various universities to organize training camps for प्रगतिशील किसानों . 
स्वप्न of our former President Shri Abdul Kalam to list India among the five super powers of the world by 2020 does not seem to be possible with इस दूसरी हरित क्रांति . 
सगन्ध तेलों can be obtained from किसी भी भाग of पौधे or from पौधे . 
Oil can be obtained from पूरे शरीर of पौधों . 
सगंध तेलों can be obtained from मूल , , stem , पत्ती , , पुष्प , , बीज , , फल or किसी भी भाग of पुष्प , . 
सगंध can be obtained from मूल or rhizome of हल्दी and पौधों . 
Efforts are being made to obtain तेल from the roots of curcuma aromatica and curcuma zedoaria . 
चूर्ण made from the roots of इन पौधों are उपयोग in medicines and cosmetics . 
कुछ तेलों are obtained from बीजों and dry flowers . 
धनिये is also तेल from the leaves of coriander . 
Oil is obtained from the leaves , flowers and फलों of वृक्षों of जाति . 
The chemical composition of सगन्ध तेलों are completely different from सगन्ध तेलों and सगन्ध तेलों but पूरी तरह of सगन्ध तेलों are obtained from तेल पौधों ही only . 
Compounds of नाइट्रोजन and सल्फर are found in सगन्ध तेलों while सगन्ध तेलों contain glycerites of high fatty acids . 
There are अनेक उपयोग of सगंध तेल some of अनेक उपयोग are : soaps , cosmetics , perfumes , medicines , बिस्कुट उद्योग , , सुगंधित तम्बाकू , , juice etc. . 
With new researches हुआ है has been found that लेमनग्रास is उपयोग in the preparation of vitamin ' A ' . 
they are also used to make perfumes , इत्र , etc. . 
कला of making इत्र or perfumes is quite ancient . 
सगन्ध तेल or इत्र सम्बन्धित विचार and तकनीक to obtain them was first विकास in सर्वप्रथम पूर्वी देशों such as फारस and भारत where they were prepared from various parts of पौधों such as पौधों and flowers . 
यात्री फाह्यान has लिखा है in his memory cards that भारत is देश of रेजिन and घासों . 
By studying कला of preserving dead bodies in Egypt one gets to थे that Egyptians knew कला of obtaining preserving and perfumed तेलों . 
सर्वप्रथम फारस were the first to obtain सुगंधित तेल from rose flowers . 
Imn Rawalin -LRB- 810-617 BC -RRB- who था , बादशाह of Faristan used to submit 30,000 बोतल of rose water प्रतिवर्ष in the treasure of गुलाब जल बगदाद in the form of tax . 
In भारत , सुगंधित पदार्थों are उपयोग during religious purposes in sutras and vedas . 
बौद्ध धर्मावलम्बी used to bathe the statue of their god with सुगंधित जल . 
During चंदन , , केसर and कस्तूरी was उपयोग . 
During Gupta period -LRB- 300-400 ) -RRB- perfumed cosmetics , सुगंधित तेल , , kajal , cream etc. were उपयोग . 
Information regarding भारतीय सुगंधित पदार्थों exists in Pali and Islamic books . 
Mughal rulers had helped in विकास of सुगंधित पदार्थों in भारत . 
Abul Fazal in अकबरी ' पुस्तक Ainey Akbari ' writes that अकबर the great was extremely fond of सुगंधियों . 
महल always रहता था महकता with perfumed flowers and incense sticks . 
In उत्तर प्रदेश सुगंधित पदार्थों were produced in जौनपुर and Gajipur . 
जिस सुगंध of which लोग knew was sandal . 
Sandalwood and sandal तेल ही were only सर्वप्रथम उपयोग in the beginning . 
लखनऊ and पुणे lead the world in उत्पादन of सुगंधित पदार्थों . 
सराहनीय प्रयास have been done by भारत सरकार and people for the development of सगंध तेलों in स्वतंत्र भारत . 
Now संगल तेल अनुसंधान समिति has been merged with केन्द्रीय भारतीय औषधीय पौध संगठन . 
these institutions are functioning under ' scientific and industrial औद्योगिक अनुसंधान परिषद , , नई दिल्ली . 
कार्य are being carried in research institutions for getting अच्छी जानकारी about मौजूद in सुगंधित तेलों . 
यह कार्य was carried first by scientific research centers of सर्वप्रथम विभिन्न राज्यों and अनेक महत्वपूर्ण पौधों were successfully cultivated . 
मैन्था and अरबेनिस are popular among them . 
Other people interested in इस क्षेत्र have also worked at personal level to विलय खेती of इन पौधों and क्रिया . 
कुछ समय पहले back केन्द्रीय भारतीय औषधि पौध संगठन have successfully सफलापूर्वक खेती cytronal grass , eucalyptus , sitiodora , geranium , pachauli lavender पचौली लवेन्डर पौधों from semi-professional perspective in लखनऊ and उटकमंड centers . 
भारतीय मानक संस्थान has occupied अच्छा स्थान in निर्यात of सुगंधित तेलों from भारत . 
Foreigners have appreciated the qualities of सुगंधित तेलों and they are totally satisfied . 
While exporting तेल to foreign countries their qualities should be properly examined , only they should be भेजते . 
यह कार्य has been handed over to प्रयोगशालाओं of ' ' विपणन and examination directorate and निरीक्षण निदेशालय एण्ड इंस्पेक्टर ' , India . 
सुगंधित तेल vaporize very quickly which can होते हैं easily अलग with the help of वाष्प . 
There are several methods of आसवन . 
इनका are उपयोग ध्यान प्रकृति of उत्पाद in ध्यान . 
Following measures should be essentially taken while doing आसवन . 
तापमान should हो kept low as far as possible . 
Lowering of तापमान is extremely important because at तापमान विविध रासायनिक घटक in सुगंधित तेलों that is at तापमान पदार्थ of सुगंधित तेलों lose their stability . 
विधि of कच्चे पदार्थ should होना चाहिए carried in favorable conditions . 
जिस कच्चे पदार्थ out of which सुगंधित तेल is to नहीं होना चाहिए सुगंधित तेल should not नहीं होना चाहिए in powder form . 
Majority of अधिकांश घटक , of सुगंधित तेलों , except few are soluble in गर्म जल . 
Hence very less अत : थोड़ी मात्रा of सुगंधित तेल is obtained when आसवन is carried by adding अधिक जल in अत : थोड़ी मात्रा of कच्चे माल . 
यह विधि of जल आसवन is extremely important . 
सुगंधित तेलों contain एक निश्‍चित मात्रा of इस्टर . 
Longer duration of आसवन and by taking अधिक मात्रा of जल while distilling , the उपस्थित इस्टर present in सुगंधित तेलों break into अम्ल and alcohol which yields very less सुगंधित तेलों . 
आसवन separates अधिक मात्रा of इस्टर over आसवन is more significant as compared to आसवन . 
जल आसवन should हो सके avoided as far as possible or they should हो सके carried for जितने कम समय . 
आसवन is not अच्छी विधि to obtain सुगंधित तेलों from flowers . 
विधि or विधि should be only उपयोग to obtain तेल from flowers . 
Both these methods are good but flower and अच्छी विधियां is the best in सबसे अच्छी because अच्छी विधियां gives अच्छी किस्म of तेल and in अधिक मात्रा . 
But विधि ही should होता है only उपयोग to obtain सुगंधित तेलों from flowers at industrial level because विधि ही yields good quality and more अधिक मात्रा of सुगंधित तेलों . 
तापक्रम भी can also be easily नियंत्रित in विधि . 
कच्चे माल should होना चाहिए in इस दशा that होना चाहिए completely gets प्रत्येक कण with कच्चे माल while वाष्प जल or आसवन and होना चाहिए should निकाल दें all the elements of कच्चे माल from उपस्थित सुगंधित तेल . 
There is आवश्यकता to कुचलने or cut कोमल भागों , of फूल , , पत्तियां , , घास and to obtain सुगंधित तेल from them . 
But कठोर भागों of पौधों such as wood , बीज , , फल , , मूल or peel should be काटना in small pieces or crushed in order to obtain सुगंधित तेल from them so that more and more walls of कोशामिनी टूट जाए and सुगंधित तेल easily comes out with वाष्प साथ . 
After properly cutting or crushing कच्चे माल they should be धो लें with साफ पानी so that perfumed oil does not evaporate by being vapor . 
Before उपयोग the roots of ओरिस , leaves of वनिला and roots of वनिला the pieces should हो जायें properly mature . 
भाग of कुछ पौधों or कुछ पौधों सुरक्षित during the time of harvesting are beneficial in the form of कच्चे माल . 
जिरेनियम and osimum filimund - फिलिमन्ड - कैरिकम पौधों are उपयोग in dry form to obtain सुगंधित तेल from them because अधिक मात्रा of सुगंधित तेल is सुगंधित तेल in dry form . 
कच्चे पदार्थ should न होने पायें , saved so that रेसीनीफिकेशन and other chemical processes do not occur because all these processes destroy मात्रा of उपस्थित सुगंधित तेल in कच्चे पदार्थ . 
Therefore यह is extremely important to save कच्चे माल प्रभाव to get अत : अच्छी किस्म and अधिक मात्रा of सुगंधित तेल . 
विधि is the most easy and less expensive विधि to obtain सुगंधित तेल and using विधि सुगंधित तेल can be सुगंधित तेल from सारे संसार . 
कच्चे माल are boiled with अधिक मात्रा of पानी साथ in इस विधि , . 
When कच्चे पदार्थ are डाल देने in पानी they float at the top or डूब जाता है but space is left for vaporization . 
इस विधि yields अच्छी किस्म and अधिक मात्रा of तेल when worked carefully but when कच्चा माल comes into संसर्ग of गर्म भाग then वास्तविक गंध of तेल gets lost with the heat of कच्चा माल . 
जल स्रोत are not made during सम्पर्क of कच्चा पदार्थ with वाष्प while extracting तेल using इस विधि . 
Another obstacle while using इस विधि is सुगंधित तेल , whose boiling point is more or which are soluble in जल can not be easily सुगंधित तेल , using इस विधि . 
विधि of distillation yields मात्रा of प्राप्‍त तेल and समय involved is less as compared to other methods and हाइड्रोलाइनिस is also more . 
Thus दर of क्रिया should be organized so that more and more युक्‍त सुगंधित तेल is obtained . 
आसवन क्रिया done at निम्न दर can होती है harmful because तेल बाहर can not होती है तेल बाहर properly from कच्चे पदार्थों and मात्रा of तेल बाहर obtained is negligible . 
क्रिया is also very less in क्रिया carried at निम्न दर . 
जल and vapor distillation method is particularly popular among the industrialists and industries उत्पादन तेल is विधि थोड़ी मात्रा . 
The distillation equipment is very small here which is directly heated using fire . 
Big distillation pots are heated through जैकेट or closed helix . 
The surface pots are रखा जाता है on तलीपात्र during क्रिया so that they remain away from जल . 
इस पात्र is dried with the help of वाष्प . 
पदार्थ to होना चाहिए उपयोग as कच्चे माल should neither होना चाहिए powdered nor cut into small pieces . 
Hence अत : कच्चे माल that is roots , stems or peels etc. should होना medium shaped . 
The distillation process of तेलों with high boiling point takes longer duration . 
वाष्प आसवन : - आसवन During इस विधि of आसवन : - आसवन वाष्प more than अति उच्च दाब of वातावरण enters into पात्र . 
During इस आसवन ताप of पात्र is much more than ताप of वाष्प . 
अति ऊष्मित वाष्प has यह क्षमता to cool that पात्र and तेल is obtained . 
विच्छेदन takes place because of वाष्प . 
In भारत वाष्प आसवन is generally उपयोग to obtain turpentine , sandalwood and vetivar तेल . 
Squeezing विधि : - : विधि : - is उपयोग to obtain सगंध from पौधों of lemon family . 
सुगंधित तेल from नींबू and वरगोवोट are obtained using इस विधि . 
तीन प्रकार of methods are उपयोग for this . 
Sponge Process : This is एक अत्यंत प्राचीन विधि . 
फलों are काट दिया जाता है into pieces using an axe in इस विधि and सार तत्व are brought out using a spoon . 
Now the peels are भिगो or डाल दिया जाता है , into पानी , तेल comes out . 
The peels are kept between स्पंज बीच to extract तेल from them . 
रस thus extracted is collected and finally filtered . 
प्राप्‍त तेल contains high value . 
Kule क्यूल विधि : - : In क्यूल विधि : - एक धातु has a hollow pipe which contains spines . 
फलों have to cross these spines only because of which टूट जाती हैं and the fluid gets collected at the surface . 
इस विधि yields even less कम मात्रा of तेल than इस विधि . 
Several machines have विकास in अमरीका and इटली on this principle . 
Extraction through विलायकों : Despite being विधि यह is not satisfying in majority of the matters but सिद्ध to होने भी harmful because of the presence of वाष्प in सुगंधित तेलों the temporary perfumed chemicals are lost . 
Sometimes मात्रा भी of तेल obtained is also very less . 
Hence in order to get away from these shortcomings विधि is उपयोग . 
इस विधि is known as विलायक निष्कर्षण which is satisfying as compared to इस विधि in majority of the cases . 
विलायक उपयोग in इस विधि are वाष्पशील or non वाष्पशील . 
Enflurez at साधारण तापक्रम : विधि is mainly उपयोग in चमेली , , ट्यूबरोज and quite often for आरेन्जानिक्यूल , , क्यूडयूट इत्यादि etc. . 
Chassis '' is set one after another above the glass plate with a wooden frame . 
फूल lie between इन दो कांच . 
सारी सुगंध of those flowers are gradually absorbed . 
After absorbing सारी सुगंध the flowers are फेंक दिया जाता है out . 
Jasmine flowers are put on कांच everyday and प्रत्येक दिन they are thrown out . 
Tuberose flowers are kept for two-three days . 
इस चेसिस is continuously moved up and down . 
The flowers are बदला जाता है till उस समय चर्बी completely absorb the oil . 
Extraction through वाष्पशील विलायकों : विधि is mainly उपयोग these days because यह is extremely useful . 
During कार्बनिक विलायकों such as पैट्रोलियम and ईथर आदि etc are उपयोग . 
Before उपयोग इन विलायकों they are treated with अम्ल and obtained in pure form . 
अनेकों कार्बनिक विलायक are उपयोग for इस विधि but ईथर and बेंजीन are mostly उपयोग . 
इस विधि is done using ( उपकरण ) which is known as extractor . 
In majority of the cases प्राप्‍त तेलों obtained using इस विधि get रंग भी of the flower from which they are प्राप्‍त तेलों . 
रंग of तेल depends on रंग of विलायक उपयोग . 
In order to remove रंग कणकों of तेलों , आसवन is carried in उपस्थिति of मोम or they are exposed to ultra violet rays . 
Although भारत produces भरपूर सुगंधित तेलों but only भरपूर सुगंधित तेलों are निर्यात abroad . 
On भारत itself imports सुगंधित तेल worth 17-20 billion प्रतिवर्ष from abroad . 
समस्त निर्माण प्रक्रिया of वर्तमान सुगंधि उद्योग is entirely different . 
सुगंध ( of किसी भी फूल is देखा जाता है by केवार ) it as to what are रासायनिक तत्व which प्रदान सुगंध ( to किसी भी फूल . 
After तैयार उन रसायनों in प्रयोगशाला , संश्‍लेषित सुगंध of उस फूल is prepared and तैयार ऐल्कोहल साइट्रोनेलोल and उन रसायनों are उपयोग . 
फिनाइल इथायल मिथाइल ईथर contains सुगंध of kewar flowers . 
According to वर्तमान आयात नीति of सरकार भारत export 4000 सुगंधियुक्‍त रसायनों from abroad . 
ये रसायन are brought through अंतर्राष्‍ट्रीय सुगंध उद्योग . 
The preparation of majority of रसायनों are आधारित on pines . 
भारतीय टरपेनचर तेल is commonly obtained from '' pinus longifolia '' . 
Opposite to अन्य देशों तारपीन found in India contains 30 प्रतिशत more pines . 
जनसंख्या of the world is continuously बढ़ती जा रही है and स्तर भी of our way of living is also rising with this . 
That is why with समय साथ -झौईण् साथ सौंदर्य of time आवश्यकतायें भी for cosmetic materials and सुगंधित तेलों are बढ़ती जा रही हैं .
