बीज are very small and बीज weigh around एक ग्राम . 
दो मीटर and one meter wide beds are made for them . 
10 kilograms of खाद is mixed in प्रत्येक क्यारी . 
किसी भी रासायनिक उर्वरक is added during इस समय . 
भूमि of प्रत्येक क्यारी leveled after मिला देने बाद खाद . 
एक ग्राम बीज is required for एक वर्गमीटर क्षेत्र . 
इन बीजों are properly mixed in soil of around 4-5 times मात्रा of इन बीजों . 
अंकुरित बीजों are mixed in सूखी बालू which helps in carrying and holding them . 
एक पतली परत of बालू is बिछा at the top when सभी बीज are sown . 
Then again it is पुन : सिंचाई जाती है . 
It starts अंकुर by अगले दिन . 
नर्सरी is irrigated प्रतिदिन with the help of फुव्वारे in the first week of बुआई . 
Within 7-10 दिन भीतर of बुआई पौधे properly उग जाते हैं in नर्सरी . 
पौधों grow well if they are supplied with 10 grams of 10 ग्राम यूरिया in the third week . 
Then after 3 मीटर and 3 मीटर wide beds are made to स्थानान्तरण दवन . 
पूर्व खेत is सिंचाई एक दिन before स्थानान्तरण . 
हल्की सिंचाई is done after plantation . 
खेत is again carefully सिंचाई after दुबारा of one week of plantation . 
दवन should not be allowed to stand in खेतों , Weed removing should be done at least 2-3 बार in खेतों . 
सिंचाई should be regularly done after every second or तीसरे दिन depending on मौसम . 
पौधे grow with बड़ी तीव्रता साथ and withing seven weeks पौधे start bearing flower buds . 
For cultivation पौधों ही with buds are चुना जाता है before they start फूल . 
After स्थानान्तरण बाद सभी फूल start सभी फूल within 10 weeks . 
The beds are again irrigated .

कलम is kept towards top to bottom .

The stems start sprouting after three weeks of plantation . 
The stems get all the roots within next four weeks .

यह स्थानान्तरण is mainly done during अंत of अगस्त or आरम्भ of सितम्बर .

फल start पकने by अंत of जुलाई and fully ripe by आरम्भ of अगस्त .

इसकी is खेती in सभी प्रदेशों in भारत and इसकी is एक महत्वपूर्ण फसल in सभी प्रदेशों , black soil in भारत and fertile loamy soil of भारत . 
इसकी is खेती in all the districts of पंजाब . 
The branches , leaves and फलों of coriander give lovely aroma . 
पौधा is used to make chutney when होता है is small and vegetable curry is garnished with their leaves . 
फलों are powdered and added as मसाले in different kinds of edible items such as अचार , , सब्जियां , , flesh etc. . 
फल , are also used to enhance the taste of some sweets , pastries , cakes and items made from तम्बाकू . 
In अमेरिका and यूरोप coriander is used to give flavor to liquor especially gin . 
धनिया contains a lot of काफी विजातीय पदार्थ such as मेथी and धान . 
The aroma and स्वाद found in फलों is because of एक प्रकार of सौरमिक तेल . 
मात्रा of तेल varies according to स्रोत of फलों . 
The lack of oil content in भारतीय धनिया is because of हानि of vaporizing तेल while फलों but this statement has not been सिद्ध through प्रयोगों . 
Still यूरोपीय तेलों have अच्छी किस्म of गंध compared to यूरोपीय तेलों and एस्टर of प्रतिशतता भी is also more . 
तेल is a colorless , light yellow liquid which has विशिष्‍ट गंध and स्वाद similar to धनिया . 
कच्चे फल and अन्य भागों of पौधे give little inferior quality of तेल . 
यह तेल is mainly इस्तेमाल in the form of fragrant in सुगंधकारक and in एवं कोको and चाकलेट उद्योगों . 
यह जी is used in removing दुष्प्रभाव of drugs causing fatigue and ऐंठन and in improving स्वाद of bitter medicines . 
Apart from अतिरिक्‍त धनिया also contains 19-21 प्रतिशत सौरभिक तेल which is black , brown , in रंग and smells like अतिरिक्‍त धनिया . 
सोडियम साबुन तैयार from them are perfumed and produces good lather . 
It is soft and green in हरे रंग . 
Coriander is धनिया महत्वपूर्ण मसाला which is प्रयोग in बहुतायत in भारत . 
विवरण of their production and internal trade are not available . 
Majority of उत्पादन is खपत within अधिकतर भारत अंदर ही because of which हो जाती है is निर्यात in अल्प मात्रा ही only . 
Although फसलें grown in विभिन्न क्षेत्रों are of एक ही जाति but there is बहुत अंतर between रूप and quality of फलों . 
The commercial qualities are mainly नाम ही on the basis of बहुधा स्थानों . 
मोरक्को and जातियां compete with भारतीय धनिया in निर्यात -झौईण् बाजारों which are quite valuable . 
ऐसा is समझा जाता है that Indian samples are mostly अधिकांशत : with डंठल , , बाह्य बीज , , कण and धूल therefore कीमत is less though in quality they are no less than Morocco samples . 
फसल are sown in mixed which is commonly dependent only on केवल वर्षा . 
It is grown as यह सिंचित फसल in कुछ क्षेत्रों . 
फलों are मसला before sowing so that fruit seeds अलग -झौईण् अलग . 
फसल matures after three or 3.5 months of फसल . 
Then पौधों are plucked along with their roots and फलों are shed after सुखाने बाद . 
Then they are सुखाकर , in धूप , cleaned and then packed in sacks . 
In भारत very less बहुत कम ध्यान is paid at putting खाद while cultivating धनिया . 
From अनुभवों of यूरोपीय देशों one gets to मालूम that there is अत्यधिक वृद्धि in मात्रा of फलों due to खाद . 
By प्रयोगों done in रूस it has been found that मात्रा of तेल in फलों have increased with प्रयोगों of उर्वरकों . 
धनिया catches fungal and rotting diseases , fungus attacks when फूलते begins especially when the climate is warm and moist , इसका can हो , effectively प्रभावशाली उपचार गंधक 0.6 प्रति . by spraying 0.6 sulfur or मिश्रण . 
विधि has been found so far to prevent them from rotting . 
No dangerous organism attacks इस फसल . 
महत्वपूर्ण सुगंधित तेलों is one of महत्वपूर्ण सुगंधित तेलों grown in the world . 
मुख्य कारण for उत्पादन इस तेल is citril concentration . 
भारत has एकाधिकार as निर्यातक and developer of उच्च कोटि of लेमनग्रास in बाजारों at some point of किसी समय . 
Because of प्रतिस्पर्धा with मध्य and देशों निर्यात of लेमनग्रास from भारत has काफी कम in कुछ वर्षों . 
Although मांग for विटामिन A ' was बढ़ रही है , for स्वदेशी उपयोग , which is समझा जाता है to be एक अच्छा अवसर for the propagation of लेमनग्रास cultivation in देश . 
फलेक्सुओसस is one of जिन जातियों of लेमनग्रास that are खेती in भारत . 
इसे is also known as Malabar or Cochin Vas . 
There are दो जातियां of पूर्वी भारतीय लेमनग्रास . 
Cimbopogon flexuosus is one of those species , Its local name is '' Cumanna Pulu '' , उनमें is also known as लाल घास भी . 
Their stems are red in रंग , the leaves from which जिस तेल is उत्पादन contain 75 % or more कुछ अधिक एल्डीहाइड्स . 
The aldehydes obtained from इस तेल are mainly citril . 
यह तेल is a good solvent . 
Majority of अधिकांश भाग of भारतीय लेमनग्रास is obtained from इसी लाल घास . 
दूसरी जाति of पूर्वी भारतीय लेमनग्रास is known as cimbropogon flexuosus variety alvicense . 
Its local name is '' Gella Pulu '' . 
खेती of लेमनग्रास requires warm and धूप and 300 सेंमी . वर्षा for पूरे वर्ष . 
मात्रा of तेल in पौधे increases due to उपस्थिति of उच्च ताप and धूप . 
Lemongrass grows in लेमनग्रास बहुतायत at पहाड़ी स्थानों in केरल where there is भारी वर्षा and they are कटाई quite early , But the amount of तेल and citril content in पौधों growing in क्षेत्रों are quite less as compared to क्षेत्रों with भारी वर्षा . 
भूमि with बालू which has उत्तम व्यवस्था is best for उत्तम वृद्धि of इस घास -झौईण् . 
इसकी grow well in बलुई भूमि , with good manure facility . 
मौसम in उत्तरी भारत is of longer duration than उत्तरी भारत because of which उपज of लेमनग्रास in उत्तरी भारत is quite less . 
तैयार पौद prepared from दो किलो of बीज are enough to grow फसल in खेत . 
Sowing the pieces in अधिक गहराई is dangerous because '' root rot '' रोग might फैल सकता है during ऋतु . 
यह कार्य is done during प्रारम्भ of ऋतु . 
In उत्तर भारत भी also पौधे are planted through root pieces during फरवरी but proper irrigation facility is आवश्यक for them because सिंचाई after plantation is very essential in these situations . 
Planting in small pieces in इस प्रकार by छोड़कर spaces depends on the fertility of भूमि and the climatic condition of स्थान . 
इसका is very essential to निकालकर व्यर्थ घासों इत्यादि of खेत with सहायता of axe because इसका affects प्रकृति of तेल and उत्पादन . 
घास is burnt during winters to increase the fertility of भूमि and to strengthen पौधों . 
फसल turns the soil and brings out वायु from फसल . 
अधिक मात्रा of पानी is required for लेमनग्रास . 
सिंचाई is required to get अच्छी उपज in निर्भर क्षेत्रों dependent on मानसून . 
उत्पादन , and प्रकृति of तेल is also affected by समय भी . 
If घास is काट लिया जाता है early then the amount of एल्डीहाइड in उत्पादित तेल is very less -LRB- up to प्रतिशत -RRB- and होता है is less soluble . 
But later the amount of aldehyde in oil increases to प्रतिशत 75 and उत्पादन भी of तेल also increases . 
Commonly उत्पादन in high rainfall months -LRB- ( जून -RRB- is very low as compared to low rainfall areas . 
फसल is काटी जाती है तीन -झौईण् चार बार वर्ष . 
फसल is काटी जाती है using हंसिया . 
आयु of पौधे निर्भर on आयु of भूमि and जलवायु . 
आयु of पौधे is 6 वर्ष . 
During इन 6 वर्षों , उत्पादन in इन 6 वर्षों is low , उत्पादन increases in इन 6 वर्षों , होता है , increases the most during third and इन 6 वर्षों but gradually later उत्पादन starts कम . 
बीजों are collected during January-February . 
फसल is छोड़ दिया जाता है , without cutting for collecting बीजों because फसल that are काटे बिना ही smoothly give relatively less बीजों . 
पुष्पक्रम is first काट लिया जाता है for बीजों and then they are allowed to dry in धूप for 2-3 दिनों . 
Later पुष्पक्रम is beaten to बीजों . 
इन बीजों are again सुखाया जाता है in धूप . 
The method उपयोग for आसवन in केरल is old विधि पुराने ढंग and not popular . 
प्राप्‍त तेल भी obtained through इस विधि is also of घटिया किस्म because जल -झौईण् आसवन is done directly or through chimney . 
Hence '' विधि should be प्रयोग to produce high quality oil . 
घास is काट लिया जाता है into small pieces to get अधिकतम उत्पादन of तेल easily . 
उत्पादन of फसल and मात्रा of तेल in it depends on उर्वरता , of भूमि , आयु , of cutting घास , दशा of घास -LRB- dry or fresh -RRB- and विधि . 
एक जाति of chilotria infects lemongrass . 
कैटरपिलर is white in सफेद रंग . 
सिर of कैटरपिलर is black in color and there are black patches on शरीर . 
यह makes छेद in the upper half of the plant and eats यह while प्ररोह there . 
It is generally found in the base of the stem . 
Drying of पत्तियां between तने बीच is its first symptom . 
Later gradually पूरा पौधा dries and gets destroyed , Consequently उपज faces भारी हानि . 
The dry stems are burnt during अंतिम दिनों of summer , It kills the caterpillar present in the stem holes . 
प्राप्‍त तेल obtained from वास्तविक लेमनग्रास contains 75 % or more अधिक एल्डीहाइड भाग of aldehyde . 
In भारत लेमनग्रास is mainly used to अलग उपयोग ' ' ' ' साइट्रल '' and producing '' vitamin A '' . 
In निर्माण इसका is उपयोग as प्रारम्भिक पदार्थ . 
तेल is उपयोग to develop स्वाद in goods and preparing cosmetics and perfumed goods . 
In कुछ देशों लेमनग्रास is उपयोग to enhance the taste of भोजन . 
At some places इसे is used in चाय and also डालते हैं in पानी भी . 
The lemongrass left after उपयोग बाद -LRB- जो पदार्थ left after extracting लेमनग्रास ( तेल आदि -RRB- is उपयोग बाद to make कागज . 
यह is प्रयोग as ईंधन for आसवन . 
यह is also एक अच्छा स्रोत of उर्वरकों भी . 
इसकी is either composted to be प्रयोग as उर्वरक or इसकी is burnt and राख are प्रयोग as उर्वरक . 
फसल has सिद्ध to हुई है helpful in stopping the flow of soil erosion . 
सिंवोपोगान विंटरिएनस and तेल are popular as तेल and commercially available as नाम . 
Java '' variety of तेल is obtained by distilling the leaves of sivopogon vinteranius jevit and '' silon '' variety is obtained by distilling the leaves of simvopogon nords randal . 
इस तेल was आयात प्रति वर्ष from भारत . 
During पिछले वर्षों there has been कमी in export and now इसका is being उत्पादन in पर्याप्‍त मात्रा in देश . 
जलवायु , , तेज धूप and वार्षिक वर्षा and उन क्षेत्रों which get shower round the year is good for पैदावार . 
अधिक वर्षा and तेज सूखा भी is also harmful for इसके . 
वृद्धि is less in shady places . 
पत्ती हो जाती है tough which reduces तेल and jeranial content . 
Extreme chilly weather and हिमपात adversely affects इस . 
कार्य of providing ऋण is done round पूरा वर्ष , not only during केवल फसल and harvesting . 
तैयारी of वार्षिक साख सीमा वितरण gets wasted where there is अभाव of कृषि साधनों . 
The main job of भूमि विकास बैंकों is to प्रदान ऋण to सदस्यों on land mortgage . 
They प्रदान साख सुविधा under following processes by keeping भवन or उपकरणों in गिरवी from सदस्यों . 
किसनों ऋण to the farmers at cheap interest rates so that do not get exploited by the owners . 
In the ancient times in spite of खेती , मछली खेती , शिकार of wild animals and वन खाद्य सम्पदाओं food resources था प्रमुख व्यवसाय of पालन . 
Wet - आर्द्र -झौईण् ऊष्ण कटिबन्धीय लोग are by nature conservative . 
Hence they are not willing to relinquish परम्परागत कृषि and the agricultural practice has been going on for centuries . 
Under animal husbandry different विभिन्न प्रकार of व्यवसाय or पशुपालन कृषि is done , such as व्यवसाय , भेड़ and मधुमक्खी पालन , , piggery etc. , Along with पशुपालन कृषि the above forms of मधुमक्खी पालन , are also reflected . 
पशुपालन husbandry play प्रमुख भूमिका in आर्थिक विकास of देश . 
Because of this lakhs of लाखों लोगों of देश receive cheap and nutritious भोजन . 
भारत पास has enormous potential to meet the growing needs of पशुओं . 
20 % of समस्त संख्या of buffaloes in दुनिया , 20 % of समस्त संख्या of बकरियों and 20 % of समस्त संख्या of समस्त संख्या is present in 16 % भारत . 
Sharp increase in क्षेत्र of animal husbandry प्रारम्भ from प्रारंभिक वर्षों of दशक of 1970 . 
उत्पादन करीब -झौईण् करीब of दूध in the time from 1947 to 1970 stayed almost stable . 
Under the Seventh Plan there has been वृद्धि in उत्पादन of दूध at दर of 4.5 % . 
Per capita उपलब्धता of दूध in 1950-51 थी 124 ग्राम per day which increased to 124 ग्राम in 1997-98 . 
यह उन्नति in उत्पादन of दूध has been due to विभिन्न मवेशी विकास कार्यक्रमों लागू by the Centre and राज्यों . 
श्रेय of वृद्धि in दुग्ध उत्पादन goes primarily to फ्लड कार्यक्रमों . 
There has been महत्त्वपूर्ण उन्नति in क्षेत्र भी of मुर्गीपालन also during पिछले वर्षों दौरान due to the research and शोध एवं विकास done by the government and private क्षेत्र भी . 
There is भूमिका of sheep - भेड़ -झौईण् बकरियों in भारतीय ग्रामीण अर्थव्यवस्था . 
प्रमुख योगदान of both these is central in ग्रामीण अर्थव्यवस्था . 
The earnings from निर्यात of पशुपालन क्षेत्र and सम्बन्धित उत्पादों in 1996-97 was Rs 1925 crores . 
Among this the export earnings of leather and चर्म उत्पाद were Rs 1063 crores . 
Looking at घोषणा of the prime minister to make भारत स्वतंत्र देश free of भुखमरी in दस वर्षों पशुपालन and डेयरी विभाग have लागू एक अतिरिक्‍त कार्य योजना of rupees 203 crores . 
From very early times man has been dependent on कृषि for livelihood . 
In most developed and विकसित देशों कृषि ही is the main enterprise . 
कच्चा माल is received for उद्योगों from कृषि . 
Also from निर्यात of the substances produced in इसमें विदेशी मुद्रा is derived as well . 
In कृषि , , natural , cultural - social , political , economic and technical etc. there is योग of all the factors . 
कृषि ही presents संयुक्त चित्रण of all these factors . 
Agriculture has come from शब्द of Latin Language . 
The word Ager means land -LRB- ( खेत ) -RRB- while the word Cultura denotes खेती क्रिया or संस्कृति . 
Like this , in a brief manner शाब्दिक अर्थ of खेती is from खेती संस्कृति or कला . 
Hence the literal meaning of एग्रीकल्चर टाइपोलोजी in हिन्दी is '' Agriculture typological analysis '' . 
Generally साधारणतया कृषि प्रकार refers to the typological model developed in किसी विशिष्‍ट क्षेत्र or व्याख्या or analysis which are naturally hierarchical . 
Prof. Kosowski sir says that ' ' कृषि प्रकारिकी ' ' is समरूपता of the agriculture related properties developed in अनेक क्षेत्रों and specific pattern of agriculture related features are observed in अनेक क्षेत्रों at एक ही समय . 
अनेक क्षेत्र can be found on the ground under एक कृषि प्रकारिकी . 
Hence in संकल्पना of कृषि प्रकारिकी under कृषि भूमि उपयोग विषयक अध्ययन social , organizational , technical and production related factors are given विशेष महत्त्व . 
There is मूलभूत अन्तर in the conception of प्रदेश and प्रकारिकी . 
प्रदेश is एक क्षेत्रीय संकल्पना which has definite boundaries . 
The spatial variations in प्रदेश are नियन्त्रित by the various factors of वातावरण whereas स्थानिक विविधताएँ is प्रकारिकी एक पदानुक्रमिक संकल्पना whose expanse is perpendicular from low till high order . 
In वर्तमान the unavailability of statistics at समस्त स्तरों is सबसे बड़ी समस्या and अवरोध in अध्ययनों the studies संबंधित to कृषि . 
To fix this problem conclusions are drawn based on the data collected by the sample studies and आधार on these findings itself नियमों and principles are enunciated . 
वर्गीकरण of कृषि प्रकारिकी is आधार on the internal and inherent characteristics . 
The intensification of कृषि is नियन्त्रित by Geo - competence , Geo - भू -झौईण् उत्पादकता , , कार्यरत श्रम , employed in उर्वरकों and pesticides , बीजों आदि etc. . 
Like this ज्ञान of all the above factors for निर्धारण of कृषि प्रकारिकी is important and necessary . 
विशद कृषि -झौईण् इस कृषि - under विशद कृषि -झौईण् इस कृषि विशद कृषि -झौईण् इस कृषि is done in वृहद क्षेत्रों for livelihood on आधार of specialties आ रही from the ancient times . 
कृषि क्षेत्र is done in काश्तकारी रूप of tenancy . 
In this उपयोग , of भूमि on large scale , कोई उपज per worker , lower commercialization and विशेषताएं , कोई उपज besides food grains etc. attributes are found . 
कृषि - in this the nature of कृषि with being of कृषि is also done with गहना तरीके भी . 
इस तरह of कृषि is done at कम लागत mostly in North , South - पूर्वी and एशिया . 
Self land - भू -झौईण् स्वामित्व is found in इस कृषि on आधार of मानवीय श्रम . 
न्यून मशीनीकरण and कम रासायनिक उर्वरकों are being प्रयोग on small to micro-level terrain . 
In इस कृषि there is a description of low-cost and relatively low कम सिंचाई . 
There is प्रचलन of मिश्रित व्यवस्था of उच्च भूमि उत्पादकता साथ ही as well as खाद्यान्‍न फसलों and some livestock in this . 
कृषि - इस कृषि - प्रमुख विशेषता of कृषि - इस कृषि is that under this more manufacturing is done with less human कम मानवीय श्रम साथ and high capital costs -LRB- irrigation , लागत ( सिंचाई , उर्वरक , प्रयोग ) of machines etc. -RRB- . 
विशेषता is commercialization . 
Highly specialized animal कृषि - under विशेषीकृत पशुपालन कृषि - इस प्रकार of प्राथमिकता is दी जाती है to substances especially meat , bone , milk , wool , leather etc. . 
This agricultural diversity has हो गयी है important to meet नगरीय आवश्यकताओं in the outskirts of big cities . 
The specialization in this enterprise is being done totally with मदद of new tools ध्यान in ध्यान व्यापारिक महत्त्व of the business . 
Fish कृषि , कृषि is also विकसित in इस तरह of कृषि . 
In the world इस तरह of कृषि is found in देशों Denmark , Holland , New Zealand etc. . 
According to Prof. Koharski sir संकल्पना of कृषि प्रकारिकी is progressing . 
There are परिवर्तन also in कृषि प्रकारिकी भी due to परिवर्तन in the environmental conditions . 
अध्ययन of डॉ . बी . एल शर्मा from राजस्थान प्रदेश of Rajasthan in अवधारणा of कृषि इतिहास in भारत is worth mentioning . 
The map of कृषि प्रकारिकी displayed by them also features परिजन of परिजन . 
In comparison of खेती of सम्पूर्ण प्रदेश खेती of श्रीगंगानगर from the perspective of कृषि प्रकारिकी has विकसित and commercially progressed . 
राजस्थान is प्रदेश . 
This animal husbandry is प्रमुख उद्यम and खाद्यान्‍न उत्पादन is subsidiary . 
Social change happens quite slowly and कृषि भी is also gets प्रभावित by सामाजिक बदलाव . 
So यह can होती हैं , कहा जा सकता है that the prevailing agricultural traditions , conditions and practices are sustainable enough , similarly किसान भी also does not take साहसिक कदम to परिवर्तन यह soon . 
Agricultural diversity is एक प्रमुख तथ्य in कृषि प्रकारिकी कृषि नियोजन . 
अध्ययन of कृषि -झौईण् प्रकारिकी is necessary for सफलता of कृषि नियोजन . 
बिना इसके is well known how practical will होगी , कृषि आयोजना without समग्र अध्ययन , . 
कृषि आयोजना done without अध्ययन बगैर is totally impractical and misguided and पूरी तरह of takes समाज towards economic problems . 
Hence agricultural diversity is not associated with समाधान to agricultural problems but is an important and indispensable अपरिहार्य कदम towards making देश economically prosperous .

Economies and agricultural practices are नियन्त्रित by जलवायु , , भू स्वामित्व , , relief , मृदा , , आकार of जोत and other factors . 
It is quite काफी ही मुश्किल कार्य to अध्ययन शामिल पद्धति or अर्थव्यवस्था developed by शामिल पद्धति including all the factors . 
इन्हीं फसलों and crop enterprises based on कृषि in फसल क्षेत्र are included in कृषि अर्थव्यवस्था सम्बन्धित to direct and कृषि . 
इस प्रणाली is जन्म due to विस्तार of कृषि प्रकारों over बड़े क्षेत्र . 
Hence these agricultural systems are विकसित because of various agricultural practices or प्रकारों . 
Like this many agriculture अनेक कृषि प्रकार can हो सकते हैं under एक ही प्रणाली and many systems can meet under अनेक कृषि प्रकार . 
Nomadic pastoral - पशुचारण - यह अर्थव्यवस्था is found in उन क्षेत्रों where geographical conditions are not right for फसलों . 
There is प्राकृतिक घास available for cattle fodder . 
Mainly क्षेत्र are found in arid States . 
Such economies are found from the arid region of Sahara to the Arab , Tibet , Central - मध्य -झौईण् एशियाई देश , , मंगोलिया and Tundra . 
They are साधन of animal survival . 
प्रमुख व्यवसाय is to graze पशुओं from one location to another location . 
भेड़ is quite useful for the geographical conditions here . 
With which everything दूध and leather can हो जाता है acquired . 
Hence पशु ही in इस क्षेत्र are the center of the economic system . 
अवधि of stay on one site is निर्धारित by the natural forage and पानी . 
खैप and मंगोल आदि etc nomadic tribes etc are found in इस अर्थव्यवस्था . 
Their home is गुफा or snow-cottage which can easily होती है moved from एक स्थान to एक स्थान or can होती है removed . 
In the present world there has been क्रमशः of आर्थिक व्यवस्था . 
पशुपालन husbandry has been commercially launched there . 
श्रेय of commercial animal husbandry goes to the immigrants . 
The permanently बस गये after getting भू -झौईण् स्वामित्व in the New World of the natural grass territories . 
निजी चरागाह surrounded from all four sides are called रेंच . 
इस तरह of व्यापारिक पशुपालन not only विकसित in United States of संयुक्‍त राज्य अमेरिका , but is also is central to कृषि also in न्यूजीलैण्ड and दक्षिणी अफ्रीका भी . 
व्यवसाय is particularly significant in संयुक्‍त राज्य अमेरिका due to भौगोलिक वातावरण for अनुकूलता , , तकनीकी विकास and स्थानीय बड़े बाजार . 
Wild boars used to roam around freely in this region of the European immigrants , these were the main source of sustaining life for the original inhabitants -LRB- Red Indians -RRB- . 
At first , in सर्वप्रथम 16वीं सदी , स्पेनिश लोगों विकसित पशुपालन कार्य of animal husbandry with गाय and horses in टेक्सास and कैलीफोर्निया , because there थी घास that grows throughout वर्ष . 
In the present times ranch exists in ग्रेट प्लेन्स , of रेंच संयुक्‍त राज्य , the valleys of the Rockies and the irrigated valleys of the western arid regions . 
Sheep breeding is उद्योग for उपलब्धता of ऊन . 
In addition to beef cattle and sheep , अंगोरा बकरियों भी are also reared . 
Cows are bred in irrigated valleys for दूध . 
Argentina - the fertile मैदान of पंपास is famous for अर्जेन्टाइना - अच्छे प्राकृतिक चरागाह , where देश most famous beef , cattle and a third of एक तिहाई भेड़ें is bred . 
It is प्रमुख देश in terms of sheep and lambs . 
In अर्जेन्टाइना भी also , as a result of the availability of विस्तृत बाजार , ज्यादा मांस -LRB- 85 % -RRB- is खपत . 
आस्ट्रेलिया and New Zealand - when the immigrant Europeans arrived in आस्ट्रेलिया they brought their animals with them and संख्या of sheep आज is several times larger than जनसंख्या of यहाँ . 
Therefore , it is यह आस्ट्रेलिया आर्थिक साधन . 
Here about करीब 16 भेड़ें , and 2 पशु are found per person . 
60 % of सभी निर्यात is achieved from इस व्यवस्था . 
आस्ट्रेलिया has श्रेय of निर्यात almost 46 % करीब 46 % ऊन and 29 % 29 % मांस of संसार . 
Here रेंच are of बड़े आकार . 
पशुपालन व्यवस्थित husbandry here is of systematic and scientific तरह . 
विकास of इस उद्योग is in दक्षिणी वेल्स , , दक्षिणी विक्टोरिया and Queensland . 
प्रादेशिक वितरण of sheep is निर्धारित by वर्षा and तापमान . 
क्षेत्र with 50 to 75 वर्षा are particularly appropriate for क्षेत्र . 
तापमान is favorable for the sheep . 
कृषि - स्थानान्तरणशील कृषि - इस प्रकार of कृषि is प्राचीनतम कार्य done on less fertile agricultural soils . 
यह कृषि व्यवस्था is in hot and wet क्षेत्र where there is high temperatures throughout वर्ष भर , क्षेत्र are तैयार by first of all selecting क्षेत्र on the borders of वन and then burning by आग . 
क्षेत्रफल of खेत used to होता है upto 2 2 हेक्टेयर . 
श्रम is उपयोग in खेती . 
खेत are not private but सार्वजनिक . 
कृषि is done for दो वर्ष , after that होता है is छोड़कर out and दूसरा खेत is selected because due to दो वर्ष there is अपरदन of उर्वरता because of which उर्वरता is lost sooner . 
उत्पादन उपयोग to होता है , low , more hard work was required and उत्पादित फसलों उपयोग more locally . 
केवल खाद्यान्‍न फसलों ही are उत्पादन - ज्वार -झौईण् बाजरा , , maize , धान are main in these . 
केला गौण फसलें are beans , टमाटर , , मौनियाख , , sugar cane , peanuts and banana . 
मुर्गी is main in पशुओं . 
Besides कृषि , fishing , surviving by collecting वन खाद्य , शिकार are a major enterprise . 
The initial steady Agriculture - this agriculture is of शुरुआती स्थिर कृषि -झौईण् कृषि आदिम प्रकार . 
Due to कमी of उर्वरकों भूमि has to be छोड़ना पड़ता है fallow . 
Hot and wet ऊष्ण कटिबन्धीय ऊँचे पठार , , hot and wet पहाड़ी भागों , , मैदानों with hot and wet जलवायु , where घनत्व is relatively high , there यह कृषि व्यवस्था it is more prevalent . 
प्रारम्भिक स्थायी कृषि takes place in areas where वर्षा is low and शुष्कता is more . 
In these hot and wet tropical plateaus , खेती -LRB- कृषि ( रबर , , कोका आदि ) -RRB- has विकास due to which there has also been विकास in पद्धति भी of स्थानीय किसानों . 
यह व्यवस्था is more intensive than shifting स्थानान्तरीय कृषि . 
इस प्रकार of agriculture has विकसित in the plantation sectors , and कृषि क्षेत्रों , close to mines . 
कृषि - मिलती है is found in parts of कृषि , particularly where geographical conditions are particularly suitable for कृषि . 
निमित्त खाद्यान्‍न फसलों are उत्पादन intended for स्थानीय उपयोग . 
In इस कृषि उपयोग of आधुनिक कृषि उपकरणों is less . 
Also उपयोग of chemical pharmaceuticals , fertilizers etc. is less . 
Due to अधिकता of जनसंख्या , उत्पादन is खपत locally . 
अतिरिक्‍त उत्पादन for बाजार can not नहीं हो पाता done . 
A shortage of bazaar or बाजार is also found . 
Due to a very low per capita प्रति व्यक्‍ति उत्पादन in इस कृषि व्यवस्था , आर्थिक स्थिति of किसानों is very weak . 
The rice सघन निर्वाही intensive livelihood farming - कृषि - इस प्रकार of farming systems are found in क्षेत्रों with ज्यादा वर्षा of 200 cm . 
इस प्रकार of कृषि is done more in देशों which come under मानसूनी जलवायु . 
ऐसी कृषि पद्धति is कहा जाता है Sagah . 
With the perspective of agricultural land कृषि भूमि उपयोग also ज्यादा क्षेत्र is found more in South East Asian पूर्वी एशियाई देशों in which लाओस -LRB- 95 % -RRB- , Thailand -LRB- 65 % -RRB- , म्यांमार -LRB- 60 % -RRB- , जापान -LRB- 42 % -RRB- , भारत and चीन -LRB- 25 % -RRB- etc. are important . 
Nirwahi less खेती - in कृषि -झौईण् जिन क्षेत्रों where rainfall is scant cm there are धान than अन्य फसलों . 
In the monsoon season , except मानसून क्षेत्रों where the environmental conditions are फसलें like बाजरा , , pigeon pea , ज्वार , , ज्वार , etc. are cultivated . 
There is उत्पादन of कपास and गेहूँ भी where सुविधा are available . 
Hence according to तापमान and मात्रा , of वर्षा there is प्रमुखता of फसलों among ज्वार आदि . 
Farmers produce two or three तीन फसलें in किसान वर्ष . 
In इस व्यवस्था , the production of dairy , cattle , beef etc is less . 
क्षेत्रफल under pasture region is negligible . 
लोग of इस भाग are vegetarian . 
विशेष प्रोत्साहन has been दिया जा रहा है by भारत सरकार in वर्षों towards dairy , दुग्ध पशुपालन , rearing , sheep , piggery , poultry , fish , rearing silkworms etc. . 
The commercial plantation business - this is पद्धति whose history is nearly a hundred लगभग सौ वर्ष old , पद्धति विकास with the British race of अमेरिका . 
यूरोप and the U. S. have invested capital in विकास of इस कृषि पद्धति , विभिन्‍न प्रकार of products are created in इस कृषि पद्धति with commercial approach which includes sugercane , spices , banana , tea , coconut , kehwa , cocoa , rubber etc. . 
These are produced in बागानों with commercial purpose . 
मुख्य तीन क्षेत्र of बागानी कृषि in the world are लैटिन अमेरिका and South - East Asia . 
Plantation happens in agriculture farms , that is why क्षेत्र is larger as compared to सामान्य जोत . 
भारत फसल is चाय , due to which क्षेत्रफल of बागानों are found with 120 to 240 240 हेक्टेयर . 
क्षेत्र in देशों of the world आज , there नहीं थी कोई समस्या of कृषि भूमि there . 
प्रमुख अवरोध था of the workers . 
Hence agricultural workers had to be आयात in क्षेत्रों of रोपण in the relatively densely populated आबाद देशों of the world . 
The major exporters of labor have been अफ्रीका , , भारत and currently are as well . 
A dominance of the Chinese workers is found in Hindeshia -LRB- हिन्देशिया ( सुमात्रा and बोर्नियो ) -RRB- and जापान in the Hawaiian Islands . 
आवश्यकता of workers is more in बागानी कृषि . 
There is अत्यंत आवश्यकता of labors here for तैयार खेतों , रोपण , , निरीक्षण , , उर्वरकों , चुनाई and चुनाई of manufactured goods . 
Also , such machines have not yet been आविष्कार with which काम like using पौधों , collecting कपास and tea picking , cutting , loading , sugar peeling and extracting दूध from वृक्षों etc. can नहीं हुआ है , done . 
Hence महत्त्व of plantation workers in बागानी खेती still remains just the same . 
As विदेशी बाजार विस्तार , बागानी कृषि मिला प्रोत्साहन and होता गया विस्तार . 
In the present circumstances , सभी देश became free from where कृषि उत्पादन was निर्यात to सभी देश . 
Despite स्वतन्त्रता भी of इन देशों , निर्यात of बागानी कृषि उत्पादन is प्रमुख for अन्तर्राष्‍ट्रीय व्यापार , because आर्थिक मजबूती comes from विदेशी आमदनी . 
इस बात has to be taken ध्यान of while deciding the status of बागानों that यातायात to विभिन्‍न भागों of संसार from here is convenient and cheap . 
साधन of यातायात are also needed within बागानों भीतर भी because फैलाव spread in बागानी कृषि is in thousands of hectares and there is a difficulty in एकत्रित उत्पादन in हजारों हेक्टेयर क्षेत्र . 
Mostly there are roads in between अधिकतर बड़े -झौईण् बड़े बागानों with which produced material is एकत्रित in एक स्थान . 
सड़क and rail lines are आवश्यक to भेजने उत्पादन from इन बागानों to बाजार and the port . 
Keeping this in ध्यान , सभी बागानी क्षेत्र are located close to सभी बागानी क्षेत्र and islands which can make traffic convenient and inexpensive . 
कृषि व्यवस्था and प्रबन्ध of the foreigners था far more efficient than स्थानीय किसानों . 
The scientists also उपयोग भी कृषि सम्बन्धी वौज्ञानिक ज्ञान for बहुलता of उत्पादन . 
सभी प्रकार of फसलें in बागानी कृषि are such whose modification is necessary because जिस रूप in which these outputs are received from बागानों , these can not be नहीं भेजे जा सकते हैं to बाजारों सभी प्रकार . 
Thus , in view of आर्थिक लाभ , it is useful to install adjacent industrially modified machines . 
Currently , there has been विशेष झुकाव towards बागानी कृषि in प्रत्येक देश of the world because due to उपयोग of machines in बागानी कृषि this is getting started in the tropical and subtropical as well as high उच्‍च स्थानों भी . 
The cultivation time is considerably saved by using machines during तैयार खेतों , रोपण and harvesting . 
In cold regions where the growing season is quite short , विस्तार of बागानी कृषि has not been possible . 
Mediterranean Agricultural System - पद्धति is found in all the continents in क्षेत्रों with भूमध्य -झौईण् सागरीय जलवायु , this place has not been named depending on the particular crop but has been done based on भूमध्य -झौईण् सागरीय जलवायु . 
Sustenance , व्यापारिक , , पशुपालन , आधारित on फसलों सिंचाई in गर्मी , winter time rainfed उत्पादन , , उत्पादन , of सब्जी , , फल , , फसलों ; कई पद्धतियाँ are adopted under इस कृषि -झौईण् व्यवस्था . 
This is पर्वतीय भू -झौईण् भाग , of the world where मैदान , , high mountain terrain , narrow valleys and मैदान , are found together . 
Because of regional variation various agricultural enterprises like food production , fruit production and sheep - goat rearing etc. are adopted in भेड़ -झौईण् बकरी पालन आदि -झौईण् इन क्षेत्रों . 
It rains during मौसम and मौसम stays dry in this agricultural land . 
Due to वर्षा and regional differences in मात्रा and समय In इस भाग because of of precipitation and environment . 
Generally in खेती of दोनों प्रकार , commercial and sustainable खेती is carried . 
Both these systems of mutual and महत्त्व are निर्धारित and regulated by मात्रा , of वर्षा , proximity to बाजारों , कृषि कुशलता and with सरकारी मदद of government . 
ग्रीक and शराब , in Greece , सन्तरे , olives and शराब , in स्पेन , सन्तरे in दक्षिणी कैलीफोर्निया and सब्जियों during winters are found in बहुलता . 
Further , सूखी ग्रीष्मकाल are quite appropriate for उत्पादन of फल and सब्जियों . 
Here सब्जियाँ of कटिबन्धीय जलवायु are grown . 
Along with फलों and सब्जियों साथ -झौईण् साथ , चारा फसलों , alfalfa , werch , clover , kupine etc are also cultivated . 
Fodder cultivation is totally dependent on जलवायु . 
Here चरागाह are used for कुछ ही समय . 
since there is तीव्र गर्मी in the lower regions and शीतकालीन वर्षा in hilly regions इसके gets समय ही . 
In प्रतिशत of बकरी , , भेड़ , , सूअर and अन्य छोटे पशुओं are found in निकटवर्ती देशों of Mediterranean sea . 
Here मुर्गीपालन उद्योग भी has also been विकास at large scale . 
दूध and cattle rearing is पशुपालन प्रमुख व्यापारिक कार्य in the nearby areas of नगर . 
Here , some areas have preponderance of मक्खन and पनीर while ताजे दूध is आपूर्ति in local areas . 
उत्पादन of पौधे and लता are कृषि of Mediterranean sea region . 
Olives , dates and अंगूर are included in इस पद्धति . 
इन वृक्षों and फसलों are the major productions . 
जैतून is the most significant among them . 
All the geographical conditions for जैतून उत्पादन are available here . 
90 % of संसार 90 % जैतून is उत्पादन in Mediterranean sea regions . 
दूसरी मुख्य फसल is अंगूर . 
Grapes are grown in abundance in the form of कृषि in कुछ भागों of आस्ट्रेलिया and Chile . 
इस पद्धति was कृषि - प्रौद्योगिकी विकास as a result of Commercial food and agricultural production technology . 
इस प्रकार of farming is found in expanded dry and humid regions of कृषि मध्य अक्षांशीय घास . 
मिट्टी here is more fertile due to वनस्पति and ice . 
As compared to other systems , कृषि includes सीमित क्षेत्र . 
due to अभाव of जनसंख्या the per प्रति मनुष्य उत्पादन is quite more . 
स्थानीय खपत is very limited . 
Therefore बहुत भारी मात्रा of food grain is left for commercial purpose . 
वैषम्य is found in उत्पादन of food grain & चावल . 
While गेहूँ is the major exporting cereal of अर्न्तराष्‍ट्रीय बाजार . 
पद्धति is विशेषता of यहाँ in कृषि उपयोग . 
यह परिवर्तन helps in up keeping उर्वर of मिट्टी . 
For उदाहरण , a form contains पद्धति for छः वर्ष where oats in टरनिप or आलू , in छः वर्ष , again oats in छः वर्ष and for छः वर्ष घास is grown . 
There is सबसे ज्यादा विनियोग of पूँजी in मिश्रित कृषि व्यवस्था . 
इस कृषि requires पूँजी and labor . 
चक्रवतीय वर्षा are received throughout वर्ष भर in the form of light showers which is quite beneficial for the farm . 
सफल उत्पादन and पशुपालन both are carried together . 
Crops are पैदा for feeding cattle . 
In यूरोप and संयुक्‍त राज्य the populations is spread on farms . 
On few parts of फार्म ही , houses of farmers , शेड , of cattle , stores of चारे इत्यादि and cattle stable are found . 
Life sustaining निर्वाही फसल and cattle rearing cultivation - पशुपालन कृषि - इस कृषि व्यवस्था was विकास in उत्तरी यूरोप . 
There has been such an advancement in the current developing times that इस प्रकार of कृषि व्यवस्था in the world has परिवर्तित in the form of व्यापारिक शस्य and cattle rearing उत्पादन कृषि . 
केवल एक ही फसल is grown because of excess cold and dry weather conditions . 
One has to adopt पशुपालन पशुपालन due to the helplessness of growing एक फसल in वर्ष . 
आज , along with जीवन स्तर of living , माँग for dairy products has also increased extraordinarily . 
Which means सुधार , in नस्लों of cattle , separately विकसित the varieties of माँस and dairy cattle . 
As a result of विकास of machines and रेफ्रीजरेटर that rear दूध and create other objects and सुधार , in cattle varieties the dairy industry has आ गया है up at डेरी उद्योग वैज्ञानिक स्तर . 
Further , in इस व्यवस्था आविष्कार and विकास भी of swift vehicles has सिद्ध to हुआ है वरदान . 
कृषि - ऐसी कृषि - कृषि - ऐसी कृषि is carried specially in the densely populated nations of उत्तर पश्‍चिम यूरोप , , Great Britain , Denmark , Belgium , France , Germany etc. . 
Under इस पद्धति , फसलों -LRB- ( साग -झौईण् सब्जी , , fruits , flowers etc , -RRB- are cultivated . 
In this method आकार of खेत is small . 
इसे is कहा गया है truck farming ' in United States of संयुक्‍त राज्य अमेरिका . 
Here , आकार of farms are bigger . 
In इस अवस्था , सही मात्रा of पानी , at सही समय , खाद , medicines and अन्य उपकरणों are required to get पर्याप्‍त उत्पादन from farms . 
Therefore , only skilled farmers with expertise in सब्जियों and उत्पादन are hired . 
भारत भी also has favorable geographical conditions for इस व्यवस्था -LRB- ( पर्याप्‍त तापमान , , सौर प्रकाश , , सही वर्धन काल , , नम जलवायु and appropriate soi . 
As a result of this appropriateness , फूल -झौईण् फल and flowers are grown in small farms and orchards . 
बैगन , , lady 's finger are सब्जियों . 
In पिछले वर्षों , there has been क्रान्तिकारी विकास due to माँग for साग -झौईण् सब्जियों , , नगरीकरण , , सुधार in बीजों of flowers and fruits and industrialization . 
मनुष्य has been doing कृषि since ancient times . 
Agriculture has been क्रिया रही है of humans . 
The agricultural techniques बदलता गया with changing times . 
In अनेक क्षेत्रों of संसार , कृषि is still carried using प्राचीन ढंग but it has taken a commercial form in अनेक क्षेत्रों . 
This is यही कारण why कई पद्धतियों are used for कृषि कार्य in संसार . 
कृषि says that कृषि is an objective oriented activity of producing crops and पशुपालन पशुपालन . 
It is clear that as per the boundaries of कृषि , primary activities मृदा पोषण , , मृदा उपयोग , , crop production , बागवानी , , पशुपालन , , सिंचाई , , fish culture are शामिल . 
जीवन -झौईण् निर्वाहक कृषि is still a life sustaining occupation in क्षेत्रों where there is low growth activity but गहन निर्वाहक and जीवन -झौईण् निर्वाहक कृषि is carried in क्षेत्रों with developed economy . 
It is not proper to compare अमेरिकी कृषि with अमेरिकी कृषि . 
A complete commercial form of कृषि is found in United states of संयुक्‍त राज्य अमेरिका , which is among औद्योगिक देशों of संसार while भारत has mixed form of कृषि where किसान grow कुछ ही फसलों with commercial perspective . 
कृषि of चाय is appropriate only on slopes . 
It is clear that due to असमानता of physical and human factors in the world , उपस्थिति of multiplicity in the form of कृषि is natural . 
उत्पादन of फूल , etc. is commonly seen around नगरों while in क्षेत्रों there is prevalence of agricultural activities such as cereals and पशुपालन पशुपालन . 
जिस क्षेत्र where प्रधानता of एक विशेष तरह of कृषि is done becomes पहचान of जिस क्षेत्र . 
वॉन थ्यूनीन first tried to explain स्थानीयकरण of आधुनिक कृषि and later several scholars played विशिष्‍ट भूमिका in इस क्षेत्र . 
The profit फसलोत्पादन from अर्थात उत्पादन determines the economic prosperity of लाभ किसान , therefore चुनाव of फसलों is done ध्यान in ध्यान the place of अर्थात उत्पादन and बाजार i.e दूरी between अर्थात उत्पादन and consumers because the profit that is फसलोत्पादन from अतिरिक्‍त उपज becomes आधार of स्थानीयकरण of कृषि . 
The profit due to कृषि उत्पादों are jointly प्रभावित by उत्पादन लागत and उत्पादन लागत . 
Further , स्थानीयकरण of कृषि is also affected by the socio-cultural system . 
सिद्धान्त of स्थानीकरण of कृषि was first प्रतिपादन by थ्यूनने स्वयं on आधार of ज्ञानों of कृषि in 1826 . 
इस जर्मन विद्वान through विधि carried at कृषि फार्म came to यह निष्कर्ष that भौतिक तत्वों are more powerful as compared to भौतिक तत्वों in स्थानीयकरण of कृषि . 
वॉन थ्यूनेन प्रतिपादन सिद्धान्त on आधार that उपयोग of कृषि भूमि increases with the increase in दूरी साथ from बाजार . 
उनका also believes that the volume of land use i. e. the form of getting अधिक उत्पादन through अधिक निवेश also changes with दूरी साथ and यह भी signifies that कोई अन्तर्निहित पक्ष is responsible for this . 
Crop production affects several physical , social , cultural and economic factors but बाजार is the most significant of all because दूरी from बाजार greatly impacts गहनता of कृषि and structure of भूमि उपयोग . 
According to दूरी from बाजार from चौतरफा the profit of पैदावार will always हो जायेगा less . 
Because परिवहन cost will keep increasing . 
वॉन थ्यूनेन believes that उन्हीं फसलों are grown on a piece of land which provide अधिक लाभ . 
दूरी साथ from शहर and नगर has resulted in the reduction of उत्पादन and लाभ and it has also changed स्वरूप of भूमि उपयोग and चुनाव of फसलों . 
लाभ decreases due to the increasing transportation cost on बाहरी छोर of towns and होती है leads to प्रधानता of पशुपालन . 
Opposite to this , there is सम्भावना for लाभ due to कम परिवहन लागत if इसके is near the towns and इसके also develops dense land गहन भूमि उपयोग साथ along with बागवानी , , दुग्ध उत्पादन and गहन कृषि आदि . 
On आधार of एकाकी अनुभव , वॉन थ्यूनेन has tried to explain that मूल बाजार is the root of the localization of कृषि which determines स्वरूप of कृषि though यह तथ्य is not applicable everywhere . 
लॉश आलोचना सिद्धान्त of Wan Thunen and explained that इनके is not possible to सामान्यीकरण of आधार . 
It can हो सकता है लागू only in some situations . 
Yet यह is स्वीकार that वॉन थ्यूनेन has प्रयास to explain some aspects of modern market prone कृषि . 
In 1996 , मैकार्टी and लिण्डवर्ग प्रतिपादन सिद्धान्त of most favorable economic conditions and limitations . 
The favorable nature of economic factors gradually decreases with दूरी साथ from इस क्षेत्र बाहर , consequently उत्पादन लागत increases . 
कृषि भी also appears in the form of कृषि भी . 
Several categories of कृषि develop due to इस परिवर्तन . 
अवधारणा of इस सिद्धान्त in भौतिक सत्यापन is more near to सत्य therefore it is more acceptable . 
मैकार्टी and लिण्डवर्ग शामिल सभी अनिवार्य तत्वों for the description of सिद्धान्त such as भूमि , , कुल लागत incurred , श्रम , , परिवहन , , सिंचाई आदि etc. . 
They believe that उत्पादन सीमा shall होगा determined in निर्धारण with मानना . 
In ऐसी दशा दुग्ध उत्पादक has to make sure whether वह would आपूर्ति दूध in its original form or transform it into पनीर , butter etc. so that अधिक लाभ can be gained . 
Hence अतएव कृषक takes निर्णय as per लाभ . 
The profit will होगा निर्धारित on the result of difference between लाभ , लागत -झौईण् मूल्य incurred and supply लाभ , लागत -झौईण् मूल्य . 
ऐसी स्थिति are visible only near the towns in देश . 
ओलोफ जोनसॉन studied few ideologies of थ्यूनेन presumptions in 1920 . 
By studying it जोनसॉन came to यह निष्कर्ष that नगर or स्थिति puts स्पष्‍ट प्रभाव on the structure of land use . 
According to him , गहन कृषि is done in समीपवर्ती क्षेत्र outside नगर or ग्राम बाहर where फसलों like साग -झौईण् सब्जी , , फल , , फूल are primarily grown . 
The vegetables growing outward from इस आन्तरिक पेटी such as आलू and फसलों such as tobacco , fodder etc are prevalent . 
हूवर प्रस्तुत सिद्धान्त of स्थानीयकरण in the year 1948 which depends on the local structure of economic activity . 
At स्थान of एकाकी बाजार उन्होंने has considered उपस्थिति of एकाकी बाजार . 
Further , वे has described भूमि उपयोग in दशा of mutual competition . 
दूध is पदार्थ that perishes very soon and होने requires निकटतम बाजार and तीव्र परिवहन . 
This is यही कारण , इसका is उत्पादन near all the towns . 
Opposite to this , due to अधिक वहनीयता and relatively less transportation cost of गेहूँ and legumes they can be उत्पादन in far flung क्षेत्रों relative to अपेक्षाकृत बाजार . 
Thus , अन्तर can not appear in मूल स्वरूप of भूमि उपयोग due to उपस्थिति of कई बाजारों and लगान determines भूमि उपयोग . 
क्षेत्र of natural boundaries and favorable conditions of उत्पादन do not remain same all the time . 
In due course of time , because of the technical advancement , स्थिति of resourcefulness of भूमि and उत्पादन क्षमता of भूमि and सम्बन्धित लागत तत्वों keeps changing and along with बदलाव the natural boundaries and favorable conditions of क्षेत्र भी of different crop productions . 
For example in the current times due to आविष्कार of wheat varieties getting prepared quickly , होने can होने grown even in more colder regions . 
उसी फसल will होगा उत्पादन in क्षेत्र with favorable conditions which gives more profit . 
In majority of अधिकांश कृषि क्षेत्रों , किसान prepares more than one फसलें in अधिकांश कृषि क्षेत्रों . 
And the major is कारण is that किसानों get विभिन्‍न तरह internal आन्तरिक बचत bu growing कई फसलों together . 
इससे gives कई तरह of लाभ such as crop rotation for समुचित उपयोग , proper utilization of श्रम and machines , security from total damage of फसलों etc. . 
There is वही महत्व of variation of आर्थिक लगान in स्थानीयकरण of कृषि as होता है is of a regional variation of श्रम in किसी श्रम -झौईण् गहन उद्योग or of a regional variation of power in किसी श्रम -झौईण् गहन उद्योग . 
फल as well as पौधा of धनिया are beneficial . 
इसे is प्रयोग in a variety of ways . 
इसके is बिकता at good prices in बाजार because of its qualities . 
तमाम किसान cultivate इसकी and कमाते हैं profit by बेच कर हरी पत्तियां . 
After cutting पत्तियां पौधे are छोड़ दिया जाता है as अंतिम फसल to bear फल . 
फल is प्रयोग in the form of मसाले . 
पत्तियां and फल are प्रयोग in the form of herbs and मसाले . 
फल -LRB- ( बीज ) -RRB- are उपयोग in the form of roasted or un-roasted मसाले to make curry powder , sauce and मसाले . 
धनिया is extensively सबसे व्यापक प्रयोग in भारत . 
वैश्‍विक उत्पादन of धनिया बीज is around 6 million करीब 6 लाख टन . 
देश are ईरान and चीन . 
आयातक देशों are मध्यपूर्व , , south east Asia , america , Britain , Germany etc. . 
On औसत भारत produces around 3 million लगभग 3 लाख टन annually . 
While भारत is सबसे बड़ा उत्पादक यह is also उपभोक्ता and निर्यातक भी . 
राजस्थान and मध्य प्रदेश are प्रमुख उत्पादक राज्यों of भारत . 
राजस्थान and मध्य प्रदेश उत्पादन around 54 % and करीब 54 फीसदी करीब 17 फीसदी धनिया respectively . 
In भारत धनिया is grown in many forms . 
इसकी can be खेती in तीनों फसलों खरीफ , and जायद . 
In the kharif season farmers sow इसकी by किसान अगस्त and सितंबर and in रबी इसकी is sown in अक्टूबर and नवंबर . 
While इसकी is sown as zaid जायद फसल in फरवरी माह of February . 
जायद फसल give कीमत for green leaves . 
The farmers get डंठलों of किसान धनिया cut in spite of plucking them from जड़ . 
They कमाते by बेच कर डंठल and छोड़ देते हैं , उस फसल which yields फल after बेच कर the stem thrice . 
Although one has to pay विशेष ध्यान on सिंचाई in जायद . 
There are several varieties of धनिया . 
धनिया is basically फसल but इसे is also grown as फसल . 
In majority of the parts of India इसलिए is भारत वर्ष based आधारित फसल therefore इसलिए is grown in the form of pure or आधारित फसल . 
In दक्षिणी राज्यों इसकी is खेती in both the seasons . 
इसकी is अक्तूबर during मई to अगस्त and secondly during October to जनवरी . 
similarly the second week of October-November is also considered appropriate for खेती of धनिया . 
There is जरूरत of adopting कोई विशेष विधि for the cultivation of धनिया . 
अंकुरण is as good as मिट्‍टी जितनी भुरभुरी is the soil . 
If धनिया is being खेती in सीजन then one should take ध्यान of the following things . 
Because during that period हो सकती है can बारिश anytime . 
Because of तेज बारिश लेप on the crops and होने affects अंकुरण . 
खेती of खरीफ सीजन should हो done taking ध्यान of इस बात that there is अच्छी व्यवस्था for पानी in यानी पानी should not stand in beds . 
If धनिया is being खेती in जायद सीजन then होती है requires पानी . 
In such situations small beds should be made . 
धनिए should होती है careful regarding मात्रा of बीज . 
मात्रा of seeds are increased in the regions where पत्ती are sold . 
On औसतन 25 किलो of बीज are sown per एक हेक्टेयर through sprinkling छिटकवां विधि . 
If धनिया is grown in garbage then 15 kilograms of बीज are sufficient . 
धनिये should be sown in rows . 
If तापमान of मिट्टी is 17 डिग्री at the time of sowing then हो is considered good because तापमान does not affect अंकुरण . 
बीज are उपचार before sowing . 
In देशी प्रणाली तेल is mixed with बीज . 
Similarly बीज can also be purified by mixing them with fungicide . 
There should not be प्रयोग of ज्यादा रासायनिक खाद in खेती of धनिया . 
It is more beneficial to प्रयोग आर्गेनिक खाद in खेती of धनिया . 
For getting भरपूर उपज , कम्पोस्ट खाद should be डाल before जुताई पहले खेत . 
Later , during the second ploghing , नीम खाद 50 किलो , of neem manure should be डालकर with सल्फेट साथ and should be दूसरी जुताई gently . 
While sowing it is beneficial to add पांच किलो acre of magnesium . 
पौधे remain green if आर्गेनिक खाद is प्रयोग . 
सिंचाई is the most important सबसे महत्वपूर्ण पक्ष in coriander cultivation . 
While irrigating one should be careful that there is n't अधिक पानी in the beds . 
धनिया requires पानी during सीजन but one has to be careful while irrigating धनिया during सीजन . 
If हो takes longer for फल to ripe then हो should हो एक सिंचाई one more time after 125 दिन बाद . 
इससे makes the grains strong and वजन भी also increases . 
A lot अनेक खरपतवार उग along with धनिया फसल साथ . 
ये खरपतवार बढ़त the growth of पौधे . 
In such situations निराई should be done when पौधे carry तीन पत्तियां . 
While तैयारी खेत for नियंत्रण , खेत should be जुताई and छोड़ देना चाहिए for कुछ दिन . 
इससे dries all the weeds . 
इन्हें should be plucked and put out of खेत . 
Weeding should be done twice for नियंत्रण . 
फसल are affected more by कीटों . 
One should be careful about this during फसल . 
Though खरीफ फसल भी also catches कीट but there is प्रकोप of कीट in खरीफ फसल भी . 
चौंपा कीट generally attacks तीनों फसलों . 
इसका affect during flowering . 
Microzyme , सल्फर is sprayed to नियंत्रण इसके . 
Building fumes near खेत आसपास is also beneficial . 
In an organic way , spraying a solution of तेल and पानी is quite beneficial . 
फसल catches कई तरह of रोग भी also . 
Sandy loamy soil is affected more by wilting उकठा रोग . 
It destroys जड़ of यह पौधे and यह पौधे fades and becomes dry . 
Similarly धनिया also catches stem तना व्रण रोग भी . 
Here , ऊपरी भाग of पौधे dries and becomes infected . 
Similarly धनिया also catches powdery mildew . 
यह is एक फफूंदीजनित रोग . 
In the initial period of इस रोग , the leaves and branches carry आटे like substance . 
पत्तियां पीली yellow and curl when the impact is severe . 
0.1 फीसदी of बेवेस्टीन can be sprayed to नियंत्रण इसके . 
Severe cold climate can also destroy फसल . 
एक हल्की सिंचाई can be done if there is संभावना for severe cold . 
फसल are बेचा जाता है as leaves in some areas . 
In such situations the leaves can हो जाए काटा जा सकता है when खेत becomes wet after पहली सिंचाई बाद . 
After cutting पत्तियां , सिंचाई and ड्रेसिंग should be done . 
If one wants to लेना हो सिर्फ फल then it should be कटाई after 100 दिन बाद when सिर्फ फल start drying . 
During this period the seed bunches हो जाता है brown . 
After कटाई बाद , फसल should be सुखाना चाहिए in the open in छाया . 
The grains are अलग -झौईण् अलग and साफ when then dry completely . 
किसान in the eastern region of Uttar Pradesh get double earning by धनिया along with winter sugarcane . 
Sugarcane are affected less by कीट if they are sown with धनिया . 
इससे not only gives अच्छी उपज तो of धनिया but also छह कुंतल of धनिया are obtained in one acre of एक एकड़ खेत . 
धनिया is sown with winter sugarcane by 15 दिसम्बर . 
The experts believe that the sugarcane sown in winters give 25 फीसदी अधिक उपज than the one sown during spring . 
Flowers and betel leaves are grown in वाराणसी and rest other areas , but लोग were unaware of खेती . 
They themselves grew सिर्फ गेहूं and धान initially . 
Thus तमाम लोग considered खेती to be a loss making सौदा . 
बाराबंकी are पहुंच रहे हैं the markets through ट्रकों from Barabanki . 
The farmers of this area have become आकर्षित हुए हैं towards खेती ओर and they are improving आर्थिक स्थिति by cultivating bananas . 
शिवकुमार says that उनका came in touch with संर्पक during 2009 . 
In the beginning उन्हें could not समझ कृषि वैज्ञानिकों and अधिकारियों . 
For पहली बार in the year 2009 , paddy and धान -झौईण् गेहूं were sown in 0.60 हेक्टेयर भूमि through SRI method while केले was खेती on 0.60 हेक्टेयर भूमि . 
When केले जी -झौईण् 9 किस्म of banana was grown in खेत for पहली बार then किसानों made fun of this . 
वैज्ञानिकों adopted तकनीक and there was धान and भरपूर पैदावार despite late arrival of मानसून . 
After धान बाद , they grew गेहूं through zero till method during रबी मौसम which saved लागत . 
Sowing गेहूं without बिना जुताई once gave निराशा but प्रयोग seemed to हुई थी , good when उपज was obtained . 
They kept cultivating केले along with धान and गेहूं साथ . 
Thus 1,63,500 INR was obtained from कुल पैदावार of भूमि . 
They स्थापित मिले , from the saving done by बेचने बाद फसल . 
Discussions of agriculture is also carried along with obtaining धान from धान . 
There should होनी चाहिए अच्छी व्यवस्था for water drainage in खेत . 
केले can not be खेती in अधिक अम्लीय or भूमि . 
similarly खोद should be dug and खाद should be essentially डालनी चाहिए in it before planting trees . 
इससे always gives ताकत to पौधे . 
5 grams of thimate insecticide should be put in the pit . 
फसल requires अधिक पानी . 
In such situations it is quite beneficial to irrigate through drip technique . 
If किसान carry खेती by मान कर the suggestions by कृषि वैज्ञानिकों ओर then certainly they will होंगे successful and खेती would होंगे a profitable rather than a loss making सौदा . 
किसान भी of कुछ रायबरेली are also cultivating bananas . 
Seeing its profit , किसान भी of the nearby districts have become लालायित हुए हैं towards इसके . 
Very soon उत्तर प्रदेश भी can हो सकता है the number one producer of केले . 
एक किसान खुदकुशी suicide by being upset due the destroying of फसल due to बारिश and hailstones . 
वह is being said that वह था in distress since the destroying of फसल due to hailstones . 
On Tuesday मंगलवार सुबह , किसान गोवर्धन राठौर of खारपा गांव , Jirapur tahsil was found शव in खेत well . 
An after किसान had खुदकुशी suicide , the chief minister ShivRaj singh मुख्यमंत्री शिवराज सिंह चौहान had come to चमारखेड़ा गांव to get the review of नुकसान occurred . 
In front of him स्थानीय अधिकारी were स्थानीय अधिकारी किसान to be a mad and ill person . 
फसलों were destroyed most in Jirapur Tehsil because of बारिश and hailstorm during शुक्रवार and रविवार बीच . 
Despite this , नहीं पहुंचा has come to do कोई सर्वे till date in several villages . 
There has been सर्वे even in the deceased 's village Kharpa . 
With the arrival of गर्मियों , several varieties of आम have आ चुकी हैं up in बाजार for शौकीनों . 
Currently , only the mangoes of दक्षिणी भारत ही are in आम बाजार . 
Although , because of बदलाव in मौसम , उत्पादन has been relatively less than पिछले साल . 
Those concerned with आम कारोबार in आजादपुर फल and सब्जी मंडी कहना that आम that are seen in मंडी now are आ रहा है , from आंध्र प्रदेश and केरल . 
Mangoes are being आपूर्ति from आंध्र प्रदेश Warangal , Vijaywada and Vijaynagar . 
Amongst them are सफेदा , , पीरकमान , , Ratnagiri 's अल्फांसो , , सुरखा and three varieties of mangoes from केरल भी . 
Further , सफेदा आम is also being आपूर्ति from हैदराबाद भी . 
Amit Gidwani concerned with आम कारोबार in मंडी says that 6 kg packets of आम is आ रही है in bulk at Rs , 350 . 
There is a little more increase in कीमत in खुदरा बाजार . 
Because of बदलाव in climatic condition , फसल have matured 15 दिन पहले ही prior to its usual timing . 
उनका says that southern mangoes would stay for लगभग एक महीना in बाजार now . 
By the end of मई , चौसा and आम would arrive from उत्तर प्रदेश . 
अन्य कारोबारी , रमेश says that mangoes are a bit costlier now . 
That is why now they are not being sold much . 
कीमत increases खुदरा बाजार because they are quite expensive when bought in bulk . 
That is why mango lovers are now खरीद रहे हैं आम just to get केवल स्वाद of it . 
पौधों should be kept as per their requirement . 
कुछ पौधों require अधिक धूप such as bougainvillea , adenium , ferkeria , morpankhi etc. . 
similarly कुछ पौधे stay well in छाया such as alpinia , aglonima , filodendron , defenwechia , dresina etc. . 
कुछ पौधों जरूरत semi-shade . 
ये पौधे are - एरिका पाम , , साइकस , , camellia , some species of bamboo etc. . 
धूप is very good for शेड पौधों . 
पौधों are also प्रयोग for interior decoration . 
It is very good to तो two sets of ऐसे पौधे inside घर अंदर for decoration . 
रख दें one set of एक सेट पौधों in खुली हवा -LRB- where there is धूप -RRB- and they can be kept inside after कुछ दिनों बाद . 
If पौधों with colorful leaves are kept under छाया नीचे of किसी पेड़ then they मिलती है प्राकृतिक हवा . 
Further , the color of पौधों also रहती है better . 
One should be careful that there is n't much sunlight there . 
Various species of साइकस are now available which look beautiful and can be arranged in प्रजातियां of ways . 
Similarly , पचीरा which is also called pachira is considered quite auspicious from the point of view of vastu . 
Several species of ग्राफ्टिंग are ग्राफ्टिंग to make designer plants . 
यह are also very attractive to देखने . 
धरना of किसान मजदूर संगठन continued for 18वें दिन भी -LRB- शुक्रवार -RRB- also in चौधरी चरण सिंह पार्क . 
अध्यक्ष of संगठन , सरदार वीएम सिंह कहा that लक्ष्य of the movement is not only to give thee clearance of बकाया and sugarcane गन्‍ना मूल्य but also to bring back किसान who are छोड़ रहे खेती due to शोषण . 
उन्होंने कहा that महापंचायत of किसानों has been कहा on Friday where भारी संख्या of किसानों will होंगे involved . 
वह was संबोधित मौजूद at the event . 
उन्होंने कहा that though India is भारत कृषि प्रधान देश but किसान here are the most troubled . 
सरकार wants किसानों जमीन on less than दाम for establishing उद्योगों and colonies for उद्योगपतियों . 
उन्होंने कहा that हालात is this that हालात are running away from खेती seeing the financial crunch of their fathers . 
सिवाय are not going to देने anything other than snatching hence fight खुद ही till death . 
The poet Dr. Hariom Pawar filled enthusiasm amongst किसानों through कविताओं at धरने . 
Gram is the major edible source of अधिसंख्य आबादी of दुनिया . 
It is also एक बड़ा जरिया भी of आमदनी for यह छोटे किसानों . 
For काफी समय कृषि वैज्ञानिक have been कोशिश to know how गुणवत्ता should be improved , how can यह be made nutritive and how can पैदावार be increased . 
Their hard work now seems to be fruitful . 
अंतरराष्‍ट्रीय टीम of भारतीय कृषि वैज्ञानिकों including भारतीय कृषि वैज्ञानिकों have been successful in studying the genome of gram . 
They have analyzed 90 various varieties of gram genes including the most popular सर्वाधिक लोकप्रिय काबुली -LRB- ( सीडीसी फ्रंटियर ) -RRB- . 
इस उपलब्धि will मदद in improving किस्मों , bringing ज्यादा आनुवांशिक विविधता and making them रोग and सूखा resistant by reforming the varieties of gram . 
According to रिसर्च पेपर , प्रकाशित in nature biotechnology , for gene analysis वैज्ञानिकों have चुना था 90 species of gram found in around 10 10 विभिन्‍न देशों . 
इनमें also has some wild varieties . 
Apart from the genome इस पेपर also has the description of special works by all the genes and यह भी is also described how सतत उत्पादन can be determined by improving फसल through gene analysis . 
अंतरराष्‍ट्रीय फसल अनुसंधान संस्थान , हैदराबाद is guiding अंतरराष्‍ट्रीय टीम . 
यह संस्थान researches फसलों grown in ऊष्णकटिबंधीय क्षेत्रों . 
The teams of वैज्ञानिकों have identified around 28,286 genes in kabuli gram . 
आनुवंशिक आधार of gram can be मजबूत through genome . 
with this the farmers engaged in खेती can निपट सकेंगे in बेहतर ढंग with the challenges of जलवायु परिवर्तनों arising due to वृद्धि . 
After सोयाबीन बाद , gram is फसल of दुनिया . 
इसकी is खेती in around 1.15 billion करीब 1.15 करोड़ हेक्टेयर क्षेत्र of दुनिया . 
Majority of ज्यादातर खेती is done by those small and poor किसानों of अर्द्ध शुष्क ऊष्णकटिबंधीय क्षेत्रों who are वंचित of संसाधनों . 
According to डॉ . राजीव वार्ष्णेय , , भारतीय वैज्ञानिक associated with this project , सुधार can be brought in प्रजनन तकनीकों by shortlisting good genes of gram through जीन अध्ययन . 
Now , आठ साल are required to विकसित new varieties of gram through पारंपरिक प्रजनन . 
Adopting तकनीक based on genome analysis prepares new varieties in आधे समय ही . 
Apart from being उत्पादक of gram , India is also its biggest consumer . 
In on around 66.70 million करीब 66.70 लाख हेक्टेयर क्षेत्र of देश , 53 million tonne gram is उत्पादन . 
Despite the increase in उत्पादन of gram in देश , there is कमी in क्षेत्रों under खेती . 
Initially gram was sown in around 75.70 million hectare area . 
Now , इसकी is grown only on 66.70 million hectare area . 
Gram is grown at a large scale in छह राज्यों of देश namely - मध्य प्रदेश , , राजस्थान , , Maharashtra , मध्य प्रदेश , , कर्नाटक and मध्य प्रदेश , . 
91 प्रतिशत of उत्पादन of देश comes from इन्हीं राज्यों . 
Due to विस्तार in सिंचाई सुविधाओं in उत्तरी राज्यों गेहूं and सरसों is being खेती at स्थान of gram in बहुत बड़े क्षेत्र . 
These figures clearly जाहिर that there is भरपूर गुंजाइश for उत्पादन in देश . 
But one has to adopt उपयुक्‍त रणनीति for this . 
In इस संदर्भ the genome analysis of gram keeps खास महत्व for भारत . 
With the help of improved varieties after gene analysis , भारतीय किसान will not only be able to increase उत्पादन but will also increase their earning . 
Being the cheapest source of protein gram plays एक बड़ी भूमिका in tackling भुखमरी and malnutrition . 
Crops like gram are also important in tolerating the shocks due to तापमान in दुनिया . 
Hence in order to ensure खाद्य सुरक्षा for भविष्य we have to pay ज्यादा ध्यान on खेती . 
क्षमता of बिहार , the state producing 70 million सात लाख टन भी paddy is even less than 7 million सात लाख टन भी . 
किसान of राज्य are मजबूर to sell फसल in खुले बाजार on less than their actual prices because of खींच of एफसीआइ from सरकारी खरीद . 
सस्ता धान of बिहार is पहुंच रहा है the rice mills of उत्तर प्रदेश and पंजाब . 
हालात has न होने more worse due to the unavailability of निजी निवेश for building granaries against the promises of राज्य सरकार . 
On the other hand , सरकार has बंद the markets long back because of which there is कोई स्थान for आधिकारिक बिक्री of कृषि उपज . 
हालात is so worse that धान भी of 2011-12 सीजन could not be नहीं बिक पाया है yet then how can धान भी of 2011-12 सीजन 2012-13 be नहीं बिक पाया है . 
खाद्य and ration minister shyam Rajak has जवाब for this . 
Yet उन्होंने has अपील किसानों of राज्य to sell धान in बाजार at less than समर्थन मूल्य . 
वास्तविक क्षमता of राज्य is around 6.45 million पौने सात लाख टन आसपास . 
इनमें include the granaries लिए गए on किराये for राज्य भंडारण निगम , , राज्य भंडारण निगम , and राज्य भंडारण निगम , . 
राज्य has almost no mills for building धान from धान . 
राज्य सरकार has बंद मंडी प्रणाली long back . 
Which means there are no government markets in राज्य . 
This is यही वजह , किसान of राज्य are बेचने उपज at very low prices to निजी व्यापारियों . 
धान of the farmers living near the border of उत्तर प्रदेश are bought by उत्तर प्रदेश व्यापारी at 30 फीसदी less than समर्थन मूल्य . 
Currently मूल्य for धान is 1250 rupees . 
There are संख्या of rice mills in उत्तर प्रदेश . 
According to एक वरिष्‍ठ अधिकारी of केंद्रीय खाद्य मंत्रालय , दो साल पहले back in बिहार it was फैसला to build गोदाम of 3 million तीन लाख टन भंडारण क्षमता . 
खानापूरी भी were also done by issuing टेंडर for 90 thousand 90 हजार टन क्षमता . 
महापंचायत of किसानों under the Indian farmers Union -LRB- IFU -RRB- has come up on parliament street . 
किसानों फैसला to रहने there till they agree to मांग for asking right prices for फसल . 
The national spokesperson of राकेश टिकैत कहा that the farmers movement is reminding us of राकेश टिकैत . 
किसानों have शुरू coming to दिल्ली on the same lines . 
Now they have entered the Delhi border with 25 tractor food stuffs . 
They have फैसला that धरना will not end on small conditions . 
गठित कमेटी held under अध्यक्षता of आर्थिक सलाहकार परिषद of economic advisory of the Prime minister handed over रिपोर्ट regarding making नियंत्रण free . 
On आधार of this सरकार has मंजूरी to make चीनी उद्योग partially नियंत्रण free . 
But यह फैसला is not in पक्ष of किसानों or consumers but in पक्ष of sugar mills . 
लेवी the compulsion to sell चीनी will yield कम से कम 10 प्रतिशत लाभ of at least 10 % to the sugarcane mills . 
Not having sugar release order and handing over चीनी to बाजार , on festive occasions will lead to the willfulness of rice mills and can increase कीमतें and the consumers have to directly bear its brunt . 
इससे will lead to fluctuation in sugar prices in बाजार and सरकार पास will have कोई उपाय to रोकने इससे . 
Thus sugar mills can also आयात आयातित चीनी if just 10 % आयात is kept on आयातित चीनी . 
उत्पादक किसानों have to bear its brunt . 
रंगराजन समिति had सिफारिश भी to stop the rights that राज्य सरकारों has in the form of state advisory price for गन्‍ना मूल्य निर्धारण the sugarcane price but it was not approved . 
Further दूरी भी between sugar mills was also duly kept . 
ऐसा could हो पाया है possible only because of प्रबल विरोध ही of agricultural experts and किसानों . 
In सिफारिश of समिति it था proposed to कीमत with शुगर रिकवरी which था against the benefits of किसानों of उत्तर भारत . 
Indeed , there is आवश्यकता for व्यापक सुधार in चीनी क्षेत्र so that गरीब जनता मिले सस्ती चीनी and the sugarcane mills मिले कोई नुकसान . 
But the interest of उत्पादक किसानों were अनदेखी in चीनी नीति . 
उत्पादक किसानों have not been नहीं दिया गया है लाभकारी मूल्य and भुगतान भी of लाभकारी मूल्य is also not being done on समय . 
इससे can बरबाद किसान . 
The argument of कुछ नेताओं that partially making नियंत्रण free will मदद किसानों in भुगतान has no strength . 
Can they say whether किसान are being दी जा रही है कोई खैरात in addition to निर्धारित गन्‍ना मूल्य e ? 
यह भी is also विचारणीय विषय that the appropriate and profitable गन्‍ना मूल्य , of केंद्र सरकार which is 170 rupees is neither appropriate nor beneficial . 
It is even 110-120 rupees less than गन्‍ना मूल्य of यह उत्तर प्रदेश सरकार which is 280-290 rupees . 
For the past one पिछले एक वर्ष कीमतें of जुताई and कटाई have increased because of which आकलन of कीमतें has increased to 314 rupees quintal from the last years 270 . 
Thus , किसान are मिल रहा है , कम गन्‍ना मूल्य even less than उत्पादन लागत भी while according to सिफारिश , of अध्यक्ष of किसान डॉ . स्वामीनाथन , सरकार should निर्धारित कम गन्‍ना मूल्य up to 1.5 times more . 
आवश्यकता in देश is 220 million 220 लाख टन while उत्पादन is 250 million 220 लाख टन . 
The granaries also have पिछले वर्ष 60 million 60 लाख टन भी . 
This is beyond समझ why आयात from abroad is reduced and कच्‍ची चीनी is being आयात . 
The sugar mills wants to मिलें rid of मिलें by निजात रिजर्व क्षेत्र for चीनी . 
If इस is fulfilled then the sugar mills will हो गया , able to गन्‍ना खरीद सकेंगी sugarcane as per its wish even outside the boundary of 15 kilometers . 
इससे will lead to a battle between mills and co-operative mills will not नहीं टिक पाएंगी before private mills . 
According to the Uttar Pradesh Sugarcane -LRB- ( पूर्ति and purchase regulation -RRB- the sugar mills have अधिकार to गन्‍ना खरीद sugarcane from एक विशिष्‍ट क्षेत्र . 
The sugarcane of कुछ किसानों can रह सकता है खेतों because of its end . 
Bustar is famous for शराब . 
But now , इससे is also used to make edible items such as pickle , chutney , laddoo , chikki and vinegar . 
इसका is also being उपयोग to make cake . 
For पिछले दो साल प्रयोग are being carried in जन विज्ञान केंद्र , Mudpar village for making edible items from महुआ . 
बायो टेक्‍नोलॉजी विभाग of दिल्ली भी is also researching on the same . 
सार्थक परिणाम of इस रिसर्च have now started to come up . 
Initially इस केंद्र only made mango and नीबू but now pickles , चटनी , and laddoo are also being made from महुआ . 
ग्रामीण महिलाओं are formally being trained for इस काम . 
केंद्र of लालाराम सिन्हा said that उन्होंने had सुना था from the elders of गांव that अचार , and चटनी are made from महुआ . 
Therefore उन्होंने स्वयं first experimented this . 
After सफलता , वे is now training महिलाओं . 
Homely घरेलू महिलाएं and self help groups can adopt this as a job . 
उन्होंने said that now बाजार भी are also being तलाश for this . 
We do not पता the qualities and disadvantages of ऐसे कई औषधीय पौधे but they can जीवनरक्षक to नहीं होता , जीवनरक्षक for us . 
एक औषधीय पौधा is पिपली , which is found to be quite effective in destroying harmful fungus Candida . 
आपको should know that the candida fungus affecting most of अधिकांश लोगों affects मुंह , , neck , होंठ of होंठ and the area under the joints . 
Under the innovation project of Delhi University , शोध is being carried on प्रभाव of पौधों that निष्क्रिय candida fungus . 
मेंटर of इस शोध is Jawaharlal Nehru University 's professor तुलिका प्रसाद . 
यह शोध carried with the association of प्राणी विज्ञान डॉ . हरदीप कौर will very soon पहुंचने वाला है its last stage . 
डॉ . कौर told that the bodies of 80 फीसद of लोगों already carry candida fungus but it does not नुकसान them . 
But if the resistant प्रतिरोधी क्षमता of शरीर starts decreasing then यह becomes active and makes शरीर severely ill . 
This fungus reduces the resistant प्रतिरोधी क्षमता of शरीर in सर्जरी , , T. B. and किसी भी तरह of संक्रमण . 
इसका is more harmful for महिलाओं because महिलाओं are more prone to fungal infection . 
If anyone has the longing to तो कुछ in adverse conditions and if there is availability of तकनीक then nothing is impossible . 
Seeing चंदन and gmelina arborea trees in जमीन of रेगिस्तानी where trees could n't be seen for miles is no less than a miracle . 
एक और दुर्लभ वनस्पतियों are grown in नारायण बाग , स्थित around करीब 11 किमी दूर away from golden town and several ayurvedic herbs are also being grown there . 
नारायण बाग has been सम्मानित कई बार for cultivating दुर्लभ वनस्पतियों in extreme conditions and giving अच्छी पैदावार . 
Further , दिलीपसिंह राजावत has also been awarded as प्रगतिशील किसान भी for his qualities . 
नारायण बाग expanded in 300 बीघा will soon have a contract with काजरी साथ . 
अधिकारियों of प्रदेश कृषि विभाग दावा that despite hailstone प्रदेश will उत्पादन गेहूं than पिछले साल भी . 
In the national conference आयोजित by the Central agriculture ministry , the agricultural enterprises of मप्र have अनुमान to have उत्पादन 162 million 162 लाख टन गेहूं इस बार . 
यह is 17 million 17 लाख टन more than पिछले साल . 
Madhya Pradesh has received अवॉर्ड for रिकॉर्ड उत्पादन of पिछले साल . 
In the national conference , डॉ. डीएन शर्मा told that पिछले साल the figures of the land records of the commissioner were कह रहे थे that there will होगा 127 million 127 लाख टन उत्पादन . 
उत्पादन will पहुंच गया 145 million 145 लाख टन if फसल आई . 
इस बार कृषि विभाग is estimating to 162 लाख टन उत्पादन 162 million tonne . 
शर्मा says that there is n't going to be much changes in उत्पादन because of winters and बारिश . 
कृषि विकास दर of MP receiving Krishi Karman award might हुए छूने जा रही है , 19 प्रतिशत but ताजा रिपोर्ट of 2011-12 पेश for दूसरी बार have raised सवाल on its speed . 
योगदान of किसानों in the gross domestic product of प्रदेश has घट गया है as compared to the last seven years . 
उत्पादन भी of महत्वपूर्ण फसलों has also been recorded to be less than राष्‍ट्रीय औसत . 
सरकार claims that there has been phenomenal growth in कृषि क्षेत्र for पिछले कुछ वर्षों . 
रकबा has increased but the reduction in कृषि क्षेत्र in जीडीपी can होने a matter of चिंता for the policy makers . 
According to रिपोर्ट , योगदान of प्राथमिक क्षेत्र -LRB- प्राथमिक क्षेत्र -RRB- in जीडीपी in वर्ष था , 24.6 फीसदी which घटकर to 21.5 24.6 फीसदी in वर्ष . 
While more than 70 सत्तर प्रतिशत of प्रदेश अधिक जनता is dependent on कृषि for जीवन यापन . 
Despite this , no increase in योगदान in जीडीपी is a thinkable issue . 
For सरकार यह भी is also बात of चिंता that despite सभी प्रयासों around 64 % of करीब 64 प्रतिशत भूमि is still un-irrigated . 
Although संसाधनों have increased in पिछले वर्षों . 
आला अधिकारी भी of कृषि विभाग also स्वीकार that छोटे खेत , , निर्भरता , on बारिश , कमी , of सिंचाई सुविधाओं , कम उत्पादकता , , unavailability of कोल्ड चैन , कमी , of अच्छे बीजों and less and अनियमित बिजली have become a hindrance in प्रगति of इस क्षेत्र . 
घटा : in आकार of खेतों : आकार of खेतों in the sate has कम in an alarming way . 
The agricultural experts do not consider इसे to be अच्छा सूचक for प्रदेश . 
While आकार of औसत जोत in प्रदेश in the year 2001-01 था , 2.22 hectare , it घटकर to 2.22 हैक्टेयर in the year 2010-11 . 
According to सर्वे there are only one % मात्र एक फीसदी किसान in पूरे प्रदेश who have more than 10 जोत . 
While लगभग 72 प्रतिशत किसान have less than 2 2 हैक्टेयर farms . 
किसान : away from बिजली दूर : जानकारी has been made available in कृषि सर्वेक्षण . 
If we look at the figures of बिजली विभाग then there has been decrease in बिजली उपयोग of electricity by किसानों in comparison to the last year . 
In the year 200-6-07 there was खपत in कृषि क्षेत्र which घटकर to just 31.445 in the year 10-11 . 
There will होने कमी in कुल चीनी उत्पादन of अगले गन्‍ना सत्र beginning from अक्टूबर , , 2013 . 
The agriculture minister , sharad कृषि मंत्री शरद पवार fears that in अगले वित्त वर्ष चीनी उत्पादन might रह सकता है 240 million 240 लाख टन . 
इसका can also असर the sugar prices . 
In चालू गन्‍ना सत्र , उत्पादन 245 is अनुमान to be 245-150 million 250 लाख टन . 
In 2011-12 -LRB- October-September -RRB- चीनी उत्पादन रहा था 260 million 260 लाख टन . 
Because of the less sugarcane कम पैदावार in Maharashtra कृषि मंत्री has यह आशंका this . 
पवार कहा that this time Maharashtra , the largest sugarcane producing state in देश has not yet शुरू sowing sugarcane . 
Perpetually for दूसरे साल there has been देरी in sowing due to low rainfall . 
पेयजल has पेयजल due to the state 's फैसले to save पानी for drinking because हुई है , can create संकट for फसलों . 
In चालू सत्र , स्थिति of चीनी उत्पादन is good in other areas of देश except Maharashtra and कर्नाटक . 
Because of तब्दील of बड़ी मात्रा of sugarcane into चारे in Maharashtra , चीनी उत्पादन has suffered a setback , while स्थिति in UP is better . 
Recently , the food minister खाद्य मंत्री केवी थॉमस had अनुमान that बेहतर पैदावार will increase up to 250 million 250 लाख टन इस साल because of बेहतर पैदावार in UP . 
Initially the estimate था 245 million 245 लाख टन . 
In the first five months of चालू सत्र there has been 188 million 188 लाख टन चीनी उत्पादन while there is 188 लाख टन चीनी उत्पादन in around 50 % sugar mills . 
गेहूं for जिले will होगा ईरान निर्यात to Iran . 
Like पिछले साल , इस बर भी also एक खेप of 26 hundred गेहूं will be भेजी जाएगी to ईरान . 
यह will first go through cargo train to Andhra Pradesh and from there यह will पहुंचेगा ईरान through ship . 
अगली खेप will go from सारंगपुर . 
In इस खेप , भंडारित गेहूं from कुरावर and Nrsinhgargh will be भेजा जाएगा . 
कॉरपोरेशन , जिला मैनेजर of the MP state civil supply corporation has said that ईरान has shown खास रुचि in खरीदने होने because the quality of गेहूं has come up to अंतरराष्‍ट्रीय मानकों . 
so far , nine thousand गेहूं has been सप्लाई to ईरान from here . 
नीतियां of सरकार are making कृषि dependent on machines and genes . 
While आज there is much ज्यादा जरुरत for परंपरागत खेती in देश . 
सरकार is neither learning सबक from the farmer suicides nor including the effects of जलवायु परिवर्तन in कृषि नीतियों . 
These things were discussed in राष्‍ट्रीय सम्मेलन on ' national mission for ' सतत कृषि राष्‍ट्रीय मिशन ' विषय आयोजित in कॉन्स्टीट्‍यूशन क्लब . 
It was आयोजन by पैरवी and Oxfam India . 
Farmers , experts and policy makers from all across देश भर participated in this . 
डॉ अजय कुमार , the parliamentarian from JDF कहा that in order to विकसित कृषि there is जरुरत to revive the conventional water sources other than building small irrigation projects . 
Rajeshwari Raina -LRB- NISTEDS -RRB- कहा that rather than paying ध्यान to the agricultural situation , अधिकतम उत्पादन is being प्रोत्साहित in NMSA . 
किसानों can very soon मिल सकती है राहत from ऊंची कीमतों of urea . 
In order to keep अंकुश on कीमतों केंद्र सरकार is विचार to fix कीमतों of उर्वरकों . 
ये कीमतें will be separately तय on आधार of लागत incurred on परिवहन in हर राज्य . 
उर्वरक विभाग irritated from वृद्धि in गैर यूरिया उर्वरकों and बिल is analyzing the current dink toll policy for गैर यूरिया उर्वरकों . 
According to the sources उर्वरक विभाग had proposed सब्सिडी up to 25 फीसदी given on di ammonium phosphate , murite of म्यूरिट ऑफ पोटाश -LRB- MOP -RRB- and single superphosphate -LRB- SSP -RRB- . 
But यह प्रस्ताव was not accepted at स्तर . 
The central chemical and केंद्रीय रसायन एवं उर्वरक मंत्रालय wants to have समाधान for बिल and कीमतों . 
According to the sources , in this situation the current dink toll policy is being तैयार afresh for गैर -झौईण् यूरिया उर्वरकों . 
Under this विभाग will तय अधिकतम कीमतें for उर्वरकों . 
The fertilizer companies will not be able to sell उर्वरक on इस कीमत than this . 
Further , there is काफी अंतर in कीमत of गैर यूरिया उर्वरकों in राज्यों . 
On आधार of transportation cost , अंतर in कीमत is correct to कुछ हद but कई बार यह इससे is more than this . 
कुछ उर्वरकों have फ्रेट सब्सिडी and others don ' t . 
In such situations कीमतें of उर्वरकों are तय for हर राज्य . 
Under नई नीति the fertilizer producing companies can get up to 30 % on ऑन अकाउंट सब्सिडी भी . 
Currently the drug companies मिल जाती है up to 85 % on ऑन अकाउंट सब्सिडी . 
The fertilizer companies were provided अधिकार to तय खुदरा कीमतें of उर्वरकों in April , 2010 . 
Currently , सब्सिडी of 14,340 Rupees on डीएपी and 14,440 rupees on MOP respectively is being provided . 
विभाग has made व्यवस्था for providing 5,000 billion rupees for भुगतान of लंबित सब्सिडी on गैर यूरिया उर्वरकों . 
केंद्र सरकार is now going to get पेटेंट of किस्म of खारचिया गेहूं grown in खारची क्षेत्र of पाली जिले . 
इस किस्म with qualities of सिंचाई with खारे पानी and giving अच्छी उपज in the country & abroad is being experimented in आस्ट्रेलिया भी for जीन -झौईण् सुधार . 
Further , after मांग for इस गेहूं , खारचिया किस्म of इस गेहूं is grown . 
अनुसंधान निदेशालय भी स्थित in हरियाणा has also विकसित several elevated varieties . 
According to वैज्ञानिकों , फसल is grown in around half the agricultural land of Pali village . 
सिंचाई भी is also carried with 70 प्रतिशत तो saline खारे पानी ही . 
On an average 2-2 खारचिया गेहूं is being obtained from जिले . 
Because of अपने color and taste , from पाली यह गेहूं is पहुंच रहा है the local migrants living in foreign lands . 
रियायती खाद and उपलब्धता of बिजली at cheap rates to increase कृषि उपज at कम लागत has become दुश्मन of soil . 
Because of अंधाधुंध इस्तेमाल of रासायनिक खाद and ज्यादा दोहन of भूजल , not only the soil and हुई ही ill but हुई ही has also प्रभावित स्तर and गुणवत्ता भी of भूजल . 
योजना आयोग has आपत्ति this by दबाव कृषि मंत्रालय for making नई नीति for कमी of इस्तेमाल of रियायती रासायनिक खाद and सस्ती बिजली . 
According to एक वरिष्‍ठ अधिकारी of कृषि मंत्रालय , they are excessively used because of the subsidies obtained in खाद and बिजली in northern , southern and पश्‍चिमी राज्यों . 
उत्तर प्रदेश , and तमिलनाडु are उत्तर प्रदेश , where स्थिति has पहुंच गई है खतरनाक स्तर due to अधिक उपयोग than what is actually required . 
There is severe deficiency of पोषक तत्वों in the soil and गुणवत्ता has reduced to to the lowering of स्तर . 
अधिकारियों कहना that in order to make कृषि सरकार has not only उपलब्ध सिर्फ किसानों with रियायती खाद and बिजली but because of its cheap unavailability सिर्फ किसानों are अधिक उपयोग होने more than आवश्यकता . 
But other are also दोहन इसका in नाम of किसानों . 
Recently the union agriculture minister Sharad केंद्रीय कृषि मंत्री शरद पवार in one of एक भाषण कहा , '' we ashould think about the mediums and methods of transformation which we are rapidly adopting '' . 
दीर्घकालीन स्थिरता भी of कृषि is as important as reducing लागत . 
Further , providing सुरक्षित भोजन to आबादी should also होना चाहिए लक्ष्य . 
पवार has certainly said सही बात but with this वह then kept हीए the genetically amended food substances for वृद्धि and खाद्य सुरक्षा in उत्पादन which not only seems to be विरोधाभासी but to बहुत हद irrelevant also .
