Along with कुल 9,000 पंजीकृत कृषकों almost 42 , 000 visitors toured मेले . 
Small pieces of पौधों are काट लिए जाते हैं and those which हो चुके हों , एक साल old are called slips . 
The pieces which have roots are used for रोपाई . 
The tough wood of the stem and dry leaves are काट दिया जाता है . 
It is appropriate to इस्तेमाल clean and healthy pieces . 
The holes build in खेत should generally have slips with two roots . 
पौधा grows well in नम स्थान but यह gets harmed if पानी stays in the roots . 
खेती of सिट्रोनेला does not reduce उर्वरता of the farm but there is वृद्धि in वृद्धि of घास and तेल a little bit of खाद साथ is mixed with खाद साथ . 
Before कटाई पहले the weeds should be properly removed from खेत . 
तेल reduces if कटाई takes more than three months , कारण is that पत्तियां become partially dry . 
The leaves should be काटना चाहिए early morning . 
पौधों should n't be नहीं काटना चाहिए . 
पौधों stems should be काटना चाहिए right above बिन्दु of वृद्धि . 
पौधों should be काट देना चाहिए from beneath once in साल so that सूखी पत्तियां come out and the bushes remain at उपयुक्‍त ऊंचाई . 
The leaves are सुखा a bit to remove अतिरिक्‍त जल . 
सुखाना of the leaves निर्भर upon तीव्रता of धूप and atmospheric conditions . 
It is beneficial to keep them in shade for एक दिन . 
The leaves are सुखाया जाता है on रैक in नम मौसम so that there is no attack of किण्वन and fermentation . 
उत्पाद keeps fluctuating in प्रत्येक मौसम , Also उर्वरता , agricultural conditions and विधि play काफी भूमिका . 
मात्रा of तेल keeps decreasing depending upon उम्र of फसल in व्यावसायिक उत्पादन . 
Generally 5 वर्ष of खेती in खेत are beneficial from economic perspective . 
Further , re-transplantation is required . 
Cymbopogon martini is पौधा of bal gramini family . 
इसको is also known as घास or motiya . 
Its एक दूसरी किस्म is sokia . 
Which is also known as जिन्जर घास भी . 
तेल is even poor than motiya . 
जरीनिओल of जरीनिओल has been done and it is being soil in बाजार , therefore there is कमी in निर्यात . 
At 1924 was cultivated in पंजाब in 1924 . 
पामरोजा is घास . 
Good drainage loamy soil is required for this . 
ऐसी भूमि where there are साधन of सिंचाई and __तेब्लिन्क्__1. वर्षा is appropriate for palmarosa . 
इसकी can not नहीं होती खेती well in foggy regions . 
Being aromatic is एक अच्छा गुण of तेल . 
घटिया किस्म becomes inferior if weeds आ जाये while extracting तेल . 
Therefore इसलिए is essential to remove खरपतवारों from खेत . 
हर भाग of पौधे has तेल . 
फूल has the maximum oil content . 
The maximum oil from सबसे अधिक तेल पौधे can be extracted at the time of फूल . 
This is ठीक समय for harvesting . 
खेत gives फसल for आठ वर्ष . 
But पैदावार reduces after 4-5 पैदावार . 
पामरोजा should be सुखा for sometime after harvesting and fresh ताजा घास should be quickly distilled so that तेल अच्छी गुणवत्ता of oil persists . 
Though बासमती 1509 ' विकसित by भारतीय कृषि अनुसंधान संस्थान पूसा , , नई दिल्ली for increasing उत्पादन of बासमती चावल has not yet been जारी at राष्‍ट्रीय स्तर but wit मदद of पंजाब सरकार नई किस्म has been जारी by the organization . 
इस किस्म of चावल will होगा नाम Pusa Punjab 1509 '' . 
Has not been given दर्जा of बासमती : कृषि वैज्ञानिक are उत्साहित on its introduction into : पंजाब but they are worried because होने has not नहीं मिला है दर्जा of बासमती on technical parameters . 
Actually केंद्र सरकार gives यह दर्जा to किसी किस्म when that Basmati producer is appropriate for पैदावार is उत्पादक सभी क्षेत्रों . 
जेनेटिक्स विभाग of संस्थान has विकसित नई किस्म in the form of '' बासमती 1121 ' . 
This is किस्म of यह बासमती in देश but '' बासमती 1509 ' '' has been विकसित because of बीमारी . 
वैज्ञानिकों कहना that यह किस्म is appropriate for उत्पादक सभी क्षेत्रों but यह किस्म could not नहीं हो पाई जारी at राष्‍ट्रीय स्तर as the rice research directorate -LRB- DRR , अनुसंधान निदेशालय ( डीआरआर हैदराबाद ) -RRB- did not encourage नहीं मिलने . 
संस्थान संपर्क दिल्ली सरकार and दिल्ली सरकार at क्षेत्रीय स्तर . 
बैठक could not नहीं हो पाई , इस विषय in कृषि विभाग of दिल्ली सरकार because of which नहीं हो पाई , was released early in पंजाब . 
निदेशक of the institution Dr. H.S. Gupta कहा that किसानों are given one kilogram of पैकेट of बीज in पंजाब . 
While the head of डॉ.विनोद प्रभु said that यह किस्म will हो जाएगी तैयार 20 दिन पहले than other varieties . 
This will बचत पानी . 
And पैदावार will होगी equal to '' बासमती 1121 ' . 
चावल is better than 1121 therefore निर्यातकों संगठन भी has also accepted इसका . 
Takhana and Padhana are two small villages of करनाल जिले . 
Majority of the farmers here grow अधिकतर किसान टमाटर ही . 
They have हो चुके हैं so skilled in इस हुनर that the farmers from far-flung areas आते हैं here to सीखने . 
Not only this पैसा lenders who hesitated in giving पैसा to किसानों are now मजबूर to खरीदने माल from गांवों . 
The money lenders of यूपी also come here to खरीदते सब्जी . 
किसान of गांव do not want to indulge in the wheat-paddy cultivation because of अन्य सब्जियों other than टमाटर . 
किसान रामदास and विक्रम सिंह said that in 1986 कुछ किसानों सुना that कुछ किसानों near Jhajjar is growing tomatoes worth millions of rupees . 
When किसान went to see फार्म we also liked that idea . 
We लगा that if कोई किसान can get so much profit on an undulated ground near Jhajjar , then why ca n't we तो it ? 
And बस इसी जिद्द turned up their destiny . 
Initially they started to cultivate टमाटर on some acres of land after which they never looked back . 
मान सिंह , , Naresh Kumar , birju , Ghanshayam , Praveen , Banwari and others say that initially लोग hesitated to lend पैसा to किसान of this area but after starting खेती of टमाटर and अन्य सब्जियों जरूरत ही do not even जरूरत ही इससे पहले . 
At around two thousand acres of करीब दो हजार एकड़ जमीन of both the villages , टमाटर are cultivated साल . 
ग्रेडिंग and पैकिंग of goods begin as soon as किसान ही पहुंचते हैं मंडी in शाम with उपज . 
किसानों भी from राज्य बाहर have also शुरू holding their foot in the villages of Chattisgarh . 
किसानों of हरियाणा and पंजाब have particularly खासकर these lands for खेती . 
यह सिलसिला endlessly continues . 
At Some places they have possessed small holdings while at other places they have large holdings . 
When भास्कर investigated इसकी then he came to पता that अजीत सिंह भी , केंद्रीय नागरिक उड्‍डयन मंत्री and राष्‍ट्रीय लोकदल lokdal chief who lives in Bagpar , उत्तर प्रदेश has also bought जमीन in Berla block of बेमेतरा जिले . 
In 1990 उन्होंने bought जमीन on नाम , and again in 2006 उन्होंने bought it on बेटे जयंत सिंह नाम , . 
अजीत सिंह तो is just सिर्फ प्रतीक भर . 
Millions of सैकड़ों किसानों such as गुरनाम सिंह तरार , , करम सिंह , , Rajkumar Panghal , करम सिंह , from हरियाणा and पंजाब have bought lands here . 
Some are बेचकर पुश्‍तैनी जमीन or कुछ रकम money to खरीद रहे हैं lands at different areas of राज्य . 
Gurnam गुरनाम सिंह Tarar from Yamuna nagar , हरियाणा आए to Chattisgarh in 2006 . 
Along with भाइयों साथ उन्होंने bought 108 acres 108 एकड़ जमीन in suhaila , सुहेला bazar . 
वे is getting 600 tonnes paddy , 800 क्विंटल गेहूं and 22 thousand tonnes 22 हजार क्विंटल गन्ने पैदावार from इस जमीन . 
There is a mango orchard in 13 acres of land . 
Kurukshetra 's करम सिंह bought 42 acres of 42 एकड़ जमीन in खपराडीह and सरसेनी in the year 2000 . 
वे is cultivating गेहूं and सब्जियों with तीन भाइयों साथ . 
रिपोर्ट has दिया है a blow to केंद्र सरकार who patted its back with the growth of one and a quarter million crore rupees in कृषि ऋणों in आम बजट . 
According to सीएजी रिपोर्ट पेश in the parliament , it investigated 90,576 accounts out of the total number of accounts . 
Out of the them there were faults in 20,242 accounts . 
As per इस हिसाब one can कही जा सकती है that there were irregularities in 22.34 % matters . 
In जांच हुई नहीं थे , found that कई ऐसे किसानों who did not हकदार हुई were freed from debts while कई ऐसे किसानों did not get लाभ and बैंकों दावेदारी their claims . 
कैग has also found evidences of सबूत with documents and presenting fake documents . 
कैग has फटकार विभाग of financial services for not monitoring the debt exemption properly . 
In order to release किसानों from institutional debts सरकार had लागू कृषि ऋण माफी and ऋण राहत योजना , 2008 . 
Under this 3.69 billion small and 60 million 60 लाख अन्य किसानों were released from कर्ज worth 52,516 billion rupees . 
इस योजना played अहम भूमिका in संप्रग into power . 
Though ताजा रिपोर्ट have brought कांग्रेस in असहज स्थिति which is busy तैयारी for general elections but खेल in कृषि ऋणों has शुरू right after संप्रग came into power when कृषि ऋणों were increased and interest rates were cut . 
For उदाहरण in 2004 , agricultural loan worth 86,000 billion rupees were allocated which increased to 5,75,000 billion rupees in 2011-12 . 
For पिछले आठ वर्षों there was not only six time increase in कृषि ऋणों but कृषि ऋणों were allocated as compared to पिछले आठ वर्षों . 
81 फीसद small and सीमांत किसानों hardly got 5 % कर्ज ही . 
बड़े किसानों , , व्यापारियों and उद्योगपतियों got the rest of बाकी मलाई . 
जितना कृषि ऋण -LRB- 32,400 billion rupees -RRB- that दिल्ली and Chandigarh got in 2009-10 था even more than जितना कृषि ऋण -LRB- 31,000 billion rupees -RRB- provided to पश्‍चिम बंगाल and झारखंड . 
It was done by bringing changing in परिभाषा of ऋणों so that ऋणों given to व्यापारियों , associated with यह कृषि and concerned activities , industrialists , governmental institutions etc are also brought under the boundaries of ऋणों . 
Not only this the share of co-operative institutions which are समझा जाता है , to be the friends of किसानों in कुल कृषि ऋणों घटकर to 62 फीसद from 62 फीसद in the year 1993-94 to 2009 . 
Thus the regional rural banks started giving प्राथमिकता to benefit after reconstitution . 
The consequence was निर्भरता of बहुसंख्यक किसानों on money lenders and small loan institutions which ultimately became कारण for बहुसंख्यक किसानों आत्महत्या . 
According to राष्‍ट्रीय अपराध रिकॉर्ड ब्यूरो of crime records , 470 किसानों committed आत्महत्या during 1995-2010 . 
During April-May for नई फसल किसानों mostly जरूरत सबसे ज्यादा ऋण because जरूरत have to arrange from बीज and खाद before मानसून पहले . 
Thus as a norm during these two months of वित्त वर्ष ऋण should be allocated but the figures of नाबार्ड speak a different story . 
According to this during April , 2009 to January , कृषि क्षेत्र था , ऋण of 3 lakh crore rupees but by March , 2010 इसके directly rose from 5 lakh crore to 8 lakh crore rupees . 
And in अगले ही महीने यह again became 3 lakh crore rupees . 
चेयरमैन खुद believes that during खरीफ सीजन दौरान किसानों should लेना चाहिए , 50-60 फीसद ऋण but there is no relationship of खरीफ सीजन दौरान of फसलों between ऋण and their repayment . 
D. Subbarao , the governor of रिजर्व बैंक has स्वीकार that the agricultural loan for सब्सिडी is being इस्तेमाल in other works . 
As नतीजा despite allocating ऋण than घोषित लक्ष्य , निर्भरता of किसानों on money lenders is not कम . 
During 2000-2010 there was 755 फीसद वृद्धि in ऋणों given to कृषि क्षेत्र but during इस दौरान there was merely वृद्धि of 755 फीसद in पैदावार . 
According to रिजर्व बैंक two factors are responsible for this . 
The first is that while giving बैंक ऋण the banks देने preference to बड़े किसानों because there is not ज्यादा जोखिम with them . 
Since किसानों who ऋण मिल जाता है , ऋण merely at दर of महज 4 फीसद therefore किसानों मिल जाता है , ऋण from बड़े किसान बैंकों and देने लगे हैं them to किसानों at दर of महज 4 फीसद . 
The figures of वित्त मंत्रालय also तस्दीक इसकी . 
For उदाहरण the share of छोटे किसानों in वितरित कुल कर्ज allocated in 2007 was just महज 3.77 फीसद थी . 
During 2010-11 the loan given to कृषि क्षेत्र increased लगभग ढाई गुना and became 5,09,000 crore rupees but only 5.71 % सिर्फ 5.71 फीसद हिस्सा ही went with छोटे किसानों . 
Secondly , बैंक do not refrain from manipulating the accounts in order to reach the targets of कृषि ऋण in last two months of एक वित्त वर्ष . 
Clearly when small and सीमांत किसानों are not मिल ही कर्ज then from where does सवाल ही of माफी arise ? 
In such a situation not only in माफी ही of कर्ज but there is scam in loan allocation also before which scams like national games , 2जी स्पेक्ट्रम and coal gate seems to be small . 
Seeing पैदावार of गेहूं in रबी सीजन , सरकार is unable to सांस because of the shortage of भंडारण . 
ज्यादातर of सरकारी and personal granaries are flooded with अनाज of पिछले साल . 
सरकार can ले सकती है फैसला of निर्यात 50 lakh tonnes of 50 लाख टन गेहूं to खाली the granaries . 
मंत्रिमंडलीय समिति of cabinet ministers of financial affairs will विचार इस प्रस्ताव by खाद्य मंत्रालय on गुरुवार . 
कृषि मंत्री शरद पवार said that only few weeks are left for the arrival of नए सीजन गेहूं . 
Seeing the dearth of granaries इस is essential to लेना फैसला on this . 
पवार was talking to journalists after participating in कृषि विज्ञान मेले . 
It is not possible to भंडारण गेहूं of नई फसल unless vacating the granaries for which sufficient granaries are जरूरत . 
Seeing the dearth of दलहन and तिलहन पवार asked कृषि वैज्ञानिकों to विकसित उन्नत प्रजाति of बीजों . 
Due to कम पैदावार ही of तिलहन 50 फीसद of मांग is fulfilled with आयात . 
निर्भरता भी of दालों is also persistently बढ़ती जा रही है . 
CCEA will विचार प्रस्ताव on निर्यात of सीसीईए गेहूं . 
Further , चर्चा on अनुमति निर्यातकों भी for गेहूं will also be held in इस बैठक . 
But उन्हीं निजी व्यापारियों can मिल सकती है , अनुमति who will निर्यात गेहूं of government stocks . 
Nodal agencies like एसटीसी and PEC are also in the list of निर्यातकों . 
सरकार has already दे चुकी है अनुमति of export worth 45 लाख टन गेहूं to these agencies . 
Out of which more than 20 20 लाख टन of गेहूं has been निर्यात at हिसाब of 295-330 dollar/tonne . 
यह मूल्य for गेहूं निर्यात of wheat was decided by अंतरमंत्रालयी समिति under अध्यक्षता of commerce secretary S. R. Rao . 
हरियाणा and मध्य प्रदेश where still पुराना स्टॉक exists will be mostly सबसे अधिक राहत by सबसे अधिक राहत on इस अतिरिक्‍त मात्रा of wheat . 
On एक फरवरी of Central pool , the granaries of इन तीनों राज्यों था स्टॉक of 3.08 करोड़ टन गेहूं . 
जरूरी स्टॉक is too much as compared to 1.12 करोड़ टन . 
Because of भारी वृद्धि in पैदावार and सरकारी खरीद स्टॉक of गेहूं has greatly भारी वृद्धि . 
लक्ष्य of शुरू from अप्रैल has been निर्धारित . 
During 2011-12 पैदावार of गेहूं was 9.48 करोड़ टन . 
उपज of गेहूं in चालू सीजन is believed to होने 9.23 करोड़ टन . 
यूकेलिप्टस is एक शोभाकारी वृक्ष with छाल , , circular stem , extended branches and crown of leaves . 
इसकी was founded by जोसेफ चैक्स in 1770 which was received from पूर्वी तट of आस्ट्रेलिया during the first brave यात्रा दौरान of Captain James in प्रथम साहसिक प्रशान्त महासागर . 
इसे was यूकेलिप्टस नाम Eucalyptus in 1770 by the French botany . 
Its two words '' दो शब्दों " यू " अर्थात well and '' calyptus '' means which covers which is '' lid of well '' . 
विशेषता is that while फूल एक टोपी like संरचना is built on the buds . 
Though अनेक महत्वपूर्ण जातियां originates from आस्ट्रेलिया but many of अनेक महत्वपूर्ण जातियां have been brought in tropical and समशीतोष्ण देशों . 
Some of these species yield best quality of wood and some other varieties are इस्तेमाल in the preparation of औद्योगिक औषधि and सुगंधि उद्योग for तेल निर्माण best quality oil . 
इस्तेमाल of यूकेलिप्टस in उद्योग was done after आविष्कार of तेल -LRB- 1882 -RRB- . 
वृक्षों are called colossal or mallige as per प्रकृति and आकार of वृक्षों . 
जातियां such as U. K. ranges are world wide popular for tough wood . 
सिट्रिमोडोरा is a long and straight growing long दीर्घकाल वृक्ष which is 20 met high . 
Later होती हैं grows कोमल पत्तियां which are ornamental . 
As compared to अन्य फसलों , climatic conditions play महत्वपूर्ण भूमिका in तैयार पौध by उपयोगी वृक्षारोपण from economic point of view . 
तदस्थ उपयुक्‍त आर्द्रता along with मध्यम वर्गीय वायु मंडलीय तापमान is good for its initial growth . 
बीजों do not sprout until तापक्रम is not appropriate that is not much , nor too less . 
सबसे अच्छा अंकुरण takes place during फरवरी मध्य till अप्रैल and the other is during नवम्बर मध्य when तापक्रम is between 15-30 degree C . 
नम जलवायु भी during July-September is also not good for अंकुरों because दर increases due to आक्रमण of अनेक प्रकार and तेज बारिश भी also harm छोटे पौधों . 
वृद्धि becomes moderate at less than 15 degree c and proportionately at zero degree पौधे मर जाते हैं . 
पौधे are very sensitive towards chilling weather and पौधे . 
If ऊंचाई of पौध is increased then the ability of tropical structures to resist force decreases . 
Therefore in order to get अच्छे परिणाम the basic seeds should be properly monitored as per height while sowing during transplantation . 
अम्लीय or saline soil which has कुछ कार्बनिक पदार्थ is good for this . 
Submerged and wet soil is not good for this , transplantation should not take place here . 
Extremely dense humus rich soil is not essential for पौधशालाओं but while transplantation humus rich soil is extremely essential . 
जमीन should be tilled twice-thrice and पटेला should be properly run . 
तहदार खेती should be properly tilled and सिंचाई after putting उर्वरक . 
If possible a handful of गोबर खाद should हो सके डाल देनी चाहिए in every pit before रोपाई पहले . 
बीज are very small and बीज माप एक ग्राम . 
Only thick and healthy बीजों ही should be sown , बीजों ही should be फेंक . 
According to तापमान and आर्द्रता ही बीज begin to sprout within 14 दिनों अंदर . 
पौधशाला should be तैयार with उद्देश्य of व्यावसायिक खेती or it is appropriate to प्रचारण plant by directly फसल बीज in उपयुक्‍त मौसम . 
पौधशाला should be स्थापित in high beds . 
Permeable sandy soil is best for मिट्‍टी पौधशाला while smooth and wet soil should not होती है used for this purpose . 
While sowing one should जायें careful that बीज are not sown more than 1 cm . 
deep and at an improper place . 
The plants can be grown directly in the bags . 
In every bag around 10 seeds are sown and are mixed into the soil and irrigated . 
The plants thus grown are made light for 2-6 months according to the height . 
This method is more convenient and useful than the conventional method . 
The benefit is that the double expenditure on preparing the nursery in farms and then transferring them into the farms is saved . 
Further the risk of plant death in bags is also not there . 
After 2-6 months , seeing इस अवस्था , when the plants grown in bags become 30 cm long are best for रोपाई . 
Cracks should न जायें made in poly bags during this period or इसमें should न जायें completely removed and then the sprouts should न जायें used for transplantation with mud balls . 
One should not tamper the roots that they become too small and deep pits should be dug for this purpose . 
It should हो सकती है filled with soil all around and properly सिंचाई . 
Delay in irrigation can lead to obstacle in growth and can reduce the condiment herb . 
August-September is not good for transplantation in regions with extremely cold condition . 
Once when the plants survive then they have the capacity to tolerate any kind of adverse condition in the coming seasons and are also able to tolerate the losses happening in winter . 
Satisfying figures of a specific variety of नाइट्रोजनयुक्‍त खाद for Eucalyptus clan or U. Citriodora species have yet not been available . 
While manures with nitrogen have proved to be helpful in वृद्धि where remarkable growth in per unit area in मात्रा has been seen . 
While there is no direct relationship between fertilizer नियमित प्रयोग in leaves and growth in oil quantity . 
No consent is given for its regular use until there is specific scarcity of these elements in the soil . 
It should हुआ करते हैं kept in mind that there is adequate amount of oil in crop leaves and the weather should also हुआ करते हैं desirable . 
Cloudy and rainy days are inappropriate for पहली कटाई . 
6-8 months old plants should हो जाती है taken for first trimming . 
Although in this situation there is relative reduction in the amount of oil but frequent trimming can वृद्धि वृद्धि of leaves . 
The number of branches also increase which leads to incessant growth in production and this sequence continues in 3 year old plants . 
First trimming should be 30-45 above ground and again it should be cut 75-90 cm above ground . 
Generally three crops are taken from the plants so that more oil is obtained . 
This condition is best during mid February , mid March , mid July and then at the end of October and beginning of November . 
It gives an interval of four months for the arrival of new leaves . 
After two years only one plant should हुआ करती हैं allowed to remain in every pit so that new branches and saplings get appropriate nutrition and place while growing . 
Thin leaves are appropriate for आसवन . 
The herb should be passed through distillation process as soon as possible . 
Leaves get dry while storing or gets rotten because of reversing . 
It reduces the oil extraction capacity . 
One can not suggest from economic point of view that leaves should होता है kept away from branches . 
The leaves and soft stems should be in the proportion of 7:3 . 
बूटी obtained from irrigated area yields an average of तेल while तेल obtained from non-irrigated area is 150 l. Apart from oil one hectare of plant yields 11 tonnes of dry wood which is used in paper industry and न हो also gives fuel . 
उसे should be carefully noted that immediately after harvesting the herb should be distilled so that there is no fear of oil evaporation and no qualitative loss during storage . 
Oil floats on water after condensation and इसकी can easily be separated from water . 
Although Australia has quite good knowledge about multiple Eucalyptus diseases but there is not a serious problem in India yet . 
At some places there is fury of termites . 
If the land becomes dry for a longer period then the termite eats the roots and stem bark because of which the plants dies soon . 
Crawling caterpillar eats the leaves of U. Citriodora . 
In order to get rid of them from time B.H.C should be regularly sprinkled . 
रोग also harm Eucalyptus . 
The disease increases also because of the excess humus containing capacity of the land and in a single night the entire nursery becomes disease prone . 
Cole tritium species also attack the leaves . 
Apart from the above mentioned diseases some viral diseases reduce the size of पत्तियां which is known as filodi . 
In this the leaves become light red or yellow and other patches arise . 
The plants that show signs should be immediately pluck and destroyed . 
तेल obtained from them give the fragrance of camphor , peppermint , rose or lemon . 
The oil is used in medicinal industries such as - anti-contagious , hygiene factor and fragrance industry etc. . 
Its increasing demand depends on the active element citronella present in होता है . 
The major factor of जितना अधिक सिट्रोनेल तेल is in fact citronella . 
The price of तेल will depend on the amount of citronella found in इसका . 
तेल is color less and sweet in taste . 
तेल is mainly used in industries and hydroxy citronyl and menthol are prepared from this only . 
The fragrance of insecticide and living factor elements can be increased by mixing a little amount of सिट्रोनेला तेल in it . 
इसका is an effective substitute and supplement of Java citronella oil . 
It is इस्तेमाल in soap industry and in the preparation of cosmetics , The wood of यू.सिट्रिओडोरा is इस्तेमाल in making houses and in mines . 
इसको is also इस्तेमाल in paper कागज निर्माण उद्योग भी . 
Erbal Moskam Maskotsalin is पौधा of '' malvesi '' species similar to lady 's finger . 
बीजों are generally कहा जाता है ambrit '' seeds . 
बीजों smell like कस्तूरी . 
बीजों खोल yield extremely valuable तेल . 
तेल is कहा जाता है तेल or तेल which is उपयोग in इत्र and सुवासित तम्बाकू . 
यह बीज is extremely useful and there is बहुत मांग for them in विदेशी बाज़ारों . 
बीजों have रेचक and transpiration values . 
During खुजली and snake bite लेप is mixed with दूध and rubbed at the affected area . 
National राष्‍ट्रीय वनस्पति garden , उद्यान लखनऊ has विकास एक नई प्रक्रिया to अलग aromatic elements from बीजों . 
During इस प्रक्रिया महीन चूर्ण of बीजों are extracted with शीतल अल्कोहल साथ . 
परकोलेटर of percolator 's battery yield '' concentrated alcohol '' . 
इसे is cooled and aqueous जलीय अल्कोहलीय अंश is अलग from ईथर . 
इस अंश when धोने with dilute alkali yields perfumed absolute . 
Later विलायक is separated . 
क्रिया separates the sterile भाग from the absolute . 
In भारत इस बीज is not खेती at large scale . 
Yet कुछ मात्रा of बीज is received from north , north-east and middle मध्य भारत . 
Extreme chilly weather is most harmful for this therefore खेती is वर्जित in क्षेत्रों during winter . 
Around 1200-1400 वर्षा is appropriate for मिली . 
यह पौधा grows well in loamy fertile उपजाऊ भूमि . 
पानी should not stand in भूमि and निकास should होना चाहिए proper . 
15 जून to 15 जुलाई is सबसे अच्छा समय to sow बीजों , though इनके can be grown in गर्मी or बरसात season .

Humulus Lupuluslin is पौधा of '' moresi '' species . 
Which is commonly known as हॉप्स . 
पौधा is valuable for its inflorescence . 
पुष्पक्रम are उपयोग in bringing विशिष्‍ट गंध and तीक्ष्ण स्वाद in liquor , making edible items tasty and keeping them safe for longer duration . 
These specific characteristics found in पुष्पक्रम are because of रसायनों of lupulin glands present in their cones . 
यही भाग of पुष्पक्रम are considered to be hypnotic , nutritive and comfortable . 
Currently हॉप्स are खेती in around 20 लगभग 20 देशों from commercial point of view . 
During पांचवें दशक of 20th Century there were around 6 liquor producing mills in भारत . 
The hops requirements of these mills is पूरी by importing them . 
आवश्यकता and खपत of हॉप्स in भारत is perpetually बढ़ती जा रही है because विकास of मदिरा उद्योग is sweepingly increasing . 
Around more than 70 व्यापारियों have been provided license for the manufacture of liquor .

The trimming of हॉप्स are essential . 
The trimming begins during बसन्त ऋतु . 
The trimming is done using sharp knife . 
Weeding should be done after trimming . 
One should समझ that हो जाएं is समय to pluck when फूल हो जाएं light yellow-green and crisp , and easy to pluck .

Delay in plucking make फूल more crisp .

1.6 प्रतिशत of तेल is तेल as per the quality of आसुत फलों . 
तेल तेल from कच्चे हरे फलों is of घटिया किस्म and तेल of fresh ripe कच्चे हरे फलों becomes एक तरह of raisin . 
भाग of व्यापारिक तेल is received as a byproduct of एल्कोहली आसवन . 
इसमें do not have natural oxygenated smelling compounds . 
जूनिपर तेल is रंगहीन or yellow-green liquid . 
Which has लाक्षणिक फल गंध and स्वाद .

परिशोधित तेल has high quality flavor .

लैवेन्डर is एक बहुमूल्य तेल and नहीं होता था was not yet पैदा in भारत . 
Therefore इसलिए was imported from abroad for प्रयोग in व्यवसाय . 
लैवन्डुला is पौधा and हो grows on उन्हीं स्थानों which are cool and where the climate is cool even during गर्मियों भी . 
Its roots are quite deep . 
Therefore इसलिए can even grow on sloping hills . 
लैवेन्डर grows well in कश्मीर . 
इसको needs light loamy sandy soil rich in calcium . 
लैवेन्डर is प्रसारण in three ways . 
From बीजों , , stems and by separating the roots of पौधों . 
उपज of उपज and पौधे deteriorates . 
Therefore इसलिए is essential that पौधों are again revived . 
Doing this is easy during November-February when पौधे are dormant . 
During इस समय पौधों should be छांट at ऊंचाई of 4-5 c.m above the ground and उर्वरक should be properly provided so that पौधों grow quickly and देना चाहिए अच्छी उपज . 
पौधे grow soon in lower warm valleys . 
Harvesting should be done when 75-90 % of 75-90 प्रतिशत फूल appear . 
Harvesting should not be done during कटाई कोहरा and वर्षा , it should be done in सूखे मौसम . 
12-14 c.m long stems with flowers should be काटी जाती हैं . 
The branches do not have तेल , only flowers have तेल . 
मात्रा and quality of तेल in लैवेन्डर depends on fertility of कटाई भंडारण आदि at proper time etc. . 
The oil is extracted from fresh flowers through vaporization .

Fresh flowers give 0.7-0 .9 % of तेल .

यह पौधा can be properly grown at ऊंचाई of 200-700 metre . 
It can बर्दाश्त extremely cool weather . 
इसे can हो , grown properly in smooth and loamy soil which has मात्रा of जैविक खाद .
