इससे proves that कि is useful for alkaline soil . 
बीज can be directly sown into खेत . 
For this इसके is essential for खेत to होनी चाहिए extremely moist . 
After properly साफ the roots of फसलों , खेत should be properly tilled . 
If there is नमी in the farm them they should हो planted . 
After दो वर्षों to परीक्षणों हुआ has been सिद्ध that पैदावार increases with मात्रा of nitrogen and नाइट्रोजन -झौईण् फास्फोरस . 
Hence रासायनिक खाद should also be प्रयोग भी . 
यह भी is also देखा गया है that मात्रा भी of चयमाजेलिन increases in तेल . 
फसल चक्र is essential for अधिक उपज of किसी फसल . 
पौधों start फूल from the second week of मार्च . 
इनको is good to देर its plucking in the first week so that during harvesting there is abundance of complete flowers . 
इसके always have buds and पूर्ण फूल therefore while plucking पूर्ण फूल should होता है plucked . 
अधिक फूल are obtained during second and third spring . 
एक मनुष्य can प्रतिदिन pluck up to लगभग 3-8 किलो फूल . 
फूल are obtained from 1 hectare area . 
There is 0.8 प्रतिशत moisture in the flowers and 0.8 प्रतिशत तेल is तेल . 
The amount of तेल decreases if the flowers are not न सुखाया जाए properly after plucking . 
Thus the flowers should be spread and सुखाना चाहिए in plain and clean surface in layers in shade . 
The flowers should be never नहीं सुखाना चाहिए in अधिक गर्मी . 
The flowers in लखनऊ catches insect during वर्षा -झौईण् ऋतु which eats and harms the flowers . 
After the last plucking of flowers पौधों should be allowed to stand in खेत for बीज and care of पौधों should be taken . 
All the flowers should be plucked and सुखा when the flowers become yellow . 
Mentha orvensis is पौधा of '' leviati '' species which is of जापानी मूल . 
In भारत सर्वप्रथम इसे was first planted in Jammu & Kashmir in 1952 and सर्वप्रथम इसे completely आत्मसात in जलवायु . 
Nowadays हो गया है has हो गया है पौधा of आर्थिक महत्व in यह अनेक राज्यों . 
जापानी पुदीने can be easily identified because of इन लक्षणों . 
यह is a creeper which grows through roots on पर्वसंधियों in the earth on the ground . 
There are white patches on stems , leaves and corolla . 
पत्तियां are like spears whose other side is triangular teeth shaped . 
मेन्था grows well in जलवायु . 
उष्ण कटिबंधीय क्षेत्र are considered best for its cultivation . 
फसल grows well in क्षेत्रों but वर्षा is beneficial during कटाई . 
फसल is grown through best method of vegetative propagation . 
It gets accomplished by underground runners . 
इन्हें should हो chosen from स्वस्थ पौधों which are free from गेरुई रोग . 
If हो is essential to keep the saplings for कुछ समय then they should हो kept in भूस्तरियों and properly ढक with soil . 
इससे keeps रोपण सामग्री in अच्छी अवस्था . 
पौधों can also be grown through रोपाई भी . 
इन्हें are grown in nursery beds . 
पौधे should हो sown in only those beds which have fresh , fertile soil full of कार्बनिक पदार्थ . 
In north बुआई is done during January-February . 
भूस्तारियों should be kept together or their heads should be attached with each other and ढक with soil . 
भूस्तारियों can be फैलाया जा सकता है more with सहायता of नए पौधों arising out of underground sack saplings sown in खेत . 
Now farmers love to sow किसान रोपाई ही किसान रोपाई ही . 
मेंथा can also be रोपा जा सकता है after कटाई बाद भी of गेहूं or आलू . 
फसल gives more and good उत्तम उपज for अगले वर्ष रोपाई . 
इसे needs काफी सिंचाई . 
There is आवश्यकता for सिंचाई in वर्षा if there are वर्षा . 
The flower quality is good and फसल भी also grows well if सिंचाई is done right after plantation and कटाई ठीक बाद . 
For अधिक लाभ from economic point of view , weeding and deep गहरी जुताई using हल should be done during last week of अप्रैल . 
Special care should होती है , taken while कटाई because of कटाई leads to कमी in मात्रा of तेल . 
संख्या of प्रति वर्ष कटाई every year according to जलवायु should होती है 2-3 . 
यही समय when पौधा is densely फैला हुआ हो is good for घोल and मात्रा of तेल , Harvesting should होता है , done during यही समय . 
If कटाई is done on time then मात्रा of मेंथाल decreases and if there is देर in कटाई then also the मात्रा of तेल decreases due to drying of leaves . 
During आरम्भ of संक्रमण , dead patches appear on underground saplings which later होते हैं भूरे and finally lead to rotting . 
The leaves turn yellow and later get destroyed by drying . 
संक्रमित पौधे should be removed from roots and destroyed . 
सामग्री should not be नहीं लेनी चाहिए from संक्रमित खेत . 
पौधे should be planted at the lines in order to रोकने water logging . 
उपयुक्‍त पौध to be रोपण should be chemically sterilized . 
पूर्ण रोकथाम has not been identified yet . 
खुआ रोग : - : यह occurs due to फफूंद नामक yaksinia menthipers . 
The first symptom of रोग occurs during spring which shows stem swelling , curling , drying of leaves etc. . 
जीवाणु make brown round patches on the leaves of पौधों . 
यूरेडिया पत्ती curl and turn yellow when uradia is present on यूरेडिया पत्ती and later fall turning brown . 
Uradia leads to tilia during आरम्भ of autumn or winter . 
उकठा रोग : - बीमारी : उकठा रोग : - बीमारी generally begins during गर्मियों . 
संक्रमण continuously spreads from एक पौधे to another and from एक खेत to another . 
यह रोग spreads during जल and infected underground saplings during plantation . 
फसल -झौईण् चक्र does not कोई असर इस because fungus remains inside the ground for वर्षों . 
दीमक आक्रमण पौधों when खेत is not moist . 
आक्रमण increases with छिटपुट सिंचाई . 
Caterpillar eating leaves and insect curling leaves -LRB- singaemia akerfatsil -RRB- harms एकरफैटसिल ) पुदीने . 
Recently खोज have been made in इस दिशा under which anti weeds chemicals are इस्तेमाल but सही उपाय is चक्र . 
आलू or फसल बाद should be sown after पुदीने during August-September . 
यह फसल ripens during मार्च . 
Then after मक्का is sown , यह gets ready in three months and then paddy is sown . 
यह is काट लिया जाता है during नवम्बर so that पुदीना should be grown again in जनवरी . 
लाभ can be increased more by आलू after कटाई बाद of पुदीने . 
किसानों get लाभ तो by खेती but लाभ तो can हो सकता है more by growing new varieties . 
Shivalik : This is पौधा and has so much of काफी अधिक तेल and menthol . 
Himalaya : This is नवीनतम विकसित जाति है of menthol . 
The cleansing point -LRB- CP -RRB- and मात्रा of मेंथाल found in तेल determine मूल्य of मेंथाल . 
As a result of वृद्धि in तेल and उत्पादन of मेंथा during पिछले दशक , not आंतरिक मांग were met but भारत also started निर्यात भी हुई . 
Thus मेंथाल उत्पादकों of भारत have occupied around 40 % बाजार in 1992-93 as compared to चीन which has now increased to 80 % . 
क्रिस्टल of grains are made out of तेल after आसवन which has अच्छी मांग in both national and दोनों बाजारों . 
These grains are of दो प्रकार - '' plaque '' and '' ' बोल्ड ' '' . 
Bold grains are more significant in terms of स्वाद and fragrance . 
The left over mentholized oil after separating the menthol grains is either बेचा जा सकता है as it is in बाजार or अन्य पदार्थ like मेंथान and liquid are made from them . 
Currently केवल दो राज्यों - उत्तर प्रदेश and पंजाब are growing मेंथा at large scale . 
For पिछले 25-30 साल उत्तर प्रदेश लगभग has been successfully doing menthol farming . 
क्षेत्र where मेंथा is cultivated fall under ज्यादातर उपोष्ण जलवायु . 
There are कई राज्य of भारत where उपोष्ण जलवायु is available such as हरियाणा and पंजाब . 
मेंथा can be successfully खेती on आधार of मृदा and climatic conditions and उपलब्धता . 
तुम know that while cultivating the first thing that should be looked upon is the land type and सुधार . 
The land where खेती is carried is of सात तरह होती है . 
जिस भूमि : जिस भूमि where 3 भाग रेत and other elements are in the ratio 3:4 or जिस भूमि which has चौथे भाग of जिस भूमि is called जिस भूमि . 
चिकनी भूमि भी : इसे is also called चिकनी भूमि भी . 
जिस भूमि which has तीन भाग of जिस भूमि and तीन भाग of other elements is called जिस भूमि or जिस भूमि . 
Loamy : - जिस भूमि which has आधी of आधी रेत and more than half जिस भूमि is called जिस भूमि . 
Sandy Loamy - जिस भूमि which has more than half of रेत and 20-40 / hundred portion of जिस भूमि is called जिस भूमि . 
जिस भूमि - जिस भूमि which has 85-95 / जिस भूमि and rest of the elements are बाकी रेत is called मटियार डाकर or जिस भूमि . 
Barren - भूमि which is never tilled and sown is called barren . 
Such land is very dry . 
यह भी can also हो सकती है used for खेती if काम is done . 
इसको are also known as Padti kadeem . 
Sterile - Nothing can नहीं हो सकती grown in इस भूमि . 
इस contain more of alkaline . 
Generally not even grass can grow in this land . 
This land can also हो सकती है fit for खेती if hard work is done . 
खाद is really खाद . 
The effects are amazing . 
It makes barren lands , fertile and cultivable . 
It completely removes वृक्षों and shrubs . 
आपने must have देखा होगा that फसल , of गाँव आसपास where people मनुष्य मलमूत्र is always green . 
वह gives more अधिक उपज compared to far flung खेतों . 
चीन is the first to सबसे आगे forward in this concern . 
प्रो0 किंग of अमेरिका has लिखा है एक महत्त्वपूर्ण ग्रन्थ नामक किसान ) of छेन्टुरिएस् " ( चालीस शताब्दियों '' . 
यह has वहाँ that despite निरन्तर खेती for गत 4000 वर्षों the fertility of the soil is still intact there . 
कारण is that देश does n't wastes even a handful of excreta . 
The toilet excreta is बेचा जाता है through contract in शहरों . 
Then खाद is made out of them and then they are provided to किसानों . 
किसान उपयोग them in खेतों . 
Therefore अवस्था of खेती in चीन is better than सब देशों of संसार . 
बेल्जियम and फ्रांस have समझा है महत्व of excreta and खाद much before . 
In order to remove the bad smell from them in फ्रांस either कोयले ash or sulfuric acid is added . 
Later it is सुखा in गर्मी and then used as खाद . 
इग्लैंण्ड भी and खाद is even उपयोग in England . 
There the excreta and पेशाब is सुखा and in order to remove the bad smell गुआनो called guano is डाल in it and then the manure mixture is उपयोग . 
India has around 32 crore villages . 
On एक मनुष्य औसतन a person everyday consumes 1.5 or 2 ratal grains . 
As per इस हिसाब around 60-62 crore ratal grains in एक दिन is 62 करोड़ रतल अनाज खर्च from entire India . 
If the rate of इस अनाज is at least counted as 20 20 सेर गिना then हर साल the entire India requires इस अनाज worth Rupees1 ,80,0000000 . 
Further a lot of grains of India is also sent to abroad . 
This is o कहने that if we तो भी गिनती अनाज that is exported then प्रति साल we get अनाज worth 1,80,0000000 rupees . 
Excreta and पेशाब is produced from अंश of अनाज consumed . 
If we तो न फेंक कर this excreta and पेशाब इधर -झौईण् उधर and उपयोग them as manure then we can उस छीजन , the health of the farm which is lost by excessive cultivation . 
It is कहा जाता है that the fertility of Indian land is day by day decreasing . 
कारण is that we ले तो so many things from the land but we do not supply them with खुराक . 
India has संख्या of Neem trees . 
छोटे छोटे फल that नीम bears are known as nimboli in मालवा and Rajputana . 
Oil is तेल from इन्हीं फलों and the remaining oil cakes are used as खाद . 
खेत insects either soon get उपयोगिता because of इस खाद or run away . 
On an average of 10-20 tonnes of fruits are used . 
Crops like potatoes etc. are benefited by खाद of this oilcake . 
The oil cake of linseed is of खली दो प्रकार होती है . 
on one side कड़ा हिस्सा of बिनौल is attached and on the other यह is separated . 
The first one has less but the other one has more useful elements . 
इस खली has more of अंश . 
खली is more nutritious than खली . 
इस has around लगभग सात फीसदी नाइट्रोजन . 
The bad oil cakes are प्रयोग as खाद . 
Otherwise they are more beneficial in feeding cattle than using them as manure . 
There are several ways of providing हरी खाद . 
Crops such as san , जंगली नीम , , horse gram , antelope etc. are sown in खेत and when they start फूल , they are tilled . 
For हरी खाद फसल is harvested and their heaps are kept and then मिश्रण of excreta and urine is put and then ढक देते हैं with दो इंच thick layer of soil . 
वह gets rotten and turns into खाद within two weeks and then खाद is फैलाकर and allowed to cool . 
यह खाद is फैला दिया जाता है in खेत . 
फलीदार पौधों like dhecha san , wild neem etc , sown in दूसरे खेतों are removed and planted during rainy season and they are mixed into the soil by tilling if they get rotten . 
The crop sown in खेत are काटकर and planted and they are mixed into the soil if they get rotten . 
खाद is not found at सब स्थानों . 
A lot many fishes get बह जाती हैं away during floods and the dead remains of the fishes are seen at the river sides . 
Majority of the fishes are dead among them . 
The dead fishes are dried and powdered and they are डाल कर on to the roots of trees and ढक with soil if required . 
The production and quality of फलों increases due to खाद . 
फल वृक्षों of mango , orange etc. bear फल if खाद is put . 
खाद is priceless for वृक्षों growing in orchards . 
But हिन्दू would not like to kill any living being for any interest . 
खाद is very useful . 
But it is unfortunate that million tonnes of bones used for this purpose are भेज abroad . 
Small pieces of bones are डाल देते हैं inside plant roots . 
Nepalese डालते very small pieces of bones into the beds of फलदार वृक्षों and they say that फलदार वृक्षों then give very sweet फल . 
कई कृषि विद्याविशारदों have known through अनुभव that खाद makes फल sweet , the number of फल increase , they ripe early and फसल is बचती है from insects in आरम्भ . 
But the tradition of putting bone pieces is not good . 
Hence agricultural scholars तैयार खाद in three ways . 
The first is चूर्ण ( -LRB- bone meal or चूर्ण ( -RRB- . 
The second is burnt चूर्ण or राख -LRB- Bone black -RRB- . 
The third is bones boiled in acid which is also known as ' super phosphate of lime ' . 
प्रोफेसर बुटनी has लिखा है एक महत्वपूर्ण ग्रन्थ नामक उपयोग " of पदार्थों ' . 
In this book उसमें has वर्णन कीमत of पदार्थों that are washed in drains of सभी प्रमुख शहरों of संसार . 
उसमें also has वर्णन of दिल्ली भी . 
He writes - The amount of इतना नाइट्रोजन received from the dirty and useless पदार्थ flowing in the drains of इस शहर with a population of 282000 is so much that हो सकता है can give manure to a minimum of अधिक 15000 एकड़ जमीन and अधिक of अधिक 15000 एकड़ जमीन . 
As per इस अनुमान उपयोग of पदार्थों can be easily calculated and विचारवान can कल्पना loss worth how many सम्पति यह देश यो ही faces प्रति वर्ष . 
चूना भी is also an extremely significant अत्यन्त महत्त्वपूर्ण खाद . 
Contemplating प्राचीन यूरोपीय साहित्य of ancient Europe reveals that प्राचीन रोमन लोग of ancient Rome considered खाद essential for अच्छी उपज . 
It softens भूमि and makes sandy and भूमि smooth . 
It cleans the pores of soil and energizes पौधों . 
India leads गेहूँ producing देशों of संसार . 
Except United संयुक्‍त प्रदेश of अमेरिका and भारतवर्ष ही produces highest wheat in दुनिया . 
During ब्रिटिश -झौईण् भारत , गेहूँ was produced in 2 , 50 , 2 करोड़ पचास लाख एकड़ भूमि . 
But इस बात is that for गत बीस वर्षों in भारत there has been कोई वृद्धि in गेहूँ and विशेष अन्तर in पैदावार ही . 
There has been आश्‍चर्यजनक वृद्धि in उपज of गेहूँ in अन्य सभ्य देशों of संसार due to पद्धतियों . 
Countries like America , Canada , Australia produce thrice the amount of जितने गेहूँ that किसान of भारतवर्ष produce in one acre . 
The population of भारतवर्ष is बढ़ती जा रही है rapidly and therefore समस्या is also getting more complex . 
In such a situation हो गया है has हो गया है essential to वृद्धि उपज of अनाज like गेहूँ . 
Further , गेहूँ is being used more after world war . 
इससे has increased खपत of गेहूँ in देश . 
That is why कितने ही व्यापारियों exporting माल to abroad say that very soon समय will आ भारतवासी will not only हो जायेगें insufficient in exporting माल to abroad but they will also require to खरीदने गेहूँ for themselves from abroad . 
Agricultural scholars say that if गेहूँ is खेती in भारतवर्ष at large scale then उपज can इतनी वृद्धि so much that हो सकती है can very easily fulfill आवश्यकताओं . 
कारण for कमी of इस पदार्थ in भारत is that खेती is done using ढंग . 
Further किसानों have खेत here because of which किसानों have to bear खर्च तो and पैदावार is also low . 
Therefore किसानों here should cultivate on आधार of पद्धतियों using Chakbandi so that there is कम से कम खर्च and उपज . 
It has been देखा गया है that the places where खेती is done using पद्धति has वहाँ अच्छी वृद्धि in उपज . 
Farming was done using पद्धति in shahjahanpur , as नतीजा there was वृद्धि in पैदावार . 
कई प्रयोग कई प्रयोग done even in कृषि -झौईण् क्षेत्र भी of नागपुर . 
During 1883-84 an agricultural scholar नामक M. Fuler शुरू exploring facts regarding खादों used in wheat cultivation . 
For पहले दो वर्षों there were some divine incidents because of which no results of अन्वेषण was visible . 
During 1885-86 there was कमी of वर्षा while गेहूँ and during दिसम्बर there were वर्षा than आवश्यकता and cool breeze also prevailed . 
इससे गेरुआ to रोग on फसल of सरकारी फार्म . 
It should be kept in ध्यान that यह रोग was seen more on उन स्थानों where कृत्रिम खाद was provided . 
On दूसरे साल there was अधिक वर्षा during फसल and because of this सारा खाद डाला हुआ in खेत got बह गया away . 
Therefore कोई असर of उस खाद was seen . 
Later प्रयोग प्रयोग carried on for कई वर्षों . 
From पिछले प्रयोगों done in नागपुर यह बात is clear that नाइट्रोजन is एक आवश्यक पदार्थ for खेती of गेहूँ . 
Because of नाइट्रोजन युक्‍त खाद they showed good results . 
Because of आबपाशी of खाद and irrigation there was और भी अधिक वृद्धि in पैदावार of गेहूँ . 
On खेती of डुमरांव प्रयोग क्षेत्र , बिहार , प्रयोग with shora , sowdung and अन्य खादों प्रयोग carried . 
As परिणामों of all these experiments , उन खादों डाला , positive impact on the growth of फसल which has more of nitrogen element . 
With आबपाशी of नाइट्रोजन युक्‍त खाद and irrigation there was highest crop production . 
हरी खाद उस समय good profit when there were अच्छी वर्षा during sowing . 
Amongst मसालों , हल्दी is Indian asset and इसे is known as मल्लिका of मसालों because इसे is golden in रंग . 
हल्दी provides आकर्षक रंग to चटनी and other food items . 
फीकी and सब्जी look bad without turmeric . 
भारत alone produces around 10 % of कुल हल्दी उत्पादन of the world and in भारत हल्दी is कुल हल्दी उत्पादन in बिहार , , Orissa , आन्ध्र प्रदेश , , Maharashtra , आन्ध्र प्रदेश , and आन्ध्र प्रदेश , . 
In बिहार हल्दी is cultivated in वैशाली and Patna while in Uttar Pradesh होती है is खेती in districts of Devaria , Siddharth Nagar , Gonda , Barabanki , Bahraich , Pilibheet etc. but किसान grow indigenous varieties उत्पादकता is low . 
Thus यह takes अवधि of दो फसल . 
दर of बीज is 20-25 tonnes per 20-25 क्विंटल प्रति हेक्टर which is very expensive . 
If किसी किसान पास does not तो बीज then उसे has to अधिक खर्च more on बीज . 
Rhizome , leaf spot and रोग of हल्दी are quite harmful which reduces उत्पादकता of हल्दी . 
इसकी has गहरा प्रभाव on उपज of हल्दी during बुआई . 
From अनुसंधान carried in Rajendra agricultural University हुए has been found that turmeric should हुए sown between हल्दी 15 मई to 1st 1 जून . 
For अच्छी उपज वीज प्रकन्द should be sown at दूरी of 20 c.m and they should be 5 c.m deep . 
दूरी between rows should be of 30 c.m. . 
Covering : Right after झपनी : - बोआई बाद खेत should be ढक with green leaves of rosewood . 
The green leaves should be डाली जानी चाहिए at दर of 12-15 tonnes/hectare . 
From अनुसंधान carried in Rajendra agricultural University हुए has been found that there is 45 % वृद्धि in उपज if हुए ढकने with green leaves of rosewood . 
फसल grows after 30-35 दिनों बाद of बुआई . 
The pure income per शुद्ध आय प्रति हेक्टर can be increased by growing फसल during अवधि of फसल . 
Paddy sapling should be grown in उसी खेत after हल्दी . 
Sapling grows ready in 25-30 दिनों , they should हो जाता है , plucked and sown at intervals . 
यह gets ready by दिसम्बर which should हो जाती है plucked for green pods . 
By adopting इस दोहरी अन्तवर्ती फसल प्रणाली आप can get 20,000 Rupees per शुद्ध आय . 
तीन सतही खेती भी of turmeric , maize and pigeon pea have been quite profitable . 
कच्ची हल्दी is इस्तेमाल only after processing . 
While at some places in भारत , कच्ची हल्दी is properly धोकर with स्वच्छ जल and सुखाया जाता है in Sun for 10-15 दिनों after cutting them into small pieces , इसे are भंडारित in tins when they are completely dry , And from समय -झौईण् समय to समय -झौईण् समय they are इस्तेमाल by पीस them in स्वच्छ जल and grinding on stone or making पाउडर . 
But तैयार हल्दी prepared by इस विधि has कमी of पीले रंग and खूशबू that is why इस विधि could not नहीं हो सकी है much popular . 
The most popular विधि of processing raw bales of हल्दी is boiling them and पॉलिस them which is as follows . 
Right after boiling , त्रिपाल should be removed from the flame and bales should be put out of त्रिपाल and फैला देना चाहिए on clean surface and allowed to dry . 
The bales should be फैलाना चाहिए in एक पतली पर्त and these bales should be collected and ढक using carpet during शाम so that ओस falls on them . 
Turmeric bales dries and becomes ready in 10-15 दिनों . 
Properly dried bales are very tight and make a cracking sound on breaking . 
Properly broken bales should not have more than 8 8 प्रतिशत नमी then only they can नहीं होनी चाहिए भंडारित for लम्बी अवधि . 
काम was done by बाँधकर sacks on hands or feet or बाँधकर a piece of sandal of bamboo baskets and rubbing them . 
इस विधि required hard work and less turmeric could हो पाती थी polished in अधिक समय . 
Now यह कार्य is done using हाथ or बिजली driven drums for polishing . 
ड्रम that runs through हाथ has a handle , and when हो जाती है runs the rubbing of small pins made inside drums does polishing . 
In एक घंटे , 1 kg of 1 किलो हल्दी is polished using इस विधि while ड्रम that runs through machine polishes 522 1 किलो हल्दी in 8 hours by two men . 
Since ancient times Indians have been इस्तेमाल turmeric in अचार and other food items for giving सुनहरा रंग and विशेष प्रकार of aroma to food items . 
Indian food items can not जाते हैं prepared without turmeric and if at all they are made they look bad without turmeric and स्वाद भी is also poor . 
वैज्ञानिकों of राष्‍ट्रीय आहार संस्थान , , हैदराबाद have सिद्ध that हल्दी has anti cancerous values . 
Thus those who take turmeric in their diet प्रतिदिन do not get कैंसर . 
Perhaps because of these qualities of turmeric Indians have been इस्तेमाल it in भोजन since इन्हीं गुणों . 
Because of the presence of क्षमता of हल्दी होने kills germs present in शरीर and makes शरीर free of रोग . 
पाउडर , when mixed with मलाई and applied on face removes dark patches from skin and the face shines . 
On अवसर of हर एक माँगलिक शादी in north हल्दी चूर्ण is मिलाकर with पीले सरसों and बेसन and applied on पूरे शरीर to cure skin disease and bring luster to पूरे शरीर . 
हल्दी is प्रसाधनीय अचूक औषधि . 
आज भी असंख्य लोग इस्तेमाल turmeric in the form of दवा and अनेक रोगों . 
The tradition of putting turmeric in pulses , vegetables , kadhi , Pulao , fish , mutton in भोजन is perhaps because Cancer does not occur if they are used . 
Because of the blood purifying values present in turmeric , इस्तेमाल purifies blood . 
Putting one or two एक दो बूंद of कच्ची हल्दी in eyes immediately gives relief . 
The application of लेप cures रोग . 
Eating the mixture of turmeric paste and honey cures diabetes . 
Applying a little bit of turmeric with शुद्ध घी before निखार skin . 
बिच्छू लेप of turmeric at स्थान of scorpion bite removes दर्द and sprinkling चूर्ण on leech bite immediately stops bleeding . 
भारत grows around 10 % of the total turmeric of the world . 
In भारत हल्दी is grown in भूमि . 
Which gives 3,47,800 tonnes of 3,47,800 टन हल्दी . 
भारत प्रतिवर्ष India exports 1895 tonnes of 1895 टन हल्दी to अन्य देशों of the world . 
Which gives foreign exchange worth 46.3 billion rupees . 
भारत has more than 60 60 प्रतिशत ऊपर हिस्सेदारी in अन्तर्राष्‍ट्रीय बाजार which is बात of pride . 
When we बात of चटपटाहट in भोजन then chilly comes up in the mind . 
There is hardly चिराग on चिराग who has not चखा chilly . 
मिर्च is not only limited to स्वाद ही , इसका is also प्रयोग in medicines . 
Further , chilly is a good source of अच्छा श्रोत and अन्य खनिज लवणों and minerals . 
Now माँग for मिर्च and other stuffs have increased in foreign markets and because of निर्यात भी valuable foreign exchange is being received . 
Since they तो माँग , therefore इसकी they are खेती properly then भरपूर उपज and profit will जाये more . 
It is समय to grow chilly . 
कुछ लोग तो already grown मिर्च and some will grow them soon , Let us कुछ बातें कुछ about मिर्च . 
In बिहार इसकी is grown as फसल but उत्पादकता is very less . 
मुख्य कारण of कम उत्पादकता is less use of developed varieties and technologies by the institution . 
The second reason of अधिक उत्पादन is growth of healthy seeds . 
Therefore ऊँची भूमि whose soil is light loamy should हो , चुनाव for पौधशाला . 
For मिर्च on एक हेक्टर of भूमि met long and 1-1 .25 met wide around 25 beds are required . 
Before बोआई पहले बीज in beds , खाद or खाद at दर of 20-25 tonnes per 25 टन प्रति हेक्टेयर should be used . 
Good farm beds are essential for रोपाई . 
For this soil turning or एक बार देशी हल should हो जाता है used and पाटा should हो जाता है run to तैयार खेत for मिर्च . 
One आवश्यकता कहने that for रोपाई खेत should हो such where water does not stagnates and which has light loamy soil of अच्छी उर्वरा . 
During पहली जुताई of खेत , application of खाद at दर of 20-25 tonnes per 20-25 टन प्रति हेक्टर is अपेक्षित . 
Weeding is required for 2-3 times for नियंत्रण खरपतवार in खरीफ फसल of chilly . 
Light tilling between the rows after 3-4 weeks of रोपाई develops more roots which puts अच्छा प्रभाव on them . 
As far as सिंचाई is concerned , यह depends on अवस्था of soil and वर्षा . 
If there are वर्षा during ड्रेसिंग of यूरिया and if the soil lacks नमी then एक हल्की सिंचाई should नहीं हो definitely given . 
If दो ढक्कन of दवा नामक planofix is solved in 10 litres of 10 लीटर पानी and sprinkled at the time of फूल then it stops the falling of फूल and फलों . 
Several medicines are made from कैप्सेसीन of लाल मिर्च which are used in खराबी and chest problems . 
There is एक कहावत that सबसे उपयोगी लाल मिर्च , is very useful but सबसे उपयोगी लाल मिर्च , is more useful and सबसे उपयोगी लाल मिर्च , is even better than them '' . 
कैप्सेसीन of लाल मिर्च is इस्तेमाल in making anti boils पाउडर and ointment . 
पाउडर made from Capsicum is used in colouring light coloured food items like पनीर etc. and making them attractive . 
जीरा occupies विशेष स्थान in भोजन . 
प्रयोग has हो गया है essential in नित्य विविध साग -झौईण् सब्जियों and नाना प्रकार of स्वादिष्‍ट अचार , , jelly and sauces everyday . 
Further they are also used to make some medicines . 
लोकप्रियता can हो अनुमान from the fact that इसकी is प्रयोग in शाकाहारी and non vegetarian food items . 
Though जीरा can हो grown in हर प्रकार of भूमि but भूमि which has good drainage system and जल धारण क्षमता so that there is less use सिंचाई जल is considered for हो . 
बलुई or भूमि is best for उत्पादन . 
Large lumps are made in smooth soil because of which there is difficulty in doing बुआई . 
As far as possible भूमि should हो बाधा so that there is no difficulty in सिंचाई and हर पौधा gets समान मात्रा of जल . 
fuzerium qumenai is घातक रोग of उकठा रोगा ( फयूजेरियम क्योमिनाई ) जीरे . 
समस्त फसल gets destroyed in heavy epidemic . 
Hence कृषक हो जाते हैं debtor . 
Hence in order to get rid off अत : इस रोग यह is essential not to sow जीरा for 15 वर्षों in जिस खेत that gets अत : इस रोग because the seeds of अत : इस रोग रहते हैं alive during इस अवधि and there is सम्भावना of फसल getting destroyed . 
Because the cure of रोग is impossible therefore बीज should e treated with नाशक नामक bevastine . 
आवश्यकता for फसल depends on उपलब्धि of सिंचाई जल . 
If there is sufficient irrigated water then 100 k.g of nitrogen per 100 __तेब्लिन्क्__1. नाइट्रोजन प्रति हेक्टर is good for अच्छी उपज . 
But if there is अभाव of सिंचाई जल then it is useless to देना more than 60 नाइट्रोजन per 60 __तेब्लिन्क्__1. प्रति हेक्टर . 
Generally प्राय : कृषक fill the beds with अधिक पानी than required so that there is आवश्यकता to do सिंचाइयों , because of this majority of अधिक पानी percolates in the deep layers of भूमि and पौधे are unable to utilize them . 
कारण is that the cumin roots do not नहीं पहुँचती , much deep thus in order to get more and more अधिकाधिक उत्पादन from : एक निश्‍चित सिंचाई जल मात्रा of प्रति सिंचाई जल इसका is essential to कम the per irrigation : एक निश्‍चित सिंचाई जल मात्रा and संख्या of सिंचाइयों should जाये increased . 
यह is clear how much पानी or सिंचाइयों is required for how much कितनी नाइट्रोजन . 
If भूमि is well prepared खरपतवार नहीं उगती in इस फसल . 
It is mostly देखा गया है that along with बीज साथ ही अनेकों प्रकार of बीज साथ ही are also available . 
Amongst them is , बीज named '' जुलते " similar to जीरा . 
Thus while buying seed one should carefully देख लें that अत : बीज should हो pure and free from अत : बीज . 
Despite these precautions if कुछ खरपतवार grow then they should be removed using खुर्पी . 
दो प्रकार of insects harm जीरे . 
One is termite and the other is aphid which is also called chepa . 
While तैयारी खेत for दीमक नियन्त्रण , properly putting 10 प्रतिशत पाउडर at दर of 25 k.g per 25 __तेब्लिन्क्__2. प्रति हेक्टर reduces the effect . 
For controlling aphid , the spraying of मोटासिस्टाक्स or रोगर घोल - चार बार at an interval of every week or 25 दिन बाद प्रति after 25 दिन बाद प्रति of बुआई saves फसल from aphid . 
सोवा is फसल . 
इसमें has more power to resist extreme cold . 
सूखा मौसम during फूल is beneficial for उत्पादन . 
फसल in उत्तर भारत needs तीन सिंचाई . 
But in दक्षिण भारत इसे is grown as असिंचित फसल . 
इसे can be grown both in light and भूमि . 
It gives यह अच्छी उपज in less productive कम उपजाऊ भूमि भी . 
बेहतर समय to grow सोवा is between अक्टूबर to नवम्बर . 
But समय between 15 नवम्बर बीच 15 नवम्बर बीच is best for अधिक उपज . 
In fact सोवा is also sown using छिटकवां विधि भी but they should be sown in rows at दूरी of 30 c.m. . 
राख or बालू should be definitely मिला लें with बीज साथ so that बीज साथ do not fall at एक ही स्थान . 
फसल gets prepared for मसाले by the mid of मार्च मध्य . 
यह is फसल . 
पौधे turn yellow when फसल becomes mature and the grains हो जाते हैं हल्क भूरे रंग . 
During इस समय पौधों should be harvested and dried in छायादार स्थान for 8-10 दिनों and then beaten to get बीज . 
बीज should be साफ and properly dried and भंडारित in sacks . 
8-10 tonnes of 8-10 क्विंटल बीज are obtained from एक हेक्टर of भूमि . 
मसाला occupies महत्वपूर्ण स्थान among मसाला . 
इसे is called Adarak is Hindi , Ada in बंगाली and Odia , Adu in गुजराती , Shunti in Kannada , Ale in मराठी , Adrak in पंजाबी , Aardrak in संस्कृत , Allam in तेलुगू , Adrak in उर्दू , and Inzi in तमिल and Malayalam . 
But in अंग्रेजी इसे is called ginger and its botanical name is gingiber afisinel . 
It is सदस्य of यह जिन्जीबरेसी पौध परिवार . 
अदरक is उपयोग in spices , pickles , sauces , pulses , vegetables and other food items to make them tasty . 
अदरक is मुख्य अंश तो of Ayurvedic medicines and आयुर्वेदिक दवाओं also . 
Further Soth is अचूक दवा of cattle . 
In अदरक is खेती mostly in सबसे अधिक क्षेत्रफल of Kerela , As a result उत्पादन भी is also highest . 
अन्य अदरक उत्पादन राज्य of भारत are - पश्‍चिम बंगाल , , Orisssa , बिहार , , मध्य प्रदेश , , मध्य प्रदेश , , Tamil Nadu , मध्य प्रदेश , , कर्नाटक and मध्य प्रदेश , . 
फसल is grown from प्रकन्दों . 
पौधों bears adequate roots within 3 months of sowing and पौधों स्थापित संपर्क with roots and start getting तत्व . 
Very less बहुत कम परिवर्तन occur in the chemical values of प्रकन्दों within 3 months of sowing . 
If we take out बीज प्रकन्द after 3 months of बोआई then again we get वजन of बीज प्रकन्द . 
That is 20 क्विंटल of बीज -झौईण् प्रकन्द are received from 18 - 20 क्विंटल of बीज -झौईण् प्रकन्द . 
यह क्रिया should be सम्पन्न by मध्य अगस्त . 
Due to अभाव of अदरक in बाजार during अगस्त , very good बहुत अच्छा मूल्य is obtained . 
नम जलवायु is favorable for सफल खेती of अदरक . 
खेती is successfully carried in स्थानों भी with ऊँचाई above sea level . 
Regular and वर्षा is essential for उत्पादन . 
सिंचाई is required on कमी of वर्षा . 
वर्षा , from फसल till sprouting and regular and excessive वर्षा , at the time of वृद्धि and सूखा मौसम at the time of harvesting is good for अच्छी पैदावार . 
अदरक and खाद are required in अधिक मात्रा for अच्छी पैदावार of अदरक . 
During अन्तिम जुताई , गोबर manure or compost at the rate of 25-30 tonnes per 25-30 टन प्रति हेक्टर should be properly mixed in the soil . 
If इसके is not available then 2-3 tonnes per 2-3 टन प्रति हेक्टर of बारीक should be डालें . 
At इसी समय 375 k.g single super phosphate and 240 k.g muriate of potash should be mixed into the soil . 
If the soil is attacked by दीमक then aldrin -LRB- एल्ड्रीन ( 5 प्रतिशत ) -RRB- should हो powdered and mixed in the soil at दर of 25 k.g per 25 किलो प्रति हेक्टर and पाटा should हो run . 
By the research done on अदरक हुए has been सिद्ध that प्रकन्द of अदरक should हुए लें only from ऐसी फसल which was not नहीं लगा हो by रोग in पिछले वर्ष . 
For अधिक पैदावार स्वस्थ बीज -झौईण् प्रकन्द rhizomes whose weight is between 20 ग्राम and which has 3-4 buds should हो , chosen . 
बीज -झौईण् प्रकन्दों should be treated with 0.5 % एगेलौल or 0.1 % घोल for 3 and 3 मिनट respectively . 
Doing this destroys फफूँद that बीज -झौईण् प्रकन्दों and स्वस्थ पौधे grow . 
Seeing संख्या and growth of खरपतवार in फसल and 2-3 times of खरपतवार 2-3 निकौनी is required . 
The first destroying of weeds should be done by हाथ after 45 दिनों बाद of प्रथम निकौनी बोआई . 
The second and third destroying of weeds should be done using तृतीय निकौनी खुर्पी after 60 and 60 दिनों of बोआई respectively . 
मिश्रित खेती जाती है : Maize , pigeon gram and अण्डी मिश्रित खेती जाती है is done with मिश्रित खेती : - अदरक साथ but the density of मिश्रित फसलों should be kept very low . 
शुद्ध खेती yields उपज as compared to शुद्ध खेती . 
Ginger wheat crop system : अदरक should be tilled by फसल प्रणाली : - मध्य दिसम्बर and अदरक -झौईण् गेहूँ should be planted in उस खेत . 
अगात अदरक gives good profit in बाजार but उपज is obtained . 
अदरक should be definitely sown between 15 15 मई - 31 15 मई . 
But where there is सुविधा नहीं हो should नहीं हो sown after प्रथम वर्षा बाद . 
प्रकन्द of 18-20 gram which has four healthy buds should हो , used to get अधिक पैदावार . 
बीज प्रकन्दों should be treated with घोल of 0.1 % सेरेसान for 30 मिनट . 
Weed control and tilling are essential to keep खरपतवार free during October-November . 
घोल of जिंक or आयरन should होने sprayed on पौधों if they कमी them . 
सिंचाई is extremely important if there is कमी of नमी in खेत because ginger rhizomes grow during इस समय . 
The growth of rhizomes stops if the soil is tough . 
February-March : फसल starts turning yellow during इस समय and those who wish to keep the nodules for प्रकन्द should till the crop field during फरवरी -झौईण् मार्च : - and साफ all the roots on nodules and the nodules should हो treated for half an hour in घोल of 0.3 % इन्डोफिल एम-45 and सुखा in छाया . 
When घोल applied in पूर्णतया सूख then they should जाये kept in a shady balcony or kept beneath पेड़ नीचे by spreading पुआल and again they should जाये ढककर with पुआल and then लेप should जाये applied . 
The ginger pile thus kept for बीज should not be नहीं खोलें before the time . 
The piles should be खोलना चाहिए when one has to sow the seeds . 
Nadiya : यह is पश्‍चिम बंगाल high yielding किस्म of अदरक . 
इसकी is cultivated in सभी अदरक producing राज्यों of भारत . 
मात्रा of सूखे पदार्थों in इस किस्म of प्रकन्दों is प्रतिशत . 
नदिया किस्म gives 240-250 tonnes per उपज . 
इस किस्म is उपयोग in making सोंठ and arka . 
Rio-de-geniro : यह is Brazil 's किस्म of अदरक . 
इसमें has मात्रा of fibres . 
मात्रा of सूखे अदरक is प्रतिशत . 
This is सर्वोत्तम किस्म for getting extracts . 
It can be grown in यह विभिन्न प्रकार of क्षेत्रों . 
5.12 % fibres are found in इस किस्म . 
इसकी give 230 tonnes per उपज . 
Chayna : यह is किस्म of अदरक . 
इसमें have 21 % सूखे अदरक . 
180-190 tonnes per 180-190 क्विंटल प्रति हेक्टर of चायना किस्म is obtained from प्रकन्द . 
Jorhat : This is लोकप्रिय किस्म . 
इसकी is cultivated in शिव सागर जिले and in the surrounding areas of Golaghat . 
क्षमता is 175-200 tonnes per 175-200 क्विंटल प्रति हेक्टर and they give 21.4 % 21.4 प्रतिशत सोंठ . 
To तैयार सोंठ from अदरक , खुदाई , of फसल should be done after 240 दिनों बाद of फसल . 
पत्तियाँ dries by इस समय . 
While खुदाई one should be careful as to not cut the rhizomes . 
The roots and the soil on the rhizomes should be properly साफ and धो लें with साफ पानी . 
The rhizomes should हो put inside स्वच्छ जल for 12 घण्टें if आवश्यक . 
Further the thin cover above the rhizomes should be removed with सहायता of sharp knives made from बाँस . 
Long rhizomes give सोंठ and मूल्य is also good in बाजार . 
मात्रा of नमी is less than 10 10 प्रतिशत . 
In order to make सोंठ more shining they are rubbed inside टोकरी which removes the remaining cover and कण . 
इस विधि of तैयार सोंठ is called इस विधि . 
There is एक और विधि of तैयार सोंठ which is called '' एक और विधि '' . 
After removing the cover the rhizomes are डुबो in 2 % घोल for 6 घण्टें . 
Then the rhizomes are taken out and allowed to dry and after 20 दिनों बाद of सुखाते हैं they are चमकीला in टोकरी to make them shining . 
तैयार सोंठ thus prepared is more white in colour . 
Only healthy and प्रकन्दों ही should be प्रयोग for sowing or प्रकन्दों ही obtained from रहित क्षेत्र should be sow . 
After the completion of cultivation or खुदाई बाद the remains of पौधों should be collected and burnt . 
The drainage system of खेत should be good so that जल does नहीं रुक सके in खेत for much time . 
फसल चक्र should be adopted and खेतों should be cleaned . 
बीज should हो जाते हैं treated with a solution of 0.1 % 0.1 प्रतिशत सेरेसान for 3 मिनट , It kills माइसीलियम and स्वस्थ पौधों are prepared . 
यह रोग is caused due to फफूँद नामक coletotraikum gingiberi . 
Initially small round or oval shaped light yellow patches appear on the leaves which later होते हैं brown in colour . 
Later these patches increase and join each other . 
भाग generally dries and falls down , This makes छोटा छिद्र in the leaves . 
पूरी पत्तियाँ मर जाती हैं when the intensity of रोग increases . 
ऐसी पत्तियाँ curl which are affected by रोग in the upper portion of ऐसी पत्तियाँ . . 
छोटे बिन्दु on old patches increase . 
प्रभाव of रोग is more on नम मौसम . 
यह रोग is caused due to फफूंद नामक failostika gingiberi . 
Small , colorless , oval or long patches appear on the leaves in इस रोग . 
आकार of patches increase and turn yellow in सफेद रंग and the edges हो जाता है भूरा . 
हिस्सा of the patches are yellow in पीले रंग . 
When several patches come together and take the form of कई धब्बों . 
An increase in the number of बिन्दु on these patches is seen . 
पाइरीकुलेरिया पर्ण धब्बा : - : रोग is caused due to फफूँद नामक piriculeria gingiberi . 
रोग appears on the leaves in the form of oval or long patches . 
The patches are red brown to लाल भूरा in रंग . 
भाग of old patches are grey and corners are भूरा in रंग . 
The patches increase in आकार and join each other . 
भाग dries and falls down and सुखकर is built in between . 
Scorching of leaves : रोग is caused due to फफूँद नामक rhiziktonia batatikola . 
Irregular small size light brown patches appear on पूरी पत्ती which later increase in size and फैल जाते हैं on पूरी पत्ती . 
रोगी leaves होकर loose and either turn down or fall down . 
Leaves turn white or light in रंग when तीव्रता of रोग increases . 
There is an increase of a pin size फफूँद at स्थानों which is known as '' scleroshium '' . 
पीत रोग : - : पीत रोग : - is caused due to फफूँद नामक fugerium oxysporum , a sub variety of gingiberi . 
The lower most leaves of पौधों पीली yellow in इस रोग . 
The yellowing starts from the corners and gradually पूरी पत्ती पीली yellow . 
रूग्न पौधे dies by drying but do not fall on जमीन . 
भाग near the ground level is soft and watery . 
ऐसे पौधे easily आ जाते हैं up on plucking . 
भीतरी भाग of प्रकन्दों are brown in भूरे रंग . 
Roots start rotting . 
बढ़वार of प्रकन्द decreases . 
रोग : - : रोग : - is caused more at समय of storing or during the maturing of फसल . 
भीतरी भाग of प्रकन्दों turn black in काले रंग because of इस रोग . 
The diseased tissue turns into ऊतक काले चूर्ण . 
This is actually बढ़वार . 
The rhizomes shrink and fall when रोग is intense . 
Such symptoms are caused due फफूँद नामक diplodia netaelensis . 
एक दूसरे प्रकार of drying disease is caused due to फफूँद नामक maikofomia kaijiaulina . 
The impact of इस रोग is seen more during the maturing of फसल in खेतों . 
पत्तियाँ of पौधों पीली yellow . 
पूरा पौधा looks burnt . 
रोगी rhizomes shrink and become dry . 
जीवाणु उकठा रोग : - : जीवाणु उकठा रोग : - spreads due to a bacteria नामक psuedomonas solenesiarum . 
मुख्य लक्षण of इस रोग are yellowing , loosing and drying of leaves . 
Initially पत्तियाँ become dry and gradually सुखने of drying increases towards ऊपर ओर . 
रोगी leaves curl . 
The stem portion near the ground level becomes watery and easily separates from प्रकन्द on plucking when रोग is intense . 
भीतरी भाग of रूग्न पौधे becomes livid or black in काले रंग . 
Termite : दीमक : - इसके consists of कीट of microterms and odontoterms species . 
They are white or off white or dark brown in रंग with a touch of रंग . 
The termites hidden in soil आंचल make under आंचल beneath and खाते हैं plant roots . 
They काटते the plant roots and stems in इस प्रकार as if they are काटते with a sharp knife . 
इनका begin आक्रमण from फसल and they ये नुकसान all the stages of फसल . 
The stem disease of अदरक : The scientific name of इस कीट is dichocrosis puntifirelis . 
इस कीट are medium तितली तितली which are white and yellow in रंग . 
हानिकारक अवस्था of this incest is शिशु which is called caterpillar . 
The baby enters शिशु पौधे ऊपर stem and reaches प्रकन्द by making an underpass beneath . 
It eats the new buds . 
Consequently हेडहार्ट लक्षण start appearing , buds shrink and later become dry . 
इस कीट affects more during July-August . 
Rhizome magot : The scientific name of इस कीट is chelseadomia stikarnis . 
इस कीट are very small in आकार and they only have a pair of अग्र पंख ही . 
The harmful stage of इस कीट भी is also शिशु which is called magot . 
मैगोट is without wings , and off white in color . 
यह enters प्रकन्दों and eats the soft tissues , Consequently प्रकन्दों dries and when they increase in संख्या पूरा पौधा dries . 
इस कीट attacks more during अक्टूबर -झौईण् नवम्बर माह of October-November . 
Leaf roller : नाम of इस कीट is udusthpus folus . 
The adult insects are मध्यम आकार तितली . 
There are दोनों अग्र पंख patches in दोनों अग्र पंख and there is आठ -झौईण् आठ धब्बे on दोनों अग्र पंख . 
शिशु which is called caterpillar is light green in रंग and इसके is हानिकारक अवस्था . 
The baby curls अदरक leaves and stays खाता and eats भीतरी पत्ती . 
इसका attacks from अगस्त till अक्टूबर . 
The healthy and tasty eatables of अदरक : अदरक has a different significance amongst the tasty and spicy मसाले that व्यंजन : - प्रकृति has given us . 
यह is an extremely significant फसल whose underground nodes have been उपयोग since ancient times . 
The nodes of फसल are called प्रकन्द . 
The fresh and कच्चे प्रकन्दों are कहा जाता है अदरक and कच्चे प्रकन्दों are कहा जाता है soth . 
अदरक and सोंठ are home medicines for दोनों अनेक रोगों . 
Generally अनेक प्रकार of Ayurvedic medicines are made from सोंठ . 
Apart from Humans soth is अचूक औषधि for अनेक रोगों . 
Method of preparation : Firstly properly धो लें विधि : - सर्वप्रथम अदरक in स्वच्छ जल . 
The cover of washed nodes should हुई peeled and finely chopped . 
These pieces and उपरोक्‍त सामग्रियों should be properly मिला लें and filled in स्वच्छ मर्तबान भर चौड़े मुँह . 
मुँह of मर्तबान should be properly tied with a clean cloth . 
इस मर्तबान should be exposed in धूप for दस दिनों प्रतिदिन . 
Meanwhile चटनी should be properly mixed from top to bottom so that सभी सामग्री are cooked . 
The tasty and healthy पौष्‍टिक चटनी is ready . 
यह चटनी curbs cold , cough and fever and is very beneficial for children . 
Soak अदरक in स्वच्छ जल for दो दिन . 
On तीसरे दिन लें then out of पानी and prick them with गोद and then again धो लें them with पानी . 
Now boil these nodules in पानी at हल्की आँच and then take them out and dry them . 
Further तैयार a thin wire sugar syrup with 2 kgs of दो किलो चीनी and add ginger nodules into them and stir until they are cooked . 
When the syrup becomes thick like honey and ginger nodules are properly cooked then take them out of आँच and add चूर्ण and rose गुलाब जल . 
Fill the Jam into jars when they are totally cool . 
यह मुरब्बा is tasty to खाने . 
उद्योग मंडल एसोचैम estimates that there will सबसे अधिक अवसर for jobs in कृषि आधारित उद्योगों based on information & बैंकिंग and agriculture in देश . 
In एक अध्ययन रिपोर्ट by एसोचैम होगा has been उम्मीद that नया साल will होगा good for आईटी and IT service providers with सुधार in अमेरिकी अर्थव्यवस्था and downfall in rupee . 
Similarly संभावना of रबी फसल will समर्थन कृषि आधारित tractors and मांग and रोजगार in उद्योगों like manure , खाद -झौईण् बीज and agricultural equipments . 
According to रिपोर्ट with the reform in आर्थिक वृद्धि , the problems of अवरद्ध ऋणों will होगी कम and बैंकों will accelerate the recruitment of vacant posts . 
The modern methods of चयनात्मक प्रजनन and पशुपालन such as खेती -LRB- इसी प्रकार of practices are लागू at hens also -RRB- has वृद्धि वृद्धि of उत्पादन . 
With this issues related to रसायनों used in औद्योगिक उत्पादन pertaining to स्वास्थ्य प्रभाव , of antibiotic medicines , growth hormones and मांस have आये हैं up . 
बड़ी इलायची -LRB- Emomam Sabletam -RRB- is मसाला of ( एमोमम् सबलेटम् ) भारतीय मूल . 
जन्म has been considered as पूर्वी हिमालय क्षेत्र of भारत . 
Somewhere इसे is known as नेपाली इलायची also . 
Cultivation of बड़ी इलायची is done in सिक्किम , , मणिपुर and पश्‍चिम बंगाल on small and big level . 
But बड़ी इलायची is खेती in Nepal , Thailand and Bangla Desh . 
In the world Nepal is the largest producer of सबसे बड़ा बड़ी इलायची . 
There should be moist and hot जलवायु चाहिए for बड़ी इलायची . 
ऐसे क्षेत्र where तापक्रम remains from 10 to 30 Celsius and more moisture and मिली rains मीटर , is great for बड़ी इलायची . 
बड़ी इलायची does not bear dryness , this is यही कारण that in मैदानी क्षेत्रों of उत्तरी भारत due to hit पत्तियाँ and फूल gets dried and फल does not form even . 
पौधे of बड़ी इलायची उगते more properly near the canal or lakes under छाया भी of the big trees , in the more moist soil . 
ऐसी भूमि in which there is more fossils and slope , is best for बड़ी इलायची . 
बड़ी इलायची is एक सदस्य of the ginger plant family . 
Leaves are thin , attached with तनों of the green colour . 
In बड़ी इलायची the bunch of the flowers comes out from the top of गुच्छे पौधों . 
On वृन्त of एक फूल , एक फूल grow . 
Pollination , is done itself or by honeybees . 
फल are of the red colour which होते of the brown colour by being processed by धुआं . 
मात्रा of वाष्पशील तेल is 3 - 3.5 प्रतिशत . 
बड़ी इलायची is cultivated by two ways . 
फूल come on the plants cultivated by बीज in पाँच वर्ष . 
But in तीन वर्ष , फूल come in पौधों which are cultivated by प्रकन्द and more yielding is मिलती है . 
Gardens are made over the mountains near lakes and springs . 
After सुथरा खेत and digging it 2 - 3 बार soil is made loose and खरपतवार are taken out of it . 
The huge trees of अमलतास are grown for shade . 
To transplant पौध , after तैयार 20-25 cm long , broad and deep hole it is filled with the half soil and half compost . 
After transplanting the plant दबा दें the soil properly . 
समय to transplant पौध is May-June , when वर्षा starts . 
Always keep weedless the plantations of बड़ी इलायची . 
पहले and दूसरे वर्ष when पौधे are small , then there is अधिक आवश्यकता of the weed-removing . 
But When पौधे हो जाते हैं more dense खरपतवार उगते हैं less , in वैसी स्थिति in वर्ष just one or two दो होविंग ही is enough if पौधे which are in छाया हो जाते हैं more dense then must तो its cutting-trimming hence हो जाते हैं will not तो बुरा प्रभाव of छाया . 
In सूखे मौसम , black cardamom must be सिंचाई . 
छायादार वृक्षों in छायादार वृक्षों which also do कार्य भी of the nitrogen stabilization in the soil with छाया साथ -झौईण् साथ like Amaltas , Irithina , Utis etc. . 
In दार्जिलिंग and Sikkim Dwarf bush , Resh sawani sait golsi , Sait Ramana , Sawani tal , Ramasi , Golsi tal , Sawani small and डवार्फ are the main . 
Tadang -LRB- Sikkim -RRB- ( सिक्किम ) अनुसंधान केन्द्र of the Indian Agriculture Research Institute has selected the five best varieties of बड़ी इलायची , which are like this : बरलागी and बेबो . 
Rhizome by vegetative method and फसल by Mustari praaroho gives फूल in तीन वर्ष . 
After परागण and गर्भाधान बाद फल start to ripen in 5-6 months . 
कार्य of the fruit plucking goes from अगस्त to नवम्बर . 
The bunches of the legumes are काट लिए जाते हैं from जिन पौधों जिन पौधों are काट लिए जाते हैं and अलग from सतह of जमीन because then on फूल do not grow . 
उपज , of बड़ी इलायची , depends on किस्म and विधि . 
In Meghalaya , अधिकतम उपज of डवार्फ बुश has been found 1300 kilos per लगभग 1300 किलो प्रति हेक्टर . 
In सिक्किम , उपज of गोलसी has been achieved about 1375 1053 किलो per लगभग 1375 किलो प्रति हेक्टर , whereas उपज of 1053 किलो and उपज of गोलसी has been achieved 1053 किलो . 
At first bunches of the legumes are plucked from the stipe . 
The furnace is ईंट with सहायता of ईंट and mud . 
Over the furnace platform of हरे बांस stick is made . 
After burning तीन दिनों and night continuously , by drying up in तीन दिनों बड़ी इलायची gets ready . 
After drying up हरी 100 किलो raw green legumes बड़ी इलायची gets ready . 
In the black cardamom leaf स्ट्रीक बीमारी harms more to the leaves , to रोकथाम इसकी रोकथाम of the 0.25 percent liquid of the Blaitox-50 has been beneficial . 
Among विषाणु रोगों फुरकी and चिरकी is more important , to रोकथाम गोलसी and Ramsi varieties . 
In सिक्किम and दार्जिलिंग , children खाते हैं fondly the ripen fruits of बड़ी इलायची . 
इसका is उपयोग to cook पकवानों of सब्जियों and muttons etc. mostly . 
Beside that बड़ी इलायची is इस्तेमाल in the chutney , अचार , , बिस्कुट and to make मिश्रण of मसालों of अनेक प्रकार . 
Eating daily two or four black cardamom seed gums होते हैं strong and होते हैं does n't दर्द in the teeth . 
बड़ी इलायची makes लीवर healthy . 
From the consumption of बड़ी इलायची , the diseases of the neck , lungs and heart do not occur and irritation of the eyes ends . 
छोटी इलायची is called रानी of मसाले . 
भारत is the biggest सबसे बड़ा उत्पादक and निर्यातक देश which produces सत्तर प्रतिशत of कुल उत्पादन and साठ प्रतिशत भाग of विश्‍व व्यापार . 
In भारत कुल उत्पादन of छोटी इलायची is 2300 टन to 2300 टन per 2800 टन प्रति वर्ष . 
The dried legumes of छोटी इलायची is प्रयोग in the form of मसाले and औषधि , in बीजों there is 2 - 4 प्रतिशत highly aromatic vaporized अत्यधिक सुगन्धित वाष्पशील तेल which fragrance is very pleasant and have प्रभाव . 
पौधा of छोटी इलायची is herbaceous , बहुवर्षी year and बीज is of single-seeded . 
पौधा looks like पौधा , just a little bud has come out in that . 
In पौधे of छोटी इलायची there is प्रकन्द , which is called a bulb . 
Generally , पौधे of छोटी इलायची उगते at ऊँचाई of the six hundred to fifteen hundred meters , where वर्षा remains 150 cm and temperature 10-35 centigrade . 
पौधे of इलायची has आवश्यकता of the shadow , that 's why in the garden होती है , can होती है , पूर्वक खेती successfully . 
जलाक्रान्त स्थिति of the excess water and सुखाड़ is harmful for the cardamom hence होते हैं needs consistent cold and moist जलवायु . 
To grow पौधों of इलायची the fertile soil of वनों is proper which has निकास , in which fossils is available in good quantity and which has PH 5 to 6 . 
Few other varieties of छोटी इलायची are also खेती in भारत different area on small level like बीजापुर and नादान इत्यादि etc. . 
In मैदानी क्षेत्रों to farm इसकी the fast growing plants are खेती like कैसिया and हरिथ्रीना आदि etc which देते हैं shadow . 
छोटी इलायची is खेती by both , sapling and बीज . 
पौधे which are grown by बीज are assumed to होता है good , in which there is less threat of विषाणु रोग . 
बीजों are ढक by the light loose soil and after बोआई बाद , पौधशाला is ढक by the straw and light हल्की सिंचाई is done in सुबह and शाम . 
After अंकुरण बाद पुआल is taken out and to save from छाया is व्यवस्था . 
When पौधे हो जायें of 5-6 leaves , then हो जायें should हो जायें displaced in तैयार खेत . 
Generally there is आवश्यकता of बीज for भूमि . 
पौधों of इलायची should be देना चाहिए खाद , , खाद , of khalli , चूर्ण , of bones , चूर्ण , of मछली etc. due to पौधों could मिल सके पर्याप्त मात्रा of fossils and humus . 
यह मात्रा should be देना चाहिए after 30 दिनों बाद of रोपाई of पौधों in तीन बार in the duration of 30 दिनों बाद . 
In karnatka where 5000 पौधे , per प्रति हेक्टर is planted through canal method , there 120.12 and 240 kilo nitrogen and potash is दिया जाता है per प्रति हेक्टर . 
Taking three months old plant from प्रारम्भिक पौधशाला is planted in प्रारम्भिक पौधशाला and इसे is रखा जाता है very carefully , for one or दो वर्षों . 
After तैयारी बाद of मुख्य भूमि तैयार पौधों are transplanted at दूरी of the 2m × 1m . 
There is आवश्यकता of the weed-removing for पौधों of छोटी इलायची चार बार , in साल , चार बार , in साल and in साल चार बार , . 
Despite that , इसके is necessary to put समय -झौईण् समय to समय -झौईण् समय , to देना खाद and trimming of the long length plants . 
In खेती of छोटी इलायची there is कोई विशेष खतरा of कीटों . 
To नियंत्रण the thrips and legumes कीट spray the mixture of 0.075 प्रतिशत of फेनथियान दवा . 
To prevent इसकी after taking ग्रस्त भाग out calcium carbonate should be डाल देना चाहिए there . 
From तीसरे वर्ष of the transplantation फल starts to come out in छोटी इलायची . 
It takes four months to होते हैं फल from फूल , which gets ready after पक with in 40 दिनों . 
All the legumes of छोटी इलायची does not ripen all together . 
By plucking the legumes which are completely ripen , they split while drying and there is हानि of गुणवत्ता , होती है , is better to pluck the legumes before पकी . 
In खेत of एक हेक्टयर उपज of छोटी इलायची is 100 to 150 किलो . 
The plucked legumes are सुखाया जाता है up in धूप or with सहायता of the artificial drying machine . 
Dry green fruits are बिकती in बाजारों at अधिक मूल्य and इसकी has बहुत मांग in abroad also . 
छोटी इलायची is cultivated as मिश्रित फसल under वृक्षों नीचे of रोबस्टा कॉफी , , coconut and nut , in that अवसर for the labor and शुद्ध आय increases . 
लोगों ही had first used व्यवहार in the form of मसाले . 
Dalchini is called in दालचीनी and in वानस्पतिक भाषा it is called cinnamonam verum . 
जन्म स्थान of दालचीनी is श्रीलंका and भारत क्षेत्र ही of the Malabar . 
In भारत , खेती of दालचीनी is being done almost from लगभग 200 वर्षों . 
Indian cinnamon is सूखा रूप of भीतरी छाल of the plant नामक cinnamomam verum . 
छाल of दालचीनी is slightly acidic and when होता है is अलग from the stem then खूशबू increases . 
In comparison of अमलतास छाल of दालचीनी is thin , पत्तियाँ are small and has सुगन्ध . 
प्रति वर्ष भारत imports 2.5 टन cinnamon . 
The plant of दालचीनी is more harder . 
In the laterite and sandy soil of पश्‍चिमी घाट in which कमी of भोज्य तत्वों of पौधों is found , the better yielding of दालचीनी is found . 
सफलापूर्वक could be grown successfully in स्थानों of ऊंचाई from the sea surface . 
इसे is cultivated as बरानी फसल hence the places where वार्षिक वर्षा falls to 200-250 cm , are more suitable . 
Generally साधारणतया दालचीनी is grown by बीजों but इसे could be grown by कलम and गुटटी भी also . 
When फल fall after पक then बीज are taken out after collecting them and they should be immediately shown in तुरन्त नर्सरी क्यारी or in the polythene bags after cleaning the flesh over them . 
नर्सरी or bags should be सिंचाई regularly . 
रखें , इन पौधों to shady places till नहीं हो जायें did not नहीं हो जायें of the 6 months . 
In जिस भूमि cinnamon is supposed to sow clean by दालचीनी रोपनी out weeds from that . 
उचित समय of पौधों June-July because पौधों shown in this period मिलता रहता है पर्याप्त पानी for three months after sowing . 
Where , there is पर्याप्त सुविधा of सिंचाई , there cinnamon could हो shown till October-November also . 
For तेज वृद्धि of पौधों इसके is necessary to पौधों छायादार वृक्ष , for छायादार वृक्ष should be selected . 
There is no tradition to डालने खाद in फसल of दालचीनी . 
For अच्छी उपज of दालचीनी it is necessary to have a nitrogen based नेत्रजनीय उर्वरक . 
After removing the weeds in जून -झौईण् जुलाई , putting in डाल कर properly 50 किलोग्राम compost and 250 grams 250 ग्राम यूरिया per प्रति पेड़ . 
When पेड़ of दालचीनी becomes 2 - 3 वर्ष , then हो जायें is काट दिया जाता है from above 20 cm of सतह thus more branches will emerge . 
After होने बाद starts raining , the branches of दालचीनी should होने बाद cut . 
Before कटाई it should जाता है seen by कटाई एक पतली टहनी and removing छाल छाल is removed easily or not . 
ऐसी टहनी which is दो साल old and 1-1 .25 1 - 1.25 मीटर long and 1.25 cm thick , is assumed better to get सर्वोत्तम दालचीनी . 
Thus लम्बाई of छाल may be kept to 10-125 cm according to the comfort इसको is कहा जाता है Quilis इसको means सबसे उच्च कोटि of दालचीनी . 
दालचीनी which is made by सुखा भीतरी पतले भाग of छाल is कहा जाता है Fetherings . 
From the very hard खूब सख्त डाल छाल is taken out दालचीनी which is तैयार by सुखा them is कहा जाता है scrap . 
दालचीनी मिश्रण of the different grade पाउडर of दालचीनी is prepared . 
At छाल from काटी गयी branches is रखा जाता है for 24 hours for fermentation . 
After that it is सुखाया जाता है up in तत्पश्‍चात् धूप for 4 - 5 दिनों while छाल takes रूप of the quill after shrinking . 
Small quill is kept putting under the big quill . 
The quills which are kept in इस प्रकार is called compound quills . 
तेल is तेल from छाल of दालचीनी which is इस्तेमाल in making of the highest quality perfume . 
Demand of इस तरह of तेल is most in फ्रांस and जर्मनी . 
औषधीय गुण of इस तेल is most . 
200 - 300 किलोग्राम cinnamon is got from the ten years old plantations . 
गुलाबी रोग : this is फैलती है by फफूंद नामक carticum jawanikam . 
On the stem and branches due to formation of खादार जगह छाल of खादार जगह gets नष्ट due to that , that शाखाओं or stem dies . 
To रोकथाम मिश्रण . 
Plants मर जाते हैं due to the attack of रोग नामक ब्लाइट on पौधों in नर्सरी . 
To prevent this , spray 0.25 percent mixture of दवा नामक इन्डोफिल एम-45 . 
फसल of दालचीनी is attacked by many insects , but दालचीनी gets harmed most from तितली . 
To prevent इस कीट the spray of the 0.05 percent mixture of दवा नामक Quinalphans has been found most beneficial . 
Among the species of पेड़ , लौंग has महत्वपूर्ण स्थान . 
सदस्य of the Mirtesi family in वानस्पतिक भाषा which is called इवजेनिया कैरिओफाइलस and Lavang in संस्कृत . 
The native place of लौंग is Molvakas -LRB- ( इन्डोनेशिया ) -RRB- . 
Clove has been planted at first in the gardens of मसालों in Madras by East India Company in सर्वप्रथम सन् . 
Due to the success of खेती here , again in सन् 1850 BC खेती was शुरू in नीलगिरि and बरलियार of तमिलनाडु . 
In भारत in लौंग producing क्षेत्रों नाडापूरम् नीलगिरि , , त्रिरूनेलवैली and कन्याकुमारी are the main districts of तमिलनाडु but in लौंग is produced in क्यूलों and Trivendram districts . 
In भारत , लौंग is खेती in सबसे अधिक क्षेत्रफल -LRB- ( 596 हैक्टर भूमि ) -RRB- in केरल राज्य . 
In the world total कुल 30,000 टन लौंग is उत्पादन . 
In the World इन्डोनेशिया is उत्पादक देश of सबसे बड़ा लौंग . 
Beside लौंग is खेती in the Pemba , जन्जीबर सिंगापुर , , श्रीलंका and Malaysia etc , देशों भी . 
For लौंग the hot and जलवायु with अधिक आर्द्रता is perfect . 
For सफल खेती of लौंग make पहाड़ी भूमि slanty by cutting हो जाय , due to that water will हो जाय drained immediately . 
Clove could be grown eaisly from the sea surface to the 1500 meter high places . 
Not much variety is found in वृक्षों available in भारत . 
In पेनांग लौंग of पेनांग is assumed best in the quality perspective . 
केरल has लौंग two reformed varieties of the clove B-59 and B-95 , which have दो उन्नत किस्में and उपज from the local varieties . 
नये पौधे of लौंग is तैयार from बीज . 
When फल on the clove trees starts to fall down after complete preparation and पककर then take out बीज from फल and sow हो कर गिरने लगें तो immediately in अच्छी प्रकार of पौधशाला . 
Sow बीजों always in the row . 
प्लास्टिक in the plastic bags by making मिश्रण of एक भाग , of the fertile soil , एक भाग , of बालू and एक भाग , of the rotten compost . 
After एक साल बाद when पौध हो जाते हैं big then again in बड़े आकार of the bag -LRB- 30cm × 15cm -RRB- मिश्रण of बालू and खाद is filled and in that पौध are transferred . 
In the nursery sprinkle जल regularly due to that moisture will remain in the nursery thus growth of पौधों will हो good and fast . 
In जिस भूमि in which लौंग is supposed to be cultivated , निकाल दें the weeds from that and in the first May-June of मानसून पहले make the hole of the 60 cm at दूरी of 6 मीटर . 
After प्रथम वर्षा बाद in पौध in these holes . 
From अक्टूबर to मई विशेष ध्यान should be देना चाहिए to सिंचाई of पौधों . 
पौधों of लौंग like थोड़ा -झौईण् बहुत छायादार वातावरण . 
मुकुन्वायडीस and मीमोसा इनवीसा should be planted in the plantations of लौंग to prevent the soil erosion . 
For अच्छी बढ़वार of पौधों it is necessary to इस्तेमाल खाद and खाद . 
But कृषि विभाग of केरल राज्य has recommended to देने 20 gram nitrogen , 18 gram 50 ग्राम पोटाश in वृक्ष of लौंग in प्रथम वर्ष and after raising इस मात्रा equal to इस मात्रा प्रथम वर्ष , in every old tree 300 gram nitrogen , 18 ग्राम स्फूर and 50 ग्राम पोटाश is देने प्रथम वर्ष . 
After पांच वर्ष बाद of the plantation of the clove trees फूल comes out , but after पांच वर्ष बाद पौधों आ जाते हैं in the complete position to flourish . 
In क्षेत्रों क्रिया of the flourishing starts in September-October and in क्रिया of the flourishing starts in December-January . 
At इस समय लम्बाई of लौंग flower-buds is 2cm . 
Due to टूटने of the branches उपज of the next season reduces . 
फल should not let formed on the clove trees because after forming फल बुरा प्रभाव occurs over अगली फसल . 
When the stem of the buds of लौंग dries up and becomes dark brown and bud remains light brown , then हो जायें should हो जायें समझना चाहिए that लौंग तैयार completely after drying up . 
At इस समय वजन of सूखी लौंग remains one third of सूखी लौंग . 
2 किलो from the complete mature विकसित वयस्क पेड़ and 2 किलो from per hectare लौंग is प्राप्त . 
कीट नामक scale and आक्रमण to पौधों . 
But for रोकथाम of the scale and मीलीबग रोकथाम of 0.05 प्रतिशत डायमेथोएट -LRB- Rogar -RRB- has been found beneficial . 
जावित्रि is एक कीमती मसाला . 
It gives सुगन्ध and tempting colour to food ingredients . 
After सुखाकर भीतरी एरिल of जावित्रि is formed and जायफल after सुखाकर बीज -LRB- Kernel -RRB- . 
The native place of जायफल is the Molakkas Ireland of इन्डोनेशिया . 
In the world कुल 7000 टन nutmeg and कुल 7000 टन mesh are उत्पादन in that there is योगदान of इन्डोनेशिया . 
For बागवाली of जायफल the hot and moist जलवायु अधिक is more proper . 
जायफल is farmed in the heavy soil , light loam soil and rocky red soil . 
The very dry अधिक सूखा वातावरण and water clog soil is not appropriate for खेती of भूमि जायफल . 
According to the gender जायफल has been divided in three parts , male , female and bisexual . 
In नर पौधों केवल फूल comes but फल does not form . 
In फूल and फल both come . 
To get the fruit होना is necessary for पौधों to होना female or bisexual . 
कार्य to विकसित उन्नत किस्म of जायफल is in प्रगति in अनुसन्धान संस्थान , , Kalicutt . 
Generally , from एक वयस्क पेड़ of फल may be प्राप्त . 
जायफल of जायफल is done by बीजों . 
After removing पर्त over बीजों ऊपर , they should be sown in the polythene bags filling it with मिश्रण of soil and compost . 
Normally , seeds अंकुरण after 50 दिनों बाद . 
In these big bags , making बालू मिश्रण of दो भाग compost and दो भाग fertile soil and one part sand should be भरना चाहिए . 
ये पौधे हो जाते हैं mature to स्थानान्तरण in 18-24 months . 
In जायफल is going to हो , transplanted , हो , should हो , clean by निकाल कर खरपतवार from हो , . 
Then in that , in 60 से0मी0 गहरे गड्‍ढे मई माह of May at दूरी of 9 meters 60cm long , 60cm broad and 60cm deep hole should be dug . 
After प्रथम वर्षा बाद in these holes itself , transplant जायफल पौधों . 
For the transplantation कृत्रिम धूप should be arranged . 
In the gardens of जायफल अन्तरावर्ती फसल of सुपारी and नारियल may be grown successfully . 
Start to दें खाद-50 किलोग्राम rotten compost of गोबर and चूरा per प्रति पेड़ when होने starts to वर्षा . 
Fertilizers 40 grams Urea , 40 ग्राम , Single Super Phosphate and 40 ग्राम , of Potash per tree should be given 80 ग्राम म्यूरिएट आफ पोटाश प्रति पेड़ प्रति वर्ष . 
From this वृद्धि of पौधों fasten . 
After : साल बाद of the plantation of पौधों , हो जाते हैं starts to come up फूल and फल in the trees . 
After nine months of flowering फल ripen and हो जाते हैं ready . 
After फल होने ready , its outer layer splits and जावित्रि and जायफल होने separate . 
जावित्रि and जायफल are सुखाया जाता है up after separating . 
After getting जावित्रि becomes yellow , then of the brown colour . 
कृषकों have to काट the 50 percent trees because they are 50 प्रतिशत पौधे over which फूल comes but फल do not flourish . 
इस समस्या can be हल by botanical diffusion . 
The falling down of फलों of जायफल is एक बड़ी समस्या . 
Due to black spot over होता है फलों get decomposed . 
To रोकथाम this spry the 0.05 percent mixture of इन्डोफिल एम-45 on the gap of 12 दिनों just when लक्षण of रोग appear . 
To prevent इस रोग , do n't make the garden very dense by planting अन्तरावर्ती फसलें because वातावरण and अधिक आर्द्रता promote इस रोग . 
यह रोग emerges from फफूंद नामक Diplodiya Metalensis . 
यह संक्रमण reaches to the mace and nutmeg -LRB- kernel -RRB- . 
जायफल and जावित्रि are इस्तेमाल in the both forms , मसाला and दवा . 
जावित्रि is इस्तेमाल to make शराब , , cake , cream piece , cream soup and साबुन because यह is of the light pink colour . 
These are very stimulating , मसाले . 
Nutmeg is अचूक दवा of जायफल दस्त and रोगों . 
अच्छा अचार is made by ऊपरी भाग of जायफल . 
केसर is the most oldest सब मसालों and most precious among सब मसालों , जन्म is supposed to be पूर्वी यूरोप . 
भारत इसकी is खेती in फ्रांस and आस्ट्रीया आदि etc. देशों . 
80-90 percent of the whole world 's 80 - 90 प्रतिशत केसर is उत्पादन in अकेले स्पेन alone . 
In भारत , केसर is उत्पादन in केवल कश्मीर ही from quite long . 
हिमाचल प्रदेश , , हिमाचल प्रदेश , and हिमाचल प्रदेश , are trying in इस दिशा from काफी समय . 
If केसर is खेती from the scientific method , then more yielding can हो सकती है प्राप्त importing that अच्छी आय could हो सकती है प्राप्त . 
केसर is मसाला of शीतोष्ण जलवायु . 
इसे can be grown successfully in स्थानों of 1,800 to 2,100 ऊंचाई . 
उपज of केसर depends on संख्या of फूल and on cold and फूल आते हैं in संख्या . 
Places which have one thousand to 1500 kilometer 1500 किलोमीटर वर्षा is appropriate for इसके and snow fall also proves beneficial . 
For खेती of केसर sandy soil is best . 
इसकी grows slowly in the clay soil and other heavy soils , and fruits do not get कन्द ) पूरा आकार . 
Run the leveler after plaughing भूमि three four तीन चार बार . 
Soil should be तैयारी in the summer weather itself . 
To sow केसर , at first small seed plots should be made . 
The shape of क्यारियों should होनी चाहिए rectangular or square shaped . 
केसर is grown through कन्द . 
Hence , उसी वर्ष itself flowers आ जाते हैं in कन्दों of 2.5 cm or bigger than बड़े आकार . 
Hence , taking account of बड़े कन्दों ही should be planted . 
कार्य of कन्द रोपाई should be done in mid of जुलाई मध्य . 
How late the bulb would होगी planted जायेगी उपज would होगी that less . 
Hence , must do रोपाई at समय . 
उनके बीच has सराहनीय प्रभाव over विकास of कन्द , of दूरी between those and गहराई . 
दूरी between कन्द to कन्द should be 10cm and 15 to 20 दूरी between the two rows . 
The bulbs which have been planted in अधिक गहराई grow less and कमी in संख्या भी is also found . 
अच्छी उपज does मिलती है by doing रोपाई with सहायता of diblar . 
The base side of कन्द should be kept downward and pointed नुकीले भाग upward . 
To plant कन्दों in एक हेक्टर there is आवश्यकता of the almost 2,50,000 कन्दों . 
It is mandatory to remove the weeds from the seedbed of केसर . 
अच्छी उपज does obtain by removing weeds चार बार in एक वर्ष . 
These weeds removing should be done successively in अगस्त and सितम्बर . 
In कश्मीर , generally no कोई भी खाद is नहीं डाली जाती है in फसल of केसर . 
But through प्रयोगों , हुआ है has been known that कार्बनिक खादों and composts have अच्छा प्रभाव over the flowers . 
In स्पेन लोग प्रयोग खाद of the feces . 
Put the Super Phosphate and Muriate of Phosphate with गोबर at the time of अन्तिम जुताई of the soil and डाले four installments of the urea in खड़ी फसल , after 20 , 45 , 65 and 85 85 दिनों बाद of अंकुरण . 
Generally , सिंचाई is not done in खेत of केसर , but after planting कन्द if नहीं होती है does not वर्षा within एक सप्ताह भीतर than सिंचाई should नहीं होती है done . 
Flowers are प्रातःकाल by हाथ in the morning and प्रातःकाल flowers are सुखाया जाता है up in धूप for three to five पांच दिनों . 
When फूल become dry , then stigmas -LRB- ( स्री केसर ) -RRB- are picked up . 
सबसे ऊपरी भाग of स्टिगमा which is of लाल नारंगी रंग , is of सबसे उच्च कोटि . 
निचले भाग of स्टिगमा is of a little lower कुछ निम्‍न कोटि . 
Which is called मागेंरा केसर . 
In this some white gleam is found which gets कीमत in बाजार . 
From स्‍त्री केसर , which has been taken out from 115 flowers स्‍त्री केसर is found , hence , होती है is clear that for स्‍त्री केसर there is आवश्यकता of almost 1,15,000 flowers . 
After four and चार पांच वर्षों बाद एक कन्द कई कन्दों gives जन्म to एक कन्द कई कन्दों . 
Due to that reason , having कई कन्द in सीमित स्थान वृद्धि stuck thus कई कन्द shoud होने planted seperately by digging . 
केसर is एक शाही मसाला . 
In भारत केसर is उपयोग in अनेक आयुर्वेदिक and Unani medicines . 
The impact of केसर is stimulating , hot and dry , due to that होती है is beneficial in digestive , urinary and आन्तरिक रोगों of women . 
Saffron is अमृत for heart patients . 
With the consumption of केसर men-women always remain young . 
In the ancient era also kings used to consume राजा -झौईण् महाराजा केसर daily . 
This is यही कारण that केसर is still सबसे बहुमूल्य मसाला in दुनिया . 
दो दिवसीय कार्यशाला was आयोजन in नैनीताल on May 13-14 , 2010 on ' विषय Conversion of पन्त कृषि in Uttrakhand ' by पन्त कृषि and Engineering university . 
At उद्‍घाटन अवसर of कार्यशाला the chief guest honorable governor Uttrakhand , श्रीमती माग्रेंट अल्वा in सम्बोधन to रोकने the migration of the youths and to call back the migrated youths in प्रदेश and to make them participate in विकास of there , बल जरूरत to make कृषि of प्रदेश beneficial . 
श्रीमती अल्वा has कहा that Uttrakhand is known for सुन्दरता and beauty in the whole world with भारत साथ -झौईण् साथ , but for विकास , , विकास , of कृषि there is आवश्यकता of the domino effect schemes . 
For कृषि विकास of प्रदेश she अपील to make the effective and useful plan , from that जीवन स्तर of पर्वतीय किसानों will improve . 
मा0 कृषि मंत्री उत्तराखण्ड श्री त्रिवेन्द्र सिंह रावत mentioned the biggest priorty of वर्तमान समय to save कृषि भूमि due to raising urbanization and industrialization pressure . 
According to the changing climate conditions itself , उन्होंने सुझाव to finalise the future agricultural development scheme . 
श्री रावत for पर्वतीय क्षेत्रों , saying सामुदायिक कृषि beneficial जोर to adopt the voluntary Chakbandi and to apply इसे in पूरे राज्य and to स्थापित a special agriculture zone -LRB- SAZ -RRB- . 
Vice Chancellor , Pantnagar University , संबोधन hoped in संबोधन that the Agricultural Development Program will मिलेगा नया आयाम by कार्यशाला . 
Simultaneously , विजन-2030 कार्यक्रम भी of the university will also get महत्वपूर्ण आधार . 
Dr. Suman Sahay of the Non Government organization ' Gene Campaign ' and डा0 शेखर पाठक made aware with the facts about the social zone in कृषि विकास and climate . 
The coordination of कार्यशाला was done by कुलपति Dr. B. S. Bist and डा0 बी0एस0 बिष्‍ट एवं सचिव , , राज्यपाल , , Mr. Ashok Pai . 
The intensive discussion was done dividing कार्यशाला in four groups , पशुपालन and social challenges , जैव विविधता and climate . 
On दूसरे दिन of the workshop while संबोधित समापन सत्र महामहिम राज्यपाल कहा that in पर्वतीय क्षेत्र परीक्षण of the recommendation related to कृषि , , बागवानी , husbandry etc. will be done by गठित कमेटी , which is formed under अध्यक्षता of Dr. M. S. Swaminathan . 
In कार्यशाला it was संस्तुतियां mainly to do कृषि and to make the settlement rule , to कम the malnutrition in महिलाओं and children , to देने encouragement to कृषि साथ -झौईण् साथ पशुपालन , , जड़ी -झौईण् बूटी उत्पादन , of बागवानी आदि with कृषि , on which calculated investment of 3000 crore rupees was प्रस्तावित to केन्द्र सरकार . 
After the research of the recommendations which were दी गई in कार्यशाला मिलेगा has been sent to राज्य सरकार by Pantahagar University after publishing titled ' Nainital Ghoshana ' , from which , मिलेगा will be helpful for राज्य सरकार to निर्धारित the agriculture related rule of राज्य and in its implementation . 
One day conference was organized in संयुक्‍त तत्वावधान of प्रसार शिक्षा निदेशालय of extension education and नई दिल्ली on 08 June , 2010 in the seminar room of the Agriculture University .

At this conference , it was बल to make the long term schemes for कृषि विकास in अगले पचास वर्ष and आवश्यकता to कार्य on that . 
At this conference , वैज्ञानिक , of कृषि विज्ञान केन्द्रों of the Universities , the representatives of the NGOs and प्रगतिशील कृषकों participated . 
With the motivation to connect महिलाओं directly from आर्थिक विकास कार्यक्रमों and to convey the obtained research achievements in क्षेत्र of गृह विज्ञान in संयुक्‍त तत्वाधान of Home Science University and प्रसार शिक्षा निदेशालय two days विषयक कार्यशाला on the subject ' दो दिवसीय ' गृह विज्ञान अनुसंधान and the extension interface ' on April 09-10 ,2010 was आयोजन in गृह विज्ञान महाविद्यालय of Home Science University . 
On उद्‍घाटन अवसर of इस कार्यशाला मुख्य अतिथि and vice chancellor Dr. B. S. Bisht in संबोधन emphasised आवश्यकता of a strong broadcasting mechanism for सार्थक प्रसार of the developed technologies in क्षेत्र of गृह विज्ञान . 
With this , उन्होंने expected from वैज्ञानिकों and अधिकारियों who are connected to गृह विज्ञान to collect सही जानकारी about different technologies which are developed in क्षेत्र of गृह विज्ञान and convey them to आम लोगों .

In संयुक्‍त तत्वाधान of कृषि विज्ञान केन्द्र , , रानीचौरी -LRB- Tihari-Gadhawal -RRB- and वानिकी and Mountain Agricultural University , रानीचौरी एक दिवसीय किसान मेला and कृषि प्रदर्शनी has been आयोजन on मई 17 , .

Activities were praised by मुख्य अतिथि while examining कृषि प्रदर्शनी .

Simultaneously , the problems related to कृषि were समाधान of कृषकों who आये हुए to मेले .

In इस किसान मेले almost 500 इस किसान and women participated .

During this , the dean of अधिष्‍ठाता वानिकी and Mountain Agricultural University , रानीचौरी , , डा0 एम0सी0 नौटियाल and dean , Engineering University , Bharsar , Dr. P. S. Bisht were also present . 
In the border सीमान्‍त क्षेत्रों of the tribal-dominated Joshimath block of जनपद was भ्रमण by Vice chancellor Dr. B. S. Bisht with वैज्ञानिकों साथ of कृषि विज्ञान केन्द्र , , ग्वालदम . 
Dr. Bisht said that , Pantnagar University with the help of भारतीय सेना is working on एक परियोजना to स्वरोजगार for self employment by connecting the villagers of विश्‍वविद्यालय इन सीमान्त क्षेत्रों with industry and पशुपालन . 
उन्होंने आह्वान the tenant farmers to grow the developed and new varieties regarding विभिन्‍न फसलों and their varieties which are being grown , by प्रक्षेत्रों the agriculture areas of these villages . 
The problems related to रोगों and कीटों of फसलों which were presented by सम्बन्धित कृषकों were समाधान by the in charge of डा0 एस0एम0ए0 रहमान . 
Representatives and tenant farmers made मा0 कुलपति aware with the enormous possibilities of उत्पादन and industrialization . 
In the Mana and गाँव मिनीकीट भी of सब्जियों were distributed by Dr. Bisht . 
उन्होंने said that to embody इस परियोजना very soon दल of कृषि वैज्ञानिकों of the Pantnagar University will भ्रमण इन क्षेत्रों . 
कृषि विज्ञान केन्द्र and वानिकी and Mountain Agricultural University , रानीचौरी were भ्रमण by Mr. Bhagat Singh Koshiyari , honorable Member of parliament and ex-chief minister , Uttrakhand on अप्रैल 08 , . 
कृषि विज्ञान केन्द्र of कृषि विज्ञान केन्द्र was praised heartily by him and कार्यक्रमों which are running by कृषि विज्ञान केन्द्र were applauded . 
उन्होंने also कहा that the Agricultural Science Center is सबसे उचित माध्यम to make कृषि विज्ञान केन्द्र किसानों reach तकनीकें of कृषि . 
प्रयासों made by वैज्ञानिकों of कृषि विज्ञान केन्द्र in the adverse conditions of पर्वतीय क्षेत्रों were सराहना by him . 
In तत्वावधान of प्रसार शिक्षा निदेशालय of Extension Education समीक्षा कार्यशाला was आयोजन on May 17-18 , 2010 in वानिकी and Mountain Agricultural University , रानीचौरी . 
The chief guest assistant director -LRB- ( कृषि प्रसार ) , -RRB- , डा0 ए0के0 मेहता has जोर to विकसित कृषकों as मानव संसाधन after training them technically . 
क्षेत्रीय परियोजना निदेशक , of the Regional Planning Commission , डा0 ए0के0 सिंह कहा that Agricultural Science centers by joining hand with जनपद Linear Departments the new developed technologies सम्बन्धित to कृषि should be exhibited . 
निदेशक of the Extension Education , वाई0पी0एस0 डबास बल on आवश्यकता to कार्य by कृषि विज्ञान केन्द्रों making जनपदवार रणनीति according to districts . 
In कार्यशाला the works from October 2009 to March 2010 of the Agricultural Science Centers of Uttrakhand were reviewed and a detailed action plan for आगामी एक वर्ष was discussed and it was implemented . 
From कुक्‍कुट इकाई at उम्र of seven weeks 2100 भार and at उम्र of 19 weeks eggs is being obtained . 
On प्रदर्शन per unit total 4500.00 rupees per खर्च आया . 
Looking at परिणामों the poultry farmers are मिल रहा है काफी प्रोत्साहन . 
From प्रर्दशन परिणाम यह निष्कर्ष comes out that if the varieties which is developed by कैरी will होगा adopted by कृषकों then there will होगा सुधार in आर्थिक स्तर of कृषकों . 
While releasing , these literatures were told very beneficial for circulating works and कृषकों . 
By कृषकों of the village Kehadgaon of the district Almora , the developmental block Syalde भूमि for स्थापना of अनुसंधान and प्रसार केन्द्र has been transferred for free to बल्लभ पंत कृषि and Engineering University , पंतनगर . 
मुख्य उद्देश्य of स्थापना of इस अनुसंधान and प्रसार केन्द्र is to तैयार पर्यावरण संतुलित आधारित मॉडल based on ecological balance and to do कार्य of प्रचार -झौईण् प्रसार for त्वरित विकास in क्षेत्र of agriculture , industrialization and animal husbandry in क्षेत्र of mountain river basins . 
For this , सहायता will be ली जायेगी from वैज्ञानिकों of विभिन्‍न विषयों and कार्यरत विभागों which are engaged in विकास . 
Dr. Bisht कहा that in the river basins of पर्वतीय क्षेत्रों there is पूरी क्षमता to fulfill the requirement of the fruit-vegetable and milk demands of पर्वतीय क्षेत्रों . 
निदेशक of Extension Education , डा0 डबास said that at first with the starting of the training program of business आधारित on कृषि , पौध and कि of फलों will be made available to सर्वप्रथम कृषकों for कृषि . 
By कृषि विज्ञान केन्द्र , , चमोली -LRB- ( ग्वालदम ) -RRB- for ग्रामीण युवाओं ' विषयक प्रशिक्षण on the subject ' व्यवसायिक उत्पादन of the campost ' was आयोजन on February 21-25 , 2011 . 
In पर्वतीय क्षेत्रों most of अधिकांश कृषक are dependent on खेती for their living , for that they are उपयोग खाद ही which are formed traditionally . 
Due to having जंगल over here animal fossils are obtained easily which is the main part of the biological techniques . 
डा0 रहमान कहा that generally कृषक बिना प्रयोग कच्‍चे गोबर which is not rotten in खेत , from that समस्या of कुरमुला कीट emerges and हो जाती है harms more to फसलों . 
While प्रशिक्षण दौरान जानकारी to keep पशुओं healthy was दी गयी by पशुपालन विशेषज्ञ , , Dr. Uma Nauliya . 
In the past three months , चार प्रशिक्षणों were आयोजन by केन्द्र , in that 49 males and 22 females who आये from 07 Gram Sabha participated . 
In इन कार्यक्रमों , विस्तृत जानकारी on सिंचाई तकनीक , , जैविक कृषि , of सब्जी in poly tunnel , जैविक कृषि , in पर्वतीय क्षेत्रों , cultivation processes of उत्पादन , etc. topics were दी गयी to trainee and on बेलिएविन्ग् ' सिद्धान्त of ' Seeing is believing ' through किसानों were प्रशिक्षित . 
By कृषि विज्ञान केन्द्र , , Jakhadhar one day farmer fair was आयोजन on March28 , 2011 .
