In इस मेले more than 500 कृषकों from the different villages of जनपद participated . 
On इस अवसर , जिले कृषि विभाग , , कृषि विभाग , , कृषि विभाग , , village and NGOs made कृषकों aware about their schemes and गतिविधियों by setting up stalls . 
कृषकों observed the presented polythene mulch in प्रक्षेत्र of केन्द्र , to cultivate बेमौसमी सब्जी in the polyhouse of the small investment and तकनीकों through the conference by कृषकों got समाधान of समस्याओं and curiosity by वैज्ञानिकों of केन्द्र . 
Under the Large Scale Demonastration of I.P.M. technology in इन उत्तराखण्ड परियोजना , selected villages under the schemes of एक दिवसीय प्रशिक्षण was आयोजित in गोसनी and Pardhyani . 
From every village तीस कृषकों were selected . 
Despite that , विस्तृत जानकारी was देने on विषयों according to जलवायु the varieties which देने more अधिक उत्पादन in low - tunnel playhouses etc. . 
Under परियोजना by the center hybrid बीज and ट्राइकोडर्मा भी was made available for अन्तर्गत कृषकों . 
From सौजन्य of the agriculture division under the special component plant on विषय of तकनीक of कृषकों दो दिवसीय कार्यशाला was आयोजित on फरवरी 8-9 , ,2011 . 
सहायक निदेशक of the water resources , श्री आर0के0 आजाद , , while inaugurating कार्यशाला कहा that looking at आबादी , , reducing ploughing and on समय वर्षा etc. circumstances , कृषकों will have to adopt आधुनिक कृषि तकनीक . 
केंद्र in प्रभारी अधिकारी , , डॉ0 एम0पी0 सिंह कहा that from केंद्र जानकारी and परामर्श of agriculture , कृषि बागवानी , , the vegetable सब्जी उत्पादन has been giving always . 
डा0 आराधना जोशी and डा0 अजय कुमार सिंह made the presentation from नर्सरी of सब्जी पौधों to महत्व of संरक्षित खेती in इस कार्य . 
डा0 बी0के0 सिंह said महत्वपूर्ण कार्यक्रम of कृषि विकास to मत्स्य उत्पादन . 
While कुलपति has expressed the satisfaction towards the works done in संरक्षित खेती , , vegetable production etc. fields . 
Vice Chancellor called the tenant farmers of क्षेत्र that to improve आर्थिक स्थिति instead of परम्परागत खेती encourage परम्परागत खेती with तकनीक . 
Dr. Bisht said that in आगामी वर्षों to देने the encouragement to poultry farming , कुक्‍कुट पालन , , कार्यक्रम will होगी conducted , from that आर्थिक स्थिति of कृषकों will होगी strong . 
उन्होंने सुई looking at उत्पादन of टमाटर in Sui under छत नीचे of the ex-army man Tara Dutt Kharkwal 's house . 
Dr. B. S. Bisht कहा that according to पर्वतीय जलवायु of the hilly area the encouragement will be दिया जाएगा to उत्पादन of उन्‍नत प्रजाति of hens . 
उन्होंने कहा that due to the change in मौसम चक्र मशरूम and मत्स्य उत्पादन कार्यक्रमों should be encouraged . 
Dr. Bisht आग्रह महिलाओं that they should आएं in आगे to अधिक उत्पादन in less lands by using आधुनिक कृषि तकनीक properly through कृषि विज्ञान केन्द्र . 
Cultivation is माध्यम , through that people can live with respect . 
At केन्द्र , एक दिवसीय किसान मेला and कृषि प्रदर्शनी was आयोजन in स्यालद on मार्च 28 , . 
While inaugurating the fair the head of the block , श्री राधा रमन उप्रेती कहा that by adopting the new techniques developed in कृषि and सम्बन्धित क्षेत्र कृषि उत्पादन may हुए increased . 
With the stalls of केन्द्र अधिकारियों of स्टॉल साथ -झौईण् साथ जनपद स्तरीय रेखीय विभागों and representatives of the NGOs also gave जानकारी to कृषकों about the schemes which is being run in स्टॉल साथ -झौईण् साथ जनपद स्तरीय रेखीय विभागों and organisations . 
In मेले almost 530 लगभग 530 कृषकों participated . 
यह प्रशिक्षण which were आयोजित were सम्बन्धित to the agricultural diversity , जैविक खेती , , maun palan , मौन पालन , , फसल उत्पादन , पॉलीहाउस उपयोग of the poly house and maintenance of the agricultural equipments and औद्यानिकी फसलों . 
From इन प्रशिक्षण कार्यक्रमों 488 trainee got benefitted . 
फसल of रबी is standing in खेतों . 
There is सम्भावना of कमी in उत्पादन of फसल and फलों due to अपेक्षित वर्षा than expected in जनवरी माह of January . 
The मौसम of the Jayad 's सब्जियों is आ रहा है . 
Do पक्षेती in different stages from फरवरी to अप्रैल , late from समय विभिन्‍न सब्जियों like lady finger , tomato , chilli , brinjal , pumpkin , gouard , thus constantly for समय उपलब्धता of विभिन्‍न सब्जियों will be maintained and लाभ could be obtained without season also . 
Always खरीदें बीज from authetic shops or Agricultural University . 
Before sowing treat पूर्व बीजों with जैविक कल्चर or रसायनों . 
In गर्मी यही सब्जियाँ देती है अच्छी कीमत in बाजार . 
Newspaper , Radio , durdarshan देते हैं , सूचना कृषि सम्बन्धी to agricuture , simultaneously , agriculture divison and विकास खण्ड भी are also working to convey सूचना to किसानों . 
कृषि परिस्थितिकी कृषि सूचना according to जलवायु and agriculture condition then उपयोग खेतों वांछित लाभ can be obtained . 
Connecting the available modern उपलब्ध आधुनिक कृषि तकनीक with उपलब्ध आधुनिक कृषि तकनीक , it could be reached to the far established कृषकों quickly . 
In the human-society , स्थान of खेती has been important due to तीन कारणों , it will be . 
पहला कारण is that which often comes in the news . 
Despite तमाम औद्योगिकीकरण and विकास आज भी बहुत बड़ा हिस्सा of the human race stay in गाँवों and for their living depends on खेती , and पशुपालन आदि . 
Including भारत in अनेक देशों of दुनिया आज भी सबसे बड़ा स्रोत of रोजगार is खेती and animal husbandary . 
In the farms the attack of कीटों and रोगों has increased , danger has raised and stability has आ गया है in पैदावार . 
For उतनी ही पैदावार किसान have to इस्तेमाल रासायनिक खाद , , pesticides and पानी in मात्रा . 
एक स्रोत of किसान संकट is modern technology . 
In भारत the prosperity of हरित क्रान्ति was सीमित रही to खुशहाली कुछ क्षेत्रों , , some classes and कुछ फसलों . 
But the time of इस सीमित खुशहाली now लद गए also . 
From last six to seven पिछले छह -झौईण् सात वर्षों the suicide cases of किसानों is continued . 
This is एक अभूतपूर्ण स्थिति which is a symbol of जबरदस्त संकट . 
But indifferent from this सरकारें of अप्रभावित भारत is moving ahead on राह of the globalization related improvements . 
Under these improvements कानून of शिथिल is being paralysed , कानून and कानून are being made , from the selling and buying of अन्तर्गत जमीन to बीज आपूर्ति , , कांट्रेक्ट खेती , , विपणन आदि etc. in सभी गतिविधियों of कांट्रेक्ट खेती , multinational company is being दी जा रही है complete freedom and putting aside सारी चिन्ताओं and warnings the dangerous technology like जीन सम्मिश्रण is being permitted . 
Thus , a cruel and inhuman अभियान is चल रहा है to हाथ over खेती to कम्पनियों and कम आबादी भी related to खेती . 
But एक अहम सवाल is being forgotten in this blind race . 
पटनायक has been एक प्रमुख समाजवादी चिन्तक and the worker of this era of भारत . 
भूमिका of जनान्दोलनों in भारतीय राजनीति उन्होंने recognised quite early , समझा , , made एक रिश्ता with them and tries to देने them एक वैचारिक दिशा . 
वे also remained a staunch supporter of किसान आन्दोलन भी . 
In किसी भी प्रक्रिया of the system-change वे used to assume एक महत्त्वपूर्ण भूमिका of किसानों and farmer movements . 
In अस्सी of the eighties and नब्बे big farmer movements occurred in भारत . 
The big sit-ins and rallies of किसानों has occurred , in those lakhs of किसानों participated . 
शोषण , of किसानों , do not न मिलना , उचित दाम of the cultivation , कर्ज , over किसानों , the raising taxes over किसानों , बिल आदि of बिजली etc. were his main issues . 
आन्दोलन can not नहीं हो सकता conservative . 
That can not run like a trade union , किशन पटनायक has also outlined , this issue . 
आन्दोलन of संगठित मजदूरों may हो सकता है conservative . 
वेतन of मजदूरों of एक फैक्ट्री may increase under मौजूदा व्यवस्था अन्दर ; it is possible without व्यवस्था -झौईण् परिवर्तन बगैर in मौजूदा व्यवस्था अन्दर . 
But आमदनी of किसानों can not increase in मौजूदा व्यवस्था . 
कारण is not just this , that the number of किसानों is quite high and they are an important and the biggest हिस्सा of देश . 
After freedom of the colonies also यह शोषण is continued from the new-colonization ways . 
Not नहीं मिलने मौका to exploit the colonies or new-colonies outside पूँजीवाद finds the colony inside देश बाहर . 
सच्‍चिदानन्द सिन्हा and किशन पटनायक have दिया है इसे नाम of ' Internal Colony ' . 
गाँव and किसानों itself सेना and arm-manufacturing and कार्यक्रम of अन्तरिक्ष अभियान kept चलता रहा in the United Nation . 
Chinese movement थी mainly the movement of किसानों ही itself . 
इसने gave चीन a new and true देशी रूप . 
But due to हावी of वही पूँजीवादी विचार ही of औद्योगिक विकास , चीन भी is also जा रहा है on राह of the capitalism globalization . 
Even there very rapidly and on the huge level किसानों and villagers are being शिकार of बदहाली and migration . 
In the last of अस्सी of the eighties , in भारत किसान आन्दोलन था at अपने . 
In कर्नाटक in नेतृत्व , of Professor M. D. Najudaswami , in Maharashtra in नेतृत्व , of शरद जोशी and in पश्‍चिम उत्तर प्रदेश , , पंजाब in नेतृत्व , of महेन्द्र सिंह टिकैत , a huge movement storm of किसान आन्दोलनों was चल रही थी . 
एकता of these movements and समन्वित कार्यवाही could have दे सकती थी a new turn to इतिहास of देश . 
But यह ऐतिहासिक मौका हाथ from हाथ . 
On 2 October , 1989 , in दिल्ली , event of dispute on stage in विशाल रैली of बोट क्लब थी like a symbol . 
It will be useful to discuss an event in this context . 
Possibly , होगी , will होगी , the issue of पिछले वर्ष ही of the Boat Club Rally , when अन्तरराज्यीय समन्वय समिति had been organised of the farmer organisations . 
किशन पटनायक भी थे also present at इस बैठक . 
उन्होंने कहा that since किसान is the biggest class of देश , स्वार्थ can not नहीं हो सकता different from देश स्वार्थ . 
उसे will have to think about the benefit of देश . 
किशन पटनायक also कहा यह भी that for बेहतरी of किसानों the problem will not be solved just by asking more money for सिर्फ कृषि उपज . 
शरद जोशी , later became the staunch supporter of उदारीकरण and capitalism . 
That 's why , perhaps वे wanted to away from बहस at उस बैठक . 
शरद जोशी showed the false dream to किसानों that from नीतियों of निर्यात of उपज will increase and they will मिलेंगे आकर्षक दाम . 
आयात of the agriculture कृषि उपज raised and दाम गिर गए down in home markets also . 
By progressing शरद जोशी तो बन गए राज्यसभा सदस्य of parliament and also बन गए अध्यक्ष भी of the ' Agriculture Investment and Price Commission ' , but the farmers of Maharashtra पहुँच गए to the border of किसान आत्महत्याओं . 
Eventually , अन्तरराष्‍ट्रीय बाजार does not काम with the good will of शरद जोशी , powerful Western Countries , works according to their huge donation and benefits of विशाल बहुराष्‍ट्रीय कम्पनियों . 
This is एक महत्त्वपूर्ण सबक for किसान आन्दोलन . 
We are used to of closing अभ्यस्त and seeing it . 
सफलता of such shut downs is evaluated on the shutting down of shops , the movement of rickshaws is also closed , हो गया was like completely closed . 
But the ' ' बन्द ' दूकानदार down ' of किसान is not the ' ' बन्द ' दूकानदार down ' of shopkeepers , होगा will have a different form . 
वह could ले सकता है the form to refuse to pay the taxes and debts . 
अध्यक्ष of Sangham , नायडू , which has been गिरफ्तार under the national safety ordinance , gave suggestion to किसानों that stop sending दूध , , साग -झौईण् सब्जी , , and other things to towns . 
If आप will ask इन किसान नेताओं for any paper or पुस्तिका or any printed description of माँगों , in that , प्रकाश is given over their perspective , आप will be disappointed . 
For the advertisement of माँगों no posters will be seen anywhere . 
Among them एक नेता कोशिश that उनमें would याद सूची of उन माँगों , which had been determined before सात -झौईण् आठ साल पहले back at the time of the establishment of the Vyavsaigal Sangam . 
संगठन रहा in papers for लम्बे समय . 
But shortly M.G.R. started to खेलने लगे double role ' . 
इससे announced to gain the confidence of गरीब किसानों that last remained ऋण of small and गरीब किसानों will नहीं हुए forgiven , but गरीब किसानों did not get प्रभावित by this . 
Now they assume M.G.R. शत्रु . 
Due to this , recently a normal debate , which could have been solved normally at स्थानीय स्तर , बन बैठा आधार to blaze the state wide anger . 
तमिलनाडु has प्रभावित कर्नाटक , but its echo could not be listen in केरल . 
Perhaps कारण for इसका is this that केरल has फसलें ही like coconut , cardamom , cashew , coffee , rubber etc. . 
Among them , अच्छे दाम is मिल जाते हैं , of the few , in कांग्रेसी नेताओं joining किसानों that they do आन्दोलन , but इनमें will not have any impact . 
किसान are guiding किसान आन्दोलन , आलोचना on इस बात is meaningless . 
It is obvious , in प्रारम्भिक चरण of any self motivated स्वतः स्फूर्त्त आन्दोलन the guidance by educated and better बेहतर लोगों in financial perspective . 
Small and किसान get प्रेरणा from संघर्ष and त्याग and शिक्षित and relatively rich किसान do काम of वाणी of किसान . 
This is यही कारण that प्रेस and शह will देंगे support to ऐसी कोशिशों from which नेतृत्व of किसान आन्दोलन would आ जाए into हाथ of political parties . 
यह भी will also wish this that आन्दोलन should be in the hand of लाबी of धनी किसानों , thus whenever there will be wish यह भी could be कुचला or stopped . 
Like all the other professional politicians कम्युनिस्ट नेता भी are also समझ इस स्थिति . 
Thus किसान आन्दोलन , , with its completeness , is एक चुनौती and एक चुभन for every political party . 
देखें तो with another perspective , then आन्दोलन is एक विस्तार of आन्दोलन . 
In दक्षिण , आन्दोलन of the backward castes has reached to बिन्दु . 
Middle castes have raised सामाजिक स्तर , in राजनीतिक रूप नेताओं pushed the brahmins relatively in कमजोर हालत . 
All of these are self motivated , unorganised and in conservative meanings apolitical movements . 
All these movements are उभार रहे हैं राजनीति of their own style . 
नेता of Maharashtra , Punjab , Haryana , Madhya Pradesh , Uttar Pradesh farmer movements had आए हुए थे . 
The leader of कर्नाटक and तमिलनाडु नहीं था present . 
नंजुदास्वामी and Ravi Varma of कर्नाटक had been गिरफ्तार in the ' Rail Roko ' ' रेल रोको ' आन्दोलन . 
Many papers were read about संगठन of राज्यों and वर्तमान स्थिति of आन्दोलन . 
After चर्चा बाद on that , argument happened on कार्यक्रमों and वैचारिक पहलुओं भी also . 
In बहस , clash of मतों occurred . 
इस प्रकार of the exchange of the ideas between ' किसानों ' and scholars was happening पहली बार . 
Thus , कुछ असहिष्णुता थी obvious . 
But from आलोचना of the intellectuals शरद जोशी used to get very angry , due to कई लोगों had to stop their presentation . 
In Varanasi Seminar , चर्चा could not happened about the relation of farmer-labor . 
Even though some causerie happened . 
There थी an expectation of विस्तृत बहस on विस्तृत बहस . 
But due to शरद जोशी नहीं हो पाई did not happen . 
Once बहस should हो जानी चाहिए happened on this among नेताओं and scholars of आन्दोलन . 
If बहस will happen then कल्याण of scholars will happen and किसानों भी also तो फायदा . 
किसानों will not have कोई नया नुकसान from बहस , because no any modern science is in पक्ष of किसानों . 
If बहस will happen then यह बात will आएगी in सामने that these sciences are वास्तविकता from लोगों of भारत and reality . 
Economics has not studied किसानों yet as एक समूह . 
Where ever , the big landlords are मालिक of the thousands and hundred acre , there is the meaning of संघर्ष . 
This is not just about सिर्फ बेनामी जमीन . 
कानून has been made yet in खेती of coffee , rubber , cashew , tea etc. . 
Communist governments also do not want . 
आन्दोलन of कर्नाटक criticizes the owners of coffee plantations openly . 
Whatever discussion happened in सेमिनार from that कुछ पहलू of शरद जोशी विचारों आए in सामने . 
To present his own thought , उनको needs ज्यादा समय . 
But whatever came to सुनने at सेमिनार , from that यह लगा that in किसान आन्दोलन कई प्रकार of विचार and perspective may emerge . 
कुछ युवा वैज्ञानिक भी had also आए थे to सेमिनार . 
ये सारे लोग are प्रतिभाशाली and want to make an alternative scientific methodology . 
स्थापना is that तकनीक is made according to अर्थव्यवस्था , thus , according to अर्थव्यवस्था तकनीक has been made . 
सिर्फ तकनीक , but वैज्ञानिक चिन्तन भी is also वैज्ञानिक चिन्तन भी to it . 
Without knowing वैज्ञानिक कारणों बगैर itself , किसानों has looked at यूकेलिप्टस yet with the eye of doubt . 
This सुखा देती है , up the crop lands , यह showing लालच of पैसे to the farmers wants to involve in खेती of यूकेलिप्टस moving from खेती of अनाज , eventually यह will आएगा in the use of -झौईण् विदेशी उद्योगपतियों . 
यह is उगानेवाला पेड़ which does not grow न फूल , फल . 
कर्नाटक किसान आन्दोलन had campaigned to remove यूकेलिप्टस . 
But due to गलत नीति of किसान आन्दोलन , एक ऐसी स्थिति may emerge which is against our motivation . 
When यूकेलिप्टस or soya bean will start to grow in ज्यादा मात्रा the country-abroad industrialists will organize to लेने होने लगेगा in cheap , खेती will होने लगेगा अधीन to them completely . 
Yet खेती is not सम्पूर्ण अधीन completely to पूँजीपतियों . 
आन्दोलन of उत्तर प्रदेश भारतीय किसान यूनियन and नेता Mahendra Singh Tickat has बने हुए हैं the motivation-center for सारे देश किसान . 
The personality of टिकैत , and टिकैत face also the matter of चर्चा . 
बोलचाल and face of नेता never before this had been that similar to बोलचाल and face of आम आदमी of गाँव . 
The opposite of इसका is happening . 
from the awakening of राजनेता and बुद्धिजीवी both are feeling that some one better than them has आ गया है . 
Looking आक्रोश against सरकार like उत्तर प्रदेश होना is obvious for राजीव गांधी to होना scared and to देना the new instructions to योजना आयोग . 
जो लोग who कहते हैं , किसान आन्दोलन of धनी किसानों to किसान आन्दोलन , in धनी किसानों and धनी किसानों is synonymous . 
There would be एक झटका to ऐसे दिमाग भी also by मेरठ आन्दोलन . 
टिकैत has reduced खर्च which is being done on marriage functions till this , that in बारात not more than ten people could go . 
Can any कोई वर्ग of भारतीय समाज which is going toward more prosperity from prosperity for थोड़े समय भी also adopt this ? 
किताब लिखनेवाले and communist politicians , both पूछते एक सवाल from टिकैत - what are तुम doing about भूमिहीनों ? 
It should be assumed the limitation of the mental bankruptcy . 
टिकैत is not कोई प्रोफेसर , and उनमें does not have कोई महत्त्वाकांक्षा to make सरकार . 
सवाल तो can be asked from the professors only or it should be asked from those who play राजनीति of power . 
टिकैत accepts that वे is running a trade union of किसानों . 
No one asked from the those who run the trade unions of rail staffs or post office staffs that what are तुम doing about बीड़ी मजदूरों and rickshaw pullars ? 
Then why is टिकैत asked about भूमिहीनों ? 
यह बात is like of कम्युनिस्टों . 
फर्क is just that कम्युनिस्ट says भूमिहीन मजदूर walk behind भूमिहीन मजदूर and नेता of किसान आन्दोलन कहता है that walk behind किसानों पीछे . 
In the map of both communist movement and the farmer movement महत्त्व of भूमिहीन मजदूर is on the second number . 
Thus , raising सवाल of भूमिहीनों कोई कम्युनिस्ट can not hit the stakes . 
The most important सबसे महत्त्वपूर्ण बात about मेरठ आन्दोलन is its defeat . 
Despite of such a huge and आन्दोलन एक भी माँग of किसानों was fufilled . 
किसान came back empty handed . 
माँगपत्र नहीं था such that accepting कुछ प्रमुख बातों , क्रान्ति would have occurred . 
ऐसी माँग have been accepted earlier . 
By blazing हिंसा also टिकैत could have मनवा सकते थे कुछ माँगों . 
If किसान आन्दोलन suppose to be kept under किसान नेतृत्व , then encouragement can not be नहीं दिया जा सकता है to हिंसा . 
By blazing हिंसा some instantaneous कुछ तात्कालिक माँगें could have been fulfilled , but for always the picture of आन्दोलन would have बदल जाता . 
मैंने have criticized the critics of टिकैत , they are professors of दूसरी धारा . 
मैंने had कोशिश to ध्वस्त तर्क of those urban intellectuals who कोशिश to retrograde it by कहकर किसान आन्दोलन of धनी किसानों to किसान आन्दोलन ; they feel negative and absurd the leader like टिकैत . 
To बताना about कमियों of किसी आन्दोलन is one thing and to announce that दुश्मन is another thing . 
The leftist professors of the universities have घोषित दुश्मन to किसान आन्दोलन . 
एक बुनियादी गलतफहमी of the communist science has still been retained that शोषित लोग with their movements start to form the opinion of system-change . 
They should have known after the hundred and डेढ़ सौ साल बाद of अनुभव and in their iconography the should have done necessary improvement that from the cohesion of आन्दोलन of शोषितों and आन्दोलन itself गति of system-change is formed . 
After आजादी बाद , आन्दोलन of मजदूरों and urban staffs रहा on the bulge . 
इसको भी did not get also the intellect support of the leftist professors . 
Assume that without depending on बाहरी नेताओं the revolution of विद्रोह occur , then will we पूछेंगे to them that what तो तुम कहते हो about the salary of वेतनमान and Afganistan . 
If तुम्हारा will not जवाब to this then your revolution is wrong . 
While talking with किसी भी वामपंथी प्रोफेसर साथ for पाँच मिनट वह इस्तेमाल three times ' धनी किसान ' शब्द rich farmer ' . 
If परिभाषा of इस शब्द is asked then words will not come from मुँह . 
Rich ' ' धनी ' शब्द indicated toward व्यय क्षमता ओर , indicates toward जीवन स्तर ओर . 
In भारतीय परिस्थिति with taking how much कितनी व्यय क्षमता or जीवन स्तर has धनी वर्ग been परिभाषित ? 
What is संख्या of धनी किसानों in विभिन्‍न राज्यों ? 
On इन सवालों , professors have not written एक भी किताब yet . 
Any less literate , अर्धशिक्षित किसान नेता if will want to तय नीति on इन सवालों , then after reading which book he will देगा राय ? 
Beside supreme being which kind of resource of ज्ञान उसके पास can have . 
In Hindustan leftists especially socialist प्रयास to किसानों as a poor class after आजादी बाद . 
लोहिया had लिखा था a long essay about the problems of किसानों in that उन्होंने had लिखा था the things to adopt a new perspective and विकेन्द्रित व्यवस्था . 
The Facet of communists towards the problems of किसानों was full of contradictions . 
They assume किसानों low bourgeoisie ' -LRB- petty bourgeoisie -RRB- . 
But कम्युनिस्ट or समाजवादी , , anyone from both , did not run आन्दोलन in देश . 
There था a vision-problem in कम्युनिस्टों and socialist have never been अच्छे संगठनकर्ता also . 
कम्युनिस्टों established अच्छा संगठन of industrial worker , but socialists neither established worker-organization and nor farmer-organization . 
At इस समय , among the communists and socialists , no one has संगठन of किसानों in देश . 
But between this the self motivated movements have raised . 
But beside socialists and communists a powerful class of rich and baron किसानों always प्रयास to do राजनीति from the side of किसानों . 
स्वार्थ नहीं था in , to raise समस्याओं of किसानों . 
ये wanted that any progressive solution should not come out of the land-problem , कानून like बटाईदारी of the border or bataidari should not हो सके लागू thus स्वार्थ could हो सके saved . 
Thus in different parties they had a strong lobby -LRB- प्रभावकारी समूह which make the pressure -RRB- . 
But गरीब किसानों न तो न तो कोई लाबी ही and they न तो get unified . 
देखें वैचारिक पक्ष . 
आर्थिक नीति , of पश्‍चिमी देशों , is आधारित on इस धारणा that the important economical work will होगा , done in औद्योगिक क्षेत्र , बड़ा हिस्सा of आबादी will indulge in औद्योगिक क्षेत्र itself . 
In खेती is a subsidiary activity , very few बहुत थोड़े लोग are indulged in इस क्षेत्र . 
in those , खेती , runs on प्रणाली of व्यापार , after loss in that , government fulfills . 
ब्रिटेन like ब्रिटेन does not take चिन्ता of इस बात that अनाज is produced at यहाँ or not . 
उद्योगपति and किसान , , for both of them व्यापारी is necessary . 
उद्योगपति keeps nailing व्यापारियों व्यापारियों earns less benefit in comparision of उद्योगपति but by बेचकर उत्पादन of किसानों वह becomes more rich than किसानों because किसानों do not have कोई नियंत्रण over that . 
यह बात is not just in यह बात of केवल अनाज , होती है also applies on व्यापारिक फसलों and forest-cultivation also . 
व्यापारी of the forest-cultivation ले जाते हैं it almost free -LRB- यानी at very low prices -RRB- and sell at very high prices , like-chironji , figs , bidi-leaf , etc. . 
After बेच their products at सर्वोच्‍च कीमत when farmer goes to खरीदने जाता है - the factory stuff-either clothes to wear or resource of उत्पादन - then उसे has to खरीदने जाता है - that at सर्वोच्‍च कीमत , because सर्वोच्‍च कीमत of किसान करखनियाँ stuff from बड़े शहर , , from बड़े शहर , to small town and from there while आते -झौईण् आते to village market increase चार बार . 
Thus , we देखते हैं that as किसान gets very low बहुत कम दाम whereas as खरीदार उसे has to pay बहुत कम दाम . 
The solution of इन समस्याओं will have to होगा - found - when किसान sell his products then उसे should मिलें , सही दाम , like this when उसे buys then उसे should मिलें , in सही दाम . 
The investment of करखनियाँ product will have to be examined . 
Meanwhile लागत of general usage things will have to be घोषणा . 
लागत of the things of the general needs should not नहीं होना चाहिए more than the margin . 
If this will होगा यह आधार of the coast , दाम of चीनी will not होगा more than two rupees per किलो . 
Till now सरकार has made आयोग to तय the cost of some products of खेती ही , which name is ' Agrictlure-Rate-Commission ' . 
In पूरे देश , there is management of सिंचाई in the just one-fourth of एक -झौईण् चौथाई खेतों ही . 
The condition of more than half of किसानों is miserable . 
They depends one प्रकृति very much that in हर तीन साल one gets affected by flood , draught or पाले and दाम भी of बीज does not return also . 
एक जोरदार माँग should होनी चाहिए there from the side of किसानों ओर of सारे देश that in एक निश्‍चित अवधि - - सात साल or - सात साल - in हर खेत the arrangement of पानी must होनी चाहिए done . 
Where ever from the side of सरकार ओर there is the arrangement of सिंचाई , there in the initial three-four years tax for सिंचाई should not applicable because यह समय is consumed by किसानों to do the new arrangements and to सीखने the new techniques of खेती . 
What will होगा , क्या नतीजा after applying इन सारी नई नीतियों in खेती , Just कल्पना होगा , . 
पहला नतीजा तो would होगा this that there will होगा जरूरत of the huge financial in दस वर्षों in the agriculture-field and for सरकार has to काटने होंगे दूसरे खर्च . 
Then this is एक महत्त्वपूर्ण सवाल that from where खर्च would be काटा जाए thus in the huge level money would be खर्च and हालत of किसानों would improve . 
उत्पादन of such things will have to be banned . 
For उदाहरण , in बाजार still food is prepared and बिकता . 
थाली of two rupees is बिकती and even hundred rupees also . 
In the five star hotels of बड़े शहरों , even plates of more than a hundred rupees are बिकती . 
If the workers of गाँवों will मिलें तो loan and दूसरी सुविधाएँ then they can also make shoes like Bata . 
That 's why in हर जिले , there will होंगे कारखाना or many factories of the shoes or in हर जिले , there will होंगे one or many factories of matchstick , clothes etc. despite of that there will होंगे just fist full factories in देश . 
In कारखाने will होगी started to open then there will होगी जरूरत to open the schools for तकनीकी प्रशिक्षण . 
In ऐसी स्थिति , girl and boys after passing मैट्रिक by connecting with the factories will सीख सकेंगे काम and later हो जा सकता है could हो जा सकता है their occupation . 
With study , they would be able to काम भी also . 
In शिक्षा , शिक्षा is separate and रोजगार is separate . 
But in बदली व्यवस्था , there will होगा opposite of इसका . 
The center of आज economy is केन्द्र शहरी उद्योग , hence everything is urban-centered . 
If खेती will हो जाए the main occupation then प्रशासन will तो to हो जाए सारी व्यवस्था which decentralized गाँव and empowered पंचायत . 
अमरीका and रूस भी want also that in मुल्क like भारत there should be केन्दित political and financial syste , they could fulfill स्वार्थ easily . 
Hence , if किसान आन्दोलन will go for long then इसलिए will not तो to fight with पूँजीपतियों and towns they इसलिए will तो to face the challenges of दुनिया superpowers also . 
In the situation when सरकार blaze हिंसा , बहस of हिंसा and अहिंसा comes up . 
भ्रम often creates doubt . 
Despite of looking this that आन्दोलन will लेगा the support of हिंसा or of अहिंसा , , we should look इस सवाल in दूसरे ढंग . 
किसान is a class which can not संघर्ष for लम्बे समय taking the support of हिंसा . 
To ऐसा so , उसे will have to unify in the different ways , will have to collect weapons , have to hide . 
By ऐसा so , वह will not be नहीं रह जाएगा , किसान , but will be a soldier . 
अच्छी सरकार is of दो तरह - without बगैर किसान अच्छी सरकार for बगैर किसान benefit , then , अच्छी सरकार of बगैर किसान . 
Now we are काम for the first . 
Now सवाल is this that किसान are organised for them for how long . 
If किसान is not संगठित स्वयं , then this is not यह सवाल that सरकार is सुन रही है or not . 
किसान are really organized , there will होंगे तीन प्रमाण of this . 
First , except baronial and पूँजीवादी किसान rest of पूँजीवादी किसान are together or not . 
Second , माँगें are clear or not . 
किसान are not सम्पत्तिविहीन less or education less . 
Then why do they राजनीतिक उपयोग राजनीतिक उपयोग of their majority of संख्या ? 
For किसानों interest , what should होना चाहिए changed in राज्य -झौईण् व्यवस्था ? 
In हित , why does not वह पेश a political opinion ? 
इसका has been must , to find कारण for this . 
आज समय is the transition period . 
In वर्तमान परिस्थिति गाँव and किसान have not been finished because गति of विकास has not been fasten . 
शहरीकरण or मशीनीकरण of कृषि should होना चाहिए with the speed , is not happening with that speed . 
Hence , अस्तित्व of गाँव and किसानों is being tolerated . 
विकास will हो जाएगा fulfilled , आबादी of गाँव will migrate to शहर completely and instead of छोटे -झौईण् छोटे खेत यान्त्रिक खेती will हो जाएगा started on छोटे -झौईण् छोटे खेत . 
In राजनीति , किसान by getting together can माँग for समय -झौईण् समय to समय -झौईण् समय , but the administration of राजनीति and finance should होकर done taking in center the interest of किसान - to कहना this is even the opposition of विरोधी and is the opposition of विरोधी also . 
Gandhism was never विचार of एक राजनीतिक समूह . 
In ऐसी स्थिति , किसान centered केन्द्रित राजनीति नहीं थी possible . 
To कहना this that the सारी नीतियाँ of देश should होनी चाहिए , according to विकास of बड़े उद्योगों , seems proper . 
संस्कृति and साहित्य has been making इस धारणा in the mind of the common people . 
In this situation , how will राजनीति of the farmers will होगी possible ? 
Leave बात of Asia-Africa , in पूर्वी यूरोप and ex-states of भूतपूर्व सोवियत संघ also बात is emerging from that , पुराने ज्ञान is being shattered . 
Will there हो पाएगी motorcars with हर नागरिक पास of the countries like यूगोस्लाविया , , Bulgaria , Ujabekistan . 
How many occupation will be open to establish the half of आधी आबादी , of दुनिया in the towns , who are poor at this time ? 
If all the natural resources of दुनिया -LRB- to और fuels -RRB- would हो पाएगा finished up in ) 50 साल अन्दर , even though , the Europianization of the half population of दुनिया हो पाएगा done ? 
From आधुनिकीकरण of गाँव which kind of विकास will होगा , there , समझने मॉडल of होगा , and to anticipate बनावट of होगा , , वर्तमान केरल could होगा , देखा जा सकता है , where फर्क between the urban and rural is not visualized . 
Among the countrysides there are some townships . 
केरल ही is the most educated राज्य in भारत . 
Actually , the scientific facts may be इस्तेमाल for कई प्रकार of technologies . 
Technology may हो सकती है big and may हो सकती है run on small finance also . 
But बहादुरी तो of विज्ञान will होगी proved when होगी will होगी इस्तेमाल by कम पूँजीवाला समाज भी with low capital . 
When to लेने फायदा of होगा , किसी देश or जनसमूह will not have निर्भर on foreign capital or foreign loan , विज्ञान or विज्ञान will get गौरव . 
To form नई स्थापनाओं it does not take more than 30-35 30-50 साल . 
In the first half of बीसवीं सदी , many socialist values have been स्थापित and have been popular also . 
Nationalization of उद्योगों , the redistribution of भूमि , हिस्सेदारी , of मजदूरों , अधिकार -झौईण् of रोजगार - all these assumptions are not very old . 
In भारत before 1930 , these were not in the news . 
In 20-25 साल अन्दर , these matters बन गईं popular and बन गईं सरकारी नीति . 
किसान वर्ग is किसान वर्ग because खेती is inevitable for मानव समाज and for this इस काम सिर्फ किसानों ही could be believed . 
Because business class is adopting वर्ग खेती just for benefit , जिस दिन उससे will मिल जाएगा , व्यापारी which will give more benefit , जिस दिन उससे will देनेवाला वर्ग खेती . 
Thus , खेती must होनी चाहिए , unprofessional , but should होनी चाहिए , beneficial , hence zest to cultivate should not end . 
Eventually , why समाजवाद and साम्यवाद had हुआ था , this much popular , and suddenly why did हुआ था , हुआ था , this much unfaithful ? 
Because , आधारित समाजवाद based on मार्क्सवाद had been agrounded on पूँजीवाद and centralization . 
Where ever हुआ was followed , there हुआ started to create regional inequality , the inequality of the village-town . 
To hide these inequalities जरूरत of the dictatorship never finished . 
Marxists has forecasted संकट of पूँजीवाद repeatedly , but बार -झौईण् बार , पूँजीवादी मुल्क पूँजीवादी मुल्क from संकट . 
उससे used to seem from that पूँजीवाद can face हर संकट . 
Now it is not going to happen . 
Now सारे देश is becoming capitalistic . 
India , Republic of सोवियत यूनियन , all the countries of पूर्वी यूरोप - All have हो चुके हैं capitalistic . 
In इन सारे देशों , in two-three decades गम्भीर संकट are going to come , पूँजीवाद will not be able to face those . 
असली संकट of पूँजीवाद is not कमी of the spending capacity of मजदूरों , like how communists have been wishing ; but असली संकट of पूँजीवाद is कमी of पूँजी . 
यह पूँजी is उपज of शोषण . 
From the fall of साम्यवाद , इस प्रक्रिया has got the immediate shock , because पूँजीवाद has हो गया है contesantless . 
विकल्प is not seen by लोगों . 
But in दीर्घकालीन सोच this will होगी , seen that from the fall of साम्यवाद यह प्रक्रिया will होगी , rapid , because साम्यवाद is एक प्रच्छन्‍न रूप of पूँजीवादी उत्पादन पद्धति ही . 
Now in इन सारे देशों , नग्‍न पूँजीवाद is being examined . 
पहली बार , at the big level and in इतने सारे महत्त्वपूर्ण देशों विशुद्ध पूँजीवाद is being प्रयोग in that there is no support of the outer colonies . 
To get the conquest on the coming new turn , भारतीय किसानों will have to prepare from now itself . 
Since यह तैयारी will होगी , यह तैयारी for an era-change , which is not less important than किसी भी महान क्रान्ति , होगी , is the need for भारतीय किसानों that they adopt the broad tactics . 
Keeping ' नई आर्थिक नीतियों ' to oppose strongly the ' new economic ' नई आर्थिक नीतियों ' will होगा पहला कदम of किसान राजनीति . 
विशेष आग्रह of बहुराष्‍ट्रीय कम्पनियों has been emerged in कृषि of तीसरी दुनिया and agriculture-business . 
To exploit जल , , जंगल , , minerals , etc. प्राकृतिक संसाधनों they have ईजाद the effective technology . 
Showing this technology they want to ऐसा the such uses of जंगल and जल संसाधनों from which they will मिलेगा , the benefit , देश will मिलेगा , धन and जल संसाधनों will हो जाएँगे finished . 
यह is not दावा at all that in comparison of the intellectuals of the independent India political leaders have served the nation in बेहतर ढंग . 
Both have गुमराह लोगों of देश and अवहेलना कर्तव्य . 
When मैं make such criticisms , then शिकायत is with the ideological groups and divisions . 
किसी विभाग or समूह of the education has not given कोई महत्त्वपूर्ण योगदान for विकास of the people . 
Here our connection is with the social sciences . 
In इस क्षेत्र इस क्षेत्र are remarkable : उदारवादी and Marxist . 
In बौद्धिक क्षेत्र of भारत there are no New-Marxist groups which are free from the communist parties . 
Hence , मैं like to कहना Indian Communist intellectuals to the Marxist intellectuals . 
But to save from अनावश्यक जटिलता मैं am इस्तेमाल ' मार्क्सवादी ' शब्द ही Marxism ' . 
कोई भी विचार conducts समाज by the disciplined processes - by कोई भी विचार processed , through माध्यम of artifacts and by running the philosophical debates . 
The कोई दूसरी धारा of the idea does not emerge due to एकाधिकार of both over the resources of the world 's समाचार -झौईण् प्रचार व्यवस्था . 
The assumptions which are made of संयुक्‍त प्रभाव of both , which तैयार mind in पक्ष of the status quo . 
In भारत , the arrival of Marxism thoughts happened in उन्हीं दिनों when due to प्रभाव of पूँजीवाद , modern middle class was stabilizing and nation wanted to free राष्‍ट्रीय कांग्रेस from the grip of गांधी . 
In भारत of 1914 to 1934 -LRB- since then गांधी imposed रचनात्मक कार्यक्रम over कांग्रेस ऊपर to the resignation of गांधी -RRB- the main conflicts which were in the economical thoughts , in that there were ' classical ' आर्थिक विचारों of एक तरफ and एक तरफ there were colonialism , liberalism , and आर्थिक विचारों . 
Since when the festival of किसान आन्दोलन has started , दो प्रकार of लोग raising the question , who do n't want that दो प्रकार of किसान आन्दोलन of the poor would happen . 
ये लोग आरोप of हिंसा to आन्दोलन of मजदूरों . 
Though वैसे लोग are कह रहे हैं that आन्दोलन is आन्दोलन of किसान , hence is retrograde . 
Among them , इन्दिरा गांधी , , M. G. Ramchandran , big government officers and speakers of पूँजीपतियों are there . 
यह भी has been देखा गया है also जमींदार or पुलिस , , to suppress मजदूरों or Harijans लेते हैं मदद of किसानों . 
From इसी अनुभव the doubt emerges that if किसान get unified , its labor-opposition will होती है very strong . 
There are big weaknesses in इस तर्क . 
The unemployed youth makes the report with बेरोजगार नौजवान पुलिस , they tease the girls . 
If they will तो आन्दोलन against the employment , then will the more pain आएगी to girls ? 
Today farmer लेता है ; सहयोग of पुलिस to keep suppressing untouchables , मजदूरों ; if वह will संघर्ष against पुलिस , सरकार and the administration , will वह suppress more the untouchables , मजदूरों ? 
If आन्दोलन is going to run for long then वह will पार इस पहली स्थिति and माँगें of ' pardon ' and ' rebate ' will हो जाएँगी extrinsic and असली टकराव will हो जाएँगी on इस बात that whatever जो सुविधाएँ is given to व्यापारी and पूँजीपति those should हो जाएँगी given to किसान or नियम -झौईण् कानून should हो जाएँगी लागू on both of them . 
If यह माँग will fit into दिमाग of किसानों then आन्दोलन will be dangerous for पूँजीवादी व्यवस्था . 
in मुल्क like भारत the legal equality of किसान and capitalist will होगी , साबित against कानूनी बराबरी पूँजीवादी व्यवस्था , because for पूँजीपति किसान are एक ऐसा विशाल समुदाय who after growing माल देता है in cheap and खरीद लेता है the industrial products on very high बहुत ज्यादा दाम . 
In जिस अनुपात श्रम is bought from पूँजी in जिस अनुपात किसान भी of the five acre is also शोषक . 
Reason , वह is मालिक of एक छोटी पूँजी of शोषक व्यवस्था अन्दर . 
If बड़ी पूँजीवाले were not there , then small capital would not तो been the source of छोटी पूँजी शोषण . 
In the land system there will not न होंगी big plowes , किसान will not न होंगी एक शोषक वर्ग भी . 
But this is एक वास्तविकता that बड़ा भूमिपति is leading छोटे किसान . 
When आन्दोलन will start , then we may वर्गचरित्र on his class character . 
In the camp of the six independent organisations who did the public movements till past 11 to 14 March , an important talk occurred . 
The matter of बहस था किसान आन्दोलन and between किसान आन्दोलन how will अन्तरविरोध and समाधान of the internal conflict happen ? 
The leaders of both the movements were arguing . 
They decided that सारांश of the Bhuvaneshwar communication will be प्रसारित for व्यापक बहस . 
Thus , होगी will होगी यह एक राष्‍ट्रीय बहस . 
For the conservative and rhetorician leftists समस्या of किसानों is negligible or inferior . 
But in रूस and चीन , where सफल रणनीतियाँ for the movement had been made , किसानों and फैक्टरी मजदूरों had been दिया गया था महत्त्व like the factory workers . 
लेनिन and माओ in his principal statements kept assuming the revolutionary power to फैक्टरी मजदूर ही , but in practicality and रणनीति kept moving with taking along किसानों भी also . 
In fact , on the basis of व्यवहार उन्होंने did not do परीक्षण on his principals or fundamental thoughts and काम of the research . 
Before the year 1905 it थी राय of the Russian communists that it is a waste of समय to go to गाँवों . 
But after आन्दोलन बाद of the 1905 in रणनीति of लेनिन महत्त्व of किसानों had started to increase . 
संकटमय after क्रान्ति तत्काल बाद of the year 1917 -LRB- in कांग्रेस ) of 1918 -RRB- लेनिन had strongly advocated this that to fight against the colonalisation and formation of समाजवाद the coalition of मध्यम किसानों साथ is inevitable . 
The workers of the factories will revolt on his their own power ' इस प्रकार of demonstration may be done by quoting प्रतिपादन and Anglas . 
But just on the basis of the power of ग्रामीण भूमिहीन मजदूरों क्रान्ति may occur , दावा of हो सकती है , is not निहित in any leftist science . 
Thus , about क्रान्तिकारी भूमिका of the organisation of the factory labors of भारत -LRB- ( ट्रेड यूनियनों ) -RRB- who have doubts in मन , इसलिए becomes necessary for them that they find सहयोग of the other village class anticapitalist power with the landlesse . 
जो लोग who सचेत मजदूरों they are not aware about क्रान्तिकारी भूमिका of the farmer organisations . 
There are दो कारण behind this . 
First this that their mentality is of the trade union , not of क्रान्ति . 
They have not made ऐसी कोई फेहरिस्त yet that to weaken and abolish मौजूदा पूँजीवादी -झौईण् साम्राज्यवादी व्यवस्था , सहयोग चाहिए of which classes is needed . 
At this time , how many big organisations of किसानों are there in देश they all are running आन्दोलन in the structure of the trade union . 
When they will think of the reformation of the villages of सम्पूर्ण भारत or will like to reform पूरे देश , when they will कोशिश to देने विकल्प then would be able to take more positive नवनिर्माण toward मजदूरों भी . 
छात्र of the Student struggle brigadier , श्री प्रियदर्शी has एक महत्त्वपूर्ण प्रतिपादन that this is एक विस्तार of किसान आन्दोलन ही itself . 
We will समझ पाएँगे this इस प्रतिपादन when would देखें the movements of मजदूरों and भूमिहीनों which are चल रहे since आजादी पहले as आन्दोलन of the village 's ग्रामीण समस्या . 
During उन दिनों , जमींदार and भूमिपति were the main exploiters hence for the freedom of the village people to start संघर्ष against them थे the main issue of वामपंथी आन्दोलन . 
मलबरी रेशमकीट can be cultivated in various climate conditions and मिट्टी of विस्तृत क्षेत्र . 
By adopting बेहतर पद्धतियों itself अच्छी उपज of the cocoon can be प्राप्त . 
But for this , इसके is आवश्यक शर्त to have पत्ती of उत्तम किस्म which gives अधिक उपज . 
The upbringing of the silk worm happens in five different steps during लार्वा अवधि दौरान . 
During लार्वा अवधि it is रखा जाता है in especially made silkworm rearing shed . 
Simultaneously , to obtain रेशम , arrangement at उचित समय and गहन देखभाल is taken . 
During पूरी पालन अवधि दौरान the silkworms are taken देखभाल very carefully and for भोजन उत्तम किस्म of the mulberry leaf is इस्तेमाल . 
The formation of बेहतर वातावरण and कृमि from कृमि and diseases are the necessary conditions in their upbringing . 
To प्रदान the favorable conditions there is आवश्यकता of the rearing house and rearing equipments and instruments separately . 
In एक साल , 5 to 10 10 फसलों are nurtured and the life span of 10 फसलों is लगभग 70-80 दिनों होती है . 
प्रजाति : V-1 and S-36 are प्रजाति which gives production and are very useful for the silkworm nurturing . 
These two varieties प्रदान ये दोनों प्रजातियाँ पोषक which are very essential for लार्वा in पालन . 
पत्तियाँ are heart हृदय आकार thick and shining with हल्के हरे रंग साथ . 
In the leaves there is उच्च आर्द्रता and in that there are more nutrients . 
प्रति वर्ष on an acre about 15 thousands to 18 thousand kilo gram mulberry leaves is प्राप्त . 
V-1 Variety - प्रजाति is quite popular in खेती which was started in the year 1997 . 
Leaves are oval shaped , huge sized , thick , deep coloured containing dampness . 
In एक वर्ष , almost 20-24 thousand पत्तियाँ can be प्राप्त . 
Planting method : व्यवस्था of रोपण पद्धति : - वृक्षारोपण of the tree is done in the two rows where दूरी of -LRB- 90 +150 cm -RRB- × 90cm or 60cm × 60cm is proper . 
Due the presence of जगह between कृषि गतिविधि and for परिवहन of leaves पावर टिलर may होने उपयोग . 
Through this there is सिंचाई सुविधा of the drip irrigation . 
In every acre , वृक्षों can be planted in अधिक संख्या . 
Leaves can be ले जाया जा सकता easily and quickly , which कम संभावना of हानि . 
श्रम is saved by डंठल कटाई . 
प्रति हेक्टेयर from दर of 8 मीट्रिक टन , प्रयोग dungs दो बार in साल . 
For प्रयोग NPK at दर of 350:140:140 kilogram per 350:140 :140 किलो ग्राम प्रति हेक्टेयर and for -झौईण् 1 प्रजाति of mulberry S-36 at दर of 300:120:120 kilogramper 350:140 :140 किलो ग्राम प्रति हेक्टेयर प्रति वर्ष by distributing in 5 बराबर भागों . 
Irrigation : irrigation in दर of 80 to 120 millimeters in सिंचाई : - सप्ताह . 
In स्थिति when there is कमी of पानी किसान can बचत 40 percent of पानी by प्रयोग ड्रिप सिंचाई . 
Hybridized संकरित रेशमकीट Under the IVLP CSR-2 X CSR-4 and the a double hybrid -LRB- द्विगुण संकरित ( कृष्ण राजा ) -RRB- developed संकरित रेशमकीट has been सिफारिश . 
चावकी rearing : - From the hatching of eggs to पहुँचने to अवस्था a silkworm has to pass through the five stages . 
दूसरी अवस्था of the worms is called दूसरी अवस्था or दूसरी अवस्था . 
Since , this is more sensitive to the adverse circumstances and होते has संभावना of being संक्रमित hence for चावकी of चावकी there is जरूरत to provide विशेष ध्यान . 
Hence , in अतएव चावकी rearing centers in the controlled circumstances , it should be कोशिश to obtain the nurtured silkworms . 
Nurturing in बड़े उम्र : पालन of the old age worms start in the third instar . 
These are the worms which खाने बहुत अधिक पत्तियाँ . 
Rearing center : पालन of the mulberry silkworm is एक पूर्णतः घरेलू व्यवसाय completely . 
For this there is जरूरत of तापमान between 24-28 degree Celsius मौसम of 70-80 प्रतिशत आर्द्रता . 
Thus , to maintain वातावरण विशेष ध्यान should be दिया जाना चाहिए to चयन , of the proper material for भवन of दीवार and छत , अभिसरण , of भवन , निर्माण पद्धतियाँ , , डिज़ाइन इत्यादि , . 
Later , for the keeping of the leaves , चावकी पालन , , चावकी पालन , and पर्याप्त जगह should होनी चाहिए there . 
Simultaneously , the cleanliness of उस स्थान and disease free arrangements also should होनी चाहिए proper . 
According to प्रकार and मात्रा of पालन आकार of पालन घर should होनी चाहिए there . 
For 100 DFL क्षेत्रफल of 400 वर्ग फीट सतह may be provided -LRB- DFL-disease free laying -RRB- , 1डीएफएल = 500 लार्वा ) -RRB- . 
Rearing equipments : the mature stage silkworms do not सहन तापमान , , आर्द्रता and आवागमन व्यवस्था . 
Hence , to maintain तापमान at न्यूनतम स्तर there should होनी चाहिए two sided air ventilation in पालन घर thus बड़ी मात्रा of गैस which is produced by the sewage released by silkworms can होनी चाहिए passed easily . 
To cure from the disease : to keep घर and instruments infection free , इसे should be साफ दो बार . 
पहली बार after तैयारी तुरंत बाद of पूर्ववर्ती फसल from the 5 percent bleaching 5 प्रतिशत ब्लिचिंग पाउडर and पहली बार दो दिन पहले before पूर्ववर्ती फसल with 2.5 सैनिटेक -LRB- clorinedi-oxide -RRB- should be साफ properly . 
Shoot nurturing-an economical solution : - in इस पद्धति of the sericulture nurturing of the last three stages is done by giving शूट instead of एक स्वतंत्र पत्ती . 
This is the most economical सबसे किफायती पद्धति of the nurturing , from that about 40 40 प्रतिशत of पालन श्रम is saved . 
After becoming संख्या of रेशमकीट less there is कमी of the spread and संक्रमण of बीमारी . 
Just by removing insects and leaves from प्रक्रिया द्वितीयक संक्रमण reduces . 
In भंडारण and स्थिति of in बेड the better preservation of the leaves . 
Nourishment : - start nourishment of the 50-55day old shoots . 
इसकी कटाई in ठण्डे मौसम of सुबह at ऊँचाई of 3-4feets . 
The nourishment of the 60-65 दिन old पुराने शूट should be done with the silkworms of पाँचवीं अवस्था . 
The storage of शूट should be done in the loose vertical position in युक्त वातावरण with cold and आर्द्रता , which are ढके हुए हों from the clean , disease free and wet cloths . 
For the Bi Voltain Silkworm there is आवश्यकता of the 460 kilograms in the fourth stage and 2880 kilograms in the fifth stage . 
Do not make them eat beige and more ripen leaves . 
During every nourishment in बेड बेड लार्वा in समानांतर रूप . 
In भारतवर्ष there are all of the total 34.43 crore cattles . 
Among them , 22.84 crore cow-buffalo , 50 लाख सुअर and 34 lakh ऊँट जातीय पशु of the horse , donkey , ass and camel family . 
Beside them there are 11.49 crore hens also . 
संख्या of भैंस जातीय पशुओं of the family of the cow and buffalo , which are found in भारतवर्ष is the 20 percent of the world 's भैंस जातीय पशुओं . 
Even having इतने अधिक पशु , among those about 50 % इतने अधिक पशु of buffalo family , 20 % इतने अधिक पशु of cow family and 16.7 % बकरियाँ are included . 
उत्पादन of दूध in भारतवर्ष is just केवल 1.19 करोड़ टन . 
Here , the average use of दूध per person is just 130 gram per केवल 130 ग्रा प्रति दिन . 
Whereas , यह मात्रा is 741 grams in Switzerland , 637 grams in न्यूजीलैंड 623 gram in अमेरिका and 509 grams in इंग्लैंड . 
यह औसत of the world is 303 gm , in comparison of अन्य देशो दुग्धोत्पादन -झौईण् क्षमता of भारतीय पशुओं is very less . 
भारतीय गाय gives औसतन 173 kg in एक वर्ष . 
Whereas , गाय of डेनमार्क gives 2,900 किग्रा दूध 3,710 , of the Switzerland 3 , 250 , of अमेरिका , 280 and of इंग्लैंड , 900 kg . 
स्थिति of the other varieties is निम्नाकित though from perspective of संख्या of 5वाँ भारतवर्ष has स्थान in the world . 
But in that उत्पादन of ऊन is very less , also ऊन obtained from them are mostly of lower quality . 
This is with hair and rough and is not good enough to knit the good cloths . 
In भारतवर्ष उत्पादन of ऊन per प्रति भेंड is just 700 gm , whereas lambs of कुछ विदेशी नस्ल in एक वर्ष give 5 to 7 ऊन even . 
Insofar there is about मास -झौईण् उत्पादन भार 25 of भारतीय भेंडो is from 25 to 30 30 किग्रा , whereas , the foreigner lambs are तीन गुनी heavier than these . 
Insofar there is the matter of कुक्कुट -झौईण् पालन in comparison of अन्य देशों in भारतवर्ष on आधार of जनसंख्या very less hens are reared . 
On every 100 persons , 540 in डेनमार्क , 373 in कनाडा , 286 in अमेरिका , 179 in इंग्लैंड and from 150 to 200 birds are reared in अन्य यूरोपय देशों . 
जबकि in भारतवर्ष just 26 hens are reared per 100 people . 
एक भारतीय मुर्गी gives औसतन 60 eggs in वर्ष -झौईण् भर . 
Whereas , the average yearly production of the hens of लेगहार्न and Road Ireland of अमेरिका are 193 and 212 eggs . 
यह संख्या of देश is less than the half of the world 's यह संख्या of the year -LRB- 130 eggs -RRB- . 
In भारत इस समय , 12 eggs per मनुष्य प्रति per year are available . 
Whereas , यही संख्या is 295 in अमेरिका , 282 in कनाडा and 249 in पश्‍चिमी जर्मनी . 
In भारतवर्ष , animals are reared in विभिन्‍न प्रकार of जलवायु and environmental conditions . 
Here -झौईण् पालन व्यवसाय is in हाथ of अधिकांश कृषक , among them अधिकांश कृषक adopt इसे as a supportive -झौईण् पालन व्यवसाय with their main occupation agrictulere . 
साधारण किसान run अपना living by putting 2-3 पशु in कम भूमि less than 3 3 हेक्टर in -झौईण् छोटे खेतों , in कुछ देशों of यूरोप in औसत झुंड संख्या of 2-3 पशु is more than 30 . 
Hence , यह is clear that having पशु संख्या of animals so high even , in the economy-system of देश योगदान of पशु संख्या is not according to पशु संख्या . 
कुल राष्‍ट्रीय आय of कुल राष्‍ट्रीय आय is obtained by the livestocks . 
कुल अनुमानित आय which is obtained from पशु -झौईण् उत्पादों in 1960-61 थी 1,529.72 crore rupees . 
From that , Rupees 988.34 crore from 988.34 करोड़ रु दूध and पदार्थों , made from 988.34 करोड़ रु दूध , Rupees 120.01 crore from meat and पदार्थों , , Rupees 42.8 crore from skin and leather , Rupees 66.91 crore from hens and eggs , Rupees 12.74 crore from 12.74 करोड़ रु ऊन and hairs , Rupees 262.8 crore from 262.8 करोड़ रु गोबर and आय had been obtained . 
In भारतवर्ष , the 18.3 percent of मूल आय by कृषि is obtained by the livestocks . 
Looking at इतनी बड़ी पशु संख्या of the animals यह योगदान is quite less . 
In तुलना यह आय is 79 % in डेनमार्क , 79 % in the Ireland , 79 % in Sweden , and 79 % in प्रत्येक देश of इंग्लैंड and Norway . 
In भारतवर्ष there is गो and जातीय पशु in काफी बड़ी संख्या . 
According to the animal census of the 1961-62 पशु of गो and buffalo family is 111.5 in the whole world and 111.5 करोड़ in भारत -LRB- 20.35 % -RRB- but the मान of the animal-bussiness is not according to पशु संख्या of पशु . 
According to प्रशासकीय सचिवालय of सांख्यिकी विभाग of the administrative secretariate in 1960-61 , as the form of धन अनुमानित योगदान was 1160 करोड़ . 
In the rural economy of भारत योगदान of पशुओं is important . 
आज भी for कृषि कार्यों the mandatory power is मिलती है from the oxen itself and the main source of पशु -झौईण् प्रोटीन in अधिकांश लोगों food is दूध ही . 
Oxen are प्रयोग for जुताई , , digging , harvesting of फसल , threshing , for सिंचाई and to transport the agricultural products to बाजार etc. many works . 
Beside that अतिरिक्‍त पशु make भूमि fertile by खाद and also प्रदान skin and leather . 
Hence , in भारतवर्ष , गायों and oxen have been considered आधारशिला of कृषि . 
The animal - industry has फैला हुआ है in पूरे देश in the numerous small units , hence to do सही मूल्यांकन is very tough . 
In भारतीय कृषि in the form of animal labor , there is एक महत्त्वपूर्ण योगदान of the livingstocks . 
अनुमानित मूल्य of इस श्रम in खेती will होगा 300 to 500 crore rupees . 
To increase उर्वरा of भूमि from पशुओं almost material of 270 crore rupees is gained . 
In भारतीय पशुओं there is more immunity power against the anavavashti , animal-plague and रोगों due to ticks . 
Thus , they have very good मान है in विदेशी बाजारों . 
Due to this , ककुदधारी प्रयोग Indian cattle -LRB- ( जेयू पशुओं ) -RRB- to crossbreed ( जेयू पशुओं ) . 
Hence अच्छे पशु can take birth . 
The ancestor of the Indian native cow-animals have not been discovered yet and their fossils have not been found yet . 
पशु of भारत हो जाते है savage often , rearing of the cow-animals is considered here very prestigious बहुत ही सम्मानित व्यवसाय and पनीर आदि and पदार्थों obtained by them are उपयोग by लोग of सभी वर्ग . 
According to the animal-census of the 1961 , in भारतवर्ष , there were जातीय पशु of the cattle family for कृषि योग्य भूमि . 
51 Crore cows of अधिक आयु more than three तीन वर्ष and 2.423 Crore buffalo had been रखा गया था for प्रजनन and milk-production . 
Among them , 2.07 crore cows and 1.25 crore buffalo used to produce दूध and शेष were either drained or थी reproduce once even . 
During अवधि of 1961-1966 , no any difference occurred in संख्या of गो जातीय पशुओं of the cattle family . 
During इस अवधि , in संख्या भी of जातीय पशुओं of the buffalo family has been वृद्धि केवल 32 % . 
संख्या of 116 is 116 in average of the per 100 कृष्य क्षेत्रफल and this is 61 in पंजाब , 283 in Maharashtra and गुजरात , 188 in पश्‍चिमी बंगाल , and 162 in Orisa . 
There is quite a difference in बनावट and frame of the cow animals of भारतवर्ष . 
Due to that reason , they have become compatible to जलवायु which is found in विभिन्‍न भागों . 
पशु here either make themselves compatible to स्थानीय जलवायु and भूमि , or grow properly there , where they are taken जन्म and nurtured . 
The native and the cows which देने दूध is found in गुजरात , , कुछ भागों , of Maharashtra , तमिलनाडु , , मैसूर and कुछ भागों , and तटीय क्षेत्रों of आन्ध्र प्रदेश . 
Thus , in Assam , West Bengal , Odisa and Kerela पशु are found . 
In पर्वतीय क्षेत्रों where होती है, rains heavily . 
Dr. Kapil is सरकारी अस्पताल of सरकारी अस्पताल . 
Daily a lot of बीमार पशु आते हैं to him . 
Some are suffering from किसी बीमारी , some are suffering from किसी बीमारी . 
Looking at ऐसे पशुओं उन्हें feels very sorry . 
Simultaneously , he feels pity on the owners of इन पशुओं . 
One day a very painful event occurred . 
A buffalo died in the campus of एक भैंस अस्पताल . 
मालिक started to cry badly like कोई सगा of his has passed away . 
डाक्टर साहब पास went near to him and चुप him . 
Asked कारण of his grief . 
उसने told that उसने is एक गरीब किसान . 
From that the needs of परिवार नहीं था met . 
By doing labor he used to run घर . 
By taking कर्ज , he had bought यह भैंस so होगी will होगी easy to run the family expenditure by बेचकर दूध of यह भैंस . 
डाक्टर साहब felt very sorry after सुनकर आपबीती of किसान . 
At उस समय in front of his eyes the face of ऐसे लाखों मजबूर किसानों and animal owners were come . 
उन्होंने decided in मन ही itself that जाकर गाँव -झौईण् गाँव to गाँव -झौईण् गाँव , उन्होंने will देंगे जरूरी जानकारी related to animal-husbandry . 
यह खबर was conveyed by the advertisement in गाँवों and शहर that the doctor Kapil of सरकारी अस्पताल will दी गई जानकारी about पशु -झौईण् पालन in the school of गाँवों . 
किसान from गाँवों and those who run the oxcart in शहर and dairy owners आकर and बैठ गये in the school before the arrival of डाक्टर साहब . 
आप all know this , गाय , , ox , भैंस आदि पशु are how important for लोगों . 
ये पशु are सबसे अच्छा साधन for the cultivation of किसान . 
The support of the living of many unemployeds . 
Actually , for your growth यह is necessary that पशु are healthy , are strong . 
If पशु will होंगे , healthy , अधिक काम could होंगे , लिया जा सकेगा from them . 
पशु will देंगे अधिक दूध . 
पैसा will have to खर्च on their sickness . 
For इलाज they will not have to wander here and there . 
Hence , मैं will tell आपको few such things , from that पशु could be prevented from बीमारी . 
Among आप , कम लोग ही would होना knowing that एक बड़ा कारण for बीमारी of पशुओं is the small and dirty shelter of पशुओं -LRB- आवास -झौईण् स्थान ( to live -RRB- . 
Always the shelter of पशुओं should न हो built in इस ढंग that they should not have किसी प्रकार of problem . 
If एक -झौईण् दो ही पशु are there , their shelter can not be arranged separately , they should be kept in the corner room of घर . 
रास्ता to go and come for पशुओं भीतर -झौईण् बाहर should होना चाहिए , एक तरफ , सारा घर ही would not get dirty from their coming-going . 
If there are ज्यादा पशु or more than this , then their shelter for them should होना चाहिए away from घर . 
If there would हो चरागाह and तालाब भी also near the cattle house , then हो is very good . 
But it is not good to make cattle-shed near the dirty drainage . 
जगह where पशुओं stay whether is cemented of earthen - in that there should हो arrangement of धूप , and साफ -झौईण् सुथरे पानी . 
According to स्थान पशुशाला of the cattle shed may be रखा जा सकता है in two directions . 
One to the east-west , and another to the north-south . 
Having पूर्व -झौईण् पश्‍चिम रुख toward east-west , पशु remain prevented from ठंडी हवा in गर्मियों and from cold wave in the winter . 
From उत्तर -झौईण् दक्षिण रुख धूप remains for long time in the cattle-shed . 
फर्श and walls remain dry . 
In fact , whatever पशुशाला would of the cattle-shelter , there should हो , हवा and light in that . 
The height of लगभग चार फुट is appropriate for the four walls of the cattle shed . 
Inside the four walls there should be high , dense and shady trees . 
Plant the trees which leaves does not नुकसान पशुओं . 
There should होने चाहिए room to prevent पशुओं from deep cold , hot and rain . 
In that for हर एक पशु there should हो 8 फुट long and 6 feet जगह . 
By making the different pattern चिकनाहट could be कम . 
फर्श भी made of सीमेंट and cement is also good . 
Ash or sandy soil should नहीं हो पाती spread on कच्‍चे फर्श , राख or soil absorbs पेशाब of मिट्‍टी पशु and जगह of मिट्‍टी पशु does not नहीं हो पाती wet . 
इस राख should be डालते सुबह in the pit of खाद , किसी प्रकार of गन्दगी did not रहना चाहिए , in पशुओं shed . 
ऊँचाई of the room of पशुओं should होनी चाहिए ten to दस -झौईण् पन्द्रह फुट . 
Walls are either earthen or cemented , but there should not have whole and pit in those . 
In these pits there is fear to emerge कई प्रकार of पशु , पशु could मर भी सकता है if they bite . 
Interrupting meanwhile एक कृषक कहा , , डाक्टर साहब , Sahab , is होना necessary to तो a window or रोशनदान in the cattle sheds ? 
There is जान in animals also . 
They also have उतनी ही जरूरत of हवा and light to be healthy how much we all उतनी ही जरूरत . 
In धूप and light , bacteria of किसी भी तरह of बीमारी can not grow . 
Thus , how much the arrangement for जितनी अधिक शुद्ध वायु अन्दर to come in and impure जितनी अधिक शुद्ध वायु अन्दर to go out will होगा , there , the suffocation will होगा , that much less . 
जानवर रहते हैं happy in the pure and हवा . 
किसी तरह of बीमारी can not happen to them . 
Thus , इसलिए is necessary to have windows and रोशनदान in the cattle sheds . 
For हर एक पशु there must होनी चाहिए a window in the room . 
Looking at the length and width of the room there should होने चाहिए कई रोशनदान in the room . 
If fix the iron net in रोशनदानों then it is good . 
In the very cold weather , windows are closed during दिनों and रात and रोशनदान remain open . 
Through this , ताजी हवा भी keep on आती रहती है to the room and cold waves does not touch पशुओं also . 
If छत of the animal-shed can be made cemented , then it is good . 
Otherwise sheets of the cement or छत of खपरैल is good . 
Never इस्तेमाल tin sheets as the form of छत , because छत becomes more hot in धूप and very cold during रात of the cold . 
Due to this there is डर that animal will feel more hot during hot weather and cold during cold weather . 
If the cattle shed is earthen then दीवारों must be whitewashed दो -झौईण् तीन बार in साल . 
Once before the rain , it is necessary to whitewash . 
We also want to know this , that should the arrangement of feeding चारा हो in that room or some where else ? 
Actually बात is this that if आपके पास तो जगह , arrangement to feed पशुओं should होना चाहिए some where else . 
In जगह of the fodder feeding , it could be managed by putting छप्पर also . 
But होना is necessary to होना साफ जगह भी of चारा . 
Due to having संख्या of पशुओं more the arrangement of their food has to होने done in two rows . 
If पशुओं तो to be standing in a line , then there is एक ' खुरली ' ( toward the front . 
पिछली दीवार of खुरली would हो , little high and पिछली दीवार would हो , low , thus wile washing पानी can drain and पशु can खा सके चारा comfortably . 
Manger should हुई होनी चाहिए made of खुरली ईंटों and cement . 
जगह near खुरली पास to stand पशुओं and नाली , both should होने cemented , clearly sloped , thus can होने साफ easily by washing . 
दूरी between खुरली and नाली बीच should होनी चाहिए at least five and कम से कम साढ़े पाँच फुट . 
पेशाब and गोबर lying on फर्श near खुरली पास should be carried to the pit of खाद by washing and through नाली . 
Behind नाली पीछे there should हो रास्ता of four and four and a half चार -झौईण् साढ़े चार फुट to bring the fodder etc. and for पशुओं to go . 
To tie पशुओं instead of the rope , iron chains or neck-band should be इस्तेमाल . 
Because chains and neck-bands could be साफ by washing it , not to the ropes . 
While tieing पशुओं in front of खुरली सामने , पशुओं should be tied in the seperate parts . 
For this after हर दो पशु बाद the iron rods or the wire without prickles or the strong sticks of the wood should be put after हर दो पशु बाद . 
While feeding चारा , गायों , , buffalos , oxen should be kept separate . 
If पानी can be carried to the animal shed , then खुरलियों should be fixed in every manger . 
डाक्टर साहब said further , if पशु are more than संख्या of eight-ten , पशु will तो to होगा tied in two rows . 
In one way , keeping एक तो पशुओं face opposite , second way , putting एक तो पशुओं tail opposite . 
The way to keep पशुओं मुँह each other is cheap , but not good . 
Because in इस विधि , while feeding पशुओं they are stood on both sides of खुरली . 
Thus , at समय of चारा the breath of एक पशु go to शरीर of एक पशु . 
In such situation , if किसी पशु will तो बीमारी then हो may फैल सकती है quickly in किसी पशु and then in किसी पशु . 
In इस विधि , दूसरी बुराई is this that while eating the fodder animals fight among them . 
In these fights-quarrels पशु may injure पशु by their horns . 
The third drawback of इस विधि is this , that यह is very problematic to डालने चारा to पशुओं . 
Hence , till how extent इसलिए is possible , पशुओं should हो सके , tied facing each others tail . 
To डालने चारा in front of दोनों खुरलियों सामने ही itself रास्ते is made . 
From a broad canal itself the urine and मूत्र of पशुओं of both sides is carried to the pit of गोबर खाद . 
It is necessary to clean the feeding place at least twice in दिन . 
The small calves of गाय and भैंस should be देना चाहिए fodder etc. by अलग बाँध them separate from बड़े पशुओं . 
गाय and भैंस भी should be kept separate also . 
Not just this , बीमार पशु भी about to die and बीमार पशु भी also should have जगह to live and खाने . 
If there are more animals in the cattle shed and साँड़ भी has also been reared in that , than with जगह साथ -झौईण् साथ for साँड़ भी a separate big courtyard should हुआ है , there also . 
While आज डा0 कपिल कहा , , मैं finish आज meeting just कहकर this that while making arrangements for पशुओं always take पूरा -झौईण् पूरा ध्यान of पशुओं complete comfort . 
अच्छे नतीजे will आयेगे itself in front of आपके सामने . 
आज था दूसरा दिन of the conference . 
At ठीक समय साहब आये and शुरू to कहना , very few बहुत कम लोग among आप would be knowing that in comparison of अन्य देशों पशु are very weak . 
They देते है दूध भी and also have less power to काम . 
Most of पशु are always lazy or sick . 
This is एक सबसे बड़ा कारण for this , that at पशुओं are not नहीं दी जाती nutritious food . 
धनवान who are rich , they do n't have knowledge that animals will be healthy from how much and which kind of food . 
पौष्‍टिक खुराक is that , in which विटामिन , , प्रोटीन , , minerals , fat , चर्बी , fibers and पानी should be in उचित मात्रा . 
All these are the parts of खुराक , are तत्त्व , are portions . 
In the fodder-grains , all these are in some extra amount . 
विटामिन are very essential for पशुओं in हर तरह . 
They prevent ये पशुओं from कई तरह of diseases . 
It helps very much to increase the sight of the eyes and to maintain the strength of the teeth . 
The pregnant cows-buffalos which देने दूध gets बहुत मदद from विटामिनों . 
Among विटामिन A ' और D ' is very essential for ' डी ' पशुओं . 
Vitamin ' A ' is found in हरी घास . 
Hence , मिलता है is considered very beneficial to feed पशुओं हरा चारा and हरी घास , विटामिन D ' is found in ' डी ' धूप . 
Hence , to put पशुओं in the open and the places with light is considered good for the health . 
Work to make शरीर strong is done by प्रोटीन . 
By doing काम the body of पशुओं which does rub down and टूटती , काम to पूरा that is of प्रोटीन ही . 
For the milch and pregnant cows-buffalos चारा with प्रोटीन is very essential . 
कृषि उत्पादों can be grouped broadly into food , fiber , fuel , raw material , pharmacuticals and stirrings . 
Simultaneously , there is a series of decorating or विदेशी उत्पादों भी also . 
What is जलवायु - जलवायु is made up of जल and air . 
In उर्दू इसे is called Abhawa . 
आब ' or ' Aab ' जल and अर्थ of ' Vayu ' or ' Hawa ' is obviously air . 
That is to say that the word climate is made from the combination of हवा and पानी . 
पानी here refers to वर्षा and हवा refers to हवा that affects वातावरण surrounding us . 
Sometimes it generates नमी around us and sometimes it generates गर्मी . 
वर्षा भी also does कुछ -झौईण् कुछ यही कार्य . 
This concludes that climate is an object that gives us गर्मी and cool . 
We अनुभव both of them ourselves . 
But there are परिवर्तन also which we अनुभव on our own . 
And there are परिवर्तन which we कुछ ऐसे भी feel . 
All such things are called जलवायु . 
Thus जुला प्रभाव of नमी and वर्षा of किसी स्थान is called जलवायु . 
There is an integral relationship between मौसम and agriculture . 
सफलता and असफलता of फसलों निर्भर on this . 
परिवर्तन in अकस्मात मौसम sometimes leads to बहुत बड़ी हानि in खेती . 
There is a terror of plants getting affected by रोगों if the weather during winters रहता है cloudy continuously for दिनों . 
It mostly catches रोग , consequently the growth of plant retards . 
Extremely cold weather and वर्षा destroys फसलें . 
This is to कहने that मौसम affects बोआई , from सिंचाई कटाई आदि till the time यह reaches घर . 
Hence होता है is essential for अत : एक सफल किसान to begin काम after पहचान मौसम . 
If there are बादल in आकाश then the plants start turning yellow and finally dry . 
फसलें can सहन मात्रा ही of एक निश्चित नमी . 
If यह नमी suddenly stops and there is मात्रा of पानी in पौधे then they stop क्रिया . 
The roots हो जाती है dry , टूट जाती है and फसल gets destroyed . 
The crop growth also stops when the moisture content is more . 
The downfall in तापक्रम affects पौधों leaves more . 
Their veins बंद काम . 
The crops are sown according to the seasons . 
ज्ञान during those seasons is essential . 
There are 6 seasons . 
Each of them lasts for two months . 
वर्ष begins from Chaitra , when सर्दी is on आगमन of ending and summer begins . 
These seasons can हो सकती है easily identified in the plains of देश . 
But there are कुछ ऐसे भाग of इसी देश which are extremely chilly for eight months and some are hot for eight months . 
Some तो year round rainfall up to 500 इंच and places like राजपूताने तो even तो 500 इंच average rainfall . 
देश is very large , कर्क रेखा of cancer passes through इसके मध्य , इसके मध्य has ocean on three sides and इसके मध्य falls on the way of monsoon winds . 
Hence जलवायु here varies at स्थान -झौईण् स्थान . 
कारण is that slanting Sun rays fall on कर्क रेखा of Cancer . 
चार महीने सूर्य shines overhead for four months वर्ष . 
इससे increases गर्मी during इन दिनों but when the Sun enters सूर्य मकर रेखा of Capricorn , प्रभाव becomes very less and the weather becomes cool . 
स्थान which will होगा more close to भूमध्य रेखा will होगा more hot and less cold and will get वर्षा . 
But as we go away from भूमध्य रेखा स्थिति will होती जायेगी विपरीत . 
That is to say the climate will होगी more cold , less hot with वर्षा . 
And even if we पहुंच जायेंगे तो धुव there will हो जाया करेगी year round cold , and sometimes snowfall will also occur . 
सूर्य will be rarely visible . 
If स्थान falls on the way of monsoon winds then rainfall is possible there but if न होने does n't fall there then स्थान becomes barren and deserted . 
राजपूताना neither falls on मानसून arising from Bay of बंगाल nor Arabian Sea . 
Consequently it remains dry . 
जलवायु in समतल मैदान is essential . 
देश is स्थित between 8 degree and 30 degree northern latitude . 
From विचार of view जलवायु should होनी चाहिए warm but this is not the situation . 
कारण is बनावट of this place . 
Because of बनावट of भूमि , जलवायु of भिन्न -झौईण् भिन्न स्थानों is different . 
Yes , the climatic conditions of मैदानों is definitely similar . 
If फसलों मिल जाता है पानी on उचित समय then उपज is good . 
But generally होता रहता है is देखा जाता है that there is always प्रकोप of rains all the times in the form of heavy rainfall , less rainfall and untimely rainfall . 
इससे damages a lot of फसल . 
These three things are harmful for खेती . 
During ऋतु due to वर्षा फसलें get बह जाती हैं away or become rotten . 
sometimes हो जाता है becomes difficult to दुस्साध्य समस्या of बीज . 
प्रकोप तो of drought is all the more dreadful . 
The leaves generally get affected by chilly weather and it stops रोक देता है of leaves . 
Because of this पत्तियाँ can not make भोजन and gradually start drying . 
Because of extreme chilly weather कभी -झौईण् कभी फसलों sometimes bear big losses . 
With the help of तापमापक we can ascertain chilly weather while before and रक्षा भी फसलों using उचित उपायों . 
If फसल are सिंचाई before the arrival of winters then फसल remain unaffected . 
प्रभाव can be forbidden up to a certain extent by ejecting धुआँ around खेत चारों ओर during winters . 
Rain Gauge - मापक - यह is a hollow instrument . 
इसमें has एक कीप from where पानी enters . 
यह कीप is attached to a glass bottle . 
पानी gets collected in the bottle through कीप . 
पानी of the glass is नापने with a measuring device . 
इस यन्त्र is kept in स्थान during rainfall so the atmospheric rain directly enters into it . 
पानी should at least be 24घंटे once in every 24 hour . 
वर्षा are जो नाप in इंचों . 
For example if there 2 inches of 2 " पानी in नपने गिलास वर्षा उस दिन will be called 2 inches only . 
Sometimes वर्षा occurs at the end of फरवरी or पहले सप्ताह of मार्च . 
इससे leads to the rotting of एकत्रित अन्न in farms . 
बीज catches एक प्रकार of black spot which reduces its rate in बाजार and स्वाद भी also becomes bitter . 
Thus अन्न are greatly affected by वर्षा until they reach घर . 
When there are हल्की वर्षा at अन्त of May after Rabi harvesting they adequately पर्याप्त सहायता in जुताई . 
Hence अत : यह is clear that rain division is more significant for खेती than मात्रा of वर्षा . 
असमय वर्षा puts बहुत ही बुरा प्रभाव on फसलों and sometimes lead to scarcity but असमय वर्षा can make कृषक rich . 
Firstly सर्व प्रथम अधिकांश कीट -झौईण् पतंग originate in the form of eggs by सर्व प्रथम अधिकांश कीट -झौईण् पतंग . 
भिन्न -झौईण् भिन्न कीट -झौईण् पतंग have different kinds of eggs . 
These eggs are round , long , triangular etc. . 
Some eggs are yellow and some are white . 
This is to कहने that eggs have अनेक रंग and colors . 
Consequently every egg gives rise to long , with many joints , crawling living being which is called ईलट or sunda . 
समय भी of egg hatching is also different . 
But it is essential to know that eggs फूटते हैं quickly in गर्मी . 
Egg hatching delays with increasing cold . 
Eggs do not eat nor drink anything but the ' insects that comes out start running here and there in खोज इधर -झौईण् उधर of भोजन . 
These insects खाते हैं the soft stem propagation , leaves and फलों when they get समय . 
आप know ' bhalu sunde ' . 
वह eats the leaves of pigeon pea , kidney bean and urad . 
The green insect which is found on the leaves of लौकी and nenua eats its leaves . 
आपको will होगा amazed to know that very soon these insects नष्ट पूरी फसल . 
That is why the form '' Sunda '' of insects is very furious . 
These insects are responsible for नष्ट फसलों . 
The gram insects eat the stems of पौधों and नष्ट समूची फसल overnight . 
प्रत्येक पतंग adds to वंश वृद्धि after copulation . 
Majority of अधिकांश नर पतंग मर जाते हैं after copulation . 
मादा पतंग होती है also face the similar situation . 
Majority of पतंग मर जाती हैं because of laying innumerable eggs . 
But as opposite to this , queen termite about whom you will learn later lives for 7-8 वर्ष giving 70000-80000 eggs everyday . 
सम्पूर्ण विश्व is aware of दीमक पतंग . 
यह is prevalent in entire world as compared to विश्वव्यापी पतंग . 
उत्पत्ति भी of इस पतंग is also very old . 
There is a story of दीमक catching a sage 's शरीर in पुस्तक . 
Thus on अत : इस आधार the age of ये पतंग and the harmful effects that they could have done can होने यह अनुमान . 
विभिन्न उपाय to curb them are being considered everywhere in विश्व . 
आक्रमण is seen more on the objects made from wood , chevron , bamboo etc. . 
There are चार प्रकार of दीमक in a single burrow . 
जो दीमक that नष्ट the things are कहा जाता है जो दीमक . 
Every labor termite is दीमक चौथाई इंच tall and light yellow-golden in हल्के पीले -झौईण् सुनहले रंग . 
Eating things and making burrows in भूमि , एकत्रित भूमि and building houses outside ground and carrying नये दीमक from एक स्थान to another is the job of नये दीमक . 
9-10 millions of दीमक stay in every burrow and there is एक ऐसा स्थान which is called राज्य गृह . 
राजा and दीमक stay in इसी राज्य -झौईण् गृह . 
रानी दीमक keeps the new eggs in एक उपवन near मज़दूर दीमक राज्य -झौईण् गृह . 
यह उपवन is स्थान for eggs . 
It has fungal growth and which is eaten by नये दीमक coming out of the eggs . 
राज्य -झौईण् गृह and उपवन भी also has some कुछ रक्षक दीमक whose कार्य is to केवल रक्षा . 
Only seven केवल सात प्रकार of tiddi insects in विश्व have been known so far . 
Amongst them अकेले भारतवर्ष alone has तीन प्रकार of tiddis . 
These tiddis are not only found in भारत ही but also in middle east and केन्द्रीय अफ्रीका भी . 
The most devastating of these three of tiddis is the one which is कहा जाता है desert tiddi . 
In English इस पतंग is called Shistosarka-grigeria . 
In भारतवर्ष अन्दर these tiddis are found in the desert of सिंध and राजस्थान . 
Outside भारत बाहर they develop and grow in Balochistan etc. also . 
The eggs of tiddis are very small yellow and brown in कुछ भूरे रंग , like चावल . 
During गर्मी these eggs फूट जाते हैं within 12-14 दिन ही . 
But during winters they take at least 25-26 दिनों in hatching . 
सरकार has made many arrangements considering आक्रमण as national difficulty . 
एक संस्था has been खोली गई है under रेख of अधिकारी whose officers keep पूरी जानकारी about आक्रमण . 
Thus सूचना regarding the tiddis attack should be provided to निकटवर्ती सरकारी अधिकारी . 
कार्यवाही should be quickly taken after सूचना . 
ये अधिकारी will follow उन्हीं उपायों which मैंने have told आपको पहले before . 
But this does not यह अर्थ that all the works will be done by सभी कार्य सरकारी अधिकारी ही . 
आपको should सहायता them while प्रयोग every possible remedy . 
We believe that आक्रमण is एक सरकारी मामला but सभी लोगों of गांव should give physical , psychological and monetary सहायता . 
Arrange for 10 सेर पानी , 25 ser paddy straw , सोडियम फ्लाउसिलिकेट and 3 ser jaggery . 
Now mix थोड़ा सा जल into it and make घोल दीजिए . 
Knead the entire hay with रस ही . 
Mix ' sodium flausilicate ' in this kneaded thing . 
मिश्रण thus तैयार should हो neither too dry nor tough or loose . 
Then इस मिश्रण should be डाल दीजिए very early morning into खेत . 
इस प्रयोग kills majority of अधिकांश पतंग . 
12-14 सेर मिश्रण is adequate for bigha land . 
Sodium flausilicate with a moon trademark can be bought from shops बेचने खाद . 
सोडियम फ्लाउसिलिकेट is विष .

यह walks during night .

When धान gets fluid in the villages then farmer enters किसान खेत and shakes पौधों इधर -झौईण् उधर from both his hands .

यह पतंग comes out only during night and gets आकर्षित towards प्रकाश ओर but hides itself and spends समय during दिन . 
ये पतंग are seen flying before वर्षा and even before that during May-June .

These eggs फूट जाते हैं within 8-10 दिन . 
The sundas -LRB- insects -RRB- that come out on its hatching are quite destructive .

This sunda is एक महान विनाशकारी शत्रु of कपास .

In भारत इससे प्रति leads to the loss of 25-45 % 45 प्रतिशत कपास वर्ष 25 . 
इससे wastes several billion Indian rupees . 
This इस पतंग only आक्रमण कपास ही but other plants of जाति also such as lady 's finger etc. .

जेसिड पतंग भी is one of जेसिड पतंग भी .

सिर is brownish black , पंख are brown and अन्य भाग of शरीर like back etc , are golden yellow in काले रंग , . 
इस पतंग is also called झांझा भी . 
यह पतंग is seen more in उत्तरी भारत . 
Like झांझा पतंग भी , झांझा पतंग भी also harms radish , cabbage , cauliflower and पौधों etc. . 
बनावट of मुंह of इस पतंग is peculiar . 
यह पतंग does not काटकर and नहीं खाता the leaves but sucks पदार्थ of leaves through तेज मुंह . 
The plants lack शक्ति of भोजन because of absence of हरे पदार्थ , as a result पत्तियां हो जाती हैं dry and पीली yellow . 
Hence the plant growth retards . 
पतंग are seen more during ( अक्टूबर till मार्च ) . 
In favorable conditions after copulation , झांझा पतंग separately lays eggs on the leaves of उपर्युक्त पौधों . 
पतंग dies after laying eggs . 
The eggs फूटते in 6-8 दिन . 
On hatching the eggs produce the new born jhanjhas that resemble their ancestors . 
These jhanjha babies आक्रमण the leaves and keep sucking रस . 
Sometimes they are seen in झुण्डों on डाल or leaves . 
Small jhanjha kids attain maturity in 20-25 or 30 दिन and engage in offspring growth through मैथुन क्रिया .

If आप देखें that आप will मिलेगा एक छेद and excreta of an insect along with that at किसी स्थान . 
If छेद is big one should assume that the insect has left the place after eating . 
Therefore आप should काट कर and burn 4-5 inches part down from उस छेद . 
If आप ऐसा ऐसा it then कोई भाग of लगभग सभी पौधों will become loose and फसल will die . 
आलू is one of the major vegetables . 
Like गेहूँ and जौ आलू भी also contain more of starch . 
That is why आलू keep एक विशेष स्थान in our everyday meal along with other edible items . 
Its use प्रतिदिन saves अधिक अन्न . 
Thus during काल of अत : अन्न , आवश्यक खाद्य वस्तु like आलू should be saved from आक्रमण of बाहरी रोगों and insects . 
अधिक मात्रा of आलू get प्रति वर्ष not only in भारतवर्ष ही but at other places of वरन सारे विश्व also . 
Because of this humans have to सामना a big economic and समबन्धी हानि .

They start giving bad odour .

इसी प्रकार of worm harms sweet potatoes also . 
भाग of इस पतंग is long which is called thuthun .
