The foreigners have ले जाकर it from इसी देश and propagated at their place . 
इसे था fertile before खेती began as होने grows even today near ponds with फसई and vattini and since होने is automatically fertile होने is called Palhar , This proves that जीवन must have been dependent only on केवल मांस and फल , , forest , wild fruits etc. and धान भी must have been used for भोजन during इस समय भी . 
इसे is considered so pious amongst Hindus that during all the Pujas in temples and शुभ सगुन चावल is used as '' Akshat '' . 
The '' body donation '' ritual during agnihotra , shradh and tarpan involves its use . 
अतिरिक्त from भारतवर्ष paddy is grown in बहुतायत in अफगानिस्तान , , देशों भी and they are also consumed more as compared to अनाजों in देशों भी . 
क्षेत्रफल under खेती in देश is around five billion acre which means 1/4th of क्षेत्रफल ढकी under खेती is paddy . 
If we calculate गेहूं then it is grown in around 2.5 billion भूमि in देश भर which is the double of धान . 
Though the major meal of humans in संयुक्त प्रदेश बंगाल , , बिहार , , Burma , and south India is अधिकतर चावल ही . 
According to डारविन जो अनाज which is grown in जितना बहुतायत gets the opportunity to फैलने in क्षेत्रफल only . 
And the varieties are also that many . 
Therefore different paddys are identified on the basis of जाति , , गुण , , क्रिया and productiveness . 
Most of them are identified on the basis of ( आकार ) and गुण . 
For क्म्च and vyaghri , Varahi fruit -LRB- ratatalu -RRB- is आकार of a varah -LRB- pig -RRB- , vyaghri -LRB- rusah -RRB- - the flowers of इस वृक्ष after flowering look like teeth of light . 
Similarly जातियों also have names . 
They are basmati , bhantaphul , phulpiyasa , ranikajar , kanak jeera , shyamamghata , badshah pasand and hansraj etc. . 
Some of कुछ जातियों are वर्णन . 
भांटाफूल is blue in रंग . 
पौधा are तीन चार फीट long . 
इसको are called bhantaphhol because they have aroma and रंग like फूल . 
They grow in abundance in मटियार भूमि . 
पुरानी पांस is beneficial for this . 
इसकी needs सिंचाई भी as compared to other paddys and फसल takes दो तीन सप्ताह पीछे more time than फसल . 
चावल is used to make Pulao , इसका has गुण . 
There are less breakage when चावल is processed using machines , उतना ही उत्तम of the rice increases with its age and a एक वर्ष old चावल becomes more aromatic and tasty . 
Its aroma spreads till far away खेत during maturing , The rate of इस चावल could हो जाता है 8-12 rupees/quintal . 
15 seeds are put in one acre of खेत . 
Their thin stripes like kajal in the eyes of रानी and धान with black stripes , यह दोनों लक्षण ऐसे ही resemble bhanta flower , Ramkajra should also होता है समझना in a similar way that there is धान which contains thick black stripes . 
Shyamghata - This paddy is more black than other paddys . 
पौधों of the farm look like बादल and that is why they are called Shyamghata . 
पौधा is 2-2 .5 दो ढाई हाथ long that होता है is 4 फिट long . 
When the rains are over and some clouds are left then its greenery looks very attractive and beautiful . 
चावल is soft and small which breaks on beating . 
Therefore इससे is not fit for making पुलाव and becomes quite white when होने older . 
When we think what is मुख्य समय to sow paddy then time difference also occurs because of their varieties , For example kuanri paddy is sown during प्रारम्भ of वर्षा on 2 जून . 
Katiki paddy is sown in Ashadh -LRB- ( जून ) -RRB- and काट लिया जाता है in the month of Katik -LRB- कातिक मास अक्टूबर -RRB- . 
Such as Basmati and Amghod . 
The sowing of Aghani paddy also begin with वर्षारम्भ of वर्षा , they are sown in Ashadh and again its saplings are planted during जुलाई and अगस्त बीच when खेत is भरजाने with water and the crop becomes mature during Agahn -LRB- November -RRB- . 
भांटाफूल हिरंजन आदि and भांटाफूल हिरंजन आदि are खेती here . 
There are sown in जून ( आषाढ़ ) -LRB- Ashadh -RRB- as the rains begin and harvested in the month of savan and bhado . 
A variety of Jethi paddy is also found which is found in बहुतायत near the areas of बलिया जिला आस -झौईण् पास . 
इसको are called Jaisariya , The seeds of of इस धान are sprinkled in the month of Fagun -LRB- फागुन मास ( मार्च and February -RRB- . 
इसे are considered pious by the Hindus used like fruits and they हो जाती है mature till the month of Katik , इसे are called तिन्नी and Pasai . 
If there are so many grasses in कुंवारी धान then they आवश्यकता to हो looked for weeds 4-5 times . 
There is पौधा which resembles पौधा and is called डंवर needs to be put out . 
Because धान sucks a lot of बहुत सा भोज्य पदार्थ from पांस and भूमि and becomes more strong than धान and makes them weak . 
पौधे हो जाते हैं weak therefore weeds are not put out from अगहनी ही paddy , एक घास which is called नरई needs to हो जाते हैं put out of केवल किसी -झौईण् 2 खेत , these grasses are mostly found in अगहनी ही and धान . 
गांदी or गांदी are very foul smelling युक्त मक्खी that is why they are called gandi . 
Such as the mosquitoes stuck to the bodies of पशुओं and मच्छर मनुष्यों and suck their blood , likewise यह मक्खी भी sucks the element from which धानों originates . 
पौधे are not left with a single grain of एक भी चावल . 
Hundreds acres of खेतों get destroyed because of this insect . 
There are कोई मुख्य उपाय of keeping away इन मक्खियों दूर . 
They burn आग near किसान खेतों पास at रात where so several flies आकर and get burnt . 
कृषि विभाग कार्यालय has come up with another measure these days where a फिट long , फिट wide and 84 inch net should be made , A single net carries फिट sackcloth . 
इसको are called Tandul in संस्कृत , Viracch in Persian , Ursasman in अरबी , उर्ससमन तूरानी in Turani and rozi in सुरियानी भाषा , In more than half भाग of भारतवर्ष जीवन is dependent on चावल , . 
No matter whether they are poor or rich everybody eats पुराना चावल with रुचि , पुराना चावल are of best उत्तम . 
That is why it is a best valuable यह एक बहुमूल्य उत्तम भोजन . 
Greek doctors believe that apart from being tasty चावल satisfies hunger , gives obesity to शरीर , cures intestinal wounds , excessive bleeding , stomach ailments . 
They are considered naturally warm -LRB- hot -RRB- & dry and cold and dry by different people . 
Rice warms those with ( पित्त ) प्रकृति and cools those with ( पित्त ) प्रकृति . 
सरकार has प्रोत्साहित संगठित विपणन of agricultural products in देश through नेटवर्क of regulated markets . 
Most of the state governments and Union Territories have made कानून for विकास कृषि उत्पाद मंडियों . 
7,177 markets have been covered under विनियम till March , 2002 . 
Out of which around 15 % कार्य under क्षेत्र . 
Yet अध्ययन says that the establishment of regulated markets have achieved सीमित सफलता in प्रदान need based आवश्यकता -झौईण् आधारित सुविधाओं and services in निर्माण an able सक्षम विपणन . 
There is कमी of अपेक्षित सुविधाओं to संभालने most of उत्पाद in regulated markets . 
Rural periodic markets generally and tribal markets particularly have रही हैं out of विकास क्षेत्र बाहर . 
एकाधिकारी पद्धतियों and traditions have stopped संचालन of कृषि विपणन through free and competitive व्यापार , , प्रयोग of modern techniques in सट्टा बाजार फसलोत्तर प्रौद्योगिकी and निर्यात , , agricultural based कृषि आधारित उद्योगों and goods granaries etc. . 
प्रतिस्पर्धा प्रतिस्पर्धा and प्रदान अन्य सुविधाएं such as categorization , standardization , storage , financial security , etc have हो गया है subsidiary works . 
Efficient agricultural marketing facility is जरूरत for विकास of कृषि क्षेत्र . 
It is essential to have flexible , quick and inclusive marketing structure to सामना challenges like बढ़ते उत्पादन , , प्रसार of new technologies , changing आर्थिक परिवेश , , आकार of वितरण श्रृंखला and बढ़ते मांग , to कम मार्जिन between अंतिम उपभोक्ता बीच and किसानों , consequences emerged due to उदारीकरण and globalization after निर्धारित अवधि बाद of विश्व व्यापार संगठन . 
उदारीकरण of कृषि in विश्व व्यापार have provided नए अवसर to फार्म सेक्टर to send their agricultural products in विश्वव्यापी बाजार . 
In order to provide पहुंच to agricultural communities , यह is essential that आंतरिक कृषि विपणन व्यवस्था in देश is एकीकृत and मजबूत . 
Currently only state governments under state agricultural marketing regulation act have been दिया गया है अधिकार to start प्रक्रिया of स्थापित regulated agricultural markets . 
As a result of प्रक्रिया of स्थापित markets , निजी क्षेत्र can not initiate the establishment markets with सर्वोत्तम सुविधाओं . 
भूमिका of सरकार in इस क्षेत्र should होनी चाहिए न of एक सहायक and not of a market manager or नियंत्रक . 
Essential high level labor skill and more and more capital for आधारिक संरचना and प्रबंधन of मंडी can only होते हैं प्राप्त from private sectors . 
कृषकों are प्रोत्साहित to श्रेणीकरण कृषि उत्पाद on खेत through प्रत्यक्ष विपणन . 
Thus they बच जाते हैं ढुलाई खर्च on transportation to bring उत्पाद from खेत to विनियमित मंडी for बिक्री . 
किसान and क्रेता भी also invest very little through प्रत्यक्ष विपणन and होता है yields good amount of money . 
Consequently परिणाम of विस्तार of कृषि उत्पाद in दक्षिण कोरिया lead to हुआ in consumer 's उपभोक्ता मूल्य and उत्पादक भी also received up to 30 प्रतिशत more profit . 
The warehouse certification in देश should also हो सके शुरू so that along with मात्रा साथ of उत्पाद गुणवता भी is also certified and these receipts are स्वीकार as the basis for loans . 
मार्जिन आवश्यकता of भंडार should be कम . 
यह भी is also essential to adopt प्रबंधन पद्धति . 
ज्वार has been खेती in भारत since ancient times but they were sown for चारे , for अन्न , But now they are sown for अन्न also . 
ज्वार is खेती in उत्तरी भारत during मौसम and during खरीफ and rabi both in उत्तरी भारत . 
In भारत इसकी is खेती at large scale in उत्तर प्रदेश . 
ज्वार is grown in प्रदेशों like पश्चिम बंगाल , , Tamil Nadu etc. . 
As per official figures in भारत रकबा of इस फसल is around 1.25 billion acres . 
भारत is third largest in terms of क्षेत्रफल under sorghum cultivation . 
महाराष्ट्र is ज्वार सबसे बड़ा उत्पादक राज्य . 
कर्नाटक and Madhya मध्य प्रदेश occupy second and दूसरे स्थान respectively . 
दाने contain 10.4 % प्रोटीन , 1.9 % fibers , 1.6 % minerals and 10.4 प्रतिशत carbohydrates . 
ज्वार contains 2.4 प्रतिशत of प्रोटीन . 
स्टार्च is तैयार from विशेष किस्म of ज्वार . 
शराब भी is also तैयार from दानों . 
It is also एक उत्कृष्ट साधन of providing alcohol . 
Apart from हरे चारे , silage which is a tasty food for cattle is also तैयार from अतिरिक्त ज्वार . 
Around 12-15 बीज are sown for चारे . 
While खेती done for getting grains require बीज . 
The grains start growing till अंत of दाना अक्टूबर . 
Its average production is 2.5-3 tonnes / acre . 
ज्वार is फसल of ऊष्ण जलवायु but fast जातियां could also be grown during गर्मी in cold regions . 
More than 30 अधिक तापक्रम at समय of fiber growth can हो सकता है harmful for फसल . 
माना जाता है of भूमि is considered good for खेती of ज्वार . 
There should होनी चाहिए good drainage system in खेत . 
खेत should be ploughed using कल्टीवेटर or tiller and leveler should be run . 
CSH-5 : यह किस्म gets prepared in 105-110 दिनों . 
इसके prepares 33-35 tonnes / hectare grains and 90-95 tonnes fodder . 
पौधे are around 175 c.m long . 
भुट्टा are long and semi-tied , आकार of the grains are small . 
CSH-9 : यह किस्म gets prepared in 105-110 दिनों . 
36-40 tonnes of grains and 95-100 tonnes / कड़बी 95-100 क्विटंल प्रति हेक्टेयर of fodder are prepared . 
Jawahar sorghum : यह किस्म gets prepared in 110-115 दिनों . 
उत्पादन is 3032 tonnes/hectare . 
They are appropriate for light less यह हल्की कम गहरी भूमि and क्षेत्रों . 
बीज should be treated with fungicide and thyrum at हिसाब of 3 g.m per बीज . 
पूर्व 10 ग्राम एजोस्प्रिलियम and PSB , कल्चर should be उपयोग at हिसाब of per प्रति किलोग्राम of बीज after treating बीज with दवा . 
ज्वार is sown in जुलाई माह of July . 
Sowing should be done keeping 12-15 सेंटीमीटर of 12-15 c.m between पौधे बीच and 12-15 सेंटीमीटर of 45 c.m between the rows . 
There should होने चाहिए 15-17 पौधे in every square meter . 
सुखी बुआई can होने done after receiving सूचना regarding वर्षा . 
घने पौधों should be pulled out and निश्चित दूरी should be kept between घने पौधों . 
पौधे is रखा जाता है at दूरी of 10-12 c.m while doing विरलन after अंकुरण बाद when पौधे are 10 दिन old . 
Rest शेष सभी पौधे are removed . 
Later if there are पश्चात then दूसरा पौधा can हो रही हो रोपा जा सकता है at a place where there are पौध . 
सिंचाई is very essential after putting खाद in खेत . 
खरपतवार should be removed after 15-20 दिन बाद of बुआई . 
खेत also get hugely attacked by insects , विभिन्न तरह of insects that infect them काफी नुकसान फसलों . 
If फसल are लगा हो by तना छेदक insect then घोल of 10 ग्राम साबुन should be sprayed thrice at अंतराल of 10 दिन . 
फसल get hugely infected by meez fly . 
यह कीट attacks when the fibers come out . 
मक्खी are orange or red in नारंगी रंग which lays eggs inside the flowers . 
अंडो 2-3 days membranes come out of the eggs and destroys the flower testes by eating them . 
औसतन of 40-50 tonnes/hectare grains and 100-125 क्विंटल dry kadbi are received by doing खेती using advanced methods . 
It depends on यह वर्षा . 
Roughly 25-30 tonnes/hectare dry kadbi are received from इन क्षेत्रों generally . 
छोटी इलायची is grown from भारत till मलेशिया . 
छोटी हरी इलायची is प्रयोग to bring aroma to किसी भी खाद्य पदार्थ . 
बीज are quite aromatic . 
नाम of हरी इलायची is हरी इलायची . 
पौधा is bushy and तना रहता है extends till तीन मीटर . 
फूल appear in white bunches . 
इलायची भी also appears in bunches . 
फल have तीन प्रकोष्टक which तीन प्रकोष्टक बीज . 
Mix इलायची , in मिर्च and घी and consume it to cure sour belching . 
Doing this cures sour belching . 
Sometimes we get हिचकी which lasts for quite long . 
लोग feel uncomfortable in खुद in such situations . 
Cardamom should होने immediately put in इलायची मुंह for getting rid of हिचकी . 
इससे immediately gives relief . 
लोग are mostly attacked by चपेट during गर्मी . 
During इस मौसम इलायची should be kept inside मुंह before going out . 
यह saves from heat strokes . 
Even if someone is attacked by heat then मरीज should be immediately देना चाहिए इलायची . 
इससे reduces असर of heat stroke . 
Dream disorder - chew दाने or dissolve मिल जाती है in दूध and drink मिल जाती है at रात , Doing this cures dream disorder . 
यह फार्मूला is also effective for patients with stone . 
There is बहस over खेती . 
Agriculture is स्थायी साधन of livelihood of majority of ज्यादातर लोगों in भारत . 
Despite being कुछ किसान some of them get अच्छी आय through खेती . 
कुछ किसान are प्राप्त उपज despite being in infertile areas . 
All this becomes true through hard work and दृढ़ इच्छा शक्ति . 
ऐसे ही एक किसान is Nand kiashore Jaismeria from जोधपुर जिले . 
इन्होंने has turned सोना of getting gold from रेतीली भूमि into reality . 
In the beginning they cultivated plums adopting एकीकृत प्रणाली and now they are earning नाम in दूसरे प्रदेशों भी through plum nurseries . 
For this he has received कई सम्मान including N. G. Ranga farmer award . 
Around जोधपुर जिला मुख्यालय to उत्तर of district headquarters -LRB- Jodhpur -RRB- , behind sandy hills , मनकलओ गांव is not considered good for cultivation . 
Nand kishore Jaisalmeria lives in गांव ही surrounded by sand hills from all sides . 
The average rainfall in the area is 365 mm . 
The farmers consider it better to engage themselves for जीविका in other works rather than agriculture . 
वैज्ञानिकों examined मिट्टी . 
After investigation with पहल of वैज्ञानिकों , with advanced systems , नंदकिशोर planted बेर in खेत . 
For पहली बार 750 saplings were planted . 
A responsibility of taking care of इन पौधों in बलुई मिट्टी बीच was undertaken . 
उन्होंने irrigated each and एक -झौईण् एक पौधे and took care of them . 
कुछ समय बाद ही later ये पौधे grew old and फूल appeared on them . 
नंदकिशोर was utterly happy to देख this . 
वह immediately पहुंचे काजरी and informed वैज्ञानिकों about फूल of पौधों . 
वैज्ञानिकों मुआयना the place and gave तकनीक to save plum flowers . 
Consequently innumerable अकूत बेर were पैदा in खेत . 
In such a situation , नीम , , acacia etc. were planted in खेत . 
There was double profit from these trees . 
Firstly , the farm lines became strong and secondly the trees started providing wood for ईंधन and चारे permanently after growing old . 
This also led to वृद्धि in संरक्षण , , security and सुरक्षा एंव उर्वरता भी . 
Later the woods of these trees also बन गई means of आमदनी for them . 
Hence cultivation of एक खेत , बेर began , the fee was received by giving bee keeping box on किराये , wood for ईंधन was cut from बेर and other trees . 
प्रत्येक पेड़ started giving 30 kilograms of बेर प्रतिवर्ष . 
भारत is देश . 
कृषि is the livelihood of around 65-70 % लगभग 65-70 प्रतिशत जनसंख्या . 
Almost 65 लगभग 14.2 % work force is engaged into this and currently -LRB- 2010-11 -RRB- agricultural contribution in राष्ट्रीय सकल घरेलू उत्पाद ( घ्ढ्फ् ) -LRB- GDP -RRB- is लगभग 14.2 % and हिस्सा in export is around लगभग 14.2 % . 
विकास is not possible without गाँवों बिना . 
सब्जियाँ आदि etc. are major produces here . 
जनसंख्या of देश is ever बढ़ रही है , which थी 102.7 billion as per जनगरणानानुसार of 2001 and is around 121 billion currently while कृषि योग्य भूमि is limited and that is reducing प्रतिदिन . 
Consequently आकार of जोत has reduced to सिकुड़कर लगभग 0.15 हेक्टेयर . 
Hence in order to increase अत : खाद्य उपज , as per मांग , जानकारी regarding उन्नत कृषि तकनीक is very essential . 
शस्यविदों are fully responsible towards इस कार्य . 
कृषि वैज्ञानिक are successfully सामना food crisis . 
कृषि फसलें have been classified into three categories kharif , rabi and zaid as per the seasons . 
Major Rabi crops are मसूर , and ( तोरिया ) . 
कहूवर्गीय फसलों such as - kahu , melon , lady 's finger , ककड़ी , urad , green gram , cow pea , सूरजमुखी आदि भी etc. can also be grown during जायद . 
कपास is one of रेशेदार कृषि उपजों . 
यह are sown during kharif season and सूती are manufactured from प्राप्त रेशों received from them . 
They are primarily grown in मिट्टी , , मिट्टी , and मिट्टी , . 
गुणवत्ता of कपास depends of the length , thinness , maturity and uniformity of रेशे . 
Like अन्य फसलों इसमें is essential to save कपास भी also from रोगों -LRB- mlani , mul , enthrekanoz and jhulsa -RRB- and कीटों -LRB- चितकबरी or pink sundi -RRB- so as to get अच्छी पैदावार . 
नेपियर घास and नेपियर घास are फसलों . 
Amongst them barsim , napier and नेपियर घास are extremely nutritious . 
जल puts बहुत प्रभाव on वृद्धि and उपज . 
Hence अत : भूमि should have पर्याप्त नमी . 
यह जल benefits फसल through अनेक रासायनिक and biological processes . 
The water moisture absorbing केशिका गुरुत्वीय in मृदा is found in four forms . 
खाद is quite significant for लाभदायक उपज . 
उर्वता increases the fertility of भूमि and supplies तत्वों for वृद्धि of पौधों . 
आवश्यक तत्व that पौधों get from them are मैग्नीशियम and sulfur . 
स्रोत भी of पोटैशियम are also जैव पदार्थ and रासायनिक उर्वरक . 
Calcium , मैग्नीशियम and sulfur are found in many kinds of compound forms . 
मात्रा of इन पोषक तत्वों required for विभिन्न फसलों are different for विभिन्न फसलों and समय भी of supplying them also varies . 
आवश्यकता of नाइट्रोजन is more during वृद्धि but आवश्यकता of फॉस्फोरस is more initially . 
पोटाश ग्रहण ग्रहण from मृदा till वृद्धि . 
आरम्भ ही is required in great amount in आरम्भ ही for वृद्धि of roots . 
खाद is the best of खाद . 
इसमें contain all आवश्यक सभी पोषक तत्व for पौधों but majority of the cow dung is प्रयोग in the form of अधिकांश गोबर ईंधन in देश . 
पोषक तत्वों of the cow dung that gets collected in इकट्ठी in थोड़ी मात्रा decreases due to वर्षा and धूप . 
Thus in order to properly collect अत : इस खाद , अत : इस खाद is collected in a pit which is called compost . 
These days there is प्रचलन of preparing गोबर गैस using gobar gas plants . 
उचित मात्रा of उपलब्धता भी is extremely important for अच्छी उपज . 
Rain water is जल प्रमुख स्रोत . 
But यह is uncertain and irregular , therefore कमी of water is supplied through कृत्रिक साधनों of सिंचाई . 
आर्द्रता , , ताप , , गति , , किस्म , , निराई , of किसी फसल , style of किसी फसल and ploughing and उर्वरता determine कितनी मात्रा of आवश्यकता for किसी फसल . 
आवश्यकता of more than अधिक जल leads to बाधा in वायु संचार because of which हानिकारक लवण start accumulating , ताप of भूमि decreases , roots होने loose , ploughing becomes bad and becomes marshy . 
एकत्रित जल gives जन्म to various diseases and insects . 
गुण भी of under पानी also varies . 
At some places पानी is fit for जो कृषि , while at other places होता है , is saline , sticky or poisonous . 
Thus इस प्रकार of water should be प्रयोग for ऐसा जल सिंचाई ध्यान गुण in ध्यान . 
खारे पानी contains more of NO3 . 
ऐसे पानी can होती है of both the varieties saline and sweet . 
खारा पानी is harmful for कृषि but खारा पानी is not . 
It is essential to have जानकारी about उत्पादनवर्द्धक of विभिन्न फसलों so as to get अधिक आर्थिक लाभ and अधिकतम कृषि उपज .

अल्प प्रकाशपेक्षी पौधे - If the amount of sun rays during दिन , is more than अवधि then वानस्पतिक वृद्धि is more and अल्प प्रकाशपेक्षी पौधे do not फूल . 
For उदाहरण if अधिकतम सीमा is 8 hours then अवधि for sun rays should होनी चाहिए 8 hours of less than that . 
फसलें in this section consist of maize , soybean , sorghum , millet , paddy etc. . 
इन्हें are कहा जाता है छ्4 पौधे . 
निष्प्रभावी पौधे : प्रक्रिया of निष्प्रभावी पौधे of this section are not affected by प्रकाश अवधि of light .

Padology-It is that शाखा of विज्ञान which considers मृदा to be purely natural एक प्राकृतिक पिण्ड and प्रयोगिक उपयोगिताओं is not taken care of . 
यह विज्ञान is related to the origin and वितरण of मृदा which is known in अध्ययन of संगठन , , जीवन and mobility . 
यह विज्ञान studies the quality , classification , behavior , anatomy and body composition of मृदा , इसके also includes वर्णन of natural powers responsibility of soil preparation . 
On आधार of soil examination , उपलब्धता of तत्वों in मृदा can हो जाती है determined and on आधार of प्राप्त परीक्षण परिणाम balanced fertilizer recommendations for फसल are made . 
Hence अत : मृदा परीक्षण is extremely important for उन्नत कृषि . 
मनुष्य and सब्जियों have विशेष महत्व in आहार . 
भोजन should essentially include खाद्यान्नों साथ -झौईण् साथ फल and सब्जियों because they provide him with vitamin , carbohydrates , salts , iron , calcium and फास्फोरस आदि which are essential for संतुलित आहार . 
Other than फलों and सब्जियों are also significant from आर्थिक दृष्टि भी of view . 
खेती is more profitable than food grain . 
उन्नतिशील देशों also do अन्तरराष्ट्रीय व्यापार भी of फलों . 
Further , उद्योग have been set up to make jam , jelly , squash , vinegar , juice , sauce etc. from फलों which are साधन of livelihood of many people . 
कई प्रकार of फल should not be planted together in the orchard but separately . 
While making योजना should make sure that विभिन्न प्रकार of वृक्षों develop properly , हो सके , facilitates कृषि कार्य and more and more फल are planted . 
विभिन्न प्रचलित ढंग of वृक्षारोपण are square size , rectangular , six sided , क्विन्कन्स and contour . 
विकास of वृक्षों are also affected by ताप , , वायु , and chilly weather . 
अधिक गर्मी and तेज वायु are harmful for them . 
Temporary shade from hay or grass is build to protect पौधों from scorching heat . 
उसके is essential to तेज हवा blocking वायु अवरोधक वृक्ष surrounding the orchard to protect तेज हवा . 
क्रिया of making सब्जी and पौधे able to सामना the chilly weather , गरम हवा and scorching heat is क्रिया of making them tolerant . 
For this इसके is essential to do न्यूनतम सिंचाई before इसके dries and they should be छोड़ दिया जाये more and more open . 
कमी भी of तापमान also makes the plants tolerant . 
The process of planting जीवित पौधे from एक स्थान to another is called transplantation . 
It is appropriate to do transplantation when पौधे are सुप्तावस्था or are more actively grown . 
Transplantation is done to बचत महँगे बीजों . 
पौधों विकसित roots with many small branches due to trimming of roots because of transplantation and the time between its plantation and growth is saved , Because of this होने has होने possible to उगने फसल even in adverse conditions . 
The transplantation should be carefully carried . 
After pulling out पौधे they should be kept in छायादार स्थान and ढककर with a wet cloth . 
Mango is an extremely important सबसे महत्वपूर्ण फल because of विशिष्ट स्वाद and अनेक उपयोगों . 
There is बहुत मांग for them outside भारत बाहर in foreign countries .

Generally सभी फसलों get affected by कीटों , which consequently leads to भारी हानि and sometimes सभी फसलों gets damaged .

Agriculture machinery are chiefly classified in two sections . 
The first section consists of यन्त्र which are run by कृषक शारीरिक शक्ति such as खुर्पी , , phawda the second section consists of यन्त्र which require पशु , , डीजल इंजन or शारीरिक शक्ति to run such as plow , harrow , कल्टीवेटर . 
यन्त्र नामक कल्टीवेटर is प्रयोग to make मिट्टी soft . 
It is useful in नष्ट यह खरपतवार , मिलाने manure to खेत and तैयार खेत for sowing . 
The major varieties are Kanpur , Vahvah , shabas etc. . 
एक अन्य उपयोगी यन्त्र is harrow . 
Like कल्टीवेटर , हैरो भी also pulls out weeds from खेत , makes मिट्टी soft and is helpful in plucking the tough land of खेत . 
जुताई has अति महत्व in agricultural methods . 
जुताई is done from outside to भीतर or from भीतर to outside in खेत . 
चालित यन्त्र of शक्ति is the process of sending शक्ति to किसी इंजन or electric motor etc. to स्रोत that runs it . 
Easily accessible conventional tracks are प्रयोग to run farm machines . 
The tracks are made of strong and flexible मजबूत लचीले पदार्थ and are put on two and more dhirnis . 
They are made from rubber , leather or cotton and are strong . 
The farmers of देश generally cut किसान फसलों using hand cutters .

पटेला is also known as सरावन or Haenga . 
Dhenkli is one of the ancient method of pulling out पानी from wells , ponds and canals , It is प्रयोग at ऐसे स्थानों where न हो is not possible to put एक प्राचीन उपकरण . 
All the processes carried with उद्देश्य to तैयार भूमि for फसलों and making खरपतवार free and loose during वृद्धि is known as भूमि . 
Indigenous plow is एक बहुउद्देशीय उपकरण for भारतीय किसान . 
Guniya is उपयोगी यन्त्र to make चिन्ह on wood . 
Basula is मुख्य उपकरण of rural carpenter which is प्रयोग by him in daily works . 
छ : प्रकार of retis , flat , semi circular , triangular , round and hand are हैण्ड प्रयोग . 
कार्य of कील is to pull out the nail from the wood . 
आरी is उपकरण to काटने wood .

Agricultural economy अभ्युदय in the form of शाखा which studies आर्थिक क्रियायों and आर्थिक नीतियां of अन्तर्गत कृषक -झौईण् समुदाय . 
Hence कृषि विज्ञान is इस प्रकार of कृषि विज्ञान and secondly it is विशिष्ट शाखा of कृषि विज्ञान . 
कृषि विज्ञान is कृषि विज्ञान which uses अर्थशास्त्र and methods in special conditions of कृषि उद्योग . 
इन साधनों can be प्रयोग in various ways to पूरा अनेक प्रकार of requirements and achieving various objectives . 
भारत was previously पिछ्ड़ा देश in कृषि उत्पादन . 
कारण are - small holdings , sub division of holdings , dependence on मानसून , epidemic of floods and सूखे , inappropriate and conventional अनुपयुक्त परम्परागत कृषि पद्धति , , illiteracy of कृषकों , poverty etc. . 
अनेक उपाय have been done and are being done by सरकार after स्वतन्त्रता . 
Which has वृद्धि कृषि उत्पादन . 
सरकार is running विभिन्न शैक्षिक कार्यक्रम to remove illiteracy . 
There are भिन्न -झौईण् भिन्न प्रकार of geographical and economic conditions in various parts of the country . 
Hence a similar kind of एक सी कृषि प्रणाली is not prevalent in अत : समस्त देश . 
Various kids of educational methods as per स्थानीय परिस्थितियों are being adopted such as - rainy कृषि , , कृषि , , कृषि , , कृषि , and jhooming झूमिंग कृषि प्रणाली . 
An organ of कृषि अर्थव्यवस्था in भारत is agricultural labor . 
ये are those people who work on other people 's भूमि and get कुछ भाग of फसल or धन for their services . 
इन्हें have no right to लेने निर्णय related to भूमि or फसलों grown on भूमि . 
संख्या in भारत is ever बढ़ती जा रही है . 
Zamindari System - Under this एक ही व्यक्ति is स्वामी of भूमि of one or more villages and he is called the zamindar . 
He is in charge of getting land tax from किसानों and submit them in सरकारी कोष . 
The British rulers gave the authority of भूमि to some British followers and made a sacrifice of the interest of billions of करोड़ों कृषकों who plowed the field because of which they had to be dependent on दया of Zamindars . 
Zamindari system was also abolished through the regulations passed in मध्य प्रदेश आदि like Rajasthan , Madhya Pradesh etc. . 
Only then रचनात्मक कार्य of कृषि प्रारम्भ . 
controlled markets have been स्थापना with उद्देश्य to improve दशा of कृषि उपज विपणन . 
The buyers and sellers of the committees of these markets are दिया जाता है क्रेत्ताओं and संगठन and functioning is done as per नियमों framed under नियमों of the act . 
पशुओं have been significant in जीवन since ancient times . 
According to the Livestock Census 2008 संख्या of पशु and hen was 648 million . 
Despite more than 112.5 दुग्ध उत्पादन in the year 2009-10 , we are lagging behind in दुग्ध उत्पादन . 
अमेरिका and न्यूजीलैण्ड आदि etc. are far ahead from देश from this point of view . 
दुग्ध उत्पादन in देश during 1950-51 था 17 ml tonne . 
पशुपालन is शाखा of व्यावहारिक विज्ञान which tells about कला of economically keeping the animals fit . 
Under this we अध्ययन विषयों like animal reproduction , प्रजनन पशु पोषण , , animal management , health etc. . 
Around 31 % लगभग 31 % भाग of कुल वार्षिक आय of देश is received through धन ही . 
4.07 % योगदान of animal wealth and fisheries in the year 2008-09 was 4.07 % . 
We get useful products such as milk , flesh , wool , eggs , leather , manure , hair etc. from पशुओं . 
पशुओं are प्रयोग in agricultural works such as सिंचाई and loading goods . 
Under various five year plans in देश consistent efforts are being made to improve animal breed , उत्पादन वृद्धि , in उत्पादन , माँस , , ऊन and eggs .

गायें of other section fulfill दोहरे उद्देश्य which implies that they देती हैं , good amount of औसतन दूध भी as well as बैल भी are good for agricultural work.Its varieties are हरियाणा , , kokrez , tharparkar -LRB- safed sindhi -RRB- , कोसी or mewati , गंगातीरी or शाहाबादी and krishna ghati etc. . 
तीसरे वर्ग of गायों have been put in तीसरे वर्ग . 
बैल of इस वर्ग are gamous for agricultural works and fast walk but गायें give very less बहुत कम दूध देती हैं , Amrit mahal , nagauri , pawar , hisar , kherigadh , alambadi , rath , bachaur , bargur , dangi kangayam , khilari , मलवी आदि etc. are some of the major varieties . 
यह is well known that उपज of foreign breed of विदेशी गायों is much more than विदेशी गायों of देश . 
The major domestic breeds of देशी गायों are hybrid frigian , brown swiss , red den , aayar shayar garnsi red pole and short horn . 
The hybrid variety of गायों made pregnant from them देती हैं अधिक दूध . 
The major hybrid variety of गायों are Jarsindh , करन स्विस and karan fry . 
उपज तो of संकर गायों is obviously more and they also होती ही mature soon and start giving दुग्ध compared to संकर गायों . 
उद्देश्य of sheep rearing is to get ऊन . 
Apart from wool , देश earns 28 billion प्रतिवर्ष through मांस , , दूध , , leather and and dung of ऊन साथ -झौईण् साथ भेड़ . 
देश gets an average of 675 grams wool औसतन 675 ग्राम ऊन प्रतिवर्ष from भेड़ . 
Indian sheep have been primarily divided into two sections . 
प्रथम वर्ग consists of sheep with ऊन and प्रथम वर्ग consists of sheep with hair . 
There are two major breeds of sheep with hair , mandila and nellore . 
These sheep have less of wool and more of hairs . 
The female sheep and goats mate after 150 दिन for 72 hours . 
Their gestation period generally lasts for 150 days . 
The male sheep are emasculated after 1-2 months for getting good quality of माँस . 
Looking at the increasing demand and less production of eggs and meat in the country the Indian government is paying attention to the development of poultry farming . 
The poultry farming business can be initiated with lost cost and more and more profit can be achieved . 
Protein is an essential element of food . 
Apart from pulses they can होता है easily taken from eggs . 
The weight of a standard size of egg is 50-60 grams . 
मुर्गी takes कम अवधि and begin to lay eggs in around 6 months . 
When hens are reared for meat then they take even lesser time and get ready in around 1.5-2 months . 
विधि of making eggs in the genitals and hatching takes around 24 hours . 
The process of coming out of the baby from the eggs takes places naturally and also by a artificial technique using an incubator . 
A large section of Indian population is vegetarian . 
Their protein supplement is fulfilled by अत : दूध . 
Hence दूध is an integral organ of human diet .

Hence promotion of dairy trade is extremely important .

दूध is the most significant food of the nature . 
लवण नगण्य मात्रा of mineral salts present in milk is little less than the required mineral salts for human body . 
Particularly iron and copper salts are negligible in amount . 
Majority of the people in our country are vegetarians . 
दूध has a special significance . 
The milk adulteration is measured through lactometer . 
आपेक्षिक घनत्व is determined through lactometer . 
The relative density of cow 's दूध is 1.028 at 60 degree F while the relative density of buffalo 's दूध is 1.032 . 
The number of bacteria is present in दूध developed in our country is huge . 
Despite total information regarding clean milk production of the people engaged in milk business , दूध gets contaminated . 
दोहन is also an art . 
The objective of बहुत कुछ दुग्ध दोहन is to get all the milk from the breast . 
The success of dairy business depends a lot on the milking technique . 
The work of milking is mostly done प्रयोग hands in our country . 
दूध is also done using machines but its use is restricted to big milk industries . 
दूध using hands is more prevalent in the country . 
there are three major methods of milking using hands - 1 , milking by bending the thumb , 2 , pinching technique , 3 , total hand milking , Total hand milking technique is the best technique from scientific point of view . 
उम्र of पशु is quite significant for the buyers and sellers of cattle . 
The age of the animal can होता है determined by seeing the structure , horns , nails , records and teeth conditions . 
The total sum of all kinds of teeth of cows-buffaloes , sheep is 32 . 
The teeth covered by the front teeth are called Incisors . 
In cows-buffaloes , sheep etc. they are present only in lower jaw . 
When the animals get all kinds of teeth permanently then this stage is called '' full mouth '' . 
आयु of the cattle can also होने determined by the rings made on their horns . 
एक नया छ्ल्ला appears on the cattle horn when they are प्रत्येक वर्ष of age . 
Then after every year a new ring appears . 
The formula of determining cattle age is -- cattle age = number of rings +2 . 
In today 's modern and scientific age , only the artificial method of animal breding is adopted . 
Rural people are also understanding the significance of artificial fertilization . 
Under विधि the sperms of male animal is sent to the genital organs of female at proper time and place using machines . 
This kind of method helps in improving the breed . 
The first artificial fertilization in India was set up in 1939 in Mysore by Dr. Sammat Kumaran . 
The knowledge of which elements and what amount of elements should be fed to the cattle is essential for successful cattle rearing . 
Then only the cattle keeper can get good production from पशुओं and can prepare पशुओं able to bear weights . 
पशुओं भी consistently require food elements and energy for bodily growth and works such as breathing , digestion , milk ejection etc. and also to remain alive . 
Like humans animals also need salts , mineral salts and vitamins . 
Salts , कुछ अन्य खनिज लवण do not accumulate in the body , they come out in the form of urine or sweat . 
Hence their regular supply should be fixed , Similarly some other mineral salts such as calcium phosphorous etc. are also essential for the building of bones and teeth . 
Therefore the elderly animals should होते हैं regularly given 60 grams of salt and 30 grams of bone meal or khadia . 
Vitamins are a kind of life elements . 
They have significant contribution in functioning of almost all the bodily processes . 
Diseases occur in a scarcity of any single vitamin . 
Every organ of animal body whether external or internal has a different function . 
The determination of whether पशु is good or bad is done on the basis of the structure and functioning of these organs . 
Hence the external bodily structure of an animal has integral relationship with its bodily functions . 
For example chest , big circle on chest , development of lungs and heart express that . 
Similarly slanting back of bulls with quick walking and running are considered good while the best quality of milking cow should have plain back . 
The common temperature of पशु , pulse rate and breathing rate signifies its complete health . 
The differences symbolizes animal 's ill heath or uncommonness . 
The common temperature of cows-buffaloes should होती है 101.5 degree F and that of sheep-goats should होती है 103 degree F . 
The common pulse rate of cows and buffaloes is 40-60 / min and that of भेड़ and बकरियों is 65-85 / min . 
Similarly the respiration rate of cows and buffaloes is 12-18 / min and that of sheep and goats is 12-20 / min . 
The animals are majorly infected by अधिकतर रोग . 
Majority of इन रोगों spread by microbes such as bacteria , virus , fungus and protozoa . 
The cattle keepers should carefully take measure to save रोग पशु from these diseases . 
Prevention is better than cure otherwise it become difficult to treat when पशु catches रोगों . 
In order to prevent from the disease firstly the diseased animal should be kept away from the healthy animals so that विभिन्न रोगों does not catch other animals , The animals should be regularly given इस प्रकार of vaccines . 
Hence there are two kinds of medicines for various diseases . 
In the first category the medicines are used internally in पशु body and in the second category the medicines are used externally . 
Internally the animal is औषधि in the form of tablets , capsules , syrup , liquid , sauce , chyle etc. . 
I order to get quick effects of दवा दवा is supplied in बाह्य रूप of injection . 
Externally the animals are given medicine by putting ointment or powder on the wound or by dressing it , bathing the animal in a solution of medicine , plaster and oil massage .

विकास आदि of rhizo bacteria ' Fomes Lamoensis ' for विकास आदि of tea plants .

Astrogenic activity is seen in turmeric , fenugreek and sesame infusion .

Animal Bio-technology - ' somatic cell nuclear transfer technique ' has been developed for the development of embryo in mouse and buffalo clone . 
Buffalo genomics program has been started at 6 centers of the country . 
Tissue culture studies are ongoing on for the development of bamboo , eucalyptus and dry region species .

Though good symptoms were seen in agriculture since 1965 which began under the development of दशक in United States of america and spread in the world with other crops .

Reason - Necessity for sustainable agriculture was felt because of the excessive exploitation of land , water and environment in order to meet the demands of increasing human food , clothing , shelter , It means to make successful use of the agricultural resources to fulfill the changing demands of human so that natural resources are not wasted and environment also remains safe . 
Hence sustainable agriculture can be kept in triangular form .

Vermicompost is also known as vermi culture or रेअरिन्ग् ( केंचुआ पालन ) भी .

They grow and खाकर these materials and make excreta which is known as vermi-compost . 
They make खाद in around 1.5 months , खाद of 3-5 cubic meter is achieved from the above mentioned row , They contain फ्,ख् अधिक मात्रा of N , P , K . 
In order to get अच्छे परिणाम from vermi-compost , it is essential to cover with leaves etc. after putting them in पौधों . 
Do not प्रयोग रसायन उर्वरक , , insecticide , fungicide , weedicide along with vermi-compost . 
मात्रा of vermi-compost in भूमि in प्रथम वर्ष should be 5 tonnes/hectare , 2.5 tonnes/hectare in प्रथम वर्ष and 1.25 / hectare in प्रथम वर्ष .

फसलों on कृषि योग्य भूमि and grazing animals on चरागाहों and rangeland by shepherds are mainly concerned with कृषि . 
पहचान various forms of कृषि and मात्रात्मक वृद्धि , बन गए the main goals of विचार in पिछली शताब्दी . 
In विकसित दुनिया it is extended from कार्बनिक कृषि ) -LRB- for जैविक कृषि ( उदाहरण , पर्माकल्चर or कार्बनिक कृषि ) -RRB- till कार्बनिक कृषि ) -LRB- जैविक कृषि ( उदाहरण कार्बनिक कृषि ) -RRB- . 
The importance of कृषि in the socio-economic framework of भारत can be महसूस by इस तथ्य that आजीविका of most of देश अधिकांश जनसंख्या is dependent on कृषि . 
योगदान of कृषि क्षेत्र to the Gross Domestic Product -LRB- G D P -RRB- is केवल 18 प्रतिशत while as more than 60 जनसंख्या is dependent on इस , फलस्वरूप of which the per capita प्रति व्यक्‍ति आय in less . 
इससे is also understood from this that there is a lot of बड़ी असमानता between the per capita आय बीच in कृषि क्षेत्र and कृषि क्षेत्र . 
So it is necessary to समाधान those issues which have प्रभाव on स्तरों of किसानों . 
स्तर of आय is निर्धारित by कुल उत्पादन and स्तर and प्राप्‍त मूल्यों obtained by किसानों . 
Obstacles like abundance of small and tertiary cultivation which is about 80 लगभग 82 प्रतिशत of the total cultivation , incomplete market conditions and shortage of post and pre-communication also adversely affect आय स्तरों of किसानों . 
Accordingly , हो , is necessary to frame a useful strategy for making कृषि कार्यकलाप more workable and स्थायी सुधार in आर्थिक स्थिति of किसानों is assured . 
Other than this , many big and small irrigation projects were also undertaken . 
In आरंभ of दशक of 1960 एक एकीकृत कार्यक्रम was आरंभ for increasing उत्पादकता and benefiting किसानों and for कृषि विकास . 
किसानों were acquainted with it and they too adopted नए बीजों and technologies . 
As फलस्वरूप , , in the late sixties there was a lot of काफी प्रगति in उत्पादकता and उत्पादकता of गेहूं . 
Other than this , नई रणनीति बल on सघनता of अधिक फसल . 
From then , वृद्धि दर of जनसंख्या वृद्धि in the agricultural yield रही above वृद्धि दर of जनसंख्या वृद्धि in the population . 
As a result , a state of self sufficiency remained in foodgrains and this was known in the form of ' Green Revolution Age ' . 
Technology services , तालमेल in सरकारी नीति बीच and industriousness of किसानों were उद्यमशीलता of this age . 
Even then , during पिछले दशक दौरान उत्पादन and उत्पादन remained constant and दर भी of विकास slowed . 
To रोकने इस गिरावट and to move कृषि क्षेत्र ahead again , it is necessary to do अधिक प्रयास . 
During the year 2000 राष्‍ट्रीय कृषि नीति was अनुमोदित by भारत सरकार whose goal was to लक्ष्य 4 प्रतिशत more annual increase in कृषि on एक दीर्घावधिक आधार through the medium of प्रभावी उपयोग of प्राकृतिक संसाधनों and other means . 
On दूसरी ओर गैर -झौईण् कृषि क्षेत्र अपेक्षाकृत more fast as expected . 
The fall in प्रगति of गैर -झौईण् कृषि क्षेत्र and the decreasing profitability in कृषि in front of तीव्र वृद्धि समक्ष of गैर -झौईण् कृषि क्षेत्र is बात of worry . 
यह ठहराव was connected to उत्पादकता साथ of फसल , as फलस्वरूप स्तर of आय of किसानों रहा less . 
Normally in ग्रामीण क्षेत्रों and specially in farmer families , shortage of अवसरों is also समस्या . 
Under the hindu ancestral rights -LRB- revised -RRB- act -LRB- 2005 -RRB- after giving land rights to महिलाओं , हो गया है became एक आवश्यक कार्य to प्रदान useful assisting services to महिला कृषकों . 
Joint land-tenure should हो compulsory relating to both the house and खेती भूमि by which महिलाओं can हो eligible for availing ऋण and other services . 
The regulation for land acquirement , specifically for counting damages , will जायेगी scrutinized . 
For non-agricultural projects , as feasible , कोई भूमि with less fertility for संभव कृषि will be allotted . 
For सिंचाई , अनुपलब्धता of जल and at सही समय is becoming एक गंभीर समस्या currently in अनेक भागों of देश in achieving उच्चतर उत्पादकता and स्थिरता in खेती . 
So assured irrigation is जरूरत of अत : आश्‍वस्त सिंचाई समय . 
In देश , although होती है , कुल वर्षा satisfactorily but its division is very uneven . 
So जल संचयन and कुशलतापूर्वक उपयोग of जल is important . 
Efficiency in जल उपयोग of water can also be increased by co-ordination among बीज , , किस्म , , पोषकों -LRB- macro and micro -RRB- and equipment of खेती . 
The thought process of increasing maximally the productivity and आय of per इकाई of जल should also be शामिल in उत्पादन कार्यक्रमों . 
उपलब्ध जल using organizations will be प्रोत्साहित to achieve mastery in getting अधिकतम लाभ of उपलब्ध जल . 
यह भी is also important to keep in ध्यान that अधिकांश किसान are dependent on भू -झौईण् जल for सिंचाई of फसलों . 
संसाधन , , in which किसानों have invested their savings earned from efforts , is today decreasing day by day . 
So , to ensure स्थिरता and चिरकालिकता of जल आपूर्ति , जल संचयन and जलाशयों of water bodies will be दी जाएगी importance . 
Other than resolving the problems of adequacy and गुणवत्ता , evenness in जल वितरण will be assured . 
जल is एक सार्वजनिक संसाधन and not private . 
So विकसित a fair and equal system for अत : जल and involving स्थानीय लोगों in प्रबंधन of जल संसाधनों will have to be देनी होगी importance . 
महिलाओं , , in the form of water user , will have to play एक भूमिका in पहुंच and प्रबंधन . 
For वृद्धि in availability water and doing इसका correct usage निम्नलिखित उपाय will be done . 
For assuring स्थिरता of आपूर्ति , rain water storage and restoring water bodies will be दी जाएगी importance . 
To regulate and नियंत्रित भूजल विकास and प्रबंधन , necessary united उपाय will be done . 
All existing wells and ponds will be restored . 
अभियान will be शुरू and आवश्यक नियम will be made for constant use of भू -झौईण् जल . 
In जल दुर्लभ क्षेत्रों , , बल will be दिया जायेगा on useful way of खेती high priced and less न्यून जल demanding फसलों like दालें and oilseeds . 
In certified famine prone सूखा संभावित प्रमाणित क्षेत्रों एक सूखा कोड will होगा लागू in which the measures adopted to reduce प्रभाव of प्रतिकूल मानसून and to take अधिकतम लाभ of अच्छे मौसम will होगा mentioned . 
In इसी प्रकार in क्षेत्रों of excessive heavy rainfall एक बाढ़ कोड will be लागू by which immediately after the floods , ध्यान in ध्यान the requirements of किसानों , will be obtained for changing बाढ़ -झौईण् मुक्‍त मौसम into एक प्रमुख कृषि उत्पादन अवधि . 
प्राधिकरण will give the technical and समर्थन in इस संबंध . 
पशुधन , which includes कुक्कुट is एक महत्वपूर्ण साधन of आजीविका . 
यह कृषि contributes to about one fourth of सकल घरेलू उत्पाद . 
महिलाएं are involved in अधिक संख्या in इन कार्यकलापों . 
पशुधन of पशुधन is much more balanced because the families of गरीब किसान mostly have भेड़ and बकरियां . 
The big hurdles faced by the farmer families are प्रजनन , , चारे , , health maintenance , and कीमतों for their produce . 
It is necessary to समाधान these issues with the help of उपयुक्‍त रणनीति . 
कृषि क्लिनिकों run by the animal doctors and agricultural science graduates will be प्रोत्साहित in increasing आय of the owners of पशुओं through उच्च उत्पादकता of पशुधन and overall workmanship . 
Along with this , crop-livestock unified farming techniques and एकीकृत खेती and उत्पादन of bio-fertilizers will be प्रोत्साहित . 
There is also a necessity to पुनर्संरचना बीमे भी of पशुओं and this will be made easy for पशुओं owners . 
In regard to poultry it is necessary to take निम्नलिखित उपाय . 
On all ports of प्रवेश , for imported birds संगरोध and checkup and टीकाकरण सुविधाएं will स्थापित and strengthened because उपाय are very essential for keeping कुक्कुट उद्योग in a good state and for ऐसे सुरक्षा of जीवन and आजीविका . 
Before giving अनुमति to sell in बाजार , सुरक्षा of imported poultry vaccines and प्रभावोत्पादकता of efficacy will be made mandatory . 
Poultry will be recognized in the form of एक कृषि कार्यकलाप . 
To encourage collective or small poultry asset यथोचित सहायता will be made available for किसानों . 
Lakhs of families मिलती है income and आजीविका from both coastal and inland fishing . 
Encouraging fishery in वैज्ञानिक रूप , एकत्रण and प्रसंस्करण , there are पर्याप्‍त अवसर to improve आय of the fisherman families on सतत आधार in वैज्ञानिक रूप . 
राष्‍ट्रीय मात्स्यिकी विकास बोर्ड -LRB- NFDC -RRB- has been स्थापित by भारत सरकार by which -झौईण् पूरा ध्यान can be दिया जा सके on fishing and main activities संबंधित to water-agriculture and व्यावसायिक प्रबंधन can be done . 
निम्नलिखित कदम will be taken for encouraging modern water-agriculture procedures and price enhancing . 
बायोकवच should be made capable for creating biocover like mangroves , kejurina , एलीकोर्निआ एट्रीप्लेक्स and पौधे . 
By मदद will be available in keeping safe जीवन and livelihoods of the coastal fishermen and farm families in स्थिति , of समुद्र जल भराव like cyclones , tsunami . 
जैव संसाधनों are related to the ample reserve of flora and fauna in which are included मृदा , , वनस्पति and small creatures which is the third most important available natural जैव संसाधनों after भूमि and जल बाद . 
For attaining some of the above said goals there are two enactments present - संरक्षण and Farmer Rights Act -LRB- PPVFR -RRB- , 2001 and 2002 . 
कार्यान्वयन of these acts will be made stronger and broad directives will be विकसित in इस प्रकार that the rights of कृषक and कृषक समुदाय can be recognized . 
For संरक्षण and विकास of bio-resources निम्नलिखित will be प्रोत्साहित . 
Through the bio-diversity पारम्परिक जानकारी -LRB- पारम्परिक जानकारी -RRB- will be documented in which involvement of महिलाओं will be done who have a lot of पारम्परिक जानकारी . 
By जेनेटिक समरूपता there will होती है वृद्धि in जेनेटिक भेद्यता towards कीटों and रोगों . 
So सहभागी of अत : प्रजनन and अत : प्रजनन will be done so that छोटे किसानों will मिले मदद in protecting from pest and disease epidemic . 
To understand महत्व of जेनेटिक संसाधन संरक्षण of प्रोत्साहन will be दिया जाएगा to स्थापित जीनोम क्लब in the rural schools and कालेजों . 
In ऐसी बायोवैलीज किसानों will be helped through venture capital and अन्य सहयोग so that they are able to protect , choose and बहुगुणन औषधीय पौधों for स्वास्थ्य सुरक्षा of health . 
A process of पुरस्कारों and rewards will be विकसित so that लोगों can be made able and encouraged to keep their genus safe under the bio-diversity act . 
For these purposes उपयोग of विधि will be done . 
Livestock owners will be प्रोत्साहित to accept अधिकारों to continue उपयोग and विकास of भण्डार and reproduction traditions . 
Accepting महत्वपूर्ण भूमिका of संरक्षण of जेनेटिक विविधता and livestock owners , it is necessary to document देशज ज्ञान about संरक्षण and प्रजनन of चरवाहा समुदायों . 
For प्रोत्साहित on स्थल ही with regard to animal species state farms can be उपयोग . 
For giving संरक्षण to पशु genetic resources pastures will be designated . 
For testing germ plasma , सुरक्षा संबंधी सुविधाएं related to protection from रोग will be provided and choosing of disease tolerant varieties will be दिया जाएगा preference . 
Indian varieties of cow-buffaloes are in माँग in दूसरे देशों . 
So Zoology graduates , self-help groups -LRB- SHG -RRB- and प्रगतिशील पशु कृषकों will be प्रोत्साहित to keep such breed of पशुओं and स्व -झौईण् सहायता so that अधिकतम लाभ can be taken of अवसरों of निर्यात . 
But निर्यात , of all bio material , in which पशु भी are also शामिल will be done according to the postulates of bio-diversity act . 
अहम भूमिका of विज्ञान and विज्ञान is important in परिवर्तन happened in प्रचालन and yield . 
To मददगार control on ठहराव in प्रौद्योगिकी उपयोग in प्रौद्योगिकी , which can हो सकती है , useful to increase यूनिट of उत्पादकता of भूमि and जल is necessary . 
Non-governmental organisations -LRB- NGOs -RRB- and private sector research and development organisations will also be शामिल in एनएआरएस . 
एनएआरएस will be restructured so that problems of small and सीमांत किसानों can be हल in an effective way . 
Research अनुसंधान कार्यनीति should होनी चाहिए , favorable to प्रकृति , should होनी चाहिए , in the interest of लघु कृषकों and महिलाओं . 
To assure the safe and responsible उपयोग of पुन : संयोजित डीएनए प्रौद्योगिकी or genetic engineering , a national bio technology regulation authority will be स्थापित . 
Increase will be done in पैदावार of विभिन्न किस्म of फसलों according to requirement , like from the viewpoint of being researched , फल and सब्जियाँ . 
To पूरा the requirements of किसानों and to increase the scientific yield in आर्गेनिक खेती उच्चस्तरीय बहु -झौईण् विषयक प्रयास will be done . 
There is a chance to adopt principles and विधियों of आर्गेनिक खेती under crop-livestock-fishing unified production processes . 
In कृषि क्षेत्रों with एकल फसल , from the viewpoint of अर्थशास्त्र and income generation , विविधीकरण can हो सकता है beneficial . 
Even then , along with any advice दिये जाने with regard to फसल विविधीकरण , ऐसे उपाय भी should also be definitely told by which प्रभावी बाजार सहायता can be assured for वैकल्पिक फसलों . 
At समय , of making ready योजना for फसल विविधीकरण , specially from खाद्य फसल to खाद्य फसल like in relation to उत्पादन , of bio-fuel , खाद्य सुरक्षा will be रखा जाएगा in ध्यान . 
In Intellectual Property Rights -LRB- IPR -RRB- नियमों , , researched अनुसंधान उत्पादों and with regard to प्रक्रियाओं of pricing for किसानों , प्रावधान for अनिवार्य लाइसेंसिंग of rights will be made . 
In all matters of स्वास्थ्य and खाद्य सुरक्षा social inclusion will होगा guiding . 
Through उचित समेकन of technology services and सार्वजनिक नीतियों , प्राथमिकता will be दी जाएगी to changing the Sindhu-Ganga plains into a main foodgrain producing प्रमुख खाद्यान्न उत्पादकता क्षेत्र and कृषि in प्रमुख खाद्यान्न उत्पादकता क्षेत्र of हरित क्रान्ति . 
Farming bio-safety of वृक्षों and फार्म and water creatures is very important because this is related to कार्य and जैव -झौईण् सुरक्षा of most of यह अधिकांश आबादी and जैव -झौईण् सुरक्षा of खाद्य and trade of the nation . 
Including फसलों , , पशुपालन , , fishery , वानिकी and farming-friendly micro organisms , एक समेकित राष्‍ट्रीय कृषि जैव -झौईण् सुरक्षा पद्धति -LRB- NABS -RRB- will be स्थापित with the following goals . 
In short , medium and long term मौसम पूर्वानुमान राष्‍ट्रीय क्षमता is much more . 
To देने संबंधी सुझाव to किसानों about उपयोग in कम से कम समय , कृषि -झौईण् मौसम विज्ञानीय सलाह जारी from कम से कम समय to कम से कम समय by the trained workers at प्रशिक्षित पंचायत स्तर will be उपयोग . 
In matters of sea fishing , with respect to ऊंचाइयों of the waves and स्थान of obtaining of schools of मत्स्य , available numbers will be conveyed to the fishermen . 
Changes happening in जलवायु due to वर्षा and प्रतिकूल परिवर्तनों in समुद्र स्तर is an upcoming topic . 
Most experts agree to this that प्रभाव of global temperatures is worrisome which is clear from the melting of अन्टार्कटिका and peaks of Antarctica and the Arctic . 
Also there is being वृद्धि in the frequency and intensity of coastal storms and cyclones . 
As a result of इन परिवर्तनों there is अधिक संभावना of सूखे and बाढ़ . 
To कम सुभेद्यता towards जलवायु परिवर्तन , सक्रिय उपाय will be taken . 
Based on exemplary models , with respect to कृषि -झौईण् जलवायु क्षेत्र incidental projects and measures for जल वैकल्पिक उपयोग of भूमि and water will be made ready . 
In सूखा and प्रवण क्षेत्रों , अनुभवी किसानों will be प्रशिक्षित in the form of '' climate managers '' in कला of प्रबंधन of बाढ़ and अनियमित मानसून . 
Seeds : बीज : and disease free planting material in which in-vitro cultured propagules are present , is mandatory for फसल उत्पादकता and सुरक्षा . 
Now in बहुत सी फसलों hybrid varieties are being available . 
Original -LRB- foundation -RRB- बीज , with respect to new sub-varieties will be मुहैया to seed growers of आधारभूत स्तर and their groups like co-operative societies and SHG . 
Partnership in mutually beneficial लाभप्रद कृषक बीज कंपनी will be encouraged . 
Agricultural colleges will be प्रोत्साहित for making सभी व्यावहारिक पाठ्यक्रमों on the main principles of व्यापार in बीज प्रौद्योगिकी and व्यापार and all practical courses . 
ग्रिड will be स्थापित by which , in संपूर्ण देश , according to the specific expectations of विभिन्न क्षेत्रों , आपूर्ति of एक राष्‍ट्रीय बीज will be assured . 
मृदा स्वास्थ्य : कुंजी to increase उत्पादकता of मृदा स्वास्थ्य : खेत is enrichment in मृदा स्वास्थ्य . 
प्रत्येक किसान परिवार will be जारी पासबुक on a permanent basis , in which along with corresponding advice , समेकित जानकारी about physical , chemical and microbiology related to the soil of खेतों will be दी जाएगी . 
For this purpose , to find the deficiency in विशिष्‍ट सूक्ष्म in the soil , और अधिक प्रयोगशालाएं will जाएंगी स्थापित . 
Including the leftovers of फसल in मृदा , मृदा -LRB- organic -RRB- matter will be वृद्धि . 
With respect to the restoration of भूमि and improving जैविकीय क्षमता , उचित तकनीकी सलाह will be made available . 
For encouraging संतुलित प्रयोग of उर्वरकों , नीतियों will be reviewed . 
कषि वानिकी will be प्रोत्साहित for expert nutrient circulation , nitrogen assessment , bio resources boosting and सुधार in निकास प्रणाली . 
Insect repellents : there is a lot of damage प्रत्येक वर्ष of फसल due to कीटों , , रोगजनकों and खरपतवार . 
Priority will be दी जाएगी to प्रयोग and प्रसार of environmentally safe and effective pesticides . 
It is necessary to include उपयोग of chemical fertilizers in a Integrated Pest Management -LRB- IPM -RRB- पद्धति . 
नियंत्रण , , safety measures and other regulatory systems will be made strong . 
बिक्री of नकली and substandard level pesticides will be stopped and bio pesticides will be प्रोत्साहित . 
Machines : किसानों जरूरत machines and appliances specific to क्षेत्र and फसल so that फसल of seeds and handling of खरपतवार and improving of after फसलोत्तर कार्य can होती है done . 
महिलाओं specially जरूरत favorable machines for themselves in which less labor is जरूरत , productivity increases and समय is बचे and जरूरत can होती है उपयोग easily . 
Agricultural graduates , agricultural entrepreneurs , and forward प्रगामी किसानों will be प्रोत्साहित to make ट्रैक्टर and other big farm equipments on आधार of fee-rent . 
Diagnosis about vaccines and serum : The main drawbacks in the provisions available now संबंधी रोगों will have to be eliminated . 
Encouraging सरकारी -झौईण् निजी भागीदारियों , it is necessary to bring speed in जैव -झौईण् प्रौद्योगिकी अनुसंधान in क्षेत्र of टीका विकास . 
मत्स्य बीज and food : खाद्य : उत्तम कोटि and मत्स्य बीज is the key to successful national fishery . 
Forward-thinking fishermen and their groups like self help groups -LRB- SHG -RRB- will be प्रशिक्षित in मत्स्य बीज प्रजनन उत्पादन and मत्स्य बीज and मत्स्य बीज खाद्य will made available at sustainable costs . 
For उचित तकनीकी सहायता will be sought from राष्‍ट्रीय मात्स्यिकी विकास बोर्ड and other agencies . 
Fodder for पशु : Insufficient nutrition only is कारण for कम पैदावार of दूध in पशु . 
For changing the cellulosic waste into a form of उत्तम पशु खाद्य through उपयुक्‍त उपचार and cultivation , रोपण of समृद्ध चारा पौधों and for spreading of technologies , encouragement will be given for both traditional and non-traditional techniques . 
Other essential helpful services : पशुधन क्षेत्र will have to be made favorable for स्वच्छता and trees स्वच्छता . 
A group of veterinary doctors will be प्रशिक्षित so that co-operative service centers for किसानों can be स्थापना by which diseases will be known immediately and मदद will be available for इलाज and other animal medicare services . 
Assistance services for the rights of महिलाओं : For क्षमता निर्माण and जीविका for काम on फार्मों there is जरूरत for proper assistance services like day care and child care centers , स्वास्थ्य and प्रशिक्षण आदि . 
There is आवश्यकता for सुधार in efficiency and outreach -LRB- outreach -RRB- of ग्रामीण बैंकिंग प्रणाली . 
For this , financial services at proper interest rates should पहुंचनी चाहिए किसानों at right सही समय , , in पर्याप्‍त मात्रा and easily . 
For facilitating बेहतर संस्थागत ऋण for किसानों there is एक कृषि ऋण नीति of भारत सरकार . 
Under the farmer credit card उपाय will be taken for व्यापक कवरेज of किसान . 
For encouraging उत्पादन and reducing ऋण जोखिम , माइक्रो ऋण and माइक्रो बीमा will be encouraged as एक प्रभावी साधन . 
In ग्रामीण वित्तीय प्रणाली , ऋण सहकारिताओं has महत्वपूर्ण स्थान and भूमिका and for सुधार in co-operative loan institutions प्राथमिकता will be दी जाएगी to implement the recomendations of वैद्यनाथन समिति . 
Because farming is very high कृषि अत्यधिक जोखिम एक आर्थिक कार्यकलाप , किसानों जरूरत consumer-friendly insurance schemes under which अंतर्गत उत्पादन अर्थात from sowing to post-crop activities will be शामिल . 
In बीमे , for protecting किसानों from financial calamities , मंडी जोखिम regarding सभी फसलों should be शामिल and in कृषि should be made financially practical . 
To make राष्‍ट्रीय कृषि बीमा स्कीम more favorable for किसानों , प्रयास will be made to bring सुधार in इसमें . 
In villages बीमा दोनों प्रकार of जानकारी of ऋण and insurance is जरूरत . 
In इस काम , ज्ञान चौपाल -LRB- Village Information Centers -RRB- can हो सकते हैं helpful . 
Encouragement will be दिया जायेगा to bring awareness in किसानों about बीमा and ऋण . 
Co-operative societies should कार्य in the form of financial enterprises and not in कार्य in the form of the extended department of राज्य . 
They should achieve an industrious viewpoint , a competitive position through माध्यम of useful entrepreneurial kendran and establish relations planned relations with public and private sector units . 
A useful technique should be made through which a farmer can have अधिक नियंत्रण on the market mediums and can get बेहतर अवसर of लाभ through co-operative societies and self help groups . 
Looking at आर्थिक उदारीकरण and market competitiveness , co-operative societies will होगी जरूरत much more capital and other financial resources . 
It is necessary to make प्रबंधन of co-operative societies more able commercially in which there will be सीमांकन of the duties of सदस्यों and the managers . 
The difference between जानकारी and फील्ड स्तरीय कार्य बीच has हो गया है much more in वर्षों . 
इस अभाव of ज्ञान will हो सके speedily taken away by which there can हो सके वृद्धि in फार्म उत्पादकता and लाभप्रदता . 
The Agricultural Science Center will देंगे प्रशिक्षण in क्षेत्र of कृषि विज्ञान केन्द्र फसलोत्‍तर प्रौद्योगिकी , , कृषि प्रसंस्करण and cost increasing of प्राथमिक उत्पादों and will organize exhibitions from प्रयोगशाला to खेत so that alert jobs can be made available in villages . 
Along with कृषि विज्ञान केन्द्रों साथ , with सम्पर्क with farm schools there will be a rush in प्रक्रिया of technological upliftment of फसल and पशुपालन , , मत्स्यकी and कृषि वानिकी . 
There will be a rush in प्रक्रिया of modern agricultural systems . 
With मदद of modern agricultural systems , प्रयास will be made to bring together किसानों , , researchers , retail sellers and other stakeholders . 
Specially at जिला स्तर and जिला स्तर below it , समेकन of प्रयासों will be fixed . 
By स्थापित नये ज्ञान चौपाल in villages , क्षमता of टी will be उपयोग . 
Other than this the service centers of सूचना प्रौद्योगिकी विभाग of भारत सरकार and the centers established through भारत सरकार and privately निजी पहल कार्यक्रमों will be included for broad and विकास . 
In the framework of ICT based सी टी आधारित ज्ञान पद्धति , in इस प्रकार , स्थापना of such village centers will होगी शामिल along with others . 
Through ब्राडबैन्ड इंटरनेट , till the last mill and the last person , सामुदायिक रेडियो or इंटरनेट -झौईण् मोबाइल फोन will be provided . 
To ensure assured आजीविका , it is necessary to include किसानों , , specially small and किसानों , and भूमिहीन कृषि श्रमिकों , under एक व्यापक राष्‍ट्रीय सामाजिक सुरक्षा स्कीम . 
So अत : सरकार will take आवश्यक उपाय to implement एक उचित सामाजिक सुरक्षा स्कीम . 
In increasing the agricultural output and लाभप्रदता , प्रदान लाभप्रद विपणन अवसर for assured and profitable marketing is मुख्य पहलू of सतत प्रगति . 
From first सुधार have been done by the central and state governments . 
Minimum Support Price -LRB- MSP -RRB- न्यूनतम समर्थन मूल्य ( एम एस पी ) पद्धति will be implemented in the whole country in a more effective अधिक प्रभावी ढंग . 
Market Intervention Scheme -LRB- MIS -RRB- , in case of emergencies , will be made strong to be implemented quickly , specially in rain harvested वर्षापोषित क्षेत्रों in case of संवेदनशील फसलों . 
Efforts will be done to develop Unitary National Market by giving concession on internal restrictions . 
All the controls and regulations obstructing in वृद्धि of आय of किसानों will जायेगी inspected and they will जायेगी removed . 
Terminal Markets will be विकास for कृषि through public-private partnership . 
किसानों need correct सही सलाह about निर्णयों and inputs based on meteorological science , trading and प्रबंधन सूचना . 
To कम हानियों and to increase रोजगार and आय at ग्राम स्तर ही only , बुनियादी सुविधाएं will be दी जाएंगी for कृषि संसाधन and value addition . 
To incentivize फसल संसाधन उद्योग , producer groups and co-operative societies will be प्रोत्साहित . 
Obstacles will be ridden away for betterment of परक्राम्यता warehouse income . 
उद्देश्य of व्यापार नीतियों in कृषि will be जीविका जीविका of the farmer families and making आर्थिक स्थिति of कृषक better . 
For this प्रभावी जीविका सुरक्षा प्रणाली of किसानों will जायेगी लागू . 
In समूचे देश गुणवत्ता and कार्यक्रम will be शुरू . 
To कम जोखिम and stakeholders , to save themselves , किसानों from जोखिम , उचित उपाय will be taken . 
By विदेश जानकारी about उपलब्ध अवसरों for कृषि व्यापार and मूल्य वर्धन , farmer associations and SHG will be helped to निर्यात at competitive terms . 
Agricultural export will होगी made more strong , so that कृषि -झौईण् निर्यात क्षेत्रों can होगी made , where किसानों will get सर्वाधिक कीमत for their produce as much as possible . 
This is यह सुस्थापित तथ्य that by वर्धन in कृषि उत्पादों , स्तरों of आय of किसानों will होती है वृद्धि . 
So it is necessary to integrate their yield with processing and other value addition chain activities . 
Also , in देश , post harvesting infrastructure is totally insufficient due to which अत्यधिक अक्षमता and waste is produced . 
वर्धन मूल्य to their income , joining them to the market , bringing about सुधार in फसलोपरान्त प्रबंधन and encouraging मांग oriented farming , food processing industry is capable of giving long term दीर्घकालीन आर्थिक सततता to खाद्य प्रसंस्करण उद्योग किसानों . 
Other than this , इसके is also necessary to make food processing activities modern . 
So to make अत : इस प्रक्रिया attractive , प्रभावी उपाय will be taken to make खाद्य प्रसंस्करण क्षेत्रों modern and वृद्धि इसकी competitiveness . 
Among श्रेणी , किसानों are in सर्वाधिक खराब स्थिति . 
All over the country most tribal groups are dependent on वनों and पशुपालन for आजीविका . 
To do खेती in this -LRB- in भागों zoom खेती -RRB- includes collecting चारा and अनेक प्रकार of वन उत्पाद . 
To bring about सुधार in आर्थिक स्थिति is प्राथमिकता of सरकार . 
For इस प्रयोजनार्थ the following activities will be done . 
To ensure अवसर of बेहतर आजीविका for the herdsmen निम्नलिखित उपाय will be taken . 
चारागाह and drinking water sources will be संरक्षित for पशुधन and feasibility will be increased as much as possible . 
Herdsmen will be made part of all the local natural resources सभी स्थानीय प्राकृतिक संसाधन प्रबंधन कार्यक्रमों . 
In which , ग्राम , , forest committees and संयुक्‍त वन प्रबंधन in शामिल . 
छोटे किसान in बड़ी संख्या are engaged in खेती of बागान फसलों like tea , coffee , rubber , cardamom , black pepper and वनिला . 
Fluctuation in कीमत and प्रतिस्पर्धा with आयातित उत्पादों imported from abroad are शामिल in some of those big problems कुछेक by them . 
So to protect them from the fluctuation of बाजार , they can मिल सकती है मदद from one price एक कीमत स्थिरीकरण fund for फसलों . 
It is necessary to दिए जाने विशेष ध्यान to farmer and fishermen families in अंडमान and Nicobar island clusters and the Lakshwadeep island clusters and in other island clusters . 
Areas of प्रशिक्षण , and अवस्थापना and व्यापार are शामिल in their needs . 
Transportation cost is also an issue in कृषि , specially with respect to perishable items like मछली which is to होता है sold on the mainland . 
There are ancient tribes on अंडमान and Nicobar islands who have एक समृद्ध पारम्परिक जानकारी and एक समृद्ध पारम्परिक जानकारी . 
Measures will be taken to प्रदान and reward ज्ञान in क्षेत्रों of जैवविविधिता संरक्षण and परम्परागत स्वास्थ्य देखभाल . 
As much as possible , बागवानी विकास कार्यक्रम will be लागू in the islands . 
With उद्देश्य of keeping जीवन and आजीविकाओं in the islands safe in स्थिति of calamities like स्तर and tsunami due to बढ़ती global warming , उपाय like creating mangrove and non-mangrove गैर -झौईण् मेनग्रोव बायोशील्डों will be done . 
In शहरी क्षेत्रों , , house gardens and नर्सरियों will be प्रोत्साहित . 
Nutritious food related gardens will be given समर्थन so that requirements regarding nutritious food will be fulfilled . 
In भारत अभियान , is not नहीं मिल पा रही है सहायता from the institute in क्षेत्रों of resources , development and विपणन and for सहायता is expected more than आर्गेनिक खेती . 
Agricultural Science Centers will be made ready to give प्रशिक्षण in आर्गेनिक खेती . 
To make किसान -झौईण् favorable and capable , internationally accepted certification activities will also be made strong . 
आर्गेनिक खेती will be प्रोत्साहित in चुनिंदा वर्षा प्रधान क्षेत्रों along with अपेक्षित सहायता साथ in which विपणन is also शामिल . 
This will be assisted through contract खेती भी also . 
खाद्य सुरक्षा and quality yardstick should होने चाहिए in accordance to एलिमेण्टेरियस मानकों of codex alimentarius because sometimes there has been रिपोर्ट of presence of lots of भारी धातु in आर्गेनिक खाद . 
किसानों engaged in कार्य of आर्गेनिक खेती should होगी joined with महत्वपूर्ण बाजारों where they will get प्रीमियम कीमत . 
To स्थापित farmer-clinics and farmer occupational centers for उन्नतशील किसानों and agricultural graduates will be given backing . 
हरित कृषि , , in which एकीकृत कीट प्रबंधन , , पूर्ति and एकीकृत कीट प्रबंधन , is शामिल , has always been recognized as going towards ' " सदा हरित क्रान्ति " ओर . 
Opposed to आर्गेनिक खेती , , under आर्गेनिक खेती , is included safe and उपयोग of खनिज उर्वरकों and chemical pesticides and varieties of विकसित फसलों developed by genetic research . 
हरित कृषि उत्पादों will होता है classified and प्रोत्साहित through प्रमाणपत्र like is done in the case of आर्गेनिक खेती . 
It is necessary to understand जोखिमों and लाभों related to जी एम फसलों in a credible and transparent ढंग . 
In genetic research inclusion of such genes should be दी जाए प्राथमिकता by which मदद will be मिल सके in stopping of famine , salinity and other pressures . 
कार्यकुशलता and सुधार भी in पोषणात्मक and प्रसंस्करण गुणवत्ता will also have to be given प्राथमिकता in the research work-list . 
In relation to G M varieties of crops प्रशिक्षण will have to होगी शुरू to होगी देना in farming management techniques and bring about awareness . 
Along with तीव्र प्रगति साथ , in पानी and fertilizer usage , like economical fertilizer systems , with सहायता of पोषक पदार्थों through irrigation systems there are अवसर of हरित गृह खेती of फलों and flowers . 
Under कार्यक्रम and कार्यक्रम , to do बागवानी , agricultural and home science graduates and other endeavors will जायेगी given सहायता . 
उपयुक्‍त सहायता will जायेगी given for such technologies by which उपयुक्‍त सहायता can जायेगी मिल सके in आय in क्षेत्रों . 
अनेक उपाय have been taken by सरकार to कम the agriculture कृषि संबंधी कठिनाई seen in कुछ भागों of देश . 
This is important that विशेष ध्यान should be दिया जाए on ऐसे क्षेत्रों so that जोखिम can be कम and encouragement can be दिया जाए to inputs for long term agricultural systems . 
In ऐसे क्षेत्रों , , information combination and social help systems and marketing framework should be made strong . 
To be exhaustively लाभान्वित under different schemes will also be प्रोत्साहित . 
Due to धीमी वृद्धि in non-agricultural field work , small and non-profitable from अलाभकर viewpoint cultivation has धीमी वृद्धि . 
To वृद्धि आय of किसानों , by increasing उत्पादकता of small farms and through crop-livestock integrated farming systems , creating अवसर for अनेक आजीविका , कृषि प्रसंस्करण with be given समर्थन . 
For small and सीमांत किसानों , principles of economic scale should be made popular by farmer groups for increasing productivity and आय . 
महिलाओं will be प्रोत्साहित to लेने भाग in such group activities . 
Some methods are illustrated below which small and किसान can adopt in farming activities for work efficiency and cost efficiency . 
सहकारी खेती and co-operative societies have been successful with respect to डेयरी उद्योग . 
Marketing Co-operative Societies have generally been successful because सदस्य देखते हैं an advantage and so help . 
Other forms of सहकारिताओं are emerging , but गति has to be increased . 
So for doing विपणन संबंधी कार्य related to processing , value addition and marketing of कृषि उत्पादों , small agricultural co-operatives will be प्रोत्साहित and सहायता will be दी जाएगी to them . 
Co-operative farming by स्वसहायता -LRB- SHG -RRB- : SHG 's have been successful in प्रोत्साहित small ventures organized by महिलाओं with सहायता of सामूहिक कृषि : लघु ऋण . 
With respect to '' green " हरित -झौईण् कृषि " '' with समेकित कीट प्रबंधन , , integrated nutrient fulfillment , समेकित कीट प्रबंधन , and प्रौद्योगिकी this has been especially helpful . 
SHG 's will also be encouraged to make ऋण available to किसानों easily . 
Contract farming : कृषि : कृषकों will be प्रोत्साहित for ensuring assured and profitable लाभप्रद विपणन अवसरों . 
For fulfilling जरूरत for विशिष्‍ट खेती co-operative farming code or a model farming code will जायेगी विकसित . 
In खेती किसान will not be वंचित of भूमि under any circumstances . 
To प्रोत्साहित farmer favorable co-operative farming अनुकूल संविदा कृषि प्रणाली , state governments should make एक समीक्षा समिति in which कृषक also be शामिल . 
Farmer companies : Private limited companies registered under the Company -LRB- amendment -RRB- Act , 2002 are now आ रही हैं into क्षेत्र of bio software production mandatory for बीज उत्पादन , , बीज उत्पादन , of bio-fertilizers , bio-pesticides and अन्य प्रकार of खेती . 
छोटे किसानों and SHG 's will be शामिल in ऐसी कम्पनियों in रूप of stakeholders and not in रूप of shareholders . 
State farms : Along with this , उपयोग , of state farms can be done for विकास सजीव दाय जीन बैंकों of जर्मप्लाज्म of local varieties of कुक्कुट by which our livestock genetic reserve can be safeguarded . 
By the following tactical solutions , कल्याण and सुरक्षा सुनिश्‍चित जायेगी of आजीविका of किसानों will be assured . 
प्रमुख बल will be देने on विकास of floriculture , roots and कन्दीय फसलों , , aromatic medicinal plants , apiculture and sericulture . 
इन उत्पादों will be given proper market connection so that by ऐसे प्रयासों अवसरों for रोजगार and earning can be increased in ग्रामीण क्षेत्रों . 
स्कीम will continue and इसे will be मजबूत . 
To eradicate ग्रामीण गरीबी and malnutrition , it is very important to grow foodgrains in घरेलू रूप and make एक सुपरिभाषित खाद्य सुरक्षा नीति for safeguarding well-defined food . 
To strengthen खाद्य सुरक्षा and to मॉनिटरिंग इसकी regularly सरकार will नियमित रूप कैबिनेट समिति on खाद्य सुरक्षा . 
There is a necessity for एक ग्रामीण गैर -झौईण् कृषि रोजगार पहल for the farmer families . 
By इस पहल सभी ग्रामीण गैर -झौईण् कृषि रोजगार कार्यक्रमों should be एकीकृत so that there can be a convergence and co-ordination among them . 
Uniting all concerned different agencies एक समग्र कार्यनीति will be adopted . 
It था समय . 
किसान थे पंचायतघर in the panchayat house of गांव . 
There था - one question on front of all - how will उपज increase , how can there be growth in खेती . 
Mahesh had come back to गांव after getting ऊंची शिक्षा of an agricultural university . 
किसानों looked at महेश ओर in amazement . 
महेश then कहा - - Yes , मैं am speaking सच , if किसान तो खेती deliberately and with intelligence , then उपज can increase . 
जो किसान who does खेती of a crop , उसे should have full knowledge of that . 
उसे has to have अच्छी जानकारी as to बीज of that crop उग सकते हैं in which kind of soil . 
How should the tillage-sowing of that soil be done , when should it be देना चाहिए , पानी and when should it be weeded , etc. . 
आप तो have come studying a lot about खेती . 
Then आप ही only बताइए न all of us useful good things about फसलों . 
महेश कुछ , महेश कहा - Good , मैं पहले will first लेता हूं खेती . 
Because सबसे अधिक महत्व of दालों in भोजन is very large . 
That crop is called दलहन , by mashing which दलहन are made . 
Farming of जौ and चावल is done in every corner of देश . 
In उसी तरह विभिन्न फसलें भी of दालों are also grown in सारे देश . 
But compared to देशों औसत पैदावार in देशों is very less . 
इस पैदावार can be increased manifold . 
उपाय is that खेती be done in ढंग . 
अधिकतर किसान of देश just keep beating the rut . 
They do efforts a lot but उपज in खेतों is not more . 
महेश कहा - - Among दालों , सबसे अधिक महत्व of दालों is most . 
दाल are eaten in सभी भागों of देश . 
दाल is सबसे अधिक उपयोग the in the eastern districts of उत्तर प्रदेश . 
दाल from कानपुर are considered the best . 
दाल from कानपुर are very delicious to खाने . 
वह शीघ्र fast , and gets घुट nicely . 
But बताइए us this Mahesh Sir , since when did the introduction of दाल happen in देश ? 
यह is difficult to बताना तो since when are लोग उपयोग दाल . 
कुछ लोगों are of मत that स्थान of कि is भारत . 
इसके देते हैं प्रमाण that the large amount of खेती of pigeon pea that is done in जितनी अधिक भारत , that much is not done in किसी भी दूसरे देश in उतनी संसार . 
यह भी also कहते हैं , that उपयोग भी of दाल done in भारत is also more than दूसरे देशों in संसार . 
पौधा of pigeon pea was first in अफ्रीका . 
They कहना , that कि of pigeon pea was found growing like कि in घाटी of नील नदी in अफ्रीका , . 
पौधा of pigeon pea is straight and stick-like . 
This is counted under एकसाला पौधों . 
After पहली उपज , पहली उपज is नहीं मिल पाती . 
From the viewpoint of आकार we can call पौधे as पौधे . 
In उपजाऊ भूमि it can grow up to ऊंचाई of यह 7-8 फीट . 
The roots are tap in which small branches are attached . 
The branches of the roots keep entering deep into भूमि भीतर , . 
The roots are knotty . 
The stalk is strong and stick-like . 
There are branches in पौधे . 
लम्बाई of all branches is same . 
Some branches are long , but some seem to होती हैं , making -झौईण् सा कोण from the stalk . 
Pods grow on पौधे , which are two to four चार इंच long and about half चार इंच thick . 
रंग of the raw leaves is dark green , but when they पकती then taking some redness they होता है , रंग . 
हर फली has two to five peas which आते हैं out immediately on pressing . 
There are two main varieties of पौधे of pigeon pea - -LRB- 1 -RRB- अरहर and -LRB- 2 -RRB- Toor . 
T 17 - Its split pea is very tasty . 
यह cooks fast . 
पौधे are long , which फैलते . 
T1 - This variety of पौधे especially grow in भूमि of गोरखपुर जिले . 
T19 - फसल of this variety is especially grown in the central area of उत्तर प्रदेश . 
पौध are straight which होते हैं about 7 लगभग 7 फुट tall . 
In one acre from 20 upto उपज is obtained . 
Farming of pigeon pea can be done in हर तरह of भूमि ; but भूमि , भूमि , भूमि and भूमि is considered good . 
Mainly खेती of pigeon pea needs ऐसी भूमि from which जल can होनी चाहिए , निकासी सुगमता easily . 
Because in नमी विकास of पौधों does not happen , and due to एक प्रकार of pests they wilt fast . 
So while चुनाव अत : भूमि , this should होने kept in ध्यान that अत : भूमि in which खेती of pigeon pea is being done , पानी तो is not accumulated near by or there is डर तो of पानी तो getting collected . 
Climate - Soil in which there is moisture , near by which there is गीलापन or पानी , हो , is definite that in जलवायु - जिस मिट्टी विकास of कि , of pigeon pea can not happen . 
Farming of pigeon pea is done along with फसलों साथ . 
यह समय is very useful for this . 
Because in इन दिनों there is नमी भी in जलवायु due to वर्षा along with ऊंचे तापक्रम साथ ही . 
इस प्रकार of जलवायु is best for खेती of pigeon pea . 
This only is यही कारण that खेती of pigeon pea is done along with फसल साथ . 
But खेती of pigeon pea also has to देखने पड़ते दिन भी of winter .
