Whenever तापक्रम becomes less , or cold increases , then by खेती of pigeon pea is adversely affected . 
There are two ways in which खेती of pigeon pea is done , mixed and separate . 
अर्थ of mixed is , that along with फसल साथ ही of pigeon pea फसल साथ ही are along planted , like मक्का आदि . 
अच्छा ढंग is , खेती of pigeon pea be done with shuffling . 
Where खेती of pigeon pea is done with बाजरा and मक्का साथ , there , as required , shuffling should होती है , done among them . 
खेती of pigeon pea is done separately also . 
For अच्छी पैदावार तैयारी भी तो of खेत also should be done well . 
When फसल of pigeon pea is being grown with ज्वार or बाजरे साथ , तैयारी of खेत should be done according to फसल of ज्वार or बाजरे साथ . 
When यह फसल is grown with यह फसल or separately , then खेत should be तैयार according to यह फसल of pigeon pea . 
Generally for फसल of pigeon pea जुताई with indigenous ploughs for तीन बार is good . 
After दूसरी -झौईण् तीसरी जुताई बाद , on मिट्टी being leveled , patela should हो जाने done . 
Only one जुताई ही by new types of imported ploughs is enough . 
समय for फसल of pigeon pea is not same in all regions . 
In उत्तर प्रदेश फसल of pigeon pea is sowed in the first week of जुलाई . 
But in south फसल of फसल of pigeon pea is शुरू in महीने ही of मई . 
Till whole of फसल is sowed . 
In मध्य प्रदेश the process of फसल फसल continues from जून till जुलाई . 
In बिहार लोग sow फसल of pigeon pea in the last month of जुलाई . 
Ideally all the farmers are familiar with बीज of pigeon pea , but lot of precaution should be taken before sowing बीज . 
Because there is एक प्रकार of रोग in बीजों of pigeon pea , which is called Wilt अर्थात सूखा . 
This is not easily परख by sight . 
It is better to ली जाए सलाह from experts before sowing बीज . 
मात्रा of बीज and ढंग of sowing depends on the variety of बीज . 
In मिश्रित फसलों per acre up to two to two and half बीज are enough . 
For growing फसल per acre up to six to seven बीज are required . 
In खेती of ' toor ' अधिक बीज more than this are needed . 
For फसल of अरहर फसल is done in two ways - -LRB- 1 -RRB- by sprinkling दो ढंग , and -LRB- 2 -RRB- in रूप of lines . 
In विशुद्ध खेती of अरहर काम is done only through sprinkling छिटकवां ढंग ही . 
In इस ढंग बीज are छिटक by हाथ in खेत . 
In the rows of pigeon pea दूरी of up to one and half to two inch is नापी जाती है . 
दूरी of मुख्य फसल and rows of pigeon pea is up to six to दस इंच . 
खाद : There is आवश्यकता for खाद for growing फसल of pigeon pea . 
Even then if उपयोग of calcium -LRB- कैल्शियम ( चूना ) -RRB- and फासफोरस is done then अच्छी पैदावार is obtained . 
Per acre 32 पौंड of फासफोरस should be उपयोग . 
To make भूमि rich for फसल of प्रयोग of super-phosphate , basic slag -LRB- Mal -RRB- and bone mill -LRB- चूरा ) of bones -RRB- should be done in it . 
लगभग पन्द्रह दिन पहले before sowing खाद should be डालनी चाहिए in the soil . 
By this पौधे shoot up and सहायता is मिलती है in विकास and विकास . 
After खाद now बता दीजिए about सिंचाई भी also . 
Without बिना सिंचाई तो there can not हो नहीं सकती अच्छी उपज . 
But फसल of pigeon pea does not आवश्यकता विशेष रूप of irrigation . 
There are tow दो मुख्य कारण for this . 
One is this , that फसल of pigeon pea is grown in उन दिनों when in the air there is lot of नमी ही . 
So फसल of pigeon pea gets पानी from the air only . 
दूसरा is that , the roots of pigeon pea प्रवेश very deep inside भूमि भीतर . 
So they keep taking water according to आवश्यकता from inside भूमि भीतर ही . 
Even then in ध्यान should be देना चाहिए on सिंचाई of pigeon pea . 
Weeding and digging of फसल of pigeon pea should be done with फसल with which it is being grown . 
Generally , digging of पौधों is done up to आयु of three months . 
Usually digging is done only in उन्हीं खेतों in which बीज are sown in the row pattern . 
Farms in which the seeds are sown in the sprinkling way , होता है is difficult to do digging . 
In digging trowel , कल्टीवेटर and हैरो are उपयोग . 
The digging by trowel is expensive . 
In it समय भी is also taken . 
विकास of फसल of pigeon pea happens very slowly . 
अधिक समय is also needed for फसल to get ready . 
So it is not surprising for grass-weeds to उग in अत : खेत . 
Whenever this happens , the useless grass-weeds should हो , destroyed . 
Which thing is there in संसार which does not get affected by रोग and ailment . 
फसल of pigeon pea needs to be protected from कई रोगों and ailments . 
So to get अच्छी फसल of pigeon pea इस is necessary to have ज्ञान about this . 
फसल of pigeon pea gets affected in two ways - -LRB- 1 -RRB- by ( 1 ) रोगों , , and -LRB- 2 -RRB- by pests . 
Among रोगों Fusarium wilt ' is dangerous . 
This happens due to एक प्रकार of pests which are called ' Fusarium Udum ' . 
This begins in the roots so roots decay . 
पौधा wilts . 
There are तीन प्रकार of pests which affect फसल - -LRB- 1 -RRB- pests of leaves , -LRB- 2 -RRB- pests of legumes , and -LRB- 3 -RRB- मक्खियां of legumes . 
The pests of leaves are called '' Ucilous cretica '' . 
These pests attack ऊपरी भाग of the leaf and make a net . 
These pests can be recognized by looking at the webs on the leaves only . 
To catch and kill them is the only easy सुगम उपाय for विनाश . 
In कटाई of फसल mainly two things are to be focused on - 1 , समय , of कटाई , 2 , ढंग of harvesting . 
फसल of pigeon pea should be काटना चाहिए only when the legumes are fully ripened . 
But while harvesting ध्यान should be paid on this that the legumes should not disperse and fall out . 
In मैसूर राज्य of दक्षिण भारत the legumes are removed from पौधों पहले ही before to protect them from falling out . 
But in north India nowhere is काम done in इस प्रणाली . 
कटाई of pigeon pea is done by हंसिया or blade . 
In foreign countries यह काम is done by machines called ' mower ' and combine ' . 
Cutting is done very close to the ground . 
It is very essential to pay ध्यान on सुरक्षा of the legumes at समय of cutting तने . 
Filling the peas in bags , -LRB- they -RRB- are closed . 
The bags are रखा जाता है , in ऐसे स्थान where there is proper level of गर्मी . 
By keeping in स्थानों with नमी and नमी the peas decay and they get infested with insects . 
उपज and उपयोग ही तो of किसी भी फसल only has सबसे अधिक महत्त्व . 
फसल of pigeon pea is of तीन प्रकार - -LRB- 1 -RRB- short term , -LRB- 2 -RRB- long term , and -LRB- 3 -RRB- mixed . 
Pigeon pea is उपयोग in the form of दाल . 
By splitting and skinning बीज , दो दालें are मिलती हैं . 
काम of splitting and छिलका is done by big machines . 
The trading of दालों is done on high scale . 
The pulses are useful for humans to खाने and पशु खाने the skin with great fondness . 
The stalk of pigeon pea is उपयोग for making baskets , making छप्पर and in the form of ईंधन . 
दाल of pigeon pea is famous for its nutritious content also . 
After दालों , दालों are more popular . 
In दाल ही दाल ही are only उपयोग . 
लोग भी from पश्‍चिमी उत्तर प्रदेश , , पश्‍चिमी बंगाल and मद्रास also make अधिक उपयोग of दाल . 
Black pea is different in its shape-type . 
By seeing black pea लोग recognize that यह is black pea . 
Its black and green हरा रंग बड़ा is very attractive . 
But sometimes seeing कभी -झौईण् कभी मूंग and black pea together , there is भ्रम in recognizing them both . 
Because both black peas and green gram are similar in shape-type and form-color . 
But seeing by removing the skin , black gram is seen clearly . 
दाल of मूंग has पीलापन which gives अलग पहचान different from मूंग . 
जन्म -झौईण् स्थान of black gram is भारत . 
From भारत ही प्रसार and प्रचार of black gram has happened in दूसरे देशों of संसार . 
The experts in कृषि after investigating have घोषित that कि of black gram is related to कि of Papilionaceae of the Leguminosae family . 
In हिन्दी we can call इसे झाड़ीदार पौधा . 
यह is bushy in shape-type . 
यह is spreading and grows up to one to दो फीट tall . 
The stalks of black gram are straight and have branches . 
The stalks and branches are full of long brown colored hair . 
Due to these hair only in किसी -झौईण् किसी देश लोग call black gram ' Uli paaydaal ' . 
पत्तियां are of attractive dark green गहरे हरे रंग . 
Like leaves फूल भी , which are in bunches are beautiful . 
When the legumes come on the branches , then it is such a sight . 
The legumes are furry , which are up to two to three inch in length . 
खेती of black gram is done in two ways - -LRB- 1 -RRB- in ( 1 ) मिश्रित रूप , , and -LRB- 2 -RRB- separately . 
In both the forms separate soil is आवश्यकता . 
But there are only two forms of इसके - loose and sandy . 
For स्वतंत्र खेती of black gram भूमि is the best . 
अच्छी फसलें of black gram can also be grown in भूमि भी . 
For मिश्रित रूप , somewhere sandy clayey and मटियार भूमि is considered good . 
फसल of black gram is grown in two forms - 1 , In रूप of फसल , 2 , In रूप of फसल . 
In the form of फसल , फसल is done in महीने of फरवरी and कटाई in महीने of मई . 
Farming of black gram can होती है done in the form of फसल only in those areas where even in दिनों भी there is कुछ गर्मी . 
फसल of black gram of रबी has भय of नुकसान due to cold and पाले . 
So फसल of अत : रबी can not होता है grown in those areas where तापक्रम is very low . 
जिन स्थानों in which तापक्रम is low , there अच्छी फसलें of black gram can not होता है , grown . 
In ऐसे स्थानों the pea of black gram is very light and small . 
फसल of black gram is grown in two ways - -LRB- 1 -RRB- in ( 1 ) मिश्रित रूप , , -LRB- 2 -RRB- separately . 
When फसल is to हो , grown in मिश्रित रूप , then हो , can हो , alternated with बाजरा and corn . 
But when फसल of black gram is to हो grown separately then हो is more useful to alternate हो with हेर -झौईण् फेर गेहूं साथ . 
On alternating with गेहूं साथ if a fast growing variety of बीज is sown , अच्छी पैदावार can be obtained . 
फसल of black gram does not आवश्यकता that much ploughing , as much -LRB- is आवश्यकता -RRB- for गेहूं . 
Generally , तीन बार जुताई ही by indigenous ploughs is considered good . 
After प्रत्येक जुताई पाटा should be देना चाहिए . 
By this मिट्टी becomes crumbly . 
If soil flipping ploughs are प्रयोग , then खेत gets ready in two ploughings only . 
From the intention of दाल mostly प्राय : लोग do खेती of black gram in मिश्रित रूप ही only . 
Black gram is mixed with फसलों - - अरहर , कोंदो and corn etc. . 
In growing फसल in मिश्रित रूप mostly फसल of बीज is done by sprinkling छिटकवां विधि . 
But यह प्रणाली is not proper . 
If for बीज प्रणाली of machines is adopted , then हो is good . 
If न हो , is not easy to sow बीज by machines , then should न हो , sown in rows in troughs behind he plough . 
While sowing बीज हो should हो kept in यह ध्यान , that दूरी between them is same . 
By not ध्यान in ध्यान दूरी somewhere पौधे उगते हैं , more , and somewhere खेत seems empty . 
In the form of विशुद्ध फसल भी , also , खेती of black gram is done for दाल ही only . 
But there are very few areas or regions , where फसलें of black gram are grown separately . 
If फसल of black gram is grown separately for दाल , then in that too the फसल of बीज has to be done according to फसल . 
Before sowing बीज if सलाह is ली जाए , from government agricultural experts , then हो is good . 
At the time of चुनाव बीजों for बोआई , उक्‍त सिफारिशों of the regional governments should definitely be taken into consideration . 
In बोआई , it is also very essential to take ध्यान of मात्रा of बीज and दूरी भी of the rows . 
On growing फसल in मिश्रित रूप per acre up to two to three बीज should be डालना चाहिए . 
In फसल परिणाम of बीज per acre is up to four to छ : किलो . 
On बोआई with छिटकवां विधि per acre up to six to eight बीज is required . 
बोआई of बीजों is done in विधि - -LRB- 1 -RRB- by छिटकवां विधि -LRB- 2 -RRB- behind the ploughs , and -LRB- 3 -RRB- by machines . 
For फसल of black gram it is necessary to डालना खाद in it after getting खेत ready . 
By खाद सहायता is मिलती है , in विकास of पौधों , and उपज is good . 
For अच्छी उपज of black gram nitrogen based नाइट्रोजन युक्‍त खाद is good . 
By putting fifteen kilo per पन्द्रह किलो प्रति एकड़ नाइट्रोजन based युक्‍त खाद , उर्वरा of खेत increases more . 
After बोआई बाद by putting up to twenty to पच्चीस किलो silicate -LRB- प्रस्फुटिक ( उर्वरक ) -RRB- per सहायता is मिलती है in विकास of पौधों . 
But खाद should हो जाएं पर at उस समय , when पौधे come up in खेत and हो जाएं little big . 
Farming of black gram is done in उन दिनों जाती है , when they are उन दिनों जाती है , of raining , and there is enough moisture in भूमि . 
So generally फसल of black gram does not आवश्यकता साधारणत : सिंचाई . 
In दिनों of सूखे when हो does not rain or धरती is very dry then there is लाभ in doing सिंचाई . 
Four-five weeks after फसल बीज , निराई of फसल of black gram should definitely be done once . 
After this if प्रतीत is seen then दूसरी बार भी also weeding-digging can हो done . 
Use of trowel , hoe and कल्टीवेटर is done for खुरपी , . 
In doing खुरपी by खुरपी अधिक व्यय and श्रम is आवश्यकता . 
कल्टीवेटर are driven by bullocks . 
But प्रयोग of कल्टीवेटर can be done in उन्हीं खेतों , in which बोआई is done in the form of rows . 
For खुरपी ही of खेतों sowed by sprinkling छिटकवां विधि , खुरपी ही is good . 
There are it 's शत्रु damaging फसल of black gram - -LRB- 1 -RRB- diseases and -LRB- 2 -RRB- pests . 
Among diseases ' with harad ' and ' with ghaati ' are प्रमुख . 
When आक्रमण of these diseases happens , then white and dusky lines are formed on the leaves of black gram . 
उपाय for eradication from these diseases is , that the leaves on which the white and dusky lines are seen , those should be काट कर and destroyed . 
Among pests ' baalkeet ' and kavachkeet ' are main . 
बालकीट are furry small in shape . 
The female is very smart in laying eggs on the leaf -LRB- and -RRB- increasing संख्या . 
These pests खा जाते हैं the leaves . 
Consequently परिणामत : फसल gets destroyed . 
To destroy तेज रोशनी should be done in खेत at रात . 
In bright light the pests on अपने fall off छोड़ कर फसल . 
And जल मर जाते हैं . 
फसल of black gram is of दो प्रकार depending on its variety - 1 , short term , and 2 , long term . 
पक gets ready in two and half months . 
समय of कटाई is अगस्त and सितम्बर . 
फसल according to its virtue gets ready by October to नवम्बर . 
कटाई of फसल of black gram should be done only after पकने ही of the legumes . 
But legumes should not ripen much such that the peas fall off at the time of कटाई . 
So कटाई should be done before fully ripening . 
In cutting फसल उपयोग of हंसिया should be done . 
In some places instead of cutting पौधों , the legumes are picked and they are सुखाया जाता है in barns . 
Then using a chaff दायं the peas and chaff are separated . 
Filling the peas in bags are closed . 
Sometimes from the barn itself the bags of दालों are sold . 
Sometimes the bags are रखा जाता है in the houses to sell and for उद्देश्य of निजी उपयोग . 
Generally उपज of उन्नत बीजों of black gram is eight to ten दस मन per acre . 
From साधारण बीजों प्रति up to five to six छ : मन of पैदावार is मिल जाती है per acre . 
Black gram is उपयोग in the form of दाल . 
The pulse of black gram has the capacity to increase दाल बल and virility . 
लोग make papadums , fried balls , dumplings , and imarati etc. of black gram too . 
In दक्षिण , मिला कर black gram with चावल साथ a special food-item is made , which is very tasty . 
Like मूंग , मूंग is also उपयोग भी for दाल . 
मूंग is of two types - with skin and skinned . 
दोनों ही दालें are light and digestive . 
Often दाल is दी जाती है as diet for patients . 
मूंग is भारत दाल . 
जन्म -झौईण् स्थान of पौधे is भारत ही . 
From here only प्रचार and प्रसार happened in foreign countries . 
Farming of मूंग in थोड़ी -झौईण् बहुत मात्रा is done in almost all सभी राज्यों in भारत . 
Green gram is specially grown in regions like उत्तर प्रदेश , and राजस्थान आदि . 
पौधा भी of मूंग is very much similar to पौधा भी of मूंग . 
पौधा of मूंग is up to two to two and दो फुट in length . 
पत्तियां are bigger and lesser than पत्तियां of black gram . 
The stalks are somewhat bigger and thicker than stalks of black gram . 
लम्बाई of the legumes is almost up to three to four चार इंच . 
कृषि -झौईण् वैज्ञानिकों have developed many varieties of मूंग . 
But from the viewpoint of बीज two varieties among them are considered important - -LRB- 1 -RRB- green color ones and -LRB- 2 -RRB- golden color ones . 
Other than this , black , brown and grey मूंग भी is also considered good . 
खेती of मूंग is done मिला with दूसरी फसलों साथ . 
So for उपज of अत : मूंग किसी विशेष प्रकार of भूमि is not आवश्यकता . 
At the time of चुनाव भूमि for this , उस फसल has to be kept in ध्यान with which इसके is to be grown . 
Generally for खेती of मूंग सभी प्रकार of भूमि are good . 
Only loose and भूमि is भूमि which is not useful for खेती of मूंग . 
Other than this in all types of खेती of जमीन can be done . 
This only is यही कारण that फसल of green gran is grown in सभी राज्यों . 
फसल of मूंग is grown with खरीफ and फसल . 
Along with फसलों साथ फसलों साथ of मूंग is done in the months of जून and जुलाई . 
In इन दिनों along with नमी साथ ही there is lot of काफी गर्मी भी in the air too . 
During दिनों of फसल होती रहती है is raining . 
So अत : यह is certain , that for उपज of मूंग , पानी is essential . 
With फसलों साथ फसलों साथ of मूंग is done in महीने of October . 
In इन दिनों cold starts , there is नमी in the air . 
But in उन स्थानों , where there is more cold , on growing मूंग with फसलों साथ , अच्छी उपज is not got . 
Because for अच्छी उपज of मूंग , along with नमी साथ ही साथ , high level of तापमान भी is also आवश्यकता . 
फसल of मूंग is grown with खरीफ and फसल only . 
So it can be alternated with अत : खरीफ and फसलों साथ ही only . 
Alternating is useful . 
By alternating फसलों उपज is more . 
मूंग can be alternated with बाजरा and corn . 
Places in which फसल of मूंग is grown with फसल , धान and मूंग can be alternated . 
On growing फसलों साथ of मूंग with फसलों साथ its alternation should be done with फसलों साथ . 
Alternation of मूंग can also be done with pigeon pea and कपास साथ भी . 
फसल of मूंग is grown with फसल . 
So for फसल of अत : मूंग , खेत does have to be gotten ready separately . 
जिस फसल साथ with which जिस फसल साथ of मूंग is grown , along with तैयारी साथ ही of खेत of that , तैयारी साथ ही of खेत of जिस फसल साथ of मूंग also gets done . 
Even then to make मिट्टी पाटा should be used after जुताई for दो बार in खेतों . 
For फसल of मूंग दो बार जुताई is enough . 
When फसल of मूंग is to हो grown in खेतों of धान , after digging of धान without जुताई बीजों should हो छिटक in खेतों . 
The topic of बीज comes in सामने after खेत is ready . 
If अच्छी फसल has to हो grown then ध्यान should हो paid on two things - 1 , 1. अच्‍छे किस्म of बीज , , and 2 , proper method of अच्छी फसल . 
There are अच्छे किस्मों of बीज of good varieties of मूंग . 
Which has been घोषणा by the agriculture-department of भारत सरकार of India after a lot of investigation . 
Sowing is done in दो विधि - by दो विधि , and in rows . 
For growing फसल of मूंग in खेतों of धान , sprinkling way is only प्रयोग . 
But where दूसरी फसलों साथ of मूंग is to होती है , grown with दूसरी फसलों साथ , बीजों साथ of मूंग are sown मिला कर बोए जाते हैं with बीजों साथ of दूसरी फसलों साथ . 
इस प्रकार of बीज भी also are sown by छिटकवां and row-method . 
In छिटकवां विधि of बोआई ध्यान is not paid to दूरी . 
But in बोआई in विधि , दूरी of one and डेढ़ फुट is kept between two rows . 
In इसी प्रकार in दूरी भी between दो पौधों also there is अन्तर of one and लगभग डेढ़ फुट . 
For फसल of मूंग there is not विशेष आवश्यकता to डालने खाद in खेतों . 
Because this is यह मिश्रित फसल . 
जिस फसल साथ with which जिस फसल साथ of मूंग be grown , खाद should be डालनी चाहिए in खेत according to प्रकृति of that . 
Even then if आवश्यकता arises silicate -LRB- fertilizer -RRB- should होने उपयोग . 
By उपयोग प्रस्फुटिक -LRB- ( गोबर , , bones etc. -RRB- विकास of पौधों happens well . 
In इस तरह , उपज is obtained . 
There is very little आवश्यकता of irrigation for फसल of मूंग . 
There are दो मुख्य कारण for this . 
One is this , that फसल of मूंग is grown in उन दिनों when उन दिनों are of rain . 
And the other is this , that its roots go very deep inside भूमि भीतर . 
फसल of मूंग keeps मिलता रहता है , पानी from वर्षा , along with that , its roots taking पानी from inside the ground keep fulfilling आवश्यकता . 
So फसल of अत : मूंग needs very little पानी from नहर or well , even then फसल of अत : मूंग grown with फसल sometimes can आवश्यकता पानी . 
When the crops start drying due to decrease in नमी , then by doing सिंचाई , पौधे gets नया जीवन . 
फसल of मूंग takes बहुत समय to get ready . 
So in फसल , of मूंग , there is आवश्यकता for weeding and digging specially . 
Even then , in मिश्रित फसलों , निराई and digging should be done based on मिश्रित फसलों . 
रोग and pests of मूंग are the same , which affect मूंग , that is like मूंग , मूंग also has भय of getting damaged by रोग and pests . 
Among रोगों एक is called ' dhaariwala ' and other ' haradewala ' . 
On infliction of रोग white or brownish colored lines appear on the leaves . 
परिणाम of इन रोगों is this , that पत्तियां becoming weak होता है , dry . 
From the point of view of getting ready of फसल of मूंग there are दो प्रकार - -LRB- 1 -RRB- that gets ready in ( 1 ) थोड़े समय , and -LRB- 2 -RRB- that gets ready in ( 1 ) थोड़े समय . 
फसलें get ready in two-and-half-three months . 
जिन फसलों which are sowed in जुलाई , get ready in October . 
फसलें sowed in सितम्बर are long term , they get ready in फरवरी . 
पौधों are sent to barns after tying them in bales . 
After कुछ दिनों when पौधे become dry , a chaff chopper of दायं is used on it after spreading them . 
चूर्ण the powder fly in हवा , the chaff and peas are separated . 
Per acre पांच मन , of पैदावार of मूंग is obtained , and chaff पांच मन , . 
In किसी -झौईण् किसी स्थान per acre the peas हो जाता है दस मन , and chaff दस मन too . 
Mostly यह is seen , that there is उपज in फसलों compared to फसलों . 
The peas obtained by great efforts are kept tied in bags or filled in pots . 
बीजों of मूंग have अधिक भय of getting damaged by pests . 
The pests affect only those areas either which are dirty , or where there is नमी . 
So efforts should हुई made to protect the bags and प्रत्यन भरी with peas from नमी . 
मूंग is specially used as दाल . 
मूंग is very light and digestive . 
मूंग has कई पोषक , which are very useful for शरीर . 
कुछ लोग consider इसे विदेशी पौधा . 
Whatever , खेती of मसूर is done specially in कई राज्यों in भारत . 
अच्छी उपज of मसूर is good in regions like बंगाल and मद्रास and राजस्थान आदि . 
Like दूसरी दालों भारतीय कृषि विशेषज्ञों have researched a lot about मसूर too . 
परीक्षण has been done in many regions in भारत about मसूर . 
Generally also there are two varieties of मसूर - one big seeded , and other small seeded . 
बड़ी मसूर of मोटे बीज is considered good . 
There is a lot of बहुत समानता between मसूर and पौधे . 
So न होगा will not न होगा improper to call पौधे of अत : मसूर पौधे . 
पौधा of मसूर is 7 inch to 1 1 फुट tall . 
The roots are fibrous and stalks have branches . 
Leaves are small and spiky . 
फूल are नीले रंग and legumes a little bigger than चने in आकार . 
From the color-form and size-type of मसूर and चने , it is understood that both these are of one family . 
सभी फसलों have अलग -झौईण् अलग गुण and प्रकृति . 
मसूर भी also has अलग प्रकृति . 
So अत : मसूर भी also needs विशेष प्रकार of भूमि . 
For अच्छी उपज of मसूर होता है is beneficial to sow होता है in दुमट or मिट्टी . 
Generally बोआई is done in महीने of October , and by अन्त of फरवरी and मार्च पक फसल gets ready . 
According to गुण and प्रकृति , of मसूर , for it moist and warm ऊष्‍ण जलवायु is आवश्यकता . 
But अधिक नमी is also हानिकारक भी for मसूर . 
Places in which it gets very cold , or in winter दिनों when पाला falls , then there is बुरा प्रभाव on उपज of मसूर . 
In some places लोग sow it with सरसों and जौ साथ . 
In some places with दूसरे अनाजों साथ , , जैसे - - मसूर are also grown with अलसी and गेहूं साथ भी . 
In कुछ स्थानों after cutting फसल of धान , खेती is done separately also . 
In इसी प्रकार , जिन खेतों in which in किसी एक वर्ष धान may होती है sown , then किसी एक वर्ष , by sowing मसूर in होती है , उपज is obtained . 
After cutting फसल of धान if फसल is to हो , grown in खेतों of धान , then in तैयारी of खेतों , जुताई is not necessary . 
In फसल , तैयारी of खेत is to be done according to फसल . 
If फसल is to हो grown with जौ साथ , then खेत should हो तैयार based on जौ साथ . 
For अच्छी उपज of मसूर , होना is not necessary for मिट्टी to होना crumbly . 
फसल of मसूर grows well in ढेले युक्‍त मिट्टी . 
बोआई of बीजों of मसूर is done in two ways - -LRB- 1 -RRB- ( 1 ) छिटकवां ( 2 ) -LRB- 2 -RRB- row-wise . 
जो लोग who grow फसल साथ , of मसूर lentils along with फसल साथ , of धान , or after cutting फसल साथ , of धान in खेतों , they प्रयोग विधि ही . 
In स्थानों where खेती of मसूर is done independently , बीज is sowed by छिटकवां विधि ही only . 
In स्थानों , for growing with मिश्रित फसलों साथ also इसी प्रणाली is उपयोग . 
For अच्छी उपज , अच्छे बीजों are required . 
Just by doing बोआई in a scientific way अच्छी उपज is not obtained . 
The agriculture experts of भारत सरकार have सिफारिश एन0पी0 नं 11 for बीजों of मसूर . 
By उपयोग इन्हीं बीजों in बोआई , अच्छी उपज is obtained . 
For फसल of मसूर there is आवश्यकता for उर्वरक . 
By उपयोग of 20 किलो खाद per acre उपज of खेतों increases . 
If फसल of मसूर is to हो , grown in खेतों of धान , and if in हो , खाद has been उपयोग , then there is आवश्यकता to डालने खाद दूसरी बार . 
Agriculture experts कहना , that there are एक प्रकार of insects under जमीन नीचे in खेतों of मसूर , which taking नाइट्रोजन from भूमि keep supplying होते हैं , to कि . 
So खाद should not be नहीं डालनी चाहिए in खेतों of अत : मसूर . 
खाद should होने बाद प्रयोग at समय of तैयारी खेतों and after पौधों have अंकुरित . 
Sometimes in खेती केवल मसूर , in खेतों , , wild grass-blades उग . 
They रोक देती हैं the growing of ये पौधों . 
So whenever wild grass-blades or weeds उगे , , then they should be totally destroyed by निराई . 
If by किसी कारण मिट्टी of खेतों becomes hard , then हो जाए , should हो जाए , made lumpy and soft by digging . 
पौधा of मसूर is पौधा , in which there is ताकत to tackle सभी प्रकार of रोगों . 
Even then sometimes ' fungal ' disease , which many people also call rust , proves हानिकारक for फसल of मसूर . 
आक्रमण of रोग happens on the leaves and तनों . 
By which the leaves हो जाते हैं dry and stalks हो जाते हैं weak . 
To protect फसल from इस विनाशकारी रोग पौधों should be dug up and फेंक देना चाहिए . 
Sometimes कुछ विशेष प्रकार भी of कभी -झौईण् कभी पतंग from the moth family also हानि फसल of मसूर . 
The attack of these insects happens on the legumes of मसूर . 
These insects can be destroyed by spraying पानी mixed with kerosene . 
When the legumes ripen the plant should be dug up . 
कुछ लोग काटते हैं फसल with sickle too . 
It is necessary to keep this in ध्यान that the peas of the legumes do not fall off in खेतों . 
फसल should हुई kept together in the barn tied in bales . 
On drying , after spreading a daayam of दायं should be run over it . 
Later the peas and the husk should be separated . 
The peas of मसूर are kept filled in bags or pots . 
जिन स्थानों where the bags and pots are kept are भर with husk . 
This is done so that , प्रभाव of नमी of the walls and floor does not fall on the bags and pots . 
Because due to नमी the peas हो जाते हैं , bad and get infected with pests . 
मसूर is used in the form of split peas . 
मसूर are of दो प्रकार - -LRB- 1 -RRB- मसूर with skin and -LRB- 2 -RRB- मसूर . 
ठंडा of मसूर is cold and प्रभाव of मसूर is warm . 
In दिनों लोग खाते हैं दाल मसूर more . 
चना is मुख्य उपज of भारत . 
In देश खेती of चने is done in two crore acres of दो करोड़ एकड़ भूमि . 
There is no such region where खेती of चने is not done . 
चना is specially grown in राजस्थान and उत्तर प्रदेश , . 
फसल of चने is grown in 60 thousand acres of 60 हजार एकड़ भूमि in अकेले उत्तर प्रदेश ही alone . 
चना is झाड़ीदार पौधा . 
वह is 8 इंच to one and डेढ़ फुट in लम्बाई . 
The stalk is straight and branched . 
पत्तियां are small and dentate . 
फूल of चने are blue and small in छोटे आकार . 
The legumes are attached to the flowers only . 
The legumes are small , in which is बीज of चने . 
In प्रत्येक फली there is one to three peas . 
The fruits are attached to the stalks , which are covered with leaves . 
From the viewpoint of रंग and peas there are many varieties of चने , in which the white and yellow चने is समझा जाता है main . 
सफेद चने is called सफेद चने . 
चना grows maximum in उत्तर प्रदेश . 
Other than these there are अतिरिक्त लाल and चने too . 
For खेती of चने , भूमि with moist , loose moist and moldy चिकनी मिट्टी is good . 
बलुई भूमि is not good for खेती of चने . 
चना is also grown on the banks of कछारों भी or islands . 
बोआई of चने happens in October and in मार्च फसल is harvested . 
For उपज of चने नमी is आवश्यकता along with उष्‍ण जलवायु साथ ही . 
In मिश्रित रूप चना is grown with जौ and गेहूं साथ . 
By doing खेती of चने with इन फसलों साथ उपज of चने is good . 
Because there are कुछ इस प्रकार of पोषक in इन फसलों , which सिद्ध very useful for चने . 
On farming चना in मिश्रित रूप , उन फसलों with which it is being grown should be shuffled . 
Like , किसी एक वर्ष it is being grown with जौ साथ , किसी एक वर्ष it should be grown with सरसों or अलसी साथ in उसी खेत . 
If चना has to हो grown separately , धान and चना , गेहूं and corn and हरी चरी should हो shuffled . 
By shuffling with सरसों and अलसी साथ also फसल is obtained . 
फसल of चने is grown in दो प्रकार of खेतों - -LRB- 1 -RRB- In खेतों of फसल , and -LRB- 2 -RRB- in खेतों . 
If खेती if चने is to be done in खेतों of फसल then after cutting फसल the seed should be बीज छिटक after ploughing खेतों once . 
बोआई of चने is done after वर्षा are over . 
Sowing starts in the first week of October . 
बोआई is also done on banks of कछारों भी or islands later . 
But if फसल is done earlier then there is संभावना of फसल being good . 
For अच्छी फसल होना is necessary to have अच्छे बीजों . 
The agriculture experts of भारत सरकार have घोषणा कई उन्नत प्रकार of बीजों of चने . 
They have demonstrated बीज for different regions . 
बोआई of बीजों of चने is done in two ways - spraying and row-wise . 
In पंजाब बीज is sowed by छिटक only . 
But this method can not be नहीं कहा जा सकता scientific . 
If बीज be sowed in rows then फसल can उग सकती है well . 
How can अच्छी उपज be obtained without putting बिना खाद ? 
For फसल of नाइट्रोजन and prasphutik प्रस्फुटिक खाद is useful . 
फसल becomes good by putting खाद per acre . 
उपज of चने is obtained by putting खाद . 
चूर्ण and सुपर फास्फेट भी can also be उपयोग for खाद . 
By putting two and ढाई मन of चूर्ण per acre , उर्वरा of खेत increases काफी . 
फसल of चने is grown in both ways , mixed and separate . 
On growing in मिश्रित रूप irrigation should be done according to सिंचाई मुख्य फसल . 
Like , if खेती of चने is done with गेहूं or जौ साथ then सिंचाई should be done according to गेहूं or जौ साथ . 
On banks of कछारों and islands there is आवश्यकता for सिंचाई . 
In दिनों there is अधिक भय of पाला affecting फसल of चने . 
But when in दिनों it rains , भय of पाला affecting keeps जाता रहता है . 
If there are वर्षा , then to protect फसल from पाले , सिंचाई should न हो definitely done . 
There is आवश्यकता to do weeding-digging for फसल of चने . 
But sometimes when wild grass-blades उग in खेतों then होता है is beneficial to do weeding-digging . 
More than weeding-digging , there is अधिक महत्त्व of खुटाई in फसल of चने . 
This means that when पौधे of चने हो जाएं , 6-7 इंच , then their top sprouts should हो जाएं , cut . 
परिणाम of this is that more branches sprout in कि and more flowers-fruits are also borne . 
There are दो मुख्य शत्रु of फसल of चने - -LRB- 1 -RRB- ( 1 ) रोग and -LRB- 2 -RRB- pests . 
Among रोगों of फसल of चने ' सूखा ' ' is the most dangerous रोगों . 
कुछ लोग also call इसे wilt ' . 
This dries यह पौधों . 
कृषि वैज्ञानिकों have discussed दो कारण for its cropping up . 
One यह crops up at उस समय , when there is deficit in the nutrients in मिट्टी of खेत . 
Or होता है , happens then , when lots of useless grass-blades उग in खेत . 
Whichever may हो , कारण , but जिन पौधों on which सूखा रोग is seen should हो , पर away from खेत uprooting them . 
Because such ऐसे पौधे also affect ऐसे पौधे . 
Among दूसरे रोगों of फसल of चने rust ' meaning ' hardaa ' and ' ब्लाइट meaning दूसरे रोगों are more dangerous . 
दूसरे शत्रु of फसल of चने are एक विशेष प्रकार of insects . 
These insects are of the butterfly family . 
They , engulfing the leaves in circle , खा them . 
It is very much needed to protect फसल from these destructive insects . 
For destroying them पीड़ित पौधों should be destroyed after selecting them or efforts should be made to destroy them by spraying पानी mixed with kerosene . 
They enter inside ये फलों भीतर भी also , and खा जाती हैं the peas . 
To protect फसल from these caterpillars they should be मार देना चाहिए in अवस्था ही only . 
Then those caterpillars are not born from them , which बरबाद फसल . 
फसल of पक gets ready to हो जाती है cut by अन्त of फाल्गुन or प्रारम्भ of chaitra . 
When पत्तियां start becoming of पीले रंग , then होने is to होने समझना चाहिए , that now फसल has started to ripen . 
Along with leaves , चना starts becoming dry , and legumes also हो जाती हैं of पीले रंग . 
After madaai when the weather becomes favorable , then using winnowing basket or टोकरी winnowing is done . 
At some places winnowing is done with मशीन भी called ' winnower ' . 
By winnowing the peas and husk are separated . 
Per acre 10 to 15 15 मन of उपज of चने is obtained . 
For keeping चने लोग keep them in warehouses , filling them in bags , or filling them in pots . 
चने is उपयोग in many ways . 
जैसे - - -LRB- 1 -RRB- in the form of ( 1 ) दाल , , -LRB- 2 -RRB- making flat breads , -LRB- 3 -RRB- making विविध प्रकार of side dishes . 
लोग मिला कर आटा of चने with गेहूं or जौ साथ make flat breads . 
Scientists कहना , इस प्रकार of flat breads are highly beneficial for स्वास्थ्य . 
What to कहना ही about चने ! 
लोग मिला कर चने with mixed pulses cook -LRB- it -RRB- . 
लोग खाते हैं केवल चने after cooking . 
बेसन is made from चने , from which विविध प्रकार of salty and sweet savories are made . 
Not only humans , but पशु भी also खाते हैं चने fondly . 
चना is very nutritious . 
परिश्रम doing animals get back their lost strength eating प्राणी चने only . 
Whatever , मटर have been grown in भारत from ancient times . 
Farming of मटर is done in all parts of भारत in large amounts . 
पौधे of मटर climb up on मिलने ऊपर support , if not फैल जाते हैं on the ground . 
In अधिकतर खेतों पौधे are फैले on the ground . 
The stalks are 2 to 4 4 इंच tall , hollow and of हरे रंग . 
Branches grow from तनों , which निकलती हैं , पत्तियां . 
संख्या of leaves is from one to six . 
फूल are white , pink and light blue in हलके नीले रंग . 
The legumes grown on the flowers . 
Which are 1 to 4 4 इंच long . 
हर फली has 4 to 8 peas . 
The peas are white , sticky and round . 
Agricultural experts in भारत have done a lot of research about मटर . 
After research they have छानबीन बाद many varieties of it . 
According to experts N.P. 29 , and N.P. 163 are the main varieties of एन0 पी0 163 मटर . 
देसी मटर is फसल . 
जिस भूमि in which there is मात्रा of फासफोरस and calcium -LRB- limestone -RRB- , that is considered good for खेती of देसी मटर . 
मटर is sowed in आश्विन महीने of Ashwin . 
पक gets ready in फरवरी and मार्च महीने . 
From the time of बोआई to कटाई कई प्रकार of changes occur in the climate - -LRB- 1 -RRB- गरम -LRB- 2 -RRB- नम ( 3 ) 3 -RRB- cold and -LRB- 4 -RRB- गरम . 
मटर has to survive in इन सभी प्रकार of जलवायु . 
In प्रारम्भ मटर needs warm-humid climate . 
More cold is not good for अधिक शीत मटर . 
In दिनों when in किसी -झौईण् किसी वर्ष there is more cold or snow falls then there is बहुत बुरा असर on फसल of मटर . 
फसल of मटर is grown in two ways - -LRB- 1 -RRB- along with फसल -LRB- 2 -RRB- in खेतों of फसल . 
देसी मटर is sown with जौ and गेहूं साथ . 
At some places -LRB- it -RRB- is sown with सरसों and अलसी साथ . 
By growing फसल in मिश्रित रूप there is आवश्यकता for shuffling . 
तैयारी of खेत should हो done according to उस मुख्य फसल , with which मटर are to हो grown . 
If फसल of मटर is to हो grown separately then तैयारी should हो done ध्यान in ध्यान प्रकृति of मटर . 
For अच्छी फसल of मटर होती है is necessary to do अच्छी जुताई of खेत . 
Generally होता है is good to plough खेत of मटर दो -झौईण् तीन बार with an indigenous plough . 
To make मिट्टी loose होता है is necessary to run पाटा after जुताई बाद . 
For growing विलायती मटर , पश्‍चात् लोग make canals after जुताई . 
This makes इससे easy to irrigate पौधों . 
At some places in खेतों भी of देसी मटर also canals are made after बोआई . 
In बोआई of मटर mainly three things should be concentrated on - -LRB- 1 -RRB- ( 1 ) समय -LRB- 2 -RRB- बीजों -LRB- 3 -RRB- method of बीजों . 
बोआई of मटर is generally done in महीने October . 
But in जिन स्थानों where winter starts early , there लोग sow बीज of मटर in सितम्बर ही only . 
In पहाड़ी क्षेत्रों , , where ठंडी जलवायु is cold , फसल of मटर is grown in दिनों भी too . 
मटर is फलीदार फसल . 
वह takes नाइट्रोजन at the rate of 40 किलो per acre from भूमि ही itself . 
So there is आवश्यकता to डालने ऐसी खादों in खेतों of अत : मटर in which there are तत्त्व of नाइट्रोजन . 
फासफोरस and खादें are more useful for खेतों of मटर . 
गोबर of खाद of गोबर also has very good बहुत अच्छा प्रभाव on उपज of मटर . 
After बोआई if विकास of पौधों is not happening then प्रयोग फासफोरस and चूने helps विकास of पौधों . 
लोग also call मटर grown with the intent of सब्जियों as मटर . 
विलायती मटर specially needs पानी . 
Because in उन दिनों it is warm . 
By not irrigating there is भय of it 's पौधों becoming dry . 
For अच्छी उपज of विलायती मटर होती है is necessary to irrigate होती है दो बार . 
Yield of देसी मटर भी also is good by irrigating once . 
On मिश्रित फसलों साथ with मिश्रित फसलों साथ सिंचाई of मटर is done along with मिश्रित फसलों साथ . 
There is not विशेष आवश्यकता for weeding-digging in फसल of मटर . 
Even then if some grass-blades उग in खेत or if पौधे are too close then पौधे लाभ ही by weeding-digging . 
Attention should होती है definitely देना चाहिए on weeding-digging for उपज of विलायती मटर because विलायती मटर is फसल . 
उसकी existence or non-existence depends of the activities of खेती only . 
To protect मटर from पाले होता है is necessary to irrigate होता है . 
Damage to legumes of मटर is also done by birds and animals . 
To protect फसल from them , रखवाली of फसल has to be done in a proper way . 
पतंग of the family of moths also नुकसान फसल of मटर . 
लोग start उपयोग legumes of मटर for making सब्जी in महीने ही of जनवरी itself . 
But कटाई of पूरी फसल is done from मार्च until अप्रैल . 
When the legumes become ripe and the stalks start to dry , then फसल should be काट लेना चाहिए . 
By letting to dry more in खेतों there is डर of the peas falling out during कटाई . 
पन्द्रह to बीस मन of उपज of मटर is obtained per acre . 
Where there is no provision for सिंचाई , there उपज is only 7-8 pounds per acre . 
In good fields upto 40 मन of green legumes are obtained per acre . 
( 1 ) दाल , of मटर is mainly done in two ways - -LRB- 1 -RRB- मुख्य रूप of मटर , and -LRB- 2 -RRB- in मुख्य रूप of सब्जी . 
Till recently खेती of soya bean was not done in भारत . 
Now खेती is being done in क्षेत्रों of the mountains of Himalayas . 
Soya bean is सोयाबीन विदेशी पौधा . 
In भाषा soya bean is called ' Glycin max ' . 
इसका पौधा is straight and of रंग . 
ऊंचाई of पौधे is 1 foot to 1 फीट . 
The stalk is branched and furry . 
पत्तियां are three-lobbed . 
रंग of the flowers is white or yellow . 
The seeds are inside the legumes . 
The length of the legumes is 1 to 1 1 इंच . 
The legumes are furry . 
रंग of बीजों is yellow , green , black or brown . 
बीज of some varieties are white and बादामी रंग भी also . 
From the viewpoint of बीज there are three main varieties of soya bean - -LRB- 1 -RRB- yellow-green colored soya bean -LRB- 2 -RRB- white colored soya bean -LRB- 3 -RRB- बादामी and black colored soya bean . 
फसल of soya bean can be grown in सभी प्रकार of खेतों . 
Even then light moist soil is best for खेती of soya bean . 
Farming of soya bean is also done on the mountains at ऊंचाई भी of 4 thousand to 7 thousand 7 हजार फीट . 
In ऐसे स्थानों भी also good yield of soya bean can be grown , where water stays collected . 
जमाव of पानी does not have बुरा प्रभाव on उपज of soya bean . 
खेती of soya bean is still in it 's प्रारंभिक अवस्था in भारत . 
Agricultural-scientists are busy researching about इसके now . 
Till now this has not been known , as to , by shuffling with which किन फसलों is अच्छी उपज of soya bean obtained . 
To grow फसल in मिश्रित रूप खेत has to be तैयारी according to फसल . 
Soya bean is फसल . 
इसकी बोआई is done in the middle of जून मध्य . 
At some places लोग sow बीज in जुलाई भी too . 
Agricultural scientists have सिफारिश Type 3 , Type 6 , Type 10 for बीज . 
So for sowing कोशिश should be made to get इन्हीं बीजों only . 
उन्नत बीज are available in local or regional agricultural-departments and shops of भारत सरकार . 
According to it 's प्रकृति , like अन्य दलहनों soya bean too absorbs नाइट्रोजन at the rate of 45 किलो per acre from भूमि . 
So there is आवश्यकता to देने खादें to soya bean . 
For वृद्धि of पौधों and वृद्धि of उपज प्रस्फुटिक खादें are good . 
-LRB- If -RRB- खाद of चूर्ण of bones is दी जाए then फसल of soya bean is obtained . 
Not much effort is आवश्यकता for growing फसल of soya bean . 
It takes from three to five months of समय for फसल of soya bean to ripen . 
फसल should be काट before the legumes are fully ripe . 
If the legumes are left to dry in खेतों ही only , then the peas fall off at the time of कटाई and हानि has to जाते हैं borne . 
After cutting पौधों should be collected in the barns and should be छोड़ देना चाहिए for drying . 
Then with क्रियाओं of husking and shelling , seeds-husk should be separated . 
In साधारण खेतों of सोयाबीन bean per acre from 4 to 5 5 मन of उपज is obtained . 
In अच्छे खेतों per acre from 10 upto 12 मन of उपज is obtained . 
In किसी -झौईण् किसी विशेष प्रकार of खेत per acre upto उपज is obtained . 
As much is जितनी उपज , दूना is obtained . 
Soya bean is used in many ways - -LRB- 1 -RRB- in the form of ( 1 ) हरी खाद , , -LRB- 2 -RRB- in making flat breads and biscuits , -LRB- 3 -RRB- in काम of दूध and -LRB- 4 -RRB- as दाल . 
दाल of soya bean are very good for स्वास्थ्य . 
Big scholars of dietetics कहना that दाल of soya bean have as much उतने ही पोषक , as much are in दूध of जितने भैंस . 
In देशों like चीन and जापान विविध प्रकार of items of food are तैयार from दाल of soya bean . 
मोठ भी is also called by different names . 
कुछ लोग call मोठ and कुछ लोग also call it mataki . 
मोठा of moth is said to be क्षेत्र of Himalaya . 
कुछ लोग also believe the birth-place of moth Lanka . 
Whatever , the spread of मोठ in foreign countries happened from भारत ही only . 
खेती of मोठ is done in huge proportions in United States of संयुक्त -झौईण् राज्य अमरीका and चीन . 
All of आप know this , that कि of मोठ is small and furry . 
ऊंचाई of तने is upto about लगभग 1 फुट . 
This stays फैला on जमीन from यह 2 इंच to यह 2 इंच . 
The stalk is branched . 
The lower branches are फैली रहती हैं on the ground . 
The upper branches are upright . 
पत्तियां are of three leaflets , which are divided in three to five पांच भागों . 
फूल come on the petiole . 
The legumes are from one to two दो इंच long . 
The seeds are inside the legumes . 
रंग of बीजों is light brown or of रंग . 
मोठ is of दो प्रकार - -LRB- 1 -RRB- मोठ of brown skin and -LRB- 2 -RRB- मोठ of green skin . 
मोठ of brown skin is also called lobiya . 
बोआई of मोठ is done in दिनों of monsoon and till October there is warmth along with नमी साथ ही in the climate . 
So अत : मोठ needs warm weather along with नमी साथ ही साथ . 
लोग grow फसल of मोठ with maize-millet . 
फसल of अलग मोठ is very rarely grown alone . 
But where कहीं लोग grow फसल of मोठ alone , there the shuffling of फसल of मोठ is done with फसल . 
For फसल of केवल मोठ , जुताइयां by indigenous ploughs for दो -झौईण् तीन बार is enough . 
May be in फसल of मोठ is grown separately , in which फसल are काट ली गई होती हैं . 
After the rain falls , when मिट्टी becomes moist , जुताई should हो जाए , done in खेतों . 
After जुताई , making मिट्टी flat , बीज should be sown . 
To grown मिश्रित फसलों साथ of मोठ with मिश्रित फसलों साथ , per acre one to one and डेढ़ किलो of बीज are necessary . 
But when फसल has to हो , grown separately , then per बीज should हो , sown . 
Like फसलों of अन्य दूसरी दाल , पौधे भी of मोठ also keep taking नाइट्रोजन from भूमि . 
So अत : मोठ does not आवश्यकता खादों . 
फासफेट तो shown that , if phosphate is प्रयोगों in खेतों of मोठ then फसल grows well . 
फसल of मोठ is sown in दिनों of monsoon . 
और ripens too in दिनों ही of monsoon . 
So there is आवश्यकता to irrigate फसल of अत : मोठ . 
But when there is scarcity of पानी of वर्षा and फसल starts drying , then हो becomes necessary to irrigate . 
फसल of मोठ takes समय of 4 months to ripen . 
If फसल is उपयोग for चारे , then फसल should be काट after the legumes sprout . 
For peas फसल should be काटनी चाहिए on पकने of the legumes . 
दाल of मोठ in the form of दाल is more . 
Like दाल मोठ is also light and easy to digest . 
कुछ लोग make आटा भी of मोठ , and make flat breads मिला कर it with आटा भी of गेहूं . 
लोग eat fried peas of मोठ . 
कुछ लोग make उपयोग of the peas of मोठ with सब्जियों साथ भी also . 
Moth cures पित्त of कफ and acid . 
There are ऐसे तत्व in the peas of मोठ which keep पेट well . 
खेसारी of grass peas has been done in भारत from ancient times . 
Grass peas has gone to foreign countries from भारत ही only . 
ऋण सीमा is decided without ध्यान in ध्यान ऋण वापसी क्षमता . 
कार्य of ऋण is done throughout पूरा वर्ष , not only at समय of केवल फसल and cutting केवल फसल . 
Where there is scarcity of कृषि साधनों , there , तैयारी for वार्षिक साख सीमा वितरण goes waste . 
The main work of Land Development Banks is to give ऋण to सदस्यों on mortgage of विशेष कार्य भूमि . 
-LRB- They -RRB- प्रदान साख सुविधा for the following activities to किसानों keeping सदस्यों भूमि , , house , गिरवी or pawn , like - . 
To improve कृषि भूमि and कृषि तकनीकी , like leveling कृषि भूमि , निर्माण barren and उपजाऊ , digging wells , निर्माण ridges , सिंचाई , , creating संसाधनों and giving them a solid form . 
Making provision for दीर्घकालीन ऋण for खरीद agricultural machines-equipment . 
To make agricultural house , बाँध , , canal , गोदाम , , cattle shed . 
Land Development Banks are expanding loan activities for विकास of agriculture assisting businesses like dairies , poultry , doing fruit farming , cow dung gas plant , windmills . 
किसनों ऋण to farmers on low rates so that they do not न होने पाये शोषक वृति of the exploiting nature of the moneylenders . 
To कार्य in the form of a link between दीर्घकालीन बैंकिग and राष्‍ट्रीय कृषि एवं ग्रामीण विकास बैंक for Agriculture and नाबार्ड and सरकार बीच . 
For the solution of problems of भूमि and उपयोग , to make आवश्यक परामर्श easy for सदस्यों is also कार्य . 
To increase पूँजी by issuing a debenture . 
There is भारी असमानता in प्रगति of the Land Development Banks in विभिन्न राज्यों of देश . 
विशेष प्रगति has happened in गुजरात , , आन्ध्र प्रदेश , , तमिलनाडु and Maharashtra , but विशेष प्रगति happened in आन्ध्र प्रदेश , like केरल , , आन्ध्र प्रदेश , , Orissa can not हुई है , considered satisfactory . 
अकुशल प्रबन्ध - बहुत - सदस्य and employees of directorate of बैंकों are untrained and inexperienced . 
इन बैंकों पास do not have वित्त . 
In almost all सभी बैंकों more than 80 80 प्रतिशत functional capital is obtained from पूँजी ऋण . 
प्रतिकूल प्रभाव of कानूनों - In कुछ राज्यों प्रतिकूल प्रभाव of कानूनों is देखा गया है on the activities of the Land Development Banks . 
In राज्यों like गुजरात and बिहार आदि due to the prohibition of land transfer or बिक्री under the tenant act , the working of the Land Development Banks has been hampered . 
प्रक्रिया of स्वीकृति adopted by इन बैंकों is very complex . 
Also long delays happen in unnecessary forms in loan disbursement . 
In किसी राज्य ये कार्य gets done in two months or in किसी राज्य हो जाते हैं takes 3-4 months or somewhere upto 9 months . 
Due to this the debtor gets very tired and after एक समय बाद दिलचस्पी in बैंक vanishes .

कई गीत of इस फ़िल्म of सत्येन बोस have become like कई गीत .

Like ' Jagruti ' यह फ़िल्म भी also was extremely successful . 
संदेश of fighting with the bitter truths of life and making one 's रास्ता has been दिया गया था in this . 
यह was said that कोई काम is small or big . 
Baby Naaz received the honour of best child artist for इस फ़िल्म . 
This is the most memorable सबसे यादगार फ़िल्म of डेविड अब्राहम in the role of John Chacha . 
उन्होंने received फेयर पुरस्कार of सर्वश्रेष्ठ सह अभिनेता for इस भूमिका .

That उसी साल ' फ़िल्म Phool aur Kaliyan ' in निर्देशन of राम गाबले was produced under बैनर of Rajkamal .

उसी साल Raj Kapoor released ' फ़िल्म Ab Dilli Dur Nahi ' as the director . 
यह फ़िल्म is कहानी of यात्रा of एक बालक in search of justice .

फ़िल्म portrays विकास of विकास of एक बालक .

इतिहास of regional cinema is older than बॉलीवुड . 
In 1909 Raghupathi Venkataratnam Naidu थे संस्थापक and अभिनेता in Indian films . 
His films were silent . 
So they could not be limited to किसी भाषा . 
वह would go places खुद ही for the ' promotion ' of films .

Now स्थान of तेलुगु फ़िल्म उद्योग is at स्थान in भारत and प्रतिवर्ष approximately 245 films are made in इसमें . 
उद्योग of भारत is of तमिल भाषा . 
रजनीकांत receives सबसे ज्यादा पैसा in एशिया .

There were तीन गीत in इस फ़िल्म and इस फ़िल्म did very well . 
Because of निर्माण of talkies abroad there was a rush to make films in भारत भी too among whom Ardeshir M. Irani and जमशेद जी मदन are prominent . 
Prabhat Film Company and Bombay Talkies produced many important films from a social and historical viewpoint . 
The first talkie प्रस्तुत पहली by Prabhat films थी Ayodhya राजा ' -LRB- 1932 -RRB- which थी released in हिंदी and मराठी together . 
वर्ष 1933 था , ऐतिहासिक वर्ष of हिंदी सिनेमा , when वी. शांताराम produced पहली रंगीन फ़िल्म Sairandhri ' under बैनर of Prabhat Film Company . 
तकनीकी कार्य of रंगीन इस फ़िल्म was done in जर्मनी . 
फ़िल्म became successful and after this the relocation of कंपनी was done to Pune from Kohlapur . 
After ' Dharmatma ' वी. शांताराम directed social films like ' Duniya na maane ' in 1937 and ' Aadmi ' in 1939 under बैनर of प्रभात . 
He created कंपनी Rajkamal Kala Mandir ' as well as पहली फ़िल्म produced by स्वयं Shakuntala ' . 
यह फ़िल्म became quite famous and was continuously shown for one hundred and four weeks in ' ' स्वास्तिक सिनेमा ' ' of मुंबई . 
स्थापना of बांबे टॉकीज़ was done by प्रसिद्ध अभिनेता and director Himanshu Rai . 
In 1950 another famous film of बांबे टॉकीज़ Mahal ' आई . 
In इस फ़िल्म थ्रिलर of the doubt of संशय was inserted . 
गीत , of इस फिल्म are याद even आज भी . 
गीतकार थे खेमचंद्र प्रकाश and the narrative , संवाद and निर्देशन of फ़िल्म थे been done by Kamal Amrohi . 
There were some such filmmakers apart from this talkies , without whose mention इतिहास of भारतीय सिनेमा is incomplete , among सोहराब मोदी and Mehboob Khan -LRB- 1906 - 1964 -RRB- are prominently noteworthy . 
These two created trend setter films , in which ' Pukar ' -LRB- 1939 -RRB- of तथा Mother India ' of महबूब खान are noteworthy . 
After Independence नींव of वैमनस्यता came between each other which was a big danger for the nationality and संस्कृति of देश . 
Therefore to generate सांप्रदायिक सौहार्द and सिनेमा played महत्वपूर्ण भूमिका . 
संगीत for all the films of महबूब खान who has directed more than twenty four films has been दिया था by Naushad . 
महबूब खान 's ' Aan ' -LRB- 1952 -RRB- which remained quite popular abroad and because of गीत , and costume यह फ़िल्म was यह फ़िल्म at that time . 
Actually , this थी the remake of फ़िल्म Aurat ' made in 1940 by him . 
In इस फ़िल्म पुरस्कार for सर्वश्रेष्‍ठ अभिनेत्री was presented , which was a ' golden chapter ' in इतिहास of हिंदी सिनेमा . 
विमल राय films in यथार्थवादी परंपरा of rural background are still a precedent . 
Through his characters उन्होंने not only प्रस्तुत सामाजिक यथार्थ in his प्रत्येक फ़िल्म , but made one aware of a sense of social responsibility . 
After ' Do Bigha Zameen ' विमल राय directed three films together in 1954 , in which ' Baap - Beti ' , Viraj Bahu ' and ' Naukri ' are prominent . 
For निर्मित फ़िल्म Viraj Bahu ' created on उपन्यासों of Sarat Chandra फ़ेयर पुरस्कार for Best Actress was दिया गया था to Kamini Kaushal . 
विमल राय made many other films too with दिलीप कुमार साथ , in which ' Devdas ' , Madhumati ' तथा Yahudi ' are prominent . 
On acquiring acting skills through inheritance Raj Kapoor gave एक नया आयाम to यथार्थ and रुमानियत through माध्यम of motion pictures and स्थापित modernity in हिंदी सिनेमा . 
Under बैनर of आर. के. स्टूडियो founded in 1948 उन्होंने made the first film ' Aag ' in 1948 . 
प्रयोग of फ्लैशबैक तकनीक was done for पहली बार in इस फ़िल्म . 
फ़िल्म Shahar Aur Sapna ' made in 1936 presents कड़ी सच्चाई on आवासीय समस्या of Bombay Metropolis . 
Raj Khosla who started his career with ' Navketan ' made फ़िल्म Kala Pani ' in 1958 with देवानंद , which थी आधारित on क्राइम थ्रिलर . 
देवानंद gave यादगार अभिनय in इस फ़िल्म and उन्हें received the honour of बेस्ट अभिनेता . 
यह फ़िल्म based on क्राइम थ्रिलर थी यह फ़िल्म at बाक्स ऑफ़िस . 
सोहराब मोदी became such a filmmaker in this age who created historical costume films . 
इन्होंने made ' फ़िल्म रानी in 1953 , which is considered ' फ़िल्म of भारत . 
While बात about हिंदी सिनेमा if the trinities - त्रिदेवों -झौईण् दिलीप कुमार , , Raj Kapoor and देवानंद are forgotten then यह will होगी unjust . 
Famous by नाम of ' tragedy king ' or ' Devdas ' नाम of दिलीप कुमार was यूसुफ़ खान था . 
In दिलीप कुमार , , Raj Kapoor and देवानंद are prominent among the three artists who got नाम written in golden letters in इतिहास of हिंदी सिनेमा . 
फ़िल्मी कैरियर फ़िल्मी कैरियर with ' Hum Ek Hain ' -LRB- 1946 -RRB- देवानंद मिला , his first break with ' Ziddi ' -LRB- 1948 -RRB- , in which his heroine was Kamini Kaushal . 
फ़िल्म बन गए सुपरहिट and Dev Anand बन गए देवानंद सदाबहार हीरो . 
After this many films of his like ' ' विद्या ' , , Jeet ' , ' Sanam ' , Nadaan ' , एवं Nirmala ' आईं with सुरैया and Madhubala . 
आनंद देवानंद थे आनंद देवानंद बडे़ भाई . 
For helping him देवानंद स्थापना स्वतंत्र फ़िल्म कंपनी Navketan ' in which उन्हीं retained the status of निर्देशक . 
In 1962 उन्होंने made ' हकी़क़त ' फ़िल्म Haqeeqat ' on the background of युद्ध of India - भारत -झौईण् चीन which थी quite popular and discussed . 
भाई of देवानंद made लोकप्रिय फ़िल्म like ' Guide ' for पहली बार with Indo-American help . 
Guide ' is one of the memorable films of the golden age . 
इस फ़िल्म made देवानंद एक कालजयी अभिनेता . 
There is महत्वपूर्ण योगदान of Baldev Raj Chopra and Yash Chopra also in इतिहास of सिनेमा . 
B.R.Chopra made फ़िल्म Sholay ' -LRB- 1953 -RRB- . 
The background of his films थी dependent on socio-economic as well as national unity and communal harmony . 
वे is बॉलीवुड ऐसे निर्देशक of बॉलीवुड , who gave a new perspective and प्रस्तुत नया आयाम to भारतीय सिनेमा . 
उन्होंने has always picked up a new issue through माध्यम of each of his films . 
For इसी कारण he was honoured with the ' फाल्के पुरस्कार ' ' of 2001 for अद्वितीय योगदान in भारतीय सिनेमा .

Second June 1947 , one एक ऐसी तारीख in इतिहास of India on which हुआ was decided to lay नींव on the ground of compromise . 
Among the Congress , मुस्लिम लीग and लॉर्ड मांउटबेटन बीच in the Viceroy House signatures were done on the deed of Partition . 
हिन्दुस्तान was divided into two pieces , the second piece became पाकिस्तान . 
Another clause was kept in the agreement that there will नहीं होगी no transfer of population . 
Which यानि that whichever मुसलमान wanted to रहना in India वो would stay in India and whichever Hindu wanted to live in हिन्दू पाकिस्तान वो would in हिन्दू पाकिस्तान , but this just could not हो नहीं सका .

A film titled ' Swadeshi Andolan ' was showcased in the Town Hall of Kolkata on 22 September 1905 . 
इतिहासकार consider इसे to be the first film of भारत . 
In इसमें there थी तस्वीर of स्वदेशी आंदोलन associated with the domestic movement . 
फ्रामजी मदन is एक अहम नाम in भारतीय फ़िल्म इतिहास of भारतीय फ़िल्म इतिहास . 
मदन प्रथम is भारतीय , who in 1902 began शो by pitching a tent in an open ground of Kolkata . 
अब्दुल यूसुफ़ अली of सूरत initiated टूरिस्ट सिनेमा in देश . 
A film ' The life of Christ ' was showcased in 1910 in पी. बी. मेहता theatre . 
In 1912 Ramchandra Gopal Torane -LRB- Dada Saheb Torane -RRB- made प्रथम फ़ीचर फ़िल्म Pundalik ' . 
When the trend of मूक सिनेमा था , prevailing , then we were not tied in बंधन of किसी भाषा . 
As क़दम set off from silent towards talking सिनेमा ओर , some alterations आई in the presentation of song-music . 
Artists performing दृश्यानुकूल themselves would sing in accordance with the scene and साजिंदे would play hiding in some bushes or camps . 
In दशक of तीस कई नए प्रयोग कई नए प्रयोग performed in इतिहास of हिंदी सिनेमा of which one we know as playback singing . 
__तेब्लिन्क्__1. बोराल was जन्म in a famous musician family on 19 October 1903 . 
लालचंद बोराल थे a famous Pakhavaj player of उस समय . 
उन्हें deserves श्रेय of जाता है कार्टून फ़िल्मकार along with जाता है the first music composer who शुरू playback singing . 
Bhulere Sheshe ' , Lakh Taka ' , एवं ' भोला मास्टर ' are there in the three cartoon feature films produced by him . 
आर. सी. बोराल निधन on 25 November 1981 . 
साहेब हुए were born in भारतीय फ़िल्म इतिहास of भारतीय फ़िल्म इतिहास . 
एक रामचंद्र गोपाल तोरणे and second , धुंडीराज गोविंद फाल्के aka धुंडीराज गोविंद फाल्के . 
There is a lot of काफी समानता in both of them . 
First this that both were from महाराष्ट्र . 
Both fanatical art lovers associated with theatre and their willpower was also similar . 
प्रसार and विकास of सिनेमा in भारत था शामिल in अहम प्राथमिकताओं of both . 
If we बात about साहेब फाल्के then even वह भी wanted to make फ़िल्म on राम or Krishna . 
But even उनके पास भी थी वही समस्या as साहेब तोरणे पास थी , of पैसों . 
Here both of them थे , problems , of पैसों भी and of artists , especially there थे , an acute shortage of female artists . 
Forget about महिलाओं काम in films during उन दिनों bringing कला from on stage was considered a sign of uncivilised behaviour . 
After a lot of churning फाल्के made up मन to पौराणिक उपाख्यान of सत्यवादी राजा हरिश्चंद्र . 
Approximately two months later returned to भारत on 1 April 1912 after receiving प्रशिक्षण in फ़िल्म निर्माण from लंदन . 
He brought along raw negative film also with प्रोसेसिंग मशीन साथ -झौईण् साथ . 
एक सज्जन one gentleman who got ready to आर्थिक मदद financially . 
As soon as समस्या was हल आई the turn of चयन प्रक्रिया of characters . 
फाल्के wanted that इस भूमिका should only be played by कलाकार ही . 
The attempt was wasted , even a prostitute refused to come in front of the camera . 
Eventually होगी was निर्णय that भूमिका will होगी made to play by a male artist only . 
तलाश शुरू as to who that man will हुई anyway ? 
After प्रयास since कई दिनों his eyes fell on a cook in an Iranian restaurant . 
His postures were somewhat like women . 
That cook became पहली अभिनेत्री of फ़िल्म able to receive the designation of फ़िल्म of रसोइया भारत , whose name था Salunke ' . 
No less effort was invested for भूमिका भी of third important character Rohitashch -LRB- son of रोहिताश्व ( हरिश्चंद्र and Taramati -RRB- in this story . 
Seeing no alternative finally फाल्के made बेटे फाल्के play this role . 
उन्हें again had to सामना financial problem while moving towards the last stage of शूटिंग . 
In this time of इस संकट एकमात्र मदद was provided by पत्नी काकी फाल्के . 
फाल्के gave हिम्मत to पूरा इस फ़िल्म by बेचकर off all her jewellery छोड़कर alone a Mangalsutra . 
After इतने सारे त्याग and संघर्ष बाद यह फ़िल्म was successfully completed . 
प्रेस शो was held in मुंबई on 21 April 1913 . 
उन्होंने is in इसी प्रेस शो that उन्होंने यह खुलासा that नाम of इस फ़िल्म is ' ' राजा हरिश्चंद्र ' ' . 
In 18 1913 Raja ' राजा हरिश्चंद्र ' भी was also रिलीज़ in that very Coronation Theatre where , about a year before इस तारीख ' Pundalik ' was रिलीज़ . 
Audiences ख़ूब पसंद इसे a lot , फ़िल्म ran in कोरेशन थियेटर for 23 दिनों continuously . 
In मानव इतिहास many such great people have been born सही मूल्यांकन of whose contribution could not हुई हैं done during जीवनकाल . 
Counting of गुरुदत्त निर्देशक and अभिनेता of हिंदी सिनेमा is also done among such great people . 
Within कुछ ही वर्षों after मृत्यु बाद उनकी was counted amongst the greatest people of विश्व सिनेमा . 
Without गुरुदत्त सूची of निर्माताओं of भारत is meaningless . 
Not only this , today कोई भी नामी अंतरराष्ट्रीय फ़िल्म समारोह is समझा जाता है incomplete without showcasing गुरुदत्त films . 
Special screenings of गुरुदत्त films have been विशेष आयोजन in almost all prestigious international film festivals . 
टाइम्स पत्रिका शामिल नाम in विश्व 100 greatest film personalities . 
Many books have been written on जीवन and achievements in गुजराती and other languages . 
In जीवनकाल his films received राष्ट्रीय पुरस्कार and राष्ट्रीय पुरस्कार also and they were appreciated in film festivals as well . 
गुरुदत्त was जन्म in बंगलौर ( -LRB- now Bengaluru -RRB- on 9 9 जुलाई , , 1925 . 
पिता थे अध्यापक in बंगलौर but in 1930 उनके took up a job in Burma oil ocmpany and began to live in कोलकाता . 
In इस तरह गुरुदत्त बचपन was spent in बंगाल . 
गुरुदत्त parents were of दोनों साहित्यिक रुचि , therefore उन्हें received literary and artistic values in परिवार ही itself . 
मामा बालकृष्ण बेनेगल laid a great impact on संवेदनशील मन . 
वे ही only ले गए him towards films . 
गुरुदत्त passed his matriculation in 1941 at आयु of 13 . 
To help in ख़र्च वे began to work at a Marwari 's दुकान . 
in the year 1942 उन्हें received प्रवेश in the dance institute of प्रसिद्ध नर्तक उदयशंकर and उन्हें went to Almoda . 
Very soon due to लगन and fascination for dance वह बन गए उदयशंकर favourite student . 
गुरुदत्त also played छोटी -झौईण् सी भूमिका भी in the film Kalpana produced by उदयशंकर . 
Around लगभग उसी समय गुरुदत्त पिता got transferred in मुंबई and they began to माटुंगा in Matunga with परिवार . 
मुबंई भी of गुरुदत्त नृत्य शिक्षा and प्रदर्शन continued in Mumbai also . 
During इसी दौरान only Gururdutt developed रुचि in films and उन्होंने saw many films . 
वे also went to चेन्नई भी to get काम in films but after गए मुबंई to Mumbai . 
उनका is then that मामा introduced him to Prabhat Studio 's partner Baburam Pai and उनका was employed in प्रभात as कला निर्देशक . 
उनकी was in प्रभात ही only that उनकी met Devanand and रहमान . 
वहीं was there only that देवानंद वचन गुरुदत्त that if वहीं ever makes फ़िल्म then वहीं will hand निर्देशन to गुरुदत्त . 
In the year 1944 उन्होंने entered क्षेत्र of acting and played भूमिका in films Chaand and Lakharani . 
After कुछ समय बाद उन्हें मिला मौका in फ़िल्म Hum Ek Hain ' . 
उन्हें was also made co-director of इस फ़िल्म . 
गुरुदत्त ही थे also नृत्य निर्देशक भी of फ़िल्म . 
गुरुदत्त again आ गए on streets after स्टूडियो was बंद down . 
After making rounds of कई स्टूडियो उन्हें मिला काम in the recently opened Fames pictures and कई स्टूडियो as सहायक of अनादिनाथ बनर्जी . 
Then वे went to Bombay talkies and बने co-director to Gyan Mukherjee , निर्देशक of super hit film Kismat . 
Songs and music of फ़िल्म were also very popular . 
During the recording of गीतों for रिकॉर्डिंग दौरान ही only गुरुदत्त and गीता राय आए near to each other and their introduction बदल गया into nuptial knot . 
After this गुरुदत्त स्थापना his independent film production company ' Gurudutt films ' and made Aar Paar under बैनर . 
This थी पहली फ़िल्म in which उन्होंने played भूमिका of अभिनेता साथ -झौईण् साथ निर्देशक and निर्माता along with that of actor . 
There was नयापन था as well in कहानी भी . 
In 1955 उन्होंने made फ़िल्म by मिस्टर एंड मिसेज 55 नाम of Mr. and Mrs. 55 in which उन्होंने exposed महिलाओं who claimed to be social reformists . 
For इस फ़िल्म screening वे went to हैदराबाद गए . 
वे was extremely impressed by वहीदा रहमान dance and रूप -झौईण् सौंदर्य and signed her for सीआईडी upon meeting her . 
उन्होंने signed a contract for 5 साल with Waheeda . 
The cine world will be indebted to जगत गुरुदत्त for मल्लिका of मल्लिका of talented and natural सौंदर्य like वहीदा रहमान . 
After that शुरू दौर of grand and classic films . 
In 1957 only उन्होंने made masterpeice Pyaasa . 
यह फ़िल्म थी supreme in हर पहलू like acting , songs-music , photography , dialogues , direction etc and became सुपरहिट . 
वे knew मराठी and उर्दू languages . 
उन्हें था विशेष लगाव of साहित्य since बचपन ही . 
Along with his own films गुरुदत्त played मुख्य भूमिका in some other films as well . 
वे was playing मुख्य भूमिका of Majnu in K. Asif 's film Love and God but due to मृत्यु फ़िल्म was left incomplete . 
Later संजीव कुमार played यह भूमिका . 
As much as Gurudutt रहे , transparent in व्यक्तिगत जीवन , मृत्यु was equally mysterious . 
At 6 a.m. on 10 October , 1964 उन्हें was found dead in his flat on Peddar road . 
भाई आत्माराम that भाई committed आत्महत्या while अरुण दत्त called इसे an accident . 
Being a skillful director वे accurately recognised Indian audiences ' रुचि towards संगीत . 
गुरुदत्त has दिया a lot to संसार in the form of a good human being and सफल अभिनेता and फ़िल्म निर्माता . 
Anil Kapoor who rose as स्टार in दशक of 1980 had actually worked as बाल कलाकार in three films . 
तीन फिल्में were ' Shatranj ' , Humaare Tumhaare ' और ' Shakti ' . 
But सच था that अनिल कपूर did not received कोई खास सफलता as बाल कलाकार . 
With बैग in hands अनिल कपूर used to घूमा from शहर -झौईण् शहर to the other . 
अनिल कपूर खुद ही used to बताया producers - directors that वह wanted to be अभिनेता . 
Finally after कठिन संघर्ष बाद अनिल कपूर मिला अवसर to play हीरो in ' Vo 7 din ' and 7 दिन ' फिल्म was released in 1983 . 
यह पहली फिल्म of अनिल कपूर was a success but उसे was not नहीं मिल रही थीं new films easily . 
Somehow he got two films ' Andar Bahar ' और Love marriage ' but both of them were unsuccessful . 
अनिल कपूर संघर्ष became more difficult . 
Pyar kiya hai pyar karenge ' थी also एक सफल फिल्म but could not make अनिल कपूर स्टार . 
आखिर Mr. India ' made अनिल कपूर स्टार in 1987 . 
This थी फिल्म of यह अनिल कपूर कैरियर till then . 
भारतीय मीडिया and मनोरंजन उद्योग are one of मनोरंजन उद्योग . 
Initially where there था only एक चैनल नाम Doordarshan under नियंत्रण of सरकार , now there are four hundred एक चैनल काम countrywide . 
More than one thousand films are made in various languages in भारत and there are approximately more than 10,000 cinema halls . 
Where यह उद्योग था of Rupees 58 , 080 Crore in the year 2009 now by 2005 it था of 35,650 करोड़ . 
In इस प्रकार the growth rate from 2005 to 2009 was 13 प्रतिशत रही . 
भारतीय बाज़ार of टेलीविज़न is growing . 
साल -झौईण् दर -झौईण् साल new channels are being launched and after मंदी बाद of 2009 now growth rate of विज्ञापन has आ गई है to two units . 
Now सरकार is paying पूरा ध्यान to डिजिटलाइजेशन . 
Now there are 6 big companies in वितरण क्षेत्र which are separate from DD Direct . 
सिर्फ़ एक कंपनी थी there in 2003 in इस क्षेत्र . 
प्रतिशत of digital cable customers is जा रहा है down although for डिजिटलाइजेशन सरकार has set नियम countrywide . 
Whenever काम for डिजिटलाइजेशन is over there will होगा तो transparency in the entire network and अनेक गुणा वृद्धि in the revenue . 
9 crore copies of newspapers are broadcast in भारत and this is one of सबसे बड़े प्रसार in पूरी दुनिया . 
It is at यह दूसरे नंबर after चीन बाद . 
यह will होगा wrong to कहना no attempts have been undertaken for डिजिटाइजेशन in भारत and पाठकों were not given online newspaper . 
But प्रगति has not been achieved in इस दिशा . 
There is मौजूदगी of most newspapers and पाठक भी are also बढ़ रहे हैं . 
But newspaper readers of भारत like to read newspapers for पाठक ख़बरों , इंटरनेट . 
Nowadays majority of अधिकांश मीडिया and मनोरंजन उद्योग क्षेत्र are विशेषकर ध्यान to entering in small towns . 
during the year विकास of समाचारपत्र उद्योग has decreased but regional newspapers increased and became local . 
विकास of newspapers increased in the year 2010 and हिस्सा in सकल आमदनी from advertisements also rose . 
Apart from this the interest of advertisers increased towards newspapers of second and third grade . 
समाचारपत्र उद्योग is समझ रहा है महत्व of इस बात and is initiating its editions in क्षेत्र . 
सबसे बड़ी चुनौती in front of प्रिंट मीडिया is the expenditure of newsprint . 
The cost of newsprint is एक प्रमुख घटक of newspaper income .

With this we मिलता है संकेत that there are भारत of वृद्धि in इस क्षेत्र . 
रानी कहा that मुझे have कोई प्रॉब्लम with किसी भी खान in बल्कि मुझे have learnt a lot from all the three Khans . 
शाहरूख and आमिर have taught me a lot . 
शाहरूख has always been very supportive and as a co-star उन्होंने has always taught me that how should one बेहतर काम better . 
आमिर तो has been like टीचर . 
When i था begun करियर then उन्होंने था taught me form the very basic how to improve एक्टिंग . 
मैं am also doing फिल्म भी with him and even now मैं feel that मैं have to सीखना a lot from him . 
रानी also admired सलमान . 
She कहा that सलमान खान is a very good बहुत अच्छे दोस्त of mine . 
मेरी have a very good and different बोंडिग with बोंडिग and मेरी पता बोंडिग like me a lot .

रानी 's यह फिल्म Aiyya is रिलीज़ in इया अक्टूबर .

करण जौहर is नाम of फिल्म इंडस्ट्री , to काम with whom हर कलाकार yearns . 
जिस खान वो wants , can make him हिस्सा of his films . 
वह considers only those films a success which can be याद for लंबे समय . 
Before अच्छी कहानी साथ with अच्छे संगीत was बॉलीवुड important for सफलता in बॉलीवुड . 
Now along strong direction with a good script is असली ताकत with which आप can rule bollywood without बिग स्टार बिना भी as well . 
There is कोई बड़ा स्टार in करण जौहर film Student of the year . 
All are debutantes but association of करण जौहर नाम with फिल्म साथ makes फिल्म साथ big in itself . 
In this Mahesh Bhatt 's daughter Aliya , director David Dhawan 's son Varun , सिदार्थ मल्होत्रा and बोमन ईरानी son Kayoz are एक्टिंग . 
काजोल presence in करण फिल्म has almost होना लगभग एक परम्परा . 
करण statement is that he does not want to break इस परम्परा because मैं am a man who works on habits .

Different from this is कहानी of जन्म of फ़िल्म उद्योग . 
लुई लुमिटे and भाई exhibited six silent films at Watson Hotel of मुंबई on 7 जुलाई , , 1886 . 
After देखने बाद these silent films ज़बरदस्त रुचि was पैदा in लोगों on इस विषय . 
As a result भटवेडेकर in मुंबई and हीरालाल सेन in Kolkata made many short silent films . 
श्रेय of making राजा हरिश्चंद्र in भारत goes to साहेब फाल्के -LRB- साहेब फाल्के -RRB- . 
फाल्के थे an extraordinary dilettante . 
वे थे निर्माता , , संवाद लेखक , , कैमरामैन and वितरक all . 
उन्हें is कहा जाता है पिता of भारतीय फ़िल्म उद्योग . 
After राजा हरिश्चंद्र बाद उन्होंने made many films . 
In शुरू of दशक of twenties 27 films per प्रतिवर्ष शुरू to be made . 
During इन्हीं दिनों निर्माण of articulate films शुरू . 
Initially maximum films were made in हिंदी . 
After this films began to be made in Bengali , Oriya , Assamese , Marathi , Tamil , Telegu , Kannada and other languages as well . 
In the year 1931 आर्देशर ईरानी produced पहली वाक् फ़िल्म आलमाआरा in देश . 
मनोविनोद मनोविनोद दिलचस्पी in इस नये माध्यम of amusement . 
Therefore सिनेमाघर were स्थापित in almost all cities of देश and swiftness आई in फ़िल्म निर्माण भी . 
There were only seven songs in आलमाआरा तो . 
In इंद्रसभा संख्या increased to 71 . 
After कुछ समय बाद that फिल्म was made on शरत novel Devdas . 
इस फ़िल्म बदल दी people 's रुचि . 
ज़बरदस्त परिवर्तन was seen in प्रस्तुतिकरण and संवादों of films in दशक of तीस . 
देवकी बोस , , वी. शांता राम , , सोहराब मोदी and महबूब have made many good films . 
Among these Maya , Achhut kanya , Duniya na Mane , Adhikaar , विद्यापति are noteworthy . 
ज़बरदस्त वृद्धि in निर्माण took place in निर्माण in दशक of तीस . 
During इस दौरान भारत भी also had to deal with विश्वव्यापी मंदी . 
Soon after being over मंदी दूसरा विश्व युद्ध शुरू . 
During युद्ध दौरान this point was agreed upon that films can become प्रमुख साधन for प्रचार and to construct public opinion . 
Many constructions were done to encourage war efforts . 
Money rained in फ़िल्म उद्योग . 
During इसी समय only import of films to सीमित मात्रा शुरू in limited number . 
कुछ समय बाद after मोहन भवानी made वसंतसेना based on famous Sanskrit play Mricchakatika . 
अगले वर्ष ईरानी made one more colour film Mother India . 
Production of colour films in देश at a big scale शुरू in दशक of fifties . 
To attract लोगों ध्यान these were full of love scenes , emotions , sensational incidents . 
Rarely कोई फ़िल्म was made on serious social problems , संघर्ष and problems of किसानों and tribals . 
In दशक of नियुक्त फ़िल्म जांच समिति was constituted to bring सुधार in फ़िल्म उद्योग , to increase its standards and to प्रदान it with strength . 
वित्त निगम was स्थापना to वित्त व्यवस्था finances for निर्माण of good films . 
To promote निर्माण of good films in big cities of देश film societies were स्थापना . 
महत्वपूर्ण सहायता was received in raising the standards of Indian films with इस योगदान of सरकार . 
भारतीय सिनेमा , , बाज़ार and influence आज is not concentrated till the frontiers of देश only . 
उसने has made जगह for itself in विश्व सिनेमा बाज़ार भी as well and is काम to strengthen its grasp . 
सिनेमा is माध्यम whose influence is two sided . 
On एक तरफ यह influences देश भाषा , , संस्कृति and समाज also gets प्रभावित by them . 
If we throw a glance at इतिहास of विश्व सिनेमा then one comes to पता विश्व सिनेमा was eexhibited in ग्रैंड कैफे of पेरिस on 28 December , 1895 . 
Then was इसे was नाम as cinematography . 
After six months of लोगों मिला मौका to देखने सिनेमा for पहली बार . 
In the advertisement published in the newspapers of उस समय इसे was दिए गए थे names like miracle of शताब्दी and विश्व wonder . 
भारतीय सिनेमा has entered not only देशों of यूरोप and अमरीका ही but till ऑस्ट्रेलिया and न्यूजीलैंड . 
With विकास and उपलब्धता साथ of साधनों - of telecommunication - मोबाइल फोन and साधनों - like 3G साधनों - is now entering everywhere . 
With this there are आसार of क्षेत्र of सिनेमा बढ़ने more . 
आज भी traditional methods are employed to arrange पूंजी in इस क़ारोबार . 
In इसमें एक हिस्सा of available numbers of निवेश and क़ारोबार can be रखा जा सकता है in the domain of speculations . 
In पूंजी निवेश in इस क़ारोबार आज भी there is importance of अनौपचारिक निवेश क्षेत्र . 
In the initial stage of फ़िल्म निर्माण usually यह क़ारोबार would आता था through family and contacts . 
यह था that time when फ़िल्म था देखा जाता था as एक माध्यम of सुधार instead of व्यवसाय . 
There थी व्यवस्था of providing funds to artists काम in films and this amount थी सीमित to hundreds and हज़ारों ही only . 
यह दौर नहीं था of big budget films . 
But in them aspects of कला and संगीत were दिया जाता था अधिक महत्व in comparison to earning profit . 
In this profession the system of पैसा on a big scale moved forward rapidly along with making of multi-starrer films . 
In भागीदारी of निवेश and लाभ instead of बैंकिंग क्षेत्र other ways are इस्तेमाल at big scale आज भी . 
एक नया दौर of नियमन has नियमन of इस उद्योग after the entry of big companies and corporate in इस क़ारोबार . 
This is being done in a more professional way since after professional managers बनने बाद partners in इस काम . 
Ways of देखने फ़िल्म have also बदलते along with changing भारत साथ . 
सिनेमाघर have not नहीं रह गए हैं limited to केवल मनोरंजन ही only . 
They along with मॉल संस्कृति साथ have become an inseparable part of मनोरंजन समग्र बाज़ार . 
भारत has होता है एक ऐसा देश where maximum films are produced निर्माण he world . 
Apart from हिंदी , सबसे ज्यादा तादाद of films being made in other Indian languages have the largest number in दुनिया . 
At this moment nationwide in दुनिया of सिनेमा around 20 lakh poeple have received रोज़गार directly or indirectly . 
भारतीय सिनेमा बाज़ार has been estimated as around two and a half क़रीब ढाई अरब अमरीकी डॉलर . 
they are attempted to be made to be worth filling front rows through हिंसा , , अपराध and चालू संगीत . 
The experts of this profession दावा that दरें of fees of celebrity actors is बढ़ती ही जा रही हैं साल -झौईण् दर -झौईण् साल . 
आधिकारिक जानकारी about which actor received how much money for which film is not generally available . 
Both those who pay money and those who receive do not supply कोई अधिकृत जानकारी about this . 
But figures like these are made available by लोगों associated with बाज़ार and क्षेत्र . 
For एक फ़िल्म पांच करोड़ or even more than that is also paid .

Since 1011 many have trampled इसे beneath their feet after robbing इसे from time to time . 
In the year 1450 Mughals stepped in who made इसे घर , gave इसे प्यार and decorated . 
Mughal reign which began from बाबर पहुँची अकबर via Humayun who acquired the highest standard in Mughal regime . 
जलालुद्दीन मुहम्मद अकबर , , था बादशाह of Mughals whose took birth on Indian land , in राजपूताना in घर of एक हिंदु घर .

Similarly राजकुमारी जोधा कहानी भी also seemed like that of outside of Rajpoot Rajwada 's दुनिया . 
Year 1555 , ये था साल when Mughal regime था jolted due to मौत of Emperor Humayun . 
Taking advantage of इस मौके King Hemu captured गद्दी of दिल्ली and then राजा हेमू of पानीपत ensued . 
Hemu 's सेना was made to lose in हेमू of पानीपत and in thsi way Bairam Khan made जलालुद्दीन take over गद्दी of दिल्ली .
