It is said that if one has to समझना किसी देश and समाज they should watch its movies . 
मोटे तौर speaking आप can make एक झलक ही about संस्कृति by एक झलक ही of फ़िल्म . 
There are phases of transitions everywhere in the world . 
देखिए , at our Hindi cinemas , how दुनिया of Hindi cinema has बदल गई है आज . 
यात्रा of the Hindi Cinema dates long back up to the point where हुई थी has पहुंचने आज . 
The movie '' Bandit Queen '' featured in 1994 had set नई राह & दिशा for हिंदी सिनेमा . 
यह फ़िल्म निर्देशित by शेखर कपूर थी आधारित on किताब India 's Bandit Queen : The true story of दि ट्रू स्टोरी ऑफ फूलन देवी '' by माला सेन . 
पूरी फ़िल्म was filmed in चंबल घाटी and the surrounding areas of उत्तर प्रदेश and उत्तर प्रदेश . 
The music direction of इस फ़िल्म was done by प्रसिद्ध गायक of उस्ताद नुसरत फतेह अली खान . 
There are no male or female actors गाता on stage in इस फ़िल्म . 
संवाद of इस फ़िल्म were full of abuses . 
Bandit Queen ' थे successful at खिड़की ( बॉक्स ऑफिस ) and it won so many कई सारे पुरस्कार . 
फ़िल्म प्रदर्शित रामगोपाल featured in 1988 by Ram gopal verma साबित to हुई a milestone in इतिहास of सिनेमा . 
वर्मा had established himself because of his films - ' Shiva ' and ' Rangila ' and now उन्हें wanted to do something new . 
उन्होंने thought of making movies on अपराध -झौईण् जगत of मुंबई . 
इस फ़िल्म with a budget of दो करोड़ did कारोबार of दो करोड़ . 
शूटिंग of पूरी फ़िल्म was done on the lanes and streets of मुंबई . 
संपादन of इस फ़िल्म was not done through the then prevalent प्रचलित स्टेनबैक मशीन but in the form of संपादन . 
The playback music in इस फ़िल्म by Sandeep Chauta startled लोगों . 
All the actors of फ़िल्मों except मातोंडकर and चक्रवर्ती were कास्ट from theater . 
किरदार and संवाद in इस फ़िल्म were not filmy but of आम बोलचाल . 
आज popular अनुराग कश्यप थे one of the writers of इस फ़िल्म . 
In the year 2001 सिनेमा again ली a new turn . 
The two films इस सांल this year , Lagan ' और Dil chahta hai ' बदल दिए both व्याकरण and समीकरण of Indian Cinema . 
Since then , आज भी संवाद of some films are डब in स्टूडियो . 
पहली फ़िल्म of director Rajkumar Hirani ' Munna Bhai MBBs ' आई in 2003 . 
चुटीले मुंबइया संवाद and the hidden messages of इस फ़िल्म made लोगों laugh a lot and compelled them to watch इस फ़िल्म again and again . 
The movie ' Khosla ka Ghosla ' built under निर्देशन of दीवाकर बनर्जी was प्रदर्शित in 2006 . 
इस फ़िल्म made with कम बजट falsified इस भ्रांति that the audience likes to watch only star cast movies . 
कहानी of फ़िल्म was new and इसे was made in an entertaining way with a put of comic-satire . 
लोग of मुंबई फ़िल्म उद्योग call such films as ' ड्राविन सिनेमा ' . 
सबसे ज्यादा ध्यान in these movies is laid on नए विषयवस्तु and theme . 
These movies have again changed इस तथ्य that हीरो of इन फ़िल्मों is स्क्रिप्ट , the popular faces . 
Then after in the series films like ' Tere Bin laden ' , Udan ' , phas gae re obama ' , vicky donor ' और Gangs of Waseypur ' were made and बनीं successful . 
Because of अपने and शरीर , दारा सिंह , , Dharmendra , Sanjay Datt , सनी देवल and सलमान खान from हिंदी फ़िल्म उद्योग has always रहे हैं popular among the viewers . 
शाहरुख खान , दोस्त and प्रतिद्वंदी of शाहरुख खान was अगला नाम in attracting his viewers by making six pack abs . 
Amir khan लिया यह अवतार for ऐक्शन फ़िल्म Gajni ' featuring in 2008 . 
यह थी फ़िल्म which कमाई more than 100 सौ करोड़ . 
अगले साल in 2009 , आमिर 's एक और फ़िल्म three idiots broke this record and earned more than 200 दो सौ करोड़ . 
एक विदेशी फ़िल्म slum-dog millionaire प्रदर्शित in 2008 excited पूरी दुनिया . 
इस फ़िल्म gave मौका to the kids living in the slums of मुंबई to act in films . 
इस फ़िल्म brought अवार्ड in अवार्ड in 2009 . 
With this a lot more things बदलने लगीं in the Indian Cinema . 
Now नायक are rarely seen themselves singing गीत on the stage . 
Now a days the supremacy of play back singing has increased more than the songs . 
Now the Hindi movies are shot less in the artificial sets and more outside मुंबई . 
The majority of ज्यादातर शूटिंग of the films such as Gangajal , Omkara , Swadesh and Dabang was done in गांव वाई नाम Wai situated at some distance to मुंबई near Mahabalehwar . 
आज movies are filmed in वास्तविक शहरों and villages . 
The costumes of the Indian movies have also नहीं रहे like the old ones . 
The popular costumes designers of देश now design costumes for the Bollywood movies . 
The costume designers for their movies खरीदते the costumes from abroad when they तो नहीं मिले the costumes of their choice in देश . 
असर of all these things are clearly visible in the increased expenditure on Indian Cinema . 
The two movies of शाहरुख खान ही are उदाहरण . 
फ़िल्म Devdas ' प्रदर्शित in 2002 था , बजट of 50 crores whereas his film Ra-one प्रदर्शित in 2011 था , बजट of 125 crores . 
आज movies कमाती हैं पैसे using new ways . 
Now काला धन लगभग in hindi movies has almost vanished . 
For कितने वर्षों आयकर विभाग in order to pay the personal tax has honored Bollywood stars . 
When there were so many changes how could the traditional movie theaters remain untouched from this breeze . 
Those were the good times when our movies used to run in the theaters for weeks , months and वर्षों . 
When the films sustained in the cinema halls for 25 weeks it था said to be फ़िल्म , 50 weeks meant गोल्डन जुबली and 75 weeks meant गोल्डन जुबली . 
Ashok kumar enacted ' ऐसी ही फ़िल्में हें ' Kismat ' , Ramesh sippi directed ' ऐसी ही फ़िल्में हें sholay ' and Aditya chopra directed ' ऐसी ही फ़िल्में हें dilwale dulhania le jaege ' are such movies . 
Then कारोबार of Hindi movies restricted to सिमटा 100 दिनों in the age of video piracy . 
Then ये घटकर to one week . 
आज तो if कोई फ़िल्म runs for तीन दिनों i.e. from शुक्रवार to रविवार , it is considered to be कोई फ़िल्म . 
Big and expensive stars started featuring their movies during holidays and festivals . 
सलमान खान has started ये खेल with फ़िल्म , , wanted ' which was released during त्योहार and was a big hit . 
Like सलमान खान , अजय अजय देवगन and सलमान खान started putting forth their movies before the viewers during दीवाली and Christmas respectively . 
In स्थिति we laugh , होते हैं depressed and can even cry . 
This is जादू of यह सिनेमा . 
Serious cinema completely binds the viewers . 
This is एक विशिष्ट पहचान of यह प्रभावी सिनेमा . 
जादू of सिनेमा is so effective that a lot कई बड़े -झौईण् बड़े निर्णय are लिए जाते हैं on आधार . 
एक ऐसा ही ऐतिहासिक निर्णय was लिया - by केंद्रीय माध्यमिक शिक्षा बोर्ड of Secondary Education . 
बोर्ड घोषणा to देने अतिरिक्त समय to the children with विशिष्ट आवश्यकता during examinations . 
Not only this , प्रावधान भी was also made to provide अतिरिक्त समय to read the question paper . 
महत्वपूर्ण भूमिका in इस निर्णय was of the movie ' Tare Zameen Par ' whose writer was Amol Gupte and the director-producer was ख़ान . 
Black ' , ' Iqbal ' , Stanley Ka Dibba ' , Three Idiots ' are few such offbeat movies which have spontaneously आकर्षित शिक्षा -झौईण् जगत towards them . 
Our classrooms also have such kids who suffer from किसी -झौईण् न-किसी तरह of problems . 
सरकार shall make विशेष प्रबंध for such children . 
In fact सरकार has made प्रबंध तो but they are not implemented . 
आप तो बताओ how can we impart education to such children ? 
Such children shall also मिलना चाहिए सहयोग भी of परिवार . 
Whenever there is बात about the deep relationship between eduaction and सिनेमा बीच then सवाल arises that what is बात that binds them together . 
After a lot of brainstorm it was लगा that the link between the two of them is समाज . 
Cinema evolves from समाज बीच and शिक्षा भी is also connected to all the disciplines of समाज बीच . 
उद्देश्य ही of शिक्षा is to live सार्थक जीवन . 
Actually Cinema illustrates the reality of सिनेमा समाज , shows the burning issues of सिनेमा समाज on silver screen and raises सवाल . 
Whether हो is ' No One Killed Jessica ' , Aarakshan ' , Rajneeti ' , Swadesh ' , Pipli Live ' or LOC - All of them expose किसी सच्चाई or another . 
सिनेमा exposes शिक्षा जगत and the realities associated with it . 
अवस्थी of film ' Tare Zameen Par ' is एक डिस्लेक्सिक बच्चा who faces problems only in reading and writing but is a creative and sensitive एक डिस्लेक्सिक बच्चा . 
वह ठीक can not read properly , faces difficulty in solving mathematics problems . 
But उसका enjoys painting . 
But his parents and शिक्षक are not aware of his specific difficulty . 
ईशान had to suffer the price of their ignorance . 
His parents sends him to एक बोर्डिंग स्कूल . 
Ishan was away from everybody at जिस उम्र when children require the love and देखभाल चाहिए थी of their parents . 
When बच्चे realizes that his parents तो विश्वास him , उसके develops महसूस of असुरक्षा . 
Enrolling the kids in अच्छे स्कूल , paying fees , and प्रबंध food , clothes and ट्यूशन does not end the responsibilities of the parents . 
The children require the quality time , faith , full affection and humanity of their families . 
शिक्षकों should समझना that प्रत्येक बच्चा in his own way is स्वामी of एक अद्वितीय व्यक्तित्व . 
कुछ दिन पहले ही before रिलीज of फिल्म , Jab tak hai jan ' , 80-year-old filmmaker Yash Chopra recognized as the ' King of Romance ' , निधन in मुंबई Lilavati hostipal on Sunday रविवार शाम at half past five . 
उन्हें was एक हफ्ता पहले to एक हफ्ता पहले एक हफ्ता पहले before on 14 अक्टूबर because of डेंगू from dengue . 
फिल्म इंडस्ट्री was स्तब्धता after hearing खबर of his death on Sunday रविवार शाम . 
His funeral ceremony will be performed on दोपहर at 3 ' o clock in दक्षिण मुंबई . 
On completion of 80 वर्ष of जन्मदिन on 27 सितंबर , उन्होंने gave लंबी बात on करियर and जीवन of शाहरुख खान . 
During the talk उन्होंने shared the significant moments of जीवन . 
At the same time उन्होंने also यह घोषणा that ' Jab tak hai jan ' will होगी अंतिम फिल्म . 
Majority of अधिकांश सदस्यों of film community have expressed their condolences through ट्विटर and other social networks . 
Yash Chopra started फिल्म निर्देशन with ' Dhool ka phool ' in 1959 . 
In शुरू वह निर्देशित movies for बड़े भाई B.R. Chopra 's बैनर . 
उन्होंने स्थापना Yash Raj films after separating from बड़े भाई in 1973 . 
Dag ' थी पहली फिल्म under बैनर . 
After जबरदस्त कामयाबी बाद of his son Aditya Chopra 's फिल्म Dilwale Dulhania le Jaege ' in 1995 उन्होंने paid ध्यान towards स्थापना of Yash Raj Studio . 
अंतिम फिल्म ' Jab Tak Hai Jaan ' will हो रही है रिलीज ' अगले महीने on 13th November on 13 नवंबर दीवाली . 
The splash of the combined organisation of Seher art and culture , विभाग , दिल्ली सरकार and सर्वे of India could be seen in the old fort पुराना किला परिसर last week . 
The introduction of अनन्य नत्य समारोह शुरू from 6th October शुरू with Bharatnatyam . 
इस समारोह of सरोजा वैद्यनाथन and विदुषी रानी कर्णा नायक पेश dance . 
There नत्यांगना विजयलक्ष्मी , and भरतनाट्यम नत्य युगल क्षितिज नांबियार and पार्वति मेनन पेश नृत्य . 
Apart from this नत्य रचना of Odishi guru Bichitranandan Swai was पेश . 
शिवशक्ति was पेश at पहले दिन of उत्सव . 
In रचना the five elements वायु and शक्ति & शक्ति evolved due to the merging of nature and human are presented . 
At तीसरे दिन of यानी on 8th October Mohiniattam dancer मोहिनीअट्टम नृत्यांगना विजयलक्ष्मी and साथी पेश नृत्य composition '' पर्याप्ती '' . 
Apart from आख्यान साथ of दुर्गा , दुर्गा पूजा परंपरा of the Durga Puja of बंगाल was presented . 
केन्द्र of आकर्षण at चौथे दिन of समारोह was Bichitranandan swai 's dance composition . 
His dance composition था एक नयापन and आकर्षण along with परंपरा साथ . 
मुख्य आकर्षण of the presentation was नृत्य ramte ramte yamuna kunjan vane ' on यमुना कुंजन of Jaidev . 
The entire Gujrat prospers with सुनसान at इन नौ दिनों दौरान and गरबे आबाद at रात during इन नौ दिनों दौरान . 
Garba now has a designer touch . 
Belle dance and गरबा is more popular इस साल . 
In order to सीखने गरबा for नौ दिन लोग हजारों खर्च thousands for months .

During इस दौरान Delhites can देखने almost all the forms from art world traditions to समकालीन कला तकरीबन .

It is शैली रही है of साहित्य and पत्रकारिता to celebrate पूजा . 
The Bangla mass media begins its preparations several months before . 
The authors are बुक in March-April to देने their compositions .

Actually एकमात्र मकसद of Bangla mass media is to उपलब्ध बेहतर सामग्री for पाठकों . 
These Puja special issues of बांग्ला take ध्यान तो of रुचि but they have also altered the interests of विशेषांक पाठकों . 
चालीस साल पहले back पूजा विशेषांकों only contained सिर्फ उपन्यास . 
What could हो सकता है a more big rejoice for the culturally aware लोगों of बंगाल that they are मिल जाता हैं a collection of पसंदीदा साहित्य at a very reasonable rate . 
That is why हर बांग्लाभाषी परिवार wishes to खरीदना more and more puja विशेषांक because for them यह is the matchless gift of पाठनीय सामग्री for साल भर . 
There has been परम्परा रही है of पूजा विशेषांकों in Bengal . 
The Shardiya issue in Bengal was started by Anand Bazar Patrika in 1928 . 
Now यह परंपरा has ले चुकी है रूप of a banyan tree . 
महाश्‍वेता देवी उपन्यास '' Hazar Chaurasi Ki Maa '' आया था into limelight after getting published in लघु पत्रिका '' ' प्रसाद ' . 
Later it आया in पुस्तक रूप of a book . 
This issue also gives आभास भी of the various genres of the present landscape of साहित्य . 
It also gives यह आभास भी as to what is दशा and दिशा of साहित्य . 
The awareness and बौद्धिकता of बांग्ला पाठकों is unequivocal . 
इन पाठकों ही only have रखा है पूजा विशेषांकों and the characteristic of Shardiya शारदीया साहित्य intact . 
पूजा विशेषांकों भी of बांग्ला have maintained their position and readership .

वह had decided to go to लंदन for पढ़ाई engineering .

उन्होंने शुरू looking at the relationships with the eye of एक इंजीनियर and framed a lot many love stories immersed in relationships . 
Such stories which आती रहीं one after another in the form of films before लोगों सामने . 
Chopra 's ' Dhool ka Phool ' , Dag ' , Diwar ' , Trishool ' , Silsila ' all the films were stories immersed in relationships . 
Yash Chopra again became active in दुनिया of निर्देशन at उम्र of 80 with नई फिल्म Jab Tak Hai Jaan ' .

एक दिन Yash Jee talked to B.R. Chopra about this desire . 
उन्होंने tried to convince him in the beginning , but later realized that उन्होंने will not take a back step from his contemplation . 
After this B.R. Chopra भेज दिया Yash Chopra to दूसरे निर्देशक पास . 
वह has been सहायक निर्देशक रहे of ' Ek Hi Rasta ' , Sadhna ' और Naya Daur ' . 
Whether हो is the efficacious writing of राष्ट्र कवि रवीन्द्र नाथ टैगोर or Mother Teresa-the icon of परोपकार and compassion . 
For us the lives of both of them is like प्रेरक of inspiration and ऊर्जा . 
With the help of colors the author has splashed ऊर्जावान जीवन onto कैनवस . 
यह प्रदर्शनी of the paintings by Keala 's artist Parmeshwar Ilanji is आयोजित in दिल्ली Azad Bhawan .

Lord Ram and रावण literally जीवन two different edges and स्तरों of चेतना . 
Both the edges are स्थित at their extremes . 
While राम is the ultimate predicament of चेतना , रावण is the extremely polluted विशुद्ध अवस्था . 
The festival of पर्व is basically the festival of victory of पवित्र चेतना over पवित्र चेतना between Lord Rama and रावण . 
Being a reasonable living being होने is कर्तव्य that we keep all the senses in our control so that सकारात्मक कार्य can होने done with them . 
उन्मुक्त them abandoned will turn ourselves into रावण , whose अंत is fixed . 
Lord Rama with संपूर्ण आचरण gives us सूत्र , with the help of which we can keep the senses under our control . 
पहला सूत्र is of patience , second is of दूसरा संघर्ष and the third is of तीसरा त्याग . 
The exile of Rama presents सुंदर समन्वय of the three , in which जीवन , , भावनाएं and कार्य are assimilated . 
अयोध्या the throne of Ayodhya , depicts his sacrifice and ascetic जीवन and his internal and external संघर्ष . 
रावण ठीक looks totally opposite to him that is why उसके dies .

__तेब्लिन्क्__1. कारदार gave सुरैया अवसर to गाने in Sharda . 
Music director Shyam sundar gave मोहम्मद रफी पहला अवसर to गाने in Gaav ki Gori . 
अनिल विस्वास लगा that Mukesh 's आवाज can तो wonders so made him sing in the first sight . 
लता मंगेशकर and आशा भोंसले भी थे also started गाने लगी थीं , but they only sang for Marathi films and in chorus . 
On कुल this था समय when the era of songs and गीत -झौईण् संगीत started which is still prevalent . 
गीत sung by these artists are still alive on the lips of लोगों . 
Away from this , इनसे था the time when people started talking about आजादी . 
गीत composed by कवि Pradeep '' Aaj Himalaya ki choti se fir hamne lalkara hai , door hato ae duniya walo hindustan hamara hai ' had then made a splash . 
लोगों पसंद films with different issues during this time .

Vijayadashmi , the festival of जीत of good over बुराई was celebrated with rejoice in विजयादशमी राजधानी . 
On the occasion राहुल भी along with PM and सोनिया साथ ही shot तीर . 
पहला रावण दहन in राजधानी was performed in Subhash Maidan near Lal Quila at 6 in शाम . 
राष्ट्रपति , , vice president , prime minister , cabinet minister Kapil Sibbal , तेजेंद्र खन्ना and शीला दीक्षित भी also participated in the ceremony . 
Before रावण दहन पहले all the dignitaries inaugurated the ceremony by putting tilak on the structures of Ram and राम -झौईण् लक्ष्मण . 
Then after first of all Meghnad , कुंभकर्ण and finally दशानन of पुतला was burnt with explosion . 
On the occasion the prime minister also released सफेद कबूतरों भी in the sky . 
तैयारियां of अंतरराष्ट्रीय फिल्म फेस्टिवल शुरू in गोवा in नवंबर has शुरू . 
उद्घाटन of इस 10 दिवसीय संयुक्त उपक्रम of Information and सूचना -झौईण् प्रसारण मंत्रालय and गोवा सरकार will होगा held on 20 नवंबर in गोवा . 
Apart from many films of दुनिया भर few selected films from भारत will be प्रस्तुत before the viewers in इस फेस्टिवल . 
उद्घाटन of भारतीय पैनोरमा will begin with Asamiya filmstar Jhanu Barua 's ' Bandhun ' . 
Apart from this , इस बार एक भोजपुरी फिल्म ' Deswa ' has also been शामिल in the films of Indian Panorma . 
Approximately 65 overseas films have been selected for Cinema of the World pocket . 
Apart from this दुनिया of कई नामी फिल्मकारों films of दुनिया will be आयोजित . 
The staging of Ramlilas in शुरू in राजधानी from आज will seem high tech to लोगों . 
Along with this the security arrangements of such big events has also हो गई है high tech . 
Now नाइटविजन fitted cctv cameras will keep a bird 's eye view on the little activities happening in रामलीला परिसरों . 
रामलीला आयोजक of राजधानी do not want to लेना any risk for सुरक्षा of the viewers . 
Because of this कुछ खर्च of the Ramlila committees has definitely increased a little . 
But यह खर्च is nothing before सुरक्षा सामने . 
युक्त would होंगे , युक्त with night vision so that no body takes फायदा of dark and ends in आतंकी गतिविधियों . 
Newly elected प्रेस सचिव of नव श्री धार्मिक लीला कमेटी said that in पूरे रामलीला पंडाल we have altogether installed more than six dozens cctv cameras . 
With नाइटविजन साथ the activities in the dark shall also होने रिकॉर्ड with these cameras . 
प्रेजेंटेशन of the cameras with स्थानीय पुलिस साथ has been done . 
The acting president of the Ramlila committee phase-1 , डॉ. महेंद्र नागपाल says that हो गया है is essential to install the cctv cameras . 
We have installed more than one and a half dozens cameras . 
Three day तीन दिवसीय अंतरराष्ट्रीय नृत्य समारोह was organized in सभागार . 
यह समारोह was आयोजित by परिषद of India . 
All the viewers were stunned to see the odisi dance performance of the dance Padmashri Dr. Liyana from इटली on पहले दिन of समारोह . 
सीमा माधवी भी from ईरान also भरतनाट्यम जादू of कला with Bharatnatyam . 
ततियाना नागारोवा from रूस enchanted all the viewers from her dance performance . 
On अंतिम दिन of समारोह अलिसा अफनासायेना and Margarita from Russia danced on नृत्य form . 
At अंत समूहबद्ध united in group and presented different forms of dances as सांस्कृतिक पहचान of the Indian culture . 
The viewers became so much touched with the performance that पूरा सभागार became musical with the clapping . 
Suresh Goel , the director of ICCR , honored and thanked all the performers and musicians by giving them bouquets . 
Dancer Asha Ponikiyavaska from आशा पोनिकियवस्का said that it था एक बेहद अच्छा अनुभव presenting Indian dance form after आईं to भारत . 
हेरिटैज प्रदर्शनी शुरुआत in मंडी हाऊस स्थित at दिल्ली . 
आपको will मिलेंगे to see the different forms of संस्कृति of कश्मीर in एक महीने इस प्रदर्शनी . 
यह प्रदर्शनी ' कशीर एंड कश्मीर ' नाम Kashir and खास कश्मीर ' is especially made by ध्यान खूबसूरती of खास कश्मीर in ध्यान . 
उन्होंने has प्रस्तुत आध्यात्म of प्रकृति and आध्यात्म with the help of pictures . 
The merging of soul with the supreme being has beautifully been put on कैनवस in the pictures . 
कश्मीर तो has always been विषय of चर्चा for its beauty . 
By looking at the pictures we get to पता a lot about the clothing and संस्कृति भी of the Kashmiris . 
The staging of नाटक Tughlaq ' based on जीवन of the most controversial emperor of Delhi sultanate emperor Muhammad bin tughlaq , will begin from रविवार at फिरोजशाह कोटला किले of Firozshah . 
The media persons appreciated the staging especially done for मीडिया on शनिवार . 
इस नाटक will होगा staged by 4 नवंबर . 
In spite of this there is n't कमी of ऐसे लोगों who are ready to खरीदना टिकट at any cost . 
उद्घाटन of इस नाटक by organized by साहित्य कला परिषद of literature and art will be done by शीला दीक्षित on रविवार . 
Similarly पिछले साल भी also ' अंधा युग ' नाटक Andha yug ' was staged in फिरोजशाह कोटला किले . 
इस नाटक was appreciated by नाट्य प्रेमियों . 
नाटक was directed by भानु भारती and portrayed by Girish Kanard . 
खास बात is this that इस नाटक for पहली बार is being मंचित in किले of उत्तराधिकारी फिरोजशाह the successor of Tughlaq . 
भानु भारती on प्रतिक्रिया of the viewers कहा that he is overwhelmed by प्रतिक्रिया . 
उन्होंने कहा that acting in आकाश नीचे at the middle of इस प्राचीन किले बीच will होगा एक खास अनुभव for हर कलाकार for lifetime . 
According to आयोजकों all the passess of नाटक सारे पास been sold एक दिन पहले ही before the staging .

इन दिनों वह was doing एक पंजाबी फिल्म power cut ' . 
वह was लॉन्च बेटे with इस फिल्म .

वह थे शहंशाह of व्यंग्यात्मक शैली . 
On शुक्रवार in his memory we ran a 10 seconds कार्यक्रम . 
We will telecast the best episodes of '' Thank You Jeejaji '' on रविवार .

वह थे कॉमेडियन . 
He did not have to put much effort to make others laugh . 
उन्होंने did शो in India . 
His sudden demise is shocking . 
कमी will always होगी missed . 
कैरियर of ग्लैमर आइकन turned heroines in बॉलीवुड is supposed to end after शादी बाद . 
The declined मांग of the actors after शादी बाद remains limited either to दुनिया of advertisements or reality shows . 
After giving हिट in 1993 with बाजीगर , काजोल after getting married had been आती रही हैं only in a couple of films such as फना or My name is khan . 
But has always been there in advertisements . 
For कुछ समय she could be seen on the screen as एंबेसेडर of Knorr soup , Olay creame , एल्पेनलिबे कैंडी and whirlpool . 
While Aishwarys Rai Bacchan is known as the figure of बच्चन लक्स साबुन and Loreal beauty products .

पूरा सीन enhances खूबसूरती of फिल्म because पूरा सीन is very close to आम आदमी नज़दीक . 
Every boys and girl start living in दुनिया during उम्र of शादी . 
रानी मुखर्जी भी is also living in fantasies . 
She wants पति who suits her . 
Now her parents बाप a boy for her . 
That boy starts loving रानी . 
Rani mukherjee is a B.A pass girl in रानी मुखर्जी फिल्म . 
फिल्म is not worth more than 1 1 स्टार . 
Whether there are ads or films , तैयारियां are always in peak keeping children in ध्यान . 
But whether जिस तरह of कंटेंट that is being shown for the kids in the movies is good for the the psychology of children ? 
If संवाद and the scenes plotted for the children in films like Ra-1 were n't such that could lead to mental deterioration . 
Arnab Chaudhay निर्देशक of the recently released एक्शन फिल्मों एनीमेशन फिल्म अर्जुन says that हुई is an era of action films . 
Very few family films are being made that is why we can not देखने child centric films . 
Children were intentionally made to play अहम किरदार when the family movies were made earlier . 
They played निर्णायक भूमिका in uniting एकजुट and परिवार . 
ऐसा is not like this that films are not being made on children or कोई काम ही is being done . 
Director Neela Madhab Panda 's फिल्म I am एम कलाम got कई सम्मान including राष्‍ट्रीय पुरस्कार . 
According to Neela Madhab Panda , ऑडियंस भी is also responsible behind the child centric films being not made . 
लोग do not go to the theaters to देखने ही films purely based on children . 
They do not find them entertaining . 
Many film makers are of राय तो that what can they तो when there are no audiences for such films ? 
Even if we make films nobody will come to देखने them . 
Trade analyst komal nahta says that quite many child films had आई थीं पिछले साल . 
They also got the appreciation of analysts and viewers . 
For चिल्लर पार्टी , , I am kalam and stanley ka dibba . 
Children and युवाओं form 30 to 40 percent share of कुल आबादी of देश . 
There is a lot of अपार for the films ध्यान them . 
इसके needs समग्र प्रयास . 
According to संतोष देसाई , we are not living in दशक that we are stipulating the movies of that era . 
Today children have पहुंच to all the mediums of communication including इंटरनेट . 
Will the children brush aside सूचनाओं through other mediums if we बात about family values , acculturation and संस्कृति in the films . 
Films are directly सीधा संबंध to बाजार . 
The movies will be made जिस तरह they will be instructed . 
Amol Gupte is listed among those who have समझा है दर्द of children and समर्पित खुद towards them . 
अमोल believes that even after इतना लंबा काम long for the children neither has उन्हें not नहीं मिला है the credit and nor इतना लंबा काम is appreciated . 
वे says that we consider the children to be monkeys and बंदर भावनाओं . 
That is why we consider their movies to नहीं जाते substandard and do not even पिक्चर पिक्चर with them . 
That is why लिहाजा film makers is beyond समझ . 
1946 to 1950 था the period when everybody talked about दिलीप कुमार , , राजकपूर and देव आनंद . 
लोग were crazy after their films . 
वजह थी obvious that भारत थी बदल गया था and so did the viewers . 
चार्ली चैप्लिन , , ग्रैगरी पैक and ब्रांडो were popular among पढ़े -झौईण् लिखे लोगों around दुनिया भर . 
Indian viewers देखा मर्लन ब्रांडो in दिलीप कुमार , , ग्रैगरी पैक in आनंद and चार्ली चैप्लिन in राज कपूर . 
All the three artists made अलग छवि before the viewers . 
युग of the three of them remained for लंबे समय . 
In these इन पांच वर्षों Dilip kumar , राजकपूर and देव आनंद gave 12 , 18 and 17 films consecutively . 
Apart from the three of them लोगों also पसंद the films of other stars . 
गीत were also heard a lot . 
One of the successful films of इस काल included Dharti k lal , with which साहनी came into films . 
जोहरा could be seen in the film for पहली बार . 
The immortal story of डॉक्टर कोटनीस थी अच्छी फिल्म of वी शांताराम . 
चेतन आनंद received अच्छी ख्याति with Nicha nagar , इस फिल्म increased भारत prestige in caan film festival . 
राजकपूर could be seen playing भूमिका of नारद in Valmiki . 
Neel kamal थी Madhubala 's पहली फिल्म as नील कमल राजकपूर साथ . 
Aag , राजकपूर पहली फिल्म as a director-producer आई during इसी काल . 
उनकी was started being paired with नरगिस साथ with इसी फिल्म . 
Viewers loved Dilip kumar 's Mela and Shaheed . 
देव आनंद Ziddi got अच्छी सफलता . 
Dilip kumar and राजकपूर for पहली बार आए together in Andaz . 
Under R. K banners Barsat was पहली हिट फिल्म . 
Kamal amrohi 's Mahal was considered to be the first haunted film in भारतीय सिनेमा इतिहास of Indian cinema . 
While लता मंगेशकर मिला , अवसर to गाने for the movie Apki Sewa , Asha bhosle sang for the film Chunariya . 
बहार came into Bollywood films with Bahar . 
पतंगा थी , ऐसी फिल्म that साबित that good films can also be made with कम बजट भी . 
इसमें थी श्याम and Nigar Sultana 's pair . 
लोगों also पसंद the officer pairing of देव आनंद and सुरैया . 
अगले दस दिनों from 18 नवंबर in the national school of drama will be very special for the children . 
Actually NSD 's sanskar theater group is going to organize its 11th child theater festival ' Jash e Bachpan '' . 
This theater festival is celebrated with बड़ी धूमधाम हर दूसरे साल , in this not only children but प्रेमी भी also show दिलचस्पी . 
इस बार भी also the selected child theater artists from nook and cranny of देश will बाल रंगकर्मी their talent . 
सबसे खास बात about the theater festival is that 163 बाल कलाकार coming here have the confidence of competing the big theater artists . 
The theater festival will comprise of two puppet shows , three hindi plays and other plays of the regional languages . 
The festival will be inaugurated by डॉ मोहन अगाशे on Monday रविवार शाम . 
A total of 17 plays of तमिल , and English अंग्रेजी भाषा shall be staged in the theater festival . 
Talking about the the plays of regional languages , NSD 's निदेशक डॉ अनुराधा कपूर कहा that क्षेत्रीय भाषाओं does not become a barrier in children 's plays . 
With great happiness they देखते and get मजा by the plays of हर भाषा . 
मुख्य फोकस of फेस्टिवल is प्रदर्शन by special children where three special children from the entire country are participating . 
राजेश खन्ना भी who was there with us in our last celebration is not with us . 
दारा सिंह भी who wished me on पिछले जन्मदिन ही has also passed away . 
According to दिलीप साहब he is also missing एक और दोस्त N.K.P Salve who थे an eminent दिग्गज नेता . 
उन्होंने लिखा that how can उन्होंने think of celebration after losing so many इतने सारे दोस्त इस साल . 
Jab tak hai jan '' has been according to the prestige of the painter of romance , Yash Chopra . 
Actually unadulterated commercial films have एक परिधि , and coming out of एक परिधि is supposed to होती है , dangerous . 
अंतर्निहित तत्व in कहानी of Jab tak hai jan is not new but there is newness in its expression . 
किरदारों have a new milieu but व्यवहार is not new . 
Samar Anand -LRB- आनंद ( शाहरुख ) -RRB- searching a good job in लंदन meets मीरा -LRB- Katrina -RRB- who is बेटी of एक उद्योगपति of भारतीय मूल . 
After few meetings she starts loving समर but the problem is this that she gets मंगनी to someone else . 
Very soon मीरा realizes that she can not live without समर बिना . 
Meanwhile एक ऐसी दुर्घटना occurs for which she has to हो जाना पड़ता है away with समर दूर . 
यह घटनाक्रम also proves to होती है a milestone in जीवन भी of समर . 
The new turning point of कहानी is this that another girl comes into जीवन . 
Akeera falls for अकीरा समर courage and starts loving him . 
Since कहानी has a series of events , that is why इसलिए became longer than expected . 
In spite of शाहरुख खान , , Kaitrina Kaif and अनुष्का शर्मा have very well played भूमिकाएं . 
Specially the acting of अनुष्का attracts ध्यान . 
A.R. Rahman 's संगीत could not नहीं जगा पाया , जादू that was being उम्मीद . 
Son of sardar is फिल्म in which it was tried to make it funny with old and boring couplets . 
Since the viewers seems to get attracted more by the comedy movies इन दिनों , Ajay Devgan सोची of playing the trick . 
Though वे could not make it successful but somehow made some profit . 
The biggest weakness of इस फिल्म made under निर्देशन of Ashwini Dheer is that लचर स्क्रिप्ट is very loose . 
Despite all this फिल्म has few entertaining scenes . 
फिल्म is centered with दुश्मनी of two families रंधावा and संधू . 
At the evasiveness of इसी दुश्मनी , attempts have been made to pour humor which था quite challenging . 
Jassi -LRB- जस्सी ( अजय देवगन ) -RRB- वारिस of रंधावा परिवार comes to पंजाब from लंदन to sell जमीन . 
During the journey उसकी meets Sukhmeet -LRB- ( सोनाक्षी सिन्हा ) -RRB- the daughter of संधू परिवार which very soon turns into प्यार . 
Here Jiya 's brother Billu -LRB- बिल्लू ( संजय दत्त ) -RRB- wants to kill and take the revenge from जस्सी and there two lovers want to होने one . 
In such a condition there are as ऐसी सिचुएशन of fight as many useless funny scenes . 
But the problem is this that in spite of सिचुएशन फिल्म has not been taken further in an appropriate way . 
The first film with the name Diwali आई थी in 1940 . 
देसाई थे निर्देशक of इस फिल्म made under Ranjit Studio . 
संगीत था given by खेमचंद्र प्रकाश and the actors were केसरी and दादा . 
इसी वर्ष एक और फिल्म थे made , Laxmi which also थे Diwali scenes . 
निर्माण of फिल्म खजांची by पिक्चर्स was done in 1941 under निर्देशन of Moti Gidwani . 
There was नया प्रयोग in संगीत . 
Punjabi folk music was रखा गया था in फिल्म छोड़कर पुरानी शैली , of singing , gazal , thumri and kaowali . 
The directors also portrayed दीवाली भी in the films in their own desirable styles . 
1956 in 1956 made the film Diwali Ki Raat with Talat Mahmood as the actor . 
आयोजकों of the 43rd Indian International Film Festival held in पणजी इन दिनों have decided to समर्पित it to सौ साल of हिंदी सिनेमा . 
The entry of हिंदी सिनेमा into सौवें साल is declared to होने historical by everybody . 
This is a golden moment . 
20 फीचर and 19 non feature films are chosen for समारोह इस बार . 
यह काम is done by the selection committee lead by Buddhadev Dasgupta . 
From a total of फीचर and 147 non feature films उन्होंने has selected फीचर and 19 non feature films . 
Such large number of entries are enthusiastic for us . 
Along side on अवसर of the completion of सौ साल of भारतीय सिनेमा , विकास यात्रा of the compilation of the major films is also पेश . 
उनमें includes ' ' राजा हरिश्चंद्र ' , , ' आवारा ' , , Pyasa ' , Pakeezah ' , Garam Hawa ' , Sholay ' , Lagan ' , and recently released हालिया प्रदर्शित फिल्म Barfi ' . 
At the same time the 162 films of 72 देशों of the world shall also be screened . 
According to information and उदय वर्मा , , भारतीय मीडिया and एंटरटेनमेंट इंडस्ट्री is growing with दर of 12 percent . 
It has हो चुकी है worth 728 billion rupees . 
With respect to entertainment , revenue and employment - it is essential to provide a nursing and direction for सिनेमा उद्योग . 
400 crore rupees has been वितरित by सरकार ओर for आर्काइविंग of the films . 
लाइफटाइम अचीवमेंट अवार्ड विजेता of क्रिस्टॉफ जॉनुसी appreciated भारतीय सिनेमा . 
उन्होंने कहा , उन्होंने adores the seasoned Bollywood movies . 
Although here , there is collision between the commercial and traditional cinemas . 
यह should not happen . 
There is जरूरत to make संतुलन between the two . 
सेंसरशिप is प्रॉब्लम . 
According to Oscar award winner Rachel Pokutti , हिंदी सिनेमा is on the right track . 
There is जगह for निर्माताओं of all kinds of status in the current situation . 
कमर्शियल सिनेमा is moving with a fast pace , but still it has not broken the record of ' Sholay ' . 
दिबाकर बनर्जी कहा , that in terms of technical progress cinema is ahead of सिनेमा पारंपरिक हद . 
Instead of wasting अनावश्यक समय in निर्माण feature films , जुट चुके हैं are busy निर्माण small films . 
सुधीर मिश्रा is drawing ध्यान towards selective challenges . 
वह says that we जरूरत to adopt विदेशी मॉडल . 
Whatever जो पैसा is incurred in the films there , the funding of most of them is done through organisations . 
They मिलता है लाभ of तमाम तरह of help and रियायत from सरकार . 
ऐसा is not there in भारत . 
The expenditure incurred for most of the films made here comes directly from the director . 
In such a situation यह has become जागीर of only the rich . 
सरकार is आ रही है at इस एकाधिकार to break इस एकाधिकार . 
There is stringent सख्त जरूरत to flourish institutions like NFDC and to create new institutions like that . 
There is a lot of काफी काम done at स्तर भी of कंटेंट also . 
Cinema is turning towards villages . 
People have started liking songs based on folk music . 
This is बहुत बड़ी बात . 
There is धूम for the films आधारित on एशियाई अध्यात्म in गोवा फिल्म समारोह इस बार . 
Films like The Buddha , Lights of ' मिस्टिक ईरान : : the unseen world , the Burmese harp , the great pilgrim can be seen in the series . 
इस फेहरिस्त also contains Confucius , मशहूर फिल्म of चीन whose निर्देशक is Hu Mai . 
According to अधिकारियों , of आयोजन समिति , भारतीय अध्यात्म and दर्शन has always been giving एक नई दिशा to the entire world with reference to humanity . 
That is why we have शुरू यह सेक्शन इस बार . 
Such films should be promoted . 
अधिकारियों said that फेहरिस्त of the popular film makers in the world class cinema is quite long इस बार . 
In मास्टर क्लास श्रेणी category films of celebrities such as David womark , Adur Gopalkrishnan , श्याम बेनेगल , , Rachael Pokutty and नितिन देसाई are being screened . 
Yann Martel 's novel ' Life of ' लाइफ ऑफ पाई is quite lot read in the country and outside . 
World famous film maker Ang lee has दिया है रूप of फिल्म to इसी उपन्यास . 
With उपयोग of 3डी तकनीक उन्होंने has दे दी है reality to कल्पना of Martel . 
यह फिल्म is कहानी of पाई . 
पाई has left for कनाडा with परिवार साथ through the Sea route . 
Their ship sinks in the horrific cyclone on रास्ते . 
Having himself saved in the security boat , Pi has खो चुका पाई his parents and भाई with the sunk ship . 
Some animals have also आ गए हैं along on the boat . 
Finally the story of the consensus and survival made between the left Pi and बाघ बीच is exciting and pleasing . 
( इरफान खान ) narrates कहानी of किशोर पाई ( सूरज शर्मा ) . 
जीवन changes after the arrival of पार्कर -LRB- Royal Bengal tiger -RRB- . 
Keeping aside the disturbances in मन of पाई , Ang lee has concentrated कहानी on समुद्र यात्रा . 
वह considers दिनों spent with रिचर्ड पार्कर साथ after the sinking of ship in महासागर to be the major story of the film . 
Cameraman Claudio Miranda 's कार्य is remarkable . 
यह फिल्म should be watched for प्रभावी उपयोग of 3D . 
काम on कंप्यूटर ग्राफिक has been done in स्टूडियो ही of जेम्स कैमरून only . 
The ability of ग्राफिक टीम is evident through the showcasing of the gesture and शेर of the animals and particularly the tiger . 
Ang lee has maintained an element of humor along with life 's जीवन संघर्ष साथ in इस कहानी of अकेले व्यक्ति courage and survival . 
उन्होंने has very well framed डर and दोस्ती of रिचर्ड पार्कर and पाई with मदद of लेखक . 
Irfan arouses interest in the role of इरफान युवा पाई . 
काम भी of शर्मा in the role of young pi is also remarkable . 
उन्होंने बीच has very well expressed his strong desires in the middle of the Ocean . 
There is a lot of copying in बॉलीवुड . 
We have already seen the contesting of heroines in dress up , style , किरदार , on the screen , item songs etc. . 
Now it seems that apart from the reel life the heroines are also हीरोइनें each other in real life . 
देखिए at Vidya Balan . 
Recently कपूर got married . 
Now होकर seems that विद्या बालन भी is also getting married प्रेरित by करीना ही , and that too in private being away from the media . 
Like करीना , विद्या भी भावी पति is also a divorcee . 
विद्या भी is also at चरम of कैरियर . 
करीना भी also got married at the peak of कैरियर . 
उनकी is heard that शादी is supposed to होनी held on 14th December and होनी is being आयोजित in a very simple बहुत ही साधारण ढंग . 
Although everybody knows that the marriage ceremony will होना performed with तमिल परंपरा in मंदिर and रिसेप्शन will होना held in मुंबई . 
Secondly since 2010 she is being aligned with Siddharth Roy , the head of UTV . 
In such a situation विद्या getting married to सिद्धार्थ is बड़ी खबर तो . 
एक कारण behind this is that if विद्या भावी पति , the 38 year old रॉय कपूर , is the head of the big production house like UTV , विद्या is also no less than him . 
कैरियर कैरियर in Hindi films from 2005 विद्या has made कई प्रतिमान during this time . 
विद्या role in पिक्चर बन गया है one of the best works . 
While her role as गांव widow in the film Ishqiya gave हिम्मत to other heroines to come out of the shell of being glamorous and fashionable . 
By doing रोल such as विद्या has साबित that for doing एक्शन and सस्पेंस किरदार of the heroines does n't require Jeans Pant and men like dressing . 
Right after पदार्पण of विद्या in films she was victimized for ड्रेस सेंस and obesity . 
Because of इस आलोचना , विद्या became disturbed for sometime but she made Sari , the cloth that always suits her , her fashion statement . 
Now like her हर हीरोइन wants to be seen in sari . 
When विद्या wore डिजाइनर सब्यसाची got एक और पहचान . 
सब्यसाची is फेवरिट डिजाइनर . 
In order to रहने in films विद्या did not reduce her obesity rather kept ग्लैमरस किरदार alive despite her obesity . 
उसके पीछे -झौईण् पीछे has been यह परंपरा in बॉलीवुड that if कोई सदस्य of परिवार becomes successful in films , the rest of कोई सदस्य also try भाग्य after them . 
If कोई अदाकारा becomes successful , बहन भी also tries to reach that position . 
Now for example Katrina Kaif 's इसाबेल is the subject of चर्चा इन दिनों . 
But परंपरा of बॉलीवुड for फिल्मी कैरियर of star sisters seems to be a fluctuating one . 
If we see फिल्मी इतिहास , starting from काजोल to कैटरिना it is rarely देखा जाए , in बॉलीवुड that both the sisters तो become successful . 
फिल्मी कैरियर of शिल्पा शेट्टी had begun with सफल फिल्म बाजीगर in 1993 . 
After that she reached her destination in बॉलीवुड with successful films like aag , mai khiladi tu anadi , dhadkan , hathiyar , rishtay , fir milege , das and metro . 
शमिता started कैरियर with the film Mohabbatein . 
After that flop films like bewafa and zeher left पीछे . 
ट्विंकल खन्ना ट्विंकल खन्ना also has a similar situation . 
कैरियर started with the film pyar me kavi kavi in 1999 . 
After that she रह गईं restricted to सपोर्टिंग रोल in the films and later became away from एक्टिंग दूर . 
करिश्मा and कपूर is remarkable among the sister duos . 
राष्ट्रीय फिल्म पुरस्कार विजेता करिश्मा शुरू फिल्मी कैरियर with प्रेम कैदी and gave super hits like राजा हिंदुस्तानी to the viewers . 
Apart from this , she has also been honored for best बेस्ट सपोर्टिंग रोल भी role in the film Dil to Pagal Hai . 
Thus करिश्मा became the favorite of audiences , at समय करीना भी was also enlisted among the top heroines of समय . 
करीना can be said to be अपवाद in this regard . 
Although she has not got कोई भी नेशनल अवॉर्ड like बड़ी बहन , but करिश्मा has got कोई भी नेशनल अवॉर्ड as a supporting actress . 
Hopefully इसाबेल will लेंगी सबक from all these younger sisters and wo n't repeat the same mistakes which these sisters committed . 
She has the benefit that कैटरिना by this time has made अच्छी छवि and दमदार दोस्त . 
There is खास with इस दुनिया that संख्या of users for ऑनलाइन टैलेंट हंट वेबसाइट , तुमभी has पहुंच चुकी है lakhs . 
On another similar website lafango.com approximately 10 करीब 10 लाख लोग across दुनिया भर ओरिजिनल new and original songs . 
The stars of सारेगामापा are also present on इस साइट and सदस्य भी of musical mughal मुगल एआर रहमान टीम also आते हैं here for searching टैलेंट . 
Talentube.com is also similar to this . 
Thousands of हजारों युवा from the nook and corners of देश have पेश टैलेंट here in very few months . 
देविंदर सिंह , a person of भारतीय मूल who lives in अमेरिका फैसला to make एक टैलेंट हंट वेबसाइट with the name talenthrobb.com सात साल पहले back . 
चार साल पहले back इसका was renamed as lafango . 
वह says that it था really bad looking at युवाओं रोना and their dreams being shattered despite working hard day and दिन -झौईण् रात . 
The talented youth of the villages were इंतजार ही for their turn . 
That is why मैंने made such a platform where युवाओं does n't have to struggle for पहुंचने their destination . 
इंडस्ट्री भी should also मिल सकें new age Khayyam sahab for लेखन , A. R Rahman sahab for संगीत and सलमान खान for एक्टिंग . 
साइट of साइट also मिलता रहता है मौका to स्टेज . 
शर्मिष्ठा , who was just महज एक कंटेस्टेंट कुछ साल पहले back now takes care of काम . 
शर्मिष्ठा has also got कॉन्ट्रैक्ट भी of two albums , one of which will be रिलीज भी in एक इंटरनेशनल फिल्म फेस्टिवल . 
Apart from this , युवाओं भी like Saurav Ghosh , देबलीन मुखर्जी , , आजम खान and देबलीन मुखर्जी , also got the appreciation from शंकर महादेवन and Sonu Nigam . 
शर्मिष्ठा said that some friends of एआर रहमान also आते हैं for searching talents through साइट . 
In order to make साइट democratic , importance is दी गई है to वोटिंग and the judges . 
देविंदर says that विजेता will be चुनाव on आधार of 75 फीसदी वोटिंग and 25 percent of the points given by the judges . 
युवाओं of top quality are selected by पब्लिक वोटिंग through International ranking system and the winners are announced at last taking राय of the judges . 
तुमभी was initiated by फिल्म निर्माता of एलसी सिंह . 
Tum bhi took आकार लिया because of the requirement of being associated with the artists and the pain of making जुनूनी दुनिया of कला . 
The head of operations of हेड ऑफ ऑपरेशंस रॉबिन रस्तोगी says that the silver screen of ऐसे युवाओं is stage and ramp , which the T.V does n't provide . 
There is neither discrimination nor deceit . 
Everybody has been मिलता रहा है मौका . 
Here one gets दोस्त , गाइड and also the wonderful opportunities to make oneself fortunate . 
तुमभी of tumv has lead so many कई युवाओं towards their destination . 
दिवाली of ' सन ऑफ सरदार ' and Jab tak hai Jan रिलीज on Diwali has दे दी है राहत to हिंदी फिल्म इंडस्ट्री . 
Both have increased the extent of box office 's profit . 
While Son of ' सन ऑफ सरदार ' on दिन did कारोबार of 12.5 crore rupees , jab tak hai jan earned 17.5 crore rupees . 
Before इंडस्ट्री was of मान that with रिलीज of two films on एक दिन , there will definitely होने नुकसान to one of the films . 
अभी date रिकार्ड of the single day earning of सलमान खान Ek tha tiger is 32 crores . 
कलेक्शन of both the movies on बुधवार should reach beyond 40 crores . 
Certainly पुराना रिकॉर्ड will be broken . 
व्यापार will be a bit loose on शुक्रवार but will again rise up on रविवार . 
But कलेक्शन will start गिरना from Monday . 
The Industry still believes that the certainty of पहुंचना Jab tak hai jaan in the club of 100 करोड़ is more than Son of ' सन ऑफ सरदार ' . 
दीवाली is actually त्योहार of people with great heart . 
Along with Hindus it is considered to be शुभ दिन for other religions too . 
That is why our reel life stars also do n't नहीं छोड़ते मौका to get immersed in the colors of इस त्योहार . 
जोरदार पार्टी is thrown at Shahrukh 's residence ' Mannat ' . 
शाहरुख says that दीवाली this year is different in many ways . 
गम of यश जी demise is irreparable and his sayings and the moments spent with him will ever be reminiscent . 
For me Diwali is त्योहार of उजाला that fills the heart with the light of खुशियों . 
People have been महफिल for playing cards every year at jumping jack Jitendra 's residence . 
इस बार भी also कुछ ऐसी ही सूरतेहाल will be organised there . 
Jitendra 's बेटे and तुषार कपूर says that पापा always had बहुत क्रेज about इस त्योहार . 
Every year वे calls दोस्तों at our residence . 
Me and एकता play भूमिका of hosts . 
मुझे do not know how to खेलना cards . 
That is why मैं do not शिरकत in this .

मिमोह says that इस दिन उत्साह of पापा is worth देखते . 
According to शिल्पा शेट्टी , the most memorable सबसे यादगार दीवाली for her is that when her Parents and शमिता साथ celebrate होती है , together . 
We enjoy a lot while bursting crackers . 
According to me सेलिब्रेट फैमिली साथ with सेलिब्रेट is the best . 
अनुष्का शर्मा says that इस बार I will be busy promoting my film Matru ki bijli ka mandola . 
Therefore I cant say whether I will be able to celebrate दीवाली or not . 
बंगाली ब्यूटी बिपाशा बसु says that we worship goddess Laxmi इस दिन . 
मुझे do n't like bursting crackers . 
Neither do I like cards and gambling . 
Otherwise मैं खाती हूं , मिठाई but यह is more during दीवाली .

It is आधारित on कहानी of यह ख्यातिप्राप्त शहरी पुलिस अधिकारी . 
There is the story of एक फिल्मकार murder mystery . 
The release date of फिल्म has shifted so many times . 
The reason behind this थी quality . 
Rima Tagti wanted to do the editing of रीमा कागती फिल्म in a good manner . 
That is why in spite of being made so early फिल्म is रिलीज अगले महीने . 
आमिर further says that रानी मुखर्जी , , करीना कपूर , and Nawazuddin are there with him in फिल्म . 
All of three of them will be seen in a new incarnation . 
मैं am playing भूमिका of police officer S.S. Shekhawat .

वह is खुद जूझ रहा है with his past . 
यह फिल्म is n't यह फिल्म . 
मुंबई can be seen at पृष्ठभूमि of फिल्म . 
The viewers will मिलेंगी the chance to देखने the old buildings after long .

सभी किरदार are cast wonderfully .

वह says that वह बहुत पसंद कहानी of the film as a viewer . 
Parineeti 's confidence has increased after being appreciated for acting in ' Ladies versus ricky behl ' and ' Ishaqzade ' . 
Now like her cousin sister Priyanka Chopra she is also going to try her luck in singing . 
Like प्रियंका 's ' single ' , Pareneeti will also एलबम रिलीज म्यूजिकल very soon . 
On her inclination towards singing , she says that she belongs to परिवार which has अगाध प्रेम for गीत -झौईण् संगीत . 
Taking forward इस परंपरा मैं आगे am also मोड़ने वाली हूं myself towards singing . 
मैं used to participate in stage shows during दिनों . 
She does n't find जोखिम of getting her acting प्रभावित if she turns towards singing . 
Parineeti also does n't hide anything about the controversies . 
She says , we laugh when मेरा am aligned with जैकी भगनानी and Uday Chopra . 
Now मुझे am used to such gossips . 
मैंने have focused totally on करियर without being प्रभावित by such talks . 
According to sources she has also been signed in Pareneeti 's mentor Manish sharma 's अगली फिल्म भी under the Yash Raj banners . 
ऑफर has also offered her एक फिल्म . 
Official announcement regarding this is awaited . 
Imran Hashmi 's previous films have the business of more than औसत . 
इमरान is very happy with this . 
इमरान says that he play the role of एक क्राइम रिपोर्टर in the film ' rush ' . 
रिपोर्टर नामक सैम is a very nice person and he is समर्पित towards काम . 
Everyday there are new series of affairs and नए किरदार आते हैं everyday . 
वह was enjoying करियर and suddenly after एक घटना बाद जीवन changes . 
मैंने तो played कई किरदार related to अपराध so now मैंने तो started liking them . 
Although , in personal life मुझे have never faced अपराध or under world . 
A lot many films of mine will be appearing . 
Some of them are also sequels . 
मैंने have also worked in many sequel films earlier . 
मुझे feel it does n't इस बात if कहानी is new or its सीक्वल , . 
Some of the film makers evolved from सिनेमा did a mistake and some of them are left behind . 
some of the few active film makers are Prakash Jha . 
After ' Apharan ' और Rajneeti ' वह has आए हैं ' with ' Chakravyuh ' . 
At the backdrop of the story there is Naxalite agitation . 
कुछ किरदार are created at पृष्ठभूमि . 
अर्जुन रामपाल , , Majoj Vajpai , Abhay Deol , Isha Gupta , अंजलि पाटिल and Om Puri have played उन किरदारों on screen . 
कुंजी to देखने and समझने Chakravyuh ' is Abhay Deol . 
आदिल खान sends him among the naxalites as his agent . 
Kabir helps him in शुरू but after living with the naxalites कबीर उनकी realizes that the authority has स्वार्थ . 
The tribals are really being exploited . 
Kabir turns the game and ' Chakravyuh ' becomes exciting after this . 
From a committed and dedicated फिल्मकार it is उम्मीद that वह will विकसित कोई नई शैली in the midst of underlying entertainment pressure of पॉपुलर सिनेमा . 
प्रकाश झा seems to discover इसी नई राह and शैली . 
उन्होंने has इस्तेमाल फार्मूले for तरह of films . 
मनोज बाजपेयी has again साबित that वह is one of the best and able actors among his contemporaries . 
अर्जुन रामपाल is ordinary . 
ईशा गुप्ता becomes careful after initial stumbling . 
पाटिल startles . 
She has इंटेनसिटी and expression . 
किरदार of जूही is made reliable by her . 
Prakash Jha 's Chakravyuh presents कठोर सच of ' चक्रव्यूह ' समकालीन समाज with reality . 
फैशन ट्रेंड of fashion in बॉलीवुड is changing . 
Now the costumes in बॉलीवुड are being designed by ध्यान आम आदमी and अंतरराष्ट्रीय ट्रेंड्स in ध्यान . 
According to मशहूर फैशन डिजाइनर लोग were not so aware of फैशन during earlier times . 
That is why हर परिधान of नए डिजाइन बन जाता था एक नया फैशन ट्रेंड on the big screen . 
आज there is मांग for such clothes with which आम आदमी can feel their association . 
Whether it was अनारकली सूट of 1960 film Mughal-e-azam or the salwar-tshirt style of 2007 film Jab we met . 
All of them have won दिलों of people . 
लुमियर भाइयों also performed शो in इंडियन सैलून of ग्रैंड कैफ़े in 1895 in पेरिस . 
अगले साल पहला शो was held in वाटसन होटल , मुंबई . 
पहली फ़िल्म of भारत थी Dhundiraj Govind Falke 's ' ' राजा हरिश्चंद्र ' which थी screened on 3rd May , 1913 for the first time . 
At उस समय nobody knew that एक दिन भारत will become देश in दुनिया in making films . 
कहानी of ' ' राजा हरिश्चंद्र ' ' is centuries old . 
It is because of the narrators that such innumerable stories are alive in समाज since thousands of years . 
कार्यक्रम of the stories of रामकथा and Mahabharata are still आयोजित . 
Between 1913 to 1921 around 75 films were made in देश and all of them were based on religious stories . 
But in इस देश of संस्कृतियों and traditions cinema could no longer रह सकता था the same . 
इसने very soon started searching new destinations ahead of mythical stories . 
During बंगाल था केंद्र of political & बदलाव and साहित्य & कला . 
सिनेमा भी could also not नहीं रह सका अछूता of अछूता of बदलाव . 
कंपनी तेजमाला of कोलकाता made ' Aghare Alo ' with Shishir Bhadudi who brought क्रांतिकारी बदलाव in the theaters . 
During इसी दौरान Maharashtra 's महाराष्ट्र फ़िल्म कंपनी made ' शिवाजी ' where जीवन if Shivaji and गौरवशाली इतिहास of the Maratha 's was shown . 
With the arrival of पहली भारतीय सवाक फ़िल्म of India ' Alam Ara ' on 14th March , 1931 , दौर of silent films came to an end . 
The film Alam Ara which थी a lot of भरमार थी full of melodious songs . 
सफलता of इस फ़िल्म moved भारतीय सिनेमा to a new crook . 
Alam Ara ' can also be कहा जा सकता है to be significant because after this films based on प्रेम and social values were started being made . 
There was increase in फ़िल्म निर्माण भी of regional languages with the commencement of voiced films . 
In the various states of the country films in हिंदी , , तमिल and तेलुगू भी also were started being made . 
A total of 27 films were made on these four languages in 1932 . 
In various parts of देश social reformers started raising their voices against the centuries old conservative forces इंसानियत . 
During the same time in 1935 came एक फ़िल्म - ' Achhoot Kanya ' . 
फ़िल्म थे produced by Himanshu Rai and मुख्य भूमिकाएं were played by अशोक कुमार and देविका रानी . 
फ़िल्म is also considered to be significant because यह did n't only चुनौती परंपरा ही of सिनेमा but also the social conservative forces . 
फ़िल्म is about कहानी of a untouchable girl and a Brahmin boy . 
another milestone in इस यात्रा of सिनेमा थी Hunterwali ' . 
1936 was the actress of इस फ़िल्म made in 1936 . 
The ' छवि of नाडिया बन गई so popular that she बन गई one of एक आइकॉन of her times . 
In 1940 महबूब खान made a triangle love story ' Anmol ghadi ' with suraiya , Noorjahan and Surendra . 
यह विषय became so popular that हुआ is still the favorite among निर्माताओं . 
Kismat was screened after the second world war in 1945 . 
उसे got the howling appreciation of the viewers and बन गई सबसे हिट फ़िल्म of उस समय . 
यह फ़िल्म made on बोल्ड विषय थी very much ahead of its times . 
Cinema had now become the most popular सबसे लोकप्रिय साधन of मनोरंजन . 
राजकपूर 's ' ' आवारा ' एक ' made in 1951 is a master piece . 
यह फ़िल्म presents निराशा and बदलावों that आई in भारतीय समाज after independence in an influential way . 
लोकप्रियता of राजकपूर had started reaching आसमान after ' ' आवारा ' बाद . 
कलात्मक प्रस्तुति has छोड़ी an unerasable mark on भारतीय सिनेमा . 
At उस समय Charlie Chaplin थी popular in पश्चिम whose dumb films प्रभावित everybody लांघ the boundaries of भाषा . 
Apart from a comedy the films also had सामाजिक संदेश भी . 
राजकपूर adopted इसी शैली in ढंग . 
After देखकर ' आवारा ' आम आदमी started seeing छवि in राजकपूर . 
इस फ़िल्म also gave him लोकप्रियता in overseas . 
During the midst of दशक बीच एक नया सिनेमा had started taking its shape in बंगाल . 
Its father थे Satyajit Ray who थे made ' Pather Panchali ' in 1955 . 
Pather Panchali ' is कहानी of strong wish of a poor and destitute girl 's plight . 
Pather Panchali ' was also appreciated in abroad and टाइम पत्रिका शामिल इसे in सूची of evergreen films . 
After ' Pather Pancholi ' , films like ' Aparajito ' , Apoor Sansar ' and ' Jalsa Ghar ' सत्यजित रे in the list of great film makers of ' अपूर संसार ' . 
The journey of 100 साल of भारतीय सिनेमा can not नहीं हो सकता complete without referring to ' Mother India ' . 
This थी पहली फ़िल्म being nominated for अवार्ड . 
Mother India ' put उस तस्वीर of villages on सेल्युलाइड whom प्रेमचंद had पेश in his compositions . 
During 1950 and 1960 many great and classic films were made . 
During the same time Mughal-e-azam reached the peak of लोकप्रियता . 
People came in large numbers to देखने the love story of सलीम and अनारकली . 
During the same time one more face appeared in हिंदी सिनेमा whose name था गुरुदत्त . 
गुरुदत्त शुरुआत with films like Baazi , Jaal and aar-paar . 
But ' Pyasa ' is considered to be his most memorable सबसे यादगार फ़िल्म . 
It थी कहानी of such an unemployed poet whose sentiments were not taken care of by समाज . 
श्याम बेनेगल took forward the realistic films which was initiated by सत्यजीत रे in बांग्ला . 
By making ' Ankur ' in 1973 उन्होंने साबित that films are not just घोल of केवल ग्लैमर and मनोरंजन . 
After that उन्होंने made many memorable films like ' Nishant ' , Mandi ' , Aarohan ' , Bhumika ' , and ' Manthan ' . 
हृषिकेश मुखर्जी and Gulzaar gave a new freshness to सिनेमा during दशक . 
During इसी समय ' Sholay ' was made . 
Sholay ' is कहानी of two men who set एक गांव from the atrocities of dacoits . 
Jane bhi do yaaro ' is a knock on सड़ी -झौईण् गली व्यवस्था of देश . 
मैं am ready to देने पैसे . 
Give me 8 paise . 
You मिलते हैं कबूतर at 8 paise . 
Then go and get तीन कबूतर for 4 paise . 
Do n't कहो 4 paise rather 4 bucks .

हमने have not नहीं दी कोई झूठी गवाही .

He has spent बारह साल in prison , He wo n't छोड़ेगा us very easily . 
Why did n't तुमने गवाही against him ?
