उनकी यह विशेषता his quality that on one hand where उनकी wrote कविता on ancient topics like ईश्वर भक्ति आदि etc. on the other उनकी also adopted new topics like समाज सुधार , , patriotism etc. . 
Therefore according to the topic कविता are aesthetic-based , social issues based and राष्ट्रप्रेम based . 
रुचि थी in Prem Shringar Rasa too . 
Bharatendu ji has given a beautiful description of both sides of श्रृंगार , the union and detachment . 
उन्होंने gave the description of many social issues in his poetry . 
उन्होंने made bitter satires of rampant abuse in समाज . 
उन्होंने did n't even leave the capitalists and the people who लेने भी bribes . 
Deep patriotism towards देश knocks in the poetry of हरिश्चन्द्र . 
The turbulence produced by तत्कालीन दशा भी of देश प्रकट in काव्य too . 
Bharatendu is also कवि who remains captivated on the picture of भारतेन्दु प्रकृति too . 
But due to being यथार्थवादी कवि , प्रकृति is not much present directly in कविता . 
In प्राकृतिक चित्रण प्रकृतिक चित्रण Bhartendu Jee did not नहीं मिली , अधिक सफलता , because वे थे , the artificer of the human-nature , in मानव -झौईण् प्रकृति his mind did not indulge completely . 
Hence , in the most of his natural illustrations there is अभाव of शक्ति to आकर्षित the human heart . 
When Bhartendu Jee was काव्य लेखन then Khadi Boli was being popular in काव्य लेखन . 
भाषा of काव्य of the Bhartendu Jee is primarily Brajbhasha . 
Leaving outdated words of the Brajbhasha उन्होंने adopted परिनिष्ठ रूप of it . 
In भाषा the famous words of उर्दू and अंग्रेजी also come here and there . 
In भाषा of the Bhartendu Jee , व्याकरण related to व्याकरण are also found to देखने . 
Idioms have been प्रयोग skillfully . 
भाषा of the Bhartendu jee is simple and pragmatic . 
That 's why in that there is a mixture of the sentiments and usage . 
In the poem of हरिश्चन्द्र there is समावेश of the all delicacy . 
श्रृंगार and Shaant genere is prominent . 
Bhartendu Jee has beautifully सुंदर वर्णन both aspects of श्रृंगार . 
In his poem idea of the comedy is also found . 
उन्होंने has adopted almost every popular verse in his poem . 
उन्होंने has दिया है स्थान not just of केवल हिन्दी ही but prosody of बंगला भाषा . 
साहित्य सेवा कार्य of the modern proponent of the Hindi literature Bhardendu is extraordinary . 
In साहित्य Bhartendu Jee has very important अत्यंत महत्त्वपूर्ण स्थान . 
भारतेन्दु थे स्वामी of the versatility . 
उनकी has remarkable contribution in सभी क्षेत्रों like poem , fiction , drama , novel , essay , etc. . 
Bhartendu Jee emerged with संदेश of नवजागरण in the Hindi literature . 
उन्होंने did महत्त्वपूर्ण कार्य in सर्वागीण विकास of हिन्दी . 
By assimilating the novelty and originality in भाषा and शैली उन्हें made them according to आधुनिक काल . . 
वे is considered as the father of आधुनिक हिंदी . 
सूत्रपात भी of the dramas of हिंदी was also done by him . 
Bhartendu Jee थे साहित्यिक नेता of समय . 
In सेवा of the mother tongue उन्होंने has contributed जीवन ही but whole property also . 
From his perspective , at उस समय हिन्दी was भाषा थी of the country 's uplifting . 
राष्ट्र of the national integrity was हिन्दी थी . 
From नाम of भारतेन्दु एक पूरा युग of पत्रकारिता is recognised . 
In इस युग , getting प्रेरणा and प्रोत्साहन from his energetic compositions , श्रृंखला of many blessed self addressee journalists-litterateur was तैयार . 
Bhartendu थे भारतेन्दु लेखक , , कवि , , पत्रकार , , editor , भारतेन्दु लेखक , , dramatist , व्यंगकार and skilled orator . 
युग facing with his this इस प्रतिभा रूबरू was called युग of संपूर्ण युग पत्रकारिता . 
In इस युग , नए प्रयोग , , नए लेखन and नई शैली मिला proper encouragement . 
Satirist hiding inside is vocalized very skillfully in the paper-magazines published-conducted by him . 
Publications like Harishchandra Chandrika , Kavivachan Sudha , Harishchandra Magazine , Stri Bala Bodhini देते हैं the knowledge of his thoughtful and progressive perspective . 
It would हो बात of the affection toward मातृभाषा or would हो स्नेह of the imported cloths . 
Before कई वर्ष from नेताओं पूर्व भारतेन्दु had blown the bugle . 
In his edited magazines in their motivation भारतेन्दु made उद्देश्य the progression of समाज , देखिए उदाहरण of his इस प्रगतिशील सोच that during उन दिनों for महिलाओं उनकी published the ' Stri Baal Bodhini ' संपादित पत्रिकाओं and महिलाओं who were studying English used to be gifted the sari from the side of संपादित पत्रिकाओं . 
यह पत्रिका had been प्रस्तुत as the form of सखी of महिलाओं during उन दिनों . 
वे wanted to make महिलाओं of भारत aware through हरिश्चन्द्र पत्रिका . 
In निबंध and dramas राष्ट्रप्रेम of भारतेन्दु seems छ्लकता out . 
देखिए यह विडंबना that भारतेन्दु irrigated form his blood the Kavi Vachan Sudha , when in 1885 भारतेन्दु निधन , then in that छ्पा was published and no homage was दी गई even . 
भारतेन्दु was cheated by his own but like an innocent child उन्होंने never loosens to विश्वास . 
If उन्हें would नहीं होगी कहा जाए अग्रदूत of हिन्दी नवजागरण then नहीं होगी will not नहीं होगी exaggerated . 
युगप्रवर्तक of the modern Hindi Bhartendu Babu Harishchandra , on the June month of the 1877 आयोजित by the Hindivardhani Society of the Kashi read लिखित व्याख्यान on विषय of the development of आधुनिक हिन्दी that was completely poetic . 
भाषा frames the human cultures and influences समझ . 
It is कहना of the Linguist that after learning एक भाषा होता है is good to सीखने बाद एक भाषा . 
But misfortune of देश भाषाओं is this that despite of getting दर्जा of अलग राज्य देश is still अछूता from the most fundamental इस अत्यावश्यक मूलभूत भाषाई अवधारणा of शिक्षा for विकास . 
युग of भारतेन्दु था the period of the fall of सांस्कृतिक परंपरा in this , language dialects were also being बदल रही थी from पाश्चात्यीकरण of शिक्षा समाज . 
In ऐसी ही स्थिति itself उन्होंने presented these thoughts regarding मातृभाषा . 
To establish भारतीय भाषाओं in जगह of अंग्रेजी was पक्ष था of the concern of भारतेन्दु . 
इसके talked about पराधीनता which is being established gradually at its core even in thought . 
भारतेन्दु प्रयोग the ' Nijbhasha ' -LRB- our language -RRB- ' निजभाषा ' शब्द in the broad perspective . 
Here आशय is not just भाषा . 
उनका has मतलब of it from the all the languages of देश . 
And in this with क्षेत्रीय भाषा साथ , क्षेत्रीय भाषा साथ संस्कृत भी should be also शामिल . 
This is also प्राचीन भाषा of भारत , in the legacy the glimpse of the Indian ancient life shadow is established . 
Sharatchandra Chatopadhyaya , in लिखे उपन्यासों has प्रस्तुत the story of समाज in the way in that from एक बौद्धिक चेतना an attempt is included to know the anomalies , चेष्टा of जानने of तत्कालीन बंगाल . 
इस सुप्रसिद्ध उपन्यासकार of the Bangala took जन्म on 15 सितम्बर , , year 1876 at स्थान नामक Devanandpur . 
उन्होंने cleared एट्रेंस at the age of अठारह साल . 
During इन्हीं दिनों उन्होंने wrote एक उपन्यास with नाम of Basa -LRB- ( घर ) -RRB- , but रचना was not प्रकाशित . 
गहरा प्रभाव of रवींद्रनाथ ठाकुर and बंकिमचंद्र चटोपाध्याय was over him . 
Sharatchandra थे the student of छात्र but due to आर्थिक तंगी वह could not study इस विषय . 
After coming back from बर्मा उन्होंने शुरू to लिखना his famous novel Shrikant . 
In बर्मा उनका came in संपर्क with एक व्यक्ति नामक बंगचंद्र though उनका था very intelligent but था alcoholic and undisciplined . 
From here itself बीज of the Charitraheen was sown , in that with वर्णन साथ of मेस जीवन there is कहानी of प्रेम with मेस of the mess . 
When once वह आए तो from बर्मा to कलकत्ता then छोड़ गए his some composition with one of his friends in कलकत्ता . 
Without telling Sharat serial publication of एक रचना बड़ी दीदी from those has been शुरू . 
Just after releasing of one two issue सनसनी फैल गई among लोगों and they started to कहने लगे that रवींद्रनाथ is writing by changing नाम . 
शरत got खबर after five and साढ़े पाँच साल बाद . 
Whatever was there he became famous , even though many problems have occurred in the publication of Charitraheen . 
संपादक of the Bharatvarsh poet Dwijendralal refused to publish इसे by कहकर इसे that इसे is against the morality . 
SharatChandra Chatopadhyaya has got वैसा ही श्रेष्ठ स्थान in साहित्य as रवीन्द्रनाथ टैगोर has got into the poetry of इस भाषा . 
On the Bengal revolutionary movement दावी उपन्यास was written . 
In इस उपन्यास there is वर्णन of the life story of the Subhash Chandra Bose . 
इसे had been जब्त by ब्रिटिश सरकार . 
शरत of शरत have been अनुवाद in the many Indian languages . 
उनके is कहा जाता है that his heroines are more powerful than his male characters . 
His creation touches the heart deeply . 
But in the Sharat literature , despite of having सारे तत्व , in कम प्रकाश पड़ता है falls over the social conflicts , शोषण आदि etc. . 
In the Palli Samaj , some picture of पल्ली समाज comes in कुछ कुछ सामने . 
In some stories like महेश आदि etc question of शोषण appears . 
On the basis of कुछ उपन्यासों Hindi pictures has been made कई बार . 
On the basis of उपन्यास Charitraheen ' in 1947 with इसी नाम itself फिल्म had been created . 
After that , निर्माण देवदास फिल्म has been made तीन बार . 
Beside that on the basis of Charitraheen in 1974 , परिणीता-1953 and in 2005 also , बड़ी दीदी -LRB- 1669 -RRB- and बड़ी दीदी , etc movies have been made also . 
प्रसिद्ध लेखक of विष्णु प्रभाकर has written जीवनी of शरतचन्द्र which is famous by नाम of the Awaara Masiha . 
यायावर is viewed as लेखक in हिन्दी and उन्हें is also कहा जाता है wanderer . 
इन्होंने has रचना विपुल साहित्य in that there is समावेश of उपन्यास and books of इतिहास , , समाज . 
राहुल सांकृत्यायन who is दी जाती है the honour of महापंडित were a prominent author of हिन्दी . 
वे थे एक प्रतिष्ठित बहुभाषाविद and in the early in बीसवीं सदी वे gave योगदान in क्षेत्र of वृतांत साहित्य and विश्व -झौईण् दर्शन लेखन . 
वह is called पितामह of the Hindi travelogue literature . 
His research on the Buddhism is considered युगान्तरकारी in शोध हिन्दी साहित्य , for that उनको had तिब्बत from श्रीलंका to श्रीलंका . 
Despite that , उन्होंने wrote यात्रा on travelling in the Middle-Asia and Tibet , which are very important in the literature perspective . 
शास्त्र is चर्चित पुस्तक . 
He asserted whole life with the creativity , quest , thinking and change . 
राजनीति नहीं था his work field but रुचि of राहुल नहीं था enamored towards आकृष्ट also . 
दुनियाँ of राहुल थी among the world 's great thinkers and intellectuals . 
मूलमंत्र ही of जीवन of राहुल सांकृत्यायन has been remaining wandering or mobility . 
Wandering for him था a practice but वरन धर्म . 
In आधुनिक हिन्दी साहित्य , राहुल सांकृत्यायन is known as लेखक , , लेखक , . 
इन्हें is considered as a prominent author of हिन्दी . 
राहुल सांकृत्यायन थे a Brahmin . 
इनका took जन्म on 9th April 1893 at Pandahaa पंदहा गाँव in आजमगढ़ जिले of उत्तर प्रदेश . 
नाम was Kedarnath Pande . 
Due to death of mother in बचपन ही his upbringing had been done by पाठक and grand mother . 
In 1898 for प्राथमिक शिक्षा he was भेजा गया to a seminary of गाँव ही itself . 
Rahul Jee was married in बचपन . 
यह विवाह was a transitional event in जीवन of राहुल जी . 
In प्रतिक्रिया of that Rahul Jee छोड़ दिया घर in किशोरावस्था ही itself . 
Running away from घर he became saint in a monastry . 
But due to his wanderer nature even he could not stay there . 
In the age of चौदह वर्ष he ये कलकत्ता to ये कलकत्ता . 
In मन गहरा असंतोष था there to earn ज्ञान . 
That 's why , from here to there he kept wandering सारे भारत . 
Excursion of the country-abroad and writing was प्रिय कार्य of लेखन राहुल . 
साहित्य of राहुल सांकृत्यायन is broad . 
राहुल सांकृत्यायन थे the product of उस दौर when under ब्रिटिश शासन अन्तर्गत भारतीय समाज , , संस्कृति , , अर्थव्यवस्था , and राजनीति were all going through उस दौर . 
That था दौर of the social reformers and काँग्रेस था in infancy then . 
In the year 1930 , after जाकर श्रीलंका वे became initiated from Buddhism and since then itself वे became ' ' राहुल ' ' from ' Ramodar Sadhu ' and due the Sankritya sept was called सांकृत्यायन . 
Looking at अद्भूत तर्कशक्ति and unique knowledge , pandits of the Kashi gave him the honor of महापंडित and thus उनकी became राहुल सांकृत्यायन from Kedarnath Pandey . 
Pandit of ज्ञाता राहुल composed the literature in the genres like संस्मरण and जीवनी आदि but most of the literature composed in अधिकांश साहित्य हिन्दी ही itself . 
Rahul was of the fact-finding and curious nature that 's why did गहन अध्ययन of the books of हर धर्म . 
He studied Sanskrit books during यात्रा दौरान of दक्षिण भारत , Pali-books during the stay in Tibet , Muslim religious book during the traveling of Lahore learning अरबी भाषा . 
To समझने राहुल as a litterateur it is must to read राजनीतिक साहित्य . 
Even after आकर्षण बाद भी towards the communist ideology राहुल did not नहीं रहे single-minded . 
1916 till 1916 , his Inclination became towards Buddhism . 
Getting teachings from the Buddhism , वे बने राहुल सांकृत्यायन . 
Due to fondness in the Buddhism he inclined to सीखने ओर Pali , Prakrit , Apbhransh etc. languages . 
रुसी क्रांति of the 1917 प्रभावित मन of जी . 
वे was Secretary-General of the All Indian Farmers Society . 
उन्होंने तिब्बत to तिब्बत चार बार and brought विपुल साहित्य from there . 
In 1932 Rahul Jee went for यात्रा of जी यूरोप . 
In 1935 , travelled to जापान , , Korea , Manchuriya . 
In 1937 , in Masco during traveling he fell in प्रेम with सचिव of the India-Tibet Department Lolo Yelena . 
And getting married there itself वे started to stay in रूस ही . 
Rahul Jee था बड़ा प्रेम to Himalaya . 
वे started to live in नैनीताल in 1950 , making home there . 
Here उनका got married to कमला सांकृत्यायन . 
After कुछ वर्षों बाद of this इसके started to live in Darjeeling -LRB- दार्जिलिंग ( पश्चिम बंगाल ) -RRB- , but later due to suffering from the diabetes वे was भेजा गया to रूस for इलाज . 
In 1963 , In रूस even after इलाज बाद भी of seven months स्वास्थ्य did not नहीं हुआ well . 
उनका died on 14th April 1963 in Darjeeling -LRB- दार्जिलिंग ( पश्चिम बंगाल ) -RRB- . 
Due to his death भारतीय साहित्य had irreparable loss . 
राहुल सांकृत्यायन थे an intellect . 
वे was living in गहरे असंतोष of ज्ञान , to पूरा गहरे असंतोष वे was always ready . 
उन्होंने gave हिन्दी साहित्य an enormous repertory . 
Talent of the Rahul Jee थे versatile and वे थे an extraordinary thinker . 
उन्होंने has done महत्त्वपूर्ण कार्य by edition religion , philosophy , folk literature , travelogue , history , politics , biography , dictionary and ancient books . 
In his compositions , समन्वय मिलता है to देखने of the belief towards antiquity , pride toward इतिहास and true vision towards वर्तमान . 
It थे , only यह केवल राहुल जी , who प्रयास to देने the integral perspective by आत्मसात the ancient and current Indian literature thoughts completely . 
उपन्यास and stories put completely new नए दृष्टिकोण in front of us . 
During यात्रा काल of तिब्बत and China journey उन्होंने reformed thousands of books and showed मार्ग for its edition and publication , these books are in the Patna Museum . 
महत्त्वपूर्ण लेखक in the travelogue has been जी रहे हैं . 
Kinnar Desh Ki Or , Kumanu , दार्जिलिंग परिचय and Yatra ke Panne are his such books . 
While reading this , we मिलती है जानकारी of these places of the country-abroad . 
राहुल सांकृत्यायन थे प्रतिपादक of दर्शन . 
उनका था his assumption that travelling being साधन to free मानव -झौईण् मन is also साधन of क्षितिज विस्तार भी of our own horizone . 
Imbibing his experiences of the traveling , राहुल also composed ' शास्त्र ' भी ' . 
वे थे a wanderer who थे in quest of सच्चे ज्ञान and whenever हो गया थे कोशिश to suppress सच वे turned rebellious . 
His whole life was filled with the internal contradictions . 
After reading the Vedant when उन्होंने gave व्याख्यान against परम्परा of the sacrifice in the temple then सनातनी पुरोहित over him with sticks . 
Despite of accepting Buddhism वह could not accept its ideology of rebirth . 
In the year 1974 as director of अखिल भारतीय साहित्य सम्मेलन उन्होंने मना to speak the early printed speech and the speech उन्होंने delivered , that था against नीतियों of the Communist Party over the अल्पसंख्य संस्कृति and the language issue . 
Hence , उन्हें has to होना पड़ा , वंचित from सदस्यता of नतीजन पार्टी , but even though his attitude did not change . 
During this time period apart from किसी बंदिश वे kept attached with the concerns of प्रगतिशील लेखन and contemporary issues . 
Meanwhile , उन्होंने emphesised to implement the Marxist ideology after measuring the concrete circumstances of भारतीय समाज . 
In पुस्तक Vaigyanik Bhautikvad ' एवं Darshan-Digdarshan ' he highlighted in इस सम्बन्ध . 
Eventually , during the year 1953-54 again , वे became सदस्य of कम्युनिस्ट पार्टी . 
During एक वर्ष , regarding the farmer-movement उन्हें was imprisoned for एक वर्ष then during this prison-stay of the Devali camp उन्हें रचना the book ' Darshan-Digdarshan ' . 
After आन्दोलन of 1942 coming out of prison , उन्हें was declared editor of the weekly magazine ' Hunkar ' which was प्रकाशित by शीर्ष नेता of स्वामी सहजानन्द सरस्वती . 
ब्रिटिश सरकार , while adopting नीति of Divide and Rule जारी an advertisement titled ' Fight with the thugs ' for four points in non Congress journals . 
राहुल थे स्वामी of सच्चे व्यक्तित्व and beside राजनीति in व्यक्तिगत जीवन with the fact of the affairs this harmony of सच्चे व्यक्तित्व always retained . 
राहुल abdicated his marriage and family गृहस्थ जीवन which was done at उम्र of ग्यारह वर्ष , some where inside him a revolution has emerged . 
जीवन of राहुल gives संदेश to लोगों of संसार to know संसार away from सीमा of the state of देश and motivates to लेने the ordination of the travelling oath . 
Rahul Sankrityaayan always remained wanderer . 
Since year 1923 his series of foreign visits शुरू , हुआ ended with जीवन साथ ही itself . 
In his these travelings encouraged by the motivation to collect the knowledge travelings of जापान and रूस are notable . 
वे Reached तिब्बत चार बार . 
He stayed there for लम्बे समय and reformed उस विरासत of भारत , which had हो चुकी थी unknown , rare and forgotten for us . 
राहुल came back from तिब्बत with pride and ample material from there , to that होना became mandatory to परिवर्तन in the many pre established values and conclusions related to इतिहास of हिन्दी भाषा and साहित्य . 
Simultaneously , नए क्षितिज of शोध and अध्ययन were open . 
Rahul went to तिब्बत गये as an author , tourist and historian . 
In respect of भारत his यह काम can not be assessed less than Hwensang . 
राहुल थे multilingual but उन्होंने wrote in मातृभाषा itself . 
वे थे हिमायती of राष्ट्रभाषा for a nation . 
Without language nation is dumb , it था his supposition . 
वे had never seen किसी प्रकार of राष्ट्रभाषा in विकास and विकास of राष्ट्रभाषा and regional languages . 
उनका था his supposition that विकास of हिन्दी as एक भाषा is possible on the foundation of these regional languages . 
वे used to assume हिन्दी as उदधृत from लोक संस्कृति and classical background of लोक संस्कृति . 
Rahul रहे प्रभावित for whole life from राहुल बौद्ध दर्शन and Mark , s communist ideas . 
Assimilated thought of both of the Buddhism and मार्क्सवाद था , with him , on which आधार उनके पास था , cherished the ' sweet dream ' of creation of नए भारत . 
श्री राहुल has made us viewed विरासत from his work and aroused the feeling of the pride among us . 
राहुल is लेखक of 22 वीं सदी . 
Due to his progressive thoughts , a person who fulfills स्वप्न एक सदी आगे ahead . 
Rahul how used to consider सारे संसार घर after छोड़ने घर in 1910 again पहुँचे to 1943 ही in राहुल सन् . 
Actually , in बचपन due to his wandering nature after मिली डाँट from पिताजी उन्होंने had decided that उन्होंने will कदम in घर in पचासवें वर्ष ही of उम्र . 
Although when वे पहुँचे तो to Pandaha then no one could recognised him but eventually एक वृद्ध व्यक्ति नामक Lohar recognised him and स्नेहासक्ति him in his arm कहकर Son of Kulvanti , kedar ' with affection and wet throat . 
परिचित आवाज of an old person at his birthplace made राहुल enraptured . 
Wandering natured राहुल सांकृत्यायन were ऐसी प्रतिभा in universal perspective , who थे , पकड़ थी over साहित्य , , इतिहास , , संस्कृति and all . 
Strange seer of कर्मयोगी and precursor of सामाजिक क्रान्ति , अग्रदूत राहुल has lived every part of the life . 
This is यही कारण that रचनाधर्मिता is not साहित्य , but that is animated through society , culture , science , religion , philosophy etc. and which attacks on कुठाराघात and becoming life-relative shows राह of संघर्ष and movement by unifying progressive powers . 
ऐसी मनीषी had to go through with अवस्था like amnesia in अंतिम दिनों of जीवन and for इलाज उन्हें had ले जाया गया to Masco . 
But who has bounded the wanderer , hence in 14 अप्रैल , वे आ गए to दिल्ली again from Masco and after the death at आयु of सत्तर वर्ष on 14th 14 अप्रैल , his journey from संन्यास in दार्जिलिंग to साम्यवाद was completed but दर्शन is still alive among us . 
राहुल सांकृत्यायन has participated in the Non-cooperation Movement against the British Government . 
In व्यक्तित्व of Rahul Jee there नहीं थी no conservation like abstinence . 
To थी विगत and infiltrate in it , to समझना the current challenges and to fight with the problems , to सँवारना -झौईण् यह राहुलीजी स्वप्न of भविष्य - this थी the lifestyle of Rahul Jee . 
Meaning of the past नहीं था , for him not just to नहीं था , इतिहास , but also , नहीं था , to समझना and नहीं था , इतिहास . 
उन्होंने उपयोग इतिहास in नये अर्थ . 
The view toward the history of Rahul Jee was antic . 
वे used to add in it the link of वर्तमान and भविष्य . 
For him इतिहास नहीं था just the description of the ' events ' . 
उसमें used to find आधार of the religious thought from it . 
उनके थी an enormous belief towards the enormous knowledge store . 
साहित्य might हो संबंधित to इतिहास or to संस्कृति , to अध्यात्म or to यथार्थ -झौईण् - वह used to examine सबको like a researcher . 
In प्रगतिशीलता there था आग्रह to देखने the international and national perspective , the imposed foreign culture था renounceable in his perspective . 
वे थे पुजारी of भाषा , , साहित्य . 
साहित्य might हो , of उर्दू or भोजपुरी . 
Beside मातृबोली राहुल has deep सभी मातृबोलियों from all the mother tongues of देश . 
भोजपुरी थी dear to him . 
Because it थी भाषा of his soil . 
वे used to suppose लोक -झौईण् नाट्य परंपरा as a carrier of लोक -झौईण् नाट्य परंपरा . 
Folk dramas or किसी भी जनआंदोलन play सशक्त भूमिका in any public movement , this was दृष्टि of Rahul Jee . 
That 's why उन्होंने रचना the Bhojapuri dramas . 
In this उन्होंने नाम himself ' Rahul Baba ' . 
In against of सामाजिक विषमता in these dramas and गीतों at many places , touching dictums has been said . 
वे brought these Bhojapuri dramas at the conceptual surface and voiced the sound of the social change in local-language . 
इतनी तीव्र पिपासा and loyalty towards निष्ठा gave such enlightenment to व्यक्तित्व of the Rahul Jee that मूल्यांकन is away from the capability of any critic . 
वह थे the supporter of the communal harmony . 
He थे ज्ञाता of many languages . 
वे just not used to नहीं देते थे , महत्त्व ही to हर भाषा and साहित्य , but even used to tell to adopt that . 
राहुल थे एक समझदार व्यक्ति and server of सामाजिक परंपरा . 
वाणी of राहुल was energetic . 
उनके पास थी कला to speak . 
His speech used to होता था flawless and had प्रभाव . 
In Patna , राहुल सांकृत्यायन साहित्य संस्थान has been स्थापना . 
Here , there is also एक संग्रहालय भी of the things related to him . 
प्रभाकर मावचे has written जीवनी of Rahul Jee and highlighted उस हिस्से of व्यक्तित्व from which लोग were not aware . 
यह पुस्तक had been प्रकाशित in 1978 for पहली बार . 
अनुवाद was also प्रकाशित in English , Russian , etc. many languages . 
The books of Rahul Jee have been translated in English , his creations have been popular also in Chinese , Russian etc. many foreign languages . 
In 1958 उन्हें has been honored by साहित्य अकादमी पुरस्कार and in साहित्य अकादमी पुरस्कार of भारत सरकार of India .

पं. बंकिमचन्द्र चट्टोपाध्याय made his entry into साहित्य . 
उनकी educated from Hugli college and Presidency college . 
उन्होंने 1857 in 1857 and received डिग्री in 1869 . 
बंकिमचन्द्र चट्टोपाध्याय , the composer of Vande Mataram is identified as लेखक and पत्रकार . 
प्रथम प्रकाशित रचना was Rajmohan 's wife . 
इसकी was रचना in अंग्रेजी . 
His first published Bangla creation ' Durgeshnandini ' was published in March ,1865 . 
यह is उपन्यास . 
उन्होंने also published 1872 ' in 1872 . 
Anandmath ' -LRB- 1882 -RRB- is राजनीतिक उपन्यास . 
The 1773 religious rebellion of उत्तर बंगाल has been वर्णन in इस उपन्यास . 
इस पुस्तक has the spirit of देशभक्ति . 
चटर्जी अंतिम उपन्यास of Chatterjee is ' Sitaram ' -LRB- 1886 -RRB- . 
इसमें shows the resistance of एक हिंदू शासक against the Mughal rule . 
उन्होंने also wrote कई निबंध भी based on religion , society and contemporary issues . 
उपन्यासों of बंकिमचन्द्र चट्टोपाध्याय was अनुवाद in all the languages in भारत . 
उनको ही only has यह गौरव in साहित्य . 
पाठक associate themselves with उपन्यासों . 
The emergence of सांस्कृतिक चेतना of देश in आधुनिक हिन्दी कविता took place during छायावादी काल whose subsequent अनन्तर विकास is seen in आधुनिक हिन्दी कविता . 
इसके is primarily based on nationalism . 
Maithilisharan Gupt is कवि of this genre . 
National poet Maithilisharan Gupt -LRB- 1885-1964 -RRB- is महत्त्वपूर्ण कवि of Hindustani . 
It is यह सबसे बड़ा योगदान of Gupt jee in इतिहास of हिन्दी कविता . 
साकेत is the supreme pinnacle of रचना . 
वह shall always होंगे immortal through his writings and shall होंगे स्रोत of प्रेरणा for the new poets in the coming centuries . 
काव्य सर्जना of Maithilisharan Gupt has सर्वकालिक महत्त्व . 
इसमें has the introduction of देश past , perspective of the present and future vision . 
He used to do कविता as Kanaklata . 
The school education could not be completed because of paying अधिक ध्यान towards sports . 
He studied संस्कृत साहित्य at घर ही itself . 
Munshi Ajmeri मुंशी अजमेरी जी guided him . 
He आरम्भ कविता in Braj language at the age of 12 . 
He आये into सम्पर्क भी with आचार्य महावीर प्रसाद द्विवेदी . 
कवितायें प्रारम्भ to होना प्रकाशित in मासिक सरस्वती in Hindi . 
First प्रकाशित poetry compilation was ' Rang me bhang and then ' Jaydrath Vadh ' got प्रकाशित . 
उन्होंने also translated ग्रन्थ ' Meghnath vadh ' and ' Brajangana ' . 
Bharat Bharati ' steeped with the spirit of nationalism was published in the year 1914 BC . 
लोकप्रियता फैल गई everywhere . 
He started लेखन the epic ' ' साकेत ' in 1916-17 BC . 
उर्मिला towards उर्मिला was cleared away through इस ग्रन्थ . 
Saket and other volumes like Panchwati etc. were completed in 1913 . 
Yashodhara ' was written in 1932 BC . 
Gandhi Jee gave him the title of ' National Poet ' . 
Under personal passive resistance he was sent to jail . 
उन्हें was honored with D.lit from Agra University . 
He was nominated as सदस्य of Rajya Sabha from 1952-1964 . 
भारत सरकार सम्मानित him with the ' Padma Vibhushan ' award . 
डॉ. राजेन्द्र प्रसाद gifted him ' अभिनन्दन ग्रन्थ ' Abhinandan ' in 1962 and was honored with D.lit by the Hindu University . 
The death of Anuj Siyaramsharan Gupt in 1963 BC gave an irreparable shock . 
He got a heart attack on 12th December , 1964 and हो गया was the set off of the shining star of साहित्य . 
He wrote two epics , 19 short narrative poetry , poetry songs , plays etc. at आयु of 78 वर्ष . 
काव्य reflects national consciousness , धार्मिक भावना and human elevation . 
The three sections of ' Bharat Bharati ' portray वर्तमान and भविष्य of देश . 
वे थे विशिष्‍ट कवि of the humanist , moral and cultural poetry stream . 
According to डॉ. नगेन्द्र वे थे , a national poet , a true national poet . 
Pratap Press was the central meeting point of the national poet Maithilisharan Gupt and the daring निर्भीक पत्रकार Ganeshankar Vidyarthi who circulated the newspaper नामक प्रताप from कानपुर . 
दोनों साहित्यकार were trying to bring आजादी for देश through the Pen power . 
Both the great men were sympathetic with great hearts . 
They थे generous heart . 
उनका also था familiar relationships with वात्स्यायन अज्ञेय भी . 
Agyeya कहा करते थे him अज्ञेय आदरवश with respect . 
He poured the feeling of patriotism in संपूर्ण देश in क्षेत्र of काव्य through his writings . 
Maithilisharan Gupt was जन्म to Seth Ramcharan das Jee Gupt on 3rd August 1886 in the jhansi block of Chirgaanv village . 
महात्मा गाँधी provided him गौरव of being called as a national poet . 
Looking at his services , भारत सरकार provided him सदस्यता of Rajya Sabha twice . 
Being जन्म in Bundelkhand , Gupt jee only प्रयोग बुंदेलखंडी भाषा ही while speaking . 
उनका passed away in चिरगाँव ही on 12th December , 1964 . 
उन्होंने prospered हिंदी with his literary customs . 
Maithilisharan Gupt 's जीवन was totally filled with the feeling of nationalism . 
This is so because all his compositions are steeped with national ideology . 
वे थे भक्त of भारतीय संस्कृति and इतिहास . 
But उनका never believed on superstitions and hollow आदर्शों . 
वे desired for the modern picture of भारतीय संस्कृति . 
काव्य of Maithilisharan Gupt is साहित्य of जीवन बोध of human life . 
At केन्द्र of his compositions Gupt jee considered संयुक्त परिवार to be the bast . 
परिवार of दशरथ in ' ' साकेत ' ' is उदाहरण of this . 
Alongside उन्होंने has expressed अगाध संवेदना towards neglected and victimized women . 
Gupt jee favors शोषण मुक्त समाज . 
उन्हें likes that Ram Rajya where एक राजा easily renounces all his luxuries for कल्याण of its subjects . 
उन्होंने made Hindustani so simple that इसमें had the assimilation of a sweet language like ब्रजभाषा . 
Apart from being कवि Maithilisharan Gupt थे also as dramatist . 
Chandrahas ' is नाटक that visually displays ' चन्द्रहास ' इतिहास . 
It transmits महत्व of destiny and Karma . 
Tilottama ' is पौराणिक नाटक . 
इसमें has uprooted the distinctions like high and low , touchable and untouchable and honored the values like सेवा and humanity . 
Their is stress on modernity in नाटक but not merely for the neo thing . 
The influence of righteous Gandhism values of freedom struggle is everywhere on Maithilisharan Gupt . 
लोक सेवा or लोक सेवा is also विषय of साकेत and Yashodhara . 
Those values are प्रस्तुत with a feel of Buddhism in इस नाटक . 
In the compositions of Gupt jee , पारिवारिकता and family life are आधार of human values . 
How should राजा होना चाहिए and what is धर्म ? 
In एक प्रकार Anagh ' is नाटक against अन्याय and resistance . 
वह had been मानते रहे हैं , the conscience of Gandhi jee as the values and मूल्य and आवाज is more in infinite . 
The endeavor of Vishambharnath towards राष्‍ट्रीय शिक्षा for तैयारी of agitation is the evidence of पहली भूमिका of गुप्‍त जी political resourcefulness . 
मूल प्रकृति of नाटक and the ease of भाषा have been taken ध्यान of while translating . 
The revolt against अत्याचार and अन्याय and the attempts of changing human behavior also have been विषय of his other compositions . 
Maithilisharan Gupt is कवि of the forte factor behind a woman 's जीवन and her honor . 
नारी is प्रेरित by the family values in his plays . 
Generally in all the plays the female characters not only identifies सत्य but also express themselves in an honest way . 
अमृता शेरगिल was जन्म in Budapest , राजधानी of हंगरी in 1913 . 
पिता उमराव सिंह थे भारतीय and her mother थे a Hungarian woman . 
नाम is शामिल amongst the leading artists of the modern revolution in the Indian arts . 
She became a mature painter at a very young बहुत कम उम्र ही , प्रतिभा was recognized and she मिला प्रोत्साहन for काम from her Indian uncle Erwin Bakhte . 
She got प्रशिक्षण in 1924 in पेरिस from सिमॉन and pear Vayam . 
She लिया आर्ट्स in दाखिला the bow arts of पेरिस at आयु of 16 . 
In 1934 अमृता शेरगिल was selected as an associate in grand cello for her work Conversation . 
She थीं , प्रथम एशियाई and महिला on इस पद but after being motivated that her काम as चित्रकार will होकर सम्पन्न in भारत , she आ गयीं back to भारत after leaving behind the beginning of opportunities and सफलता of पेरिस . 
She considered बंगाल शैली to be a regressive one and declared it to be responsible for the stagnancy which बन गया था the character of Indian Paintings . 
Amrita Shergil थीं skilled at प्रयोग colors . 
The colors she प्रयोग प्रयोग self willed and violent ; and against the then prevalent light colors . 
She traveled दक्षिण भारत in 1937 and यात्रा gave a format to her future works . 
Her works of इस काल include three pictures श्रृंखला of south India also are - Brahmachari , south Indian villagers going to market and bride 's toilet . 
During उस समय the Indian painting थी completely different from the prevalent realistic water color methods . 
Along with the shapes these pictures showed प्रयोगों and aligning the powerful influence of अजन्ता and Elora cave pictures प्रयोगों प्रयास . 
Amrita Shergill who has always been engaged in experimentation turned towards the small mughal paintings of सत्रहवीं शताब्दी here and she शामिल her Ajanta oil paintings विकसित in औपचारिक शैली in its fusion and colors . 
She निधन at आयु ही of मात्र अट्‍ठाईस साल in 1941 because of एक रहस्यपूर्ण बीमारी . 
अन्तिम last and incomplete work shows उपयोग of more dark colors than before and झुकाव towards the abstract . 
उपन्यासकार and story writer of मुंशी प्रेमचन्द was on 31st 31 जुलाई , , 1880 in लमही गाँव of Benaras . 
पिता नाम was Ajayab lala and his mother 's नाम was देवी . 
पिता थे क्लर्क at the Post office . 
इनके पास had six acres of जमीन थी at गाँव . 
इन्होंने received प्रारम्भिक शिक्षा in उर्दू , and एक मौलवी from a priest in लमही ही itself . 
इन्होंने passed his matriculation from Benaras . 
After the demise of पिताजी उपरान्त प्रेमचन्द दिन were spent in adversities . 
इन्होंने held पद of अध्यापक and स्कूल इंस्पेक्टर at places like Allahabad , Pratapgarh , Kanpur , Gorakhpur etc. . 
इन्होंने completed his B.A in this series . 
Behind every successful man there is a woman ' कहावत also proves to होता है ' true for Prem Chand . 
By the way Prem chand 's पहला विवाह was unsuccessful . 
But his second wife शिवरानी देवी gave him the freedom to लिखने despite अनेक प्रकार of scarcities . 
Many of his stories were published with the name Nawab Rai . 
पहली कहानी with the name Prem chand was ' Bade ghar ki Beti ' . 
श्रेय of making प्रेमचन्द लेखक of हिन्दी goes to मन्नन द्विवेदी and Mahaveer Prasad Poddar . 
Almost 250 stories of प्रेमचन्द have been compiled with the title Mansarovar . 
Like उपन्यासों ही , this volume is also constituted in its usual nature and शैली and the comprehensive dimensions of उत्तर भारतीय जीवन has been made its theme . 
Generally किसी नैतिकता ओर towards some morality or they reveal किसी मनोवैज्ञानिक सत्य . 
गोदान is considered to be प्रेमचन्द most significant composition . 
His popular stories include Namak ka daroga , Poos ki raat , kafan etc. . 
प्रेमचन्द worked as a teacher until he got involved in Gandhi jee 's आन्दोलन in 1921 . 
He also did the writing लेखन कार्य भी for ' ' माधुरी ' ' and ' Chand ' magazines . 
इन्होंने launched पत्रिका Hans ' on मार्च , , 1930 but always सदैव अर्थाभाव from economic crisis . 
He went to मुंबई because of economic problems and to लिखने संवाद but he could not even spend पूरा एक साल भी there . 
As लेखक he first became ख्याति for उपन्यासों and stories written in उर्दू . 
Rang Bhumi ' made him the novel-emperor . 
लेखक died on 8 अक्टूबर , , 1936 . 
क्रान्तिकारी कवि of the सूर्यकान्त त्रिपाठी ' निराला ' was जन्म in 21 फरवरी , , 1899 in बंगाल . 
निराला , रहे , present as one such poor but happy revolutionary who always स्वीकार challenges . 
इस कवि who wrote vigorous classics like पूजा of Rama , started prosody-free poetries breaking the norm of prosodies . 
By 1930 the central characters like Chaturi Chamaar started गद्य in his prose . 
So many incidents took place in निराला जीवन . 
His paternal village था at the center place of गाँव जुझारु किसान संस्कृति . 
बचपन था spent in बंगाल where भारतीय and cultural renaissance revolution था at its peak . 
सम्पूर्ण लेखन of निराला जी favors social and cultural सांस्कृतिक नवजारण which gives एक अलग ही आयाम to romanticism . 
Whether हो was उपन्यास or निबंध , Nirala seems to probe सच of युग . 
Nirala jee has रचना many works . 
Nirala jee has also written कई उपन्यास and निबन्ध भी . 
Nirala jee also edited ' Matwala ' and ' Samanvay ' for कुछ समय . 
निराला जी took his last breath on 15th October , 1961 in Prayag . 
आर. के. नारायण प्रसिद्ध भारतीय लेखक of अंग्रेजी भाषा was जन्म on 10 अक्टूबर , , 1906 in चेन्नई . 
पूरा नाम was Rasipuram Krishnaswamy Narayanswamy . 
Before becoming लेखक आर. के. नारायण also worked as अध्यापक भी . 
स्वामी and friends -LRB- 1935 -RRB- has वर्णन of the exciting acts of एक दल of boys in different contexts . 
The background of नारायण 's all the books after this was एक काल्पनिक शहर of south India , Malgudi . 
Narayan generally depicts human relationships , attributes and the ironies of भारतीय दैनिक जीवन where भारतीय दैनिक जीवन collides with the old traditions . 
शैली is sober which has the blend of cultured comic , elegance and simplicity . 
The theme of आत्मकथा is ' My days : Amemwa and my dateless diary : An American journey . 
भारत सरकार honored him with ' ' पद्मभूषण ' in 1964 and ' Padmavishan ' in 2000 .

Devakinandan Khatri is लेखक who came after the era of खत्री भारतेन्दु बाद in हिन्दी साहित्य . 
Novels are primarily शामिल in साहित्य written by him . 
Where instead of यथार्थवादी कथानक यथार्थवादी कथानक was built . 
Bhutnath ' was completed by दुर्गा प्रसाद खत्री . 
चंद्रकांता has बहुत बड़ा योगदान in the propagation of हिंदी भाषा . 
इस उपन्यास won everybody 's heart . 
Many non Hindi speakers learnt Hindi language for testing रसास्वादन of इस किताब . 
Devakinandan Khatri jee was जन्म on 29 जून -LRB- Ashadh Krishnapaksha saptami samwat 1918 -RRB- शनिवार in पूसा , , बिहार . 
प्रारम्भिक शिक्षा of Devakinandan Khatri jee was carried in Urdu & Persian . 
Later उन्होंने also studied संस्कृत and अंग्रेजी भी . 
उन्होंने later स्थापना एक प्रिंटिंस प्रेस in वाराणसी and initiated a Hindi monthly ' Sudarshan ' in 1883 . 
The magical fictional literature of Devakinandan khatri jee has कहानी . 
Since देवकीनन्दन खत्री जी बचपन ही Devakinandan Khatri jee थे fond of travelling . 
In the past when the contracts of the forests were taken away from him उनसे composed चन्द्रकान्ता mixing कल्पनाओं of the works of तिलिस्म and ऐयारी keeping the same ruins of the forests , hills and ancient historical buildings as the background . 
In आधुनिक दौर भूमिका in the propagation of Hindi through साहित्य has been remarkable . 
Most of अधिकतर हिन्दू लोग भी during those days knew Hindi when Babu Devakinandan Khatri jee शुरू writing उपन्यास . 
In ऐसी परिस्थिति मुख्य लक्ष्य of Khatri jee था to compose a work through which देवनागरी हिन्दी could हो propagated . 
उपन्यास became so popular that those who did not थे , to read and लिखना -झौईण् in हिन्दी or only knew Urdu learnt हिन्दी to just read उपन्यास . 
Keeping इसी लोकप्रियता in ध्यान extending this story उन्होंने लिखा दूसरा उपन्यास Chandrakanta Santati ' which was कई गुणा interesting than ' ' चन्द्रकान्ता ' ' . 
चन्द्रकान्ता -LRB- 1888-1892 -RRB- - Lakhs of लाखों लोगों learnt हिंदी to read चन्द्रकान्ता . 
यह उपन्यास is विभक्त in four sections . 
Chandrakanta Santati -LRB- 1894-1904 -RRB- - Inspired by अभूतपूर्व सफलता of Chandrakanta , Devkinandan Khatri jee रचना Chandrakanta Santati , विशाल उपन्यास comprising of 24 sections . 
यह उपन्यास भी also became greatly popular . 
Bhutnath -LRB- 1907-1913 -RRB- - -LRB- Uncompleted -RRB- Devakinandan jee रचना इस उपन्यास by giving one of the characters of Chandrakanta Santati the role of Protagonist . 
But because of असामयिक मृत्यु वे could only लिख पाये लिख पाये of इस उपन्यास after which the rest of लिख पाये were completed by his son दुर्गाप्रसाद खत्री . 
The popular educationist patriot , the originator of संस्कृति and संस्कृति and संस्थापक of Benaras Hindu University महामना Pandit Madan Mohan Malviya थे a great man of this generation . 
यह is noteworthy that abbe Malviya had अद्वितीय स्थान in इस देश in terms of देशभक्ति and self denial . 
महामना always remained soft मृदुभाषी रहे in व्यवहार . 
कर्म ही था जीवन . 
Apart from a lifetime alignment with Benaras Hindu University वे remained engaged in public service by working in many organizations . 
As एक प्रखर पत्रकार , मदनमोहन मालवीय aroused his invisible pen ideologies and gave संदेश of देश सेवा and societal creation . 
मालवीय जी had participated in the second conference of भारतीय राष्‍ट्रीय कांग्रेस आयोजित in 1886 in Kolkata during काल ही . 
Inspired by वाग्मिता of मालवीय जी , Dadabhai Narojee in भाई नौरोजी कहा that वाणी has वाणी of mother India . 
The second sojourn of महामना जीवन was the institution and संपादन था of Abhudaya . 
मालवीय जी also fought for संपादकीय स्वतन्त्रता through this paper . 
मालवीय जी संपादन इसका for about two लगभग दो वर्षों . 
After this the publishing of an English paper नामक Leader ' प्रारम्भ from Allahabad . 
Abbe Malviya jee wanted to send संदेश of मालवीय जी स्वतंत्रता to the non Hindi speaking अहिन्दी भाषी क्षेत्रों through this paper . 
With प्रेरणा of मालवीय जी in सन् 1929 हिन्दी संस्करण Bharat ' was also started being published . 
एक वर्ष after the publication of ' Leader ' , with प्रयास of Malviya मालवीय जी a paper नामक Maryada ' was also शुरू being published . 
अनेक निबन्ध written on political problems by मालवीय were प्रकाशित in this paper . 
Abbe Malviya jee started a weekly paper नामक Sanatan Dharma ' from काशी on 20th 20 जुलाई , which था प्रेरित by परिस्थिति of the country . 
मालवीय जी also gave योगदान in the circulation of many papers and magazines . 
If आप are in नगालैंड or particularly in कोहिमा in महीने of November . 
गांव is located at दूरी ही of 12 किमी. from कोहिमा . 
As आप पहुंचते ही here आप पहुंचते ही into हॉर्नबिल फेस्टिवल . 
धनेश उत्सव was शुरू by नगालैंड सरकार in साल of the new millennium . 
Since then हर साल it is being आयोजित in the first week of December . 
यह उत्सव celebrated for a week ties हर नगालैंड वासी in a single thread and हो जाता है , turns into एक मेले where लोग from every corner of राज्य and लोग from राज्य assemble and participate in colorful presentations . 
Here we मिलता है to देखने the amazing blend of crafts , games , खाद्य मेले , , traditional games and rituals . 
Traditional arts such as hand made paintings , wooden crafts and मूर्ति are exhibited in मेले . 
Here a special proclivity of लोगों is seen towards many amazing games like climbing the oily bamboos और ' नगा राजा प्रतियोगिता आदि . 
Here the medicine shops of indigenous herbs remain overcrowded . 
If आपको are interested in historical places after आनंद पारंपरिक जनजातीय संस्कृति of various tribes and species , आपको can यात्रा युद्ध स्मारक . 
युद्ध स्मारक was built in the memory of the martyrs of the second world war . 
उत्सव propagated at a bigger level is a little different from the traditional festivals and rituals of नगालैंड . 
During धनेश उत्सव it is ले सकें ध्यान of that here only those rituals are शामिल which can also be पर्यटक भी by the people from outside . 
यह उत्सव signifies happiness and pride . 
प्रतिवर्ष एक गांव represents एक जनजातीय समुदाय . 
नगालैंड is कहा जाता है to be the ' भूमि ' of festivals ' . 
The 16 big tribes and the sub tribes of राज्य have विधि of abiding विशिष्‍ट सांस्कृतिक परंपराओं which they express by art exhibitions during Naga festivals . 
80 percent of राज्य अस्सी फीसदी आबादी is directly associated with agricultural work . 
नगाओं of the Naga festivals is that they can जा सकते हैं identified with Christianity values . 
Despite this its locality , traditions and feel can not be compared with anything . 
The Aoleng Monyu festival of कोन्याक जनजातियों of मोऊ जिले is celebrated after त्योहार फ़सल . 
Aolenge Lee - यह त्योहार is celebrated in महीने of March-April for छह दिन . 
In यंगवां and काहशिह gods are prayed for अच्छी पैदावार and वृद्धि of generation . 
यह त्योहार also used to हुआ करता था माध्यम भी of सगाई and marriages . 
बुशू is त्योहार which is celebrated by the kachari tribes of दीमापुर जिले in the last week of January . 
For the kacharis , Bushu is संगीत of the soul . 
On this day kacharis eat a lot , dance and marry . 
Meanwhile परंपरा भी of respecting elders is also obeyed . 
जेमेन लियांगमई जनजाति known as Jeliyang of पारेन जिले celebrates त्योहार नाम Melingi Nachegankhia हर साल in अक्‍तूबर महीने of मार्च and October after sowing crops . 
उत्सव begins after chanting मंत्रोच्चार and lighting आग by पुजारी of गांव which symbolizes सुरक्षा of महिलाओं and children against शत्रुओं and wild animals . 
The festival also provides अवसर for a gathering of the family members at एक जगह . 
During इस दौरान the exchange of gifts , organization of community feast , round of drinking and letting drink and cultural activities takes place . 
यिंमचुंगरू जनजाति of त्युयेनसांग and किफिरे जिले celebrates त्योहार . 
यह त्योहार related to फ़सल continues for पांच दिनों शुरू from आठ अगस्त . 
स्थानीय मान्यता is that देवता who drinks the fermented drink wants that लोग associated with फ़सल should लें पांच दिन leave from work . 
After the announcement of उत्सव by पुजारी a sacrifice of एक हृष्‍ट -झौईण् पुष्‍ट पशु is made . 
जनजाति celebrates मिमकुट उत्सव in महीने of जनवरी to please demons . 
यह उत्सव begins with the sacrifice of two white cocks . 
जनजाति of मोकोकचुंग जिले celebrates त्योहार after फ़सलों in महीने of मई . 
' टग ऑफ वार ' खेल Tug of war ' is organized which exhibits the weeding of फ़सल . 
मतलब of मोआत्सू is the betterment of बेहतरीन फ़सल in दिनों to come . 
ये युवा roam around गांव while dancing so that the bad omen runs away . 
संगतम जनजाति of the Tyuyensang-kifire celebrate उत्सव मोंगमोंग for छह दिनों in महीने of सितंबर हर साल . 
Digit six is considered to be lucky amongst संगतम जनजाति . 
जन्म are also named after छह दिनों बाद of जन्म . 
Monyu is त्योहार after sowing which is celebrated हर साल by फोम जनजाति of longlong लोंगलेंग जिले for छह दिनों before किसी संकट पहले . 
शाब्दिक अर्थ of मोन्यू is लगाव and respect towards women and यह त्योहार is एक अवसर of exhibiting लगाव and respect towards the married girls and sisters by सदस्यों of परिवार . 
हर साल जनजाति of त्युयेनसांग जिले celebrates Nakyulum त्योहार of the freedom from darkness . 
जनजाति of फेक जिले celebrates नाझु उत्सव of sowing for दस दिनों in महीने of फरवरी हर साल . 
नाझु is त्योहार of spiritual relationship between the dead people and their unseen protectors . 
During नाझु उत्सव दौरान apart from other rituals pairs are also chosen by अविवाहित लोगों . 
रेंगमा जनजाति of कोहिमा जिले celebrates त्योहार हर साल in महीने of नवंबर after कटाई बाद of फ़सल . 
रेंगमा लोगों believe that नगदा is the mother power of all the festivals . 
माएं of every family tastes नये अन्न after कटाई बाद and त्योहार begins after this . 
अंगामी जनजातियों of कोहिमा जिले celebrates Sekrenyi fetival for 10 दिनों after कटाई बाद . 
Officially दिन of इस उत्सव is 15 फरवरी . 
According to अंगामी दर्शन शरीर is the blend of Umo -LRB- physical -RRB- and Yufo -LRB- nonphysycal -RRB- . 
उत्सव begins with the bath of सदस्यों of समुदाय at a sacred well . 
जनजाति of वोखा जिले celebrates nine days नौ दिवसीय त्योहार in the first week of नवंबर पहले . 
As compared to other festivals Tokhu Imong is अन्य उत्सवों of rest and during इस दौरान the villagers do not hunt , catch fishes , do not व्यापार and travel . 
खियामनियुगम जनजाति of त्युयेनसांग जिले celebrates sokum for आठ दिनों . 
During सोकुम दौरान ही the announcement of निर्माण of नये झूम खेत is made . 
सुमी जनजाति of Junheboto believes that तुलुनी उत्सव is अवसर to honor its warriors and exhibit blaze . 
During festivals also the physical and mental capacities of युवाओं are tested . 
Even for महिलाएं भी exhibit their health power . 
There is पुरातन परंपरा of festivals in नगालैंड so that they are able to recover themselves in adverse conditions . 
So much so that the color of festivals did not होते हुए faint in the journey from आदिम समाज to मुख्यधारा of religious beliefs . 
यह is surprising that most of अधिकांश लोग here abide Christianity and follow western culture . 
Festivals play the role of supplying happiness and ऊर्जा in जीवन of वस्तुत : नगा लोगों . 
If नहीं होता had not happened , जीवन of लोगों in this remote area would not तो been so easy . 
Hey तू have इंटर the intermediate examinations .

We are प्रखात about the popular Sarod player , सरोदवादक उस्ताद अमजद अली खान , who has written किताब अवर फ्रैटर्निटी ' नाम My father , over fraternity ' on सरोदवादक उस्ताद अमजद अली खान , . 
यह किताब has been जारी in the second fortnight of December and समय is also significant because 2012 was स्मरणवर्ष था of उस्ताद हाफिज अली खान . 
उस्ताद अमजद अली खान says , " यह is special in one more way because there नहीं था . no authentic literature on अब्बा until now '' . 
अमजद अली खान considers that there is अहम योगदान of अमजद अली खान and Ayan Ali अमजद अली खान in the writing of इस पुस्तक . 
Ustad amjad ali khan is संगीतकार of the sixth generation of the Bangash musicians . 
His ancestors are known as सरोद of Sarod . 
उस्ताद हाफिज अली खान अनूठी शैली ईजाद a new style of playing sarod by the nails of the fingers of बाएं हाथ . 
उस्ताद हाफिज अली खान शुरुआती जीवन and व्यक्तित्व has been illuminated in My father , over fraternity . 
उस्ताद अमजद अली खान honored with 1975 in 1975 , पद्मभूषण in 1991 and Padmavibhushan in 2001 says that , " यह किताब contains many interesting and memorable talks of अब्बा . 
As वे was honored with पद्मभूषण by the first प्रथम राष्ट्रपति डॉ. राजेंद्र प्रसाद in 1960 and when the honorable President asked अब्बा whether वे can तो anything for him , अब्बा presented a unique thing . 
Raag Darbari has been composed by दरबारी तानसेन which was altered by लोगों as per their wishes . 
उनके speaks about समर्पण towards संगीत . 
उस्ताद अमजद अली खान says , " अब्बा था taught me that संगीत is not a profession . 
यह तो is a way of living . 
शास्त्रीय संगीत requires patience , perseverance and meditation and we कोशिश to practice them in our lives . 
A person who knows the values of परिवार , understands प्रेम , and विश्वास can only समझता the true meaning of इस पुस्तक .

the central government wheat the minimum support price ( एमएसपी ) में 65 रुपये की बढ़ोतरी को the farmer organizations futile बताया है . 
The organizations say है कि it the farmers produce लागत निकालना भी मुश्किल it जिस कारण उन्हें heavy loss उठना पड़ सकता है . 
इसके साथ ही the government the bumper stock देखते हुए wheat export agreed दे दी है . 
यदि the MSP बढ़ोतरी नहीं की गई तो आने वाले दिनों में wheat the produce कम कर सकते हैं .

the forests साफकर farming करना started किया .

primary agriculture व पशुचारण herbage situation सम्बन्ध विवादपूर्ण है . 
this regard एक विचार यह है कि economy मिश्रित कृषि ( मिदेड् ङर्मिन्ग् ) की the infancy स्थली ( छर्ड्ले ) से भिन्न भिन्न दिशाओं में spread . 
यह शैशवस्थली उर्वरचाप ( ङेर्टिइले छ्रेस्चेन्ट् ) में स्थित was . 
इनमें से the economy यूरेशिया के स्टेप प्रदेश में गई . 
वहाँ वह पहले ही पशुचारणिक व चलवासी nomadic economy बदल गई . 
इस प्रक्रिया में environment कारकों ने महत्वपूर्ण योगदान दिया . 
इस तरह यहाँ उन्होंने mixed farming birth दिया . 
यह पद्धति roman tradition running आ रही है कि farming descent और development इस अनुक्रम में हुआ . 
प्रथम , वन्य प्राणियों का hunting द्वितीय , secondly accumulating wild fruits व products संग्रहण व तृतीय , पशुचारण . 
किन्तु अब it शायद ही accepted किया जाता है . 
इसी तरह एक दूसरा विचार यह है कि farming evolved ऐसी विशाल घाटियों में हुई है , जहाँ water control required पड़ती थी .

सुदूर पूर्व - यहाँ की species wheat एवं राई की species अंगूर , अंजीर , नाशपाती , चेरी , बादाम , mustard , grapes , fig , pear , cherry , almonds , walnut और एल्फाफा थे . 
भूमध्यसागरीय केन्द्र - जौ , oat , olive एवम् कई साग सब्जियों का the home है .

दक्षिणी मेक्सिको मध्यअमेरिका - यहाँ शकरकन्द , sweet potato , maize और उच्चभूमि तरह के quality cotton प्राथमिक the primary center यहाँ 49 local species सूचीबद्ध की गई थीं .

The industrial revolution The industrial revolution न सिर्फ गहरा संबंध ही was not अपितु वह उसके ऊपर आश्रित थी . 
1709 ई . में अब्राहम डबी कोलबुक डेल में कोक की the help iron ढालने का the work कर रहे थे . 
Many kinds iron ढालने के पहले उसमें reforms करने पड़े . 
जैसे जैसे casting iron ढालने की the new ways अपनाई जाने लगीं वैसे वैसे agriculture व other industries सस्ता casting iron सुलभता से प्राप्त होने लगा . 
Steam-power शक्ति भी आसानी से प्राप्त होने लगी . 
इससे उद्योग शालाएँ एवं पूरक सेवाओं की तीव्रता से वृद्धि हुई .

the laborers the remote areas बुलाया गया तो भी the laborers कमी बनी रही . 
a result more work निपुण खेती की विधियों की ओर ध्यान दिया गया .

इसका Its origin China माना जाता है . 
china It the highest production किया जाता है . 
world The second position India है . 
इसका Its plant India Burma 17th century लाया गया .

India every crop प्रति production world average कम है . 
India rice प्रति हेक्टर Australia एक तिहाई है और Japan तथा Italy आधा से कम . 
The reserve bank अपनी its concern कृषि की गिरती the decreasing development rate its concern जताई है . 
कृषि की The rate 80 के दशक में 4.4 % was जो नौवें दशक में 3.2 remained और वर्तमान में 4.4 % गिर चुकी है . 
गिरती falling economic rate The meaning है कि agricultural production वृद्धि तो हो रही है , परंतु वृद्धि की falling economic rate कम होती जा रही है . 
The Reserve bank this situation the government agricultural sector गिरते the falling investment दोषी ठहराया है . 
सत्तर के दशक में country 's income 3.4 फीसदी कृषि की the basic agricultural facilities जैसे नहर एवं seed research spent it लेकिन वर्तमान में 3.4 % रह गया है . 
The Reserve bank the government आगाह किया है कि agriculture the government investment बढ़ाए , जिससे agriculture high growth rate ऊंची बनी रहे . 
Reserve bank चिंता उचित है . 
investment बढ़ाने से Agricultural production increase होगी .

gender discrimination व agriculture बदलते अंतर्राष्‍ट्रीय स्वरूप के मद्‍देनजर the national commission कृषि गत नीति निर्माताओं का the attention कृषि क्षेत्र से जुड़ी women जरूरतों व समस्याओं की ओर आकृष्‍ट करने के मकसद से ' नेशनल पॉलिसी फॉर वीमेन इन एग्रीकल्चर ' नामक a draft तैयार किया है .

the national farmer policy साझा पट्‍टा पर तेजी से work करने की अनुशंसा तो The government की गई है . 
the national farmer policy भोजन व कृषि में women विशेष ज्ञान , कला को accepted नहीं किया गया है . 
यह पूर्वाग्रह ख्यातिप्राप्‍त कृषि वैज्ञानिक व National farmer commission the chairman agricultural scientist M. S. Swaminathan अध्यक्षता में तैयार की गई the national farmer policy झलकता है , It National farmer commission the draft said .

NDC की last days हुई the 53rd meeting समापन भाषण में प्रधानमंत्री की इस घोषणा से पहले NDC agriculture sector a ten point proposal सहमति जतायी . 
It food security mission cereal production बढ़ोत्तरी , agriculture investment बढ़ाना , marketing reforms तेज करना , fertilizer subsidy नयी प्रणाली और विस्तार ढांचे को मजबूत करना शामिल है . 
the meeting प्रधानमंत्री ने said कि केंद्र कृषि क्षेत्र में the investment बढ़ाने को तैयार है लेकिन the states अपने their respective level efforts करने होंगे . 
This investment the ground level reach ताकि better results सामने आ सकें . 
He बताया , food import the dependence खत्म करने के लिए जल्द ही a Food Security Mission लांच किया जायेगा . 
He said कि agriculture चार फीसदी की विकास दर हासिल करने के लिए strict decision taken be . 
साथ ही इन पर अमल की a periodic review करनी होगी . 
He the finance minister four years सभी किसानों debt system दायरे लाने को कहा .

the country the history संभवत : first time Seed Satyagrah journey नामक an eighteen day agriculture movement last days चलाया गया जिसका उद्‍देश्‍य the farmers जागरूक बनाने के साथ साथ उनके परम्परागत कृषि हितों की रक्षा करना था . 
भारत में अंग्रेजीराज के दौरान नील की खेती करने वाले indigo farmers उत्पीड़न के खिलाफ राष्‍ट्रपिता Mahatma Gandhi 1917 में चंपारण ( बिहार ) में सत्याग्रह a Satyagrah movement किया था . 
such a historical land the women और environment अंतर्राष्‍ट्रीय आन्दोलन करने वाली डॉ . वन्दना Dr. Vandana Shiva अपनी संस्था ' नव धान्य ' के Nav Dhanya seed satyagrah journey निकाली थी जिसमें उत्तराखंड , बिहार , Uttarakhand , Bihar , Jharkhand और Rajasthan the farmers भाग लिया . 
राष्‍ट्रपति की समाधि राजघाट पर संपन्न हुई accomplished journey सहभागियों ने seed sway और food security शपथ took . 
Seed Satyagrah journey ' संदेह बहुत दूरगामी है . 
the world today दुनिया के shrunk कर a global village become profit और loss a communicable disease become . 
Agriculture it प्रभावित है . 
developed countries the influence running All the international organizations येन केन प्रकारेण विकासशील और developed countries न सिर्फ शोषण कर रहे हैं बल्कि उन्हें यथास्थिति में ही बनाए रखना चाहते हैं . 
Imposing foreign seeds स्थान पर Imposing foreign seeds थोपा जाना this conspiracy the basic part है . 
the world the agriculture seeds यदि a country या समूह का कब्जा it तो it एक तरह से विश्‍वविजय कही जा सकती है . 
इसी परिप्रेक्ष्य में याद दिलाने की जरूरत है कि अमेरिका के America , Henry Kissinger said कि यदि हम the world खाद्यान्न पर control कर लें तो हम our population नियंत्रित कर सकते हैं . 
the country आज जो खाद्यान्न या कृषक आत्महत्याओं का संकट आया हुआ है , उसके पीछे two basic reasons हैं - पहला यह कि हमने traditional seeds व farming लगभग left तथा the second यह कि वैश्‍विक खतरों को जानने के बावजूद the world dangers government farming संरक्षित नहीं किया . 
It कम आश्‍चर्यजनक नहीं है कि country कुल फसली ha area 190 मिलियन हेक्टेयर में सिर्फ 57 मिलियन हेक्टेयर ही सिंचित है . 
the country agriculture such a diversity परम्परागत रूप से उपलब्ध है कि farmers भूखा remain . 
विश्‍व में 60 kinds soil ( मिट्‍टी ) में से 46 किस्में अपने यहां पाई जाती हैं जिनमें 60 kinds crop हो सकती है . 
यहां षड्‍ six season हैं . 
इसके विपरीत विदेशों में प्राय : weather और एक सी मिट्‍टी है . 
इसलिए वहां के the seeds हमारी our agriculture निर्भर नहीं हो सकती . 
हमारे यहां Our traditional seeds सावां , कोदो , मक्का , बाजरा , बगरी ( धान ) , मसूर , अरहर , चरी जैसी सैकड़ों किस्में हैं जिनके लिए natural rain पर्याप्‍त है . 
no rainfall न होने पर भी stopgap produce हो जाती है . 
हमारे Our indigenous seeds यहां के the weather अनुकूल हैं तथा उन पर insects या बीमारियों का प्रकोप नहीं होता जबकि Our indigenous seeds the treatment व रख रखाव पर काफी खर्च करना पड़ता है . 
the multinational companies the conspiracy the Indian farmers It their seeds the production saving व विनिमय से वंचित करना है .

गांधी Bhitarwa ( चम्पारण ) की बीज The Sayagrah journey सिलसिला चलते रहना चाहिए . 
हमारी our traditional agriculture तथा श्रमिकों के maximum use The policy the country खुशहाल बना सकती है . 
मशीनीकरण की The mechanization policy the country खुशहाल बना सकती है . 
Mechanization some people तिजोरियां भरेंगी , गरीबों का पेट नहीं . 
Western countries और हमारे यहां every kind सामाजिक व भौगोलिक अन्तर है . 
इसलिए हमारा उनका मुकाबला भी नहीं हो सकता .

हमारे यहां Our population ज्यादा है इसलिए human labor आवश्यक है . 
the Indian folk tradition पेड़ -झौईण् पौधे , जड़ी -झौईण् बूटियां , पंचतत्व , गोबर , गोमूत्र , खनिज संपदा , रस विज्ञान से जुड़ा अपार immense intellectual knowledge भरा पड़ा है . 
आयुर्वेद , यर्जुवेद , भावप्रकाश आदि ग्रंथों में plants और प्राणी जगत से human body लाभ पहुंचाने वाले हजारों नुस्खे लोगों के लिए सहज ही उपलब्ध हैं . 
Indian government the carelessness कोई भी इन नुस्खों का a patent कराने को स्वतंत्र है . 
this carelessness हमारे Neem Basmati rice और turmeric our patent विदेशियों द्वारा करा लिए गये और हम हाथ पर हाथ धरे बैठे रहे . 
Neem the patent कराने के बाद America और Japan कुछ बहुराष्‍ट्रीय कंपनियों ने Neem various insecticides जैवरासायनिक और औषधीय गुणों पर अपने our intellect right जता कर Neem हमारे our intellect right गुलाम बना लिया है . 
India अमूल्य निधि रही है और इसीलिए हमारे ऋषि मुनियों ने it घर के आंगन में लगाने की a tradition began की थी . 
कुछ कंपनियों ने turmeric अपना शिकार बना लिया . 
इसी तरह Punjab the gift Basmati rice आहार नलिकाओं को स्वस्थ रखने का औषधीय गुण रखता है , लेकिन अब इस पर भी हमारा अधिकार नहीं रहा . 
Indian seeds इसी तरह का खिलवाड़ चल रहा है और हमारी our government मौन साधे हुए है या फिर जानबूझ कर लापरवाही बरत रही है . 
आनुवांशिक रूप से संशोधित यानी जेनेटिकली मॉडिफाइड Genetically modified seeds हमारी our crops बर्बाद कर ही रहे हैं , साथ ही मनुष्य और दूसरे प्राणियों पर भी जबर्दस्त दुष्‍प्रभाव छोड़ रहे हैं . 
such kinds seeds put बैक्‍टीरिया नए किस्म के वर्णसंकर बैक्‍टीरिया या virus उत्पन्न करते हैं जो such kinds अज्ञात बीमारियों को birth दे रहे हैं . 
हाल ही में ग्रीनपीस संस्था द्वारा information अधिकार के अंतर्गत जीएम GM brinjal भिंडी , finger , mustard और चावल की rice crops जीएम GM seeds प्रभाव की information ली गयी . 
examination उपरांत ज्ञात it कि जीएम the GM seeds जहरीले हैं जो मनुष्य के human health प्रतिकूल असर डाल रहे हैं और the agricultural land हानि harming . 
The central government patent law amending करने पर considering कर रही है . 
this law ड्रग कंपनियों को नयी दवाओं को 20 years मनचाहे ऊंचे दाम पर बेचने का एकाधिकार मिला जाता है , the central government considering कर रही है कि original research the patent given . 
ordinary research अथवा the drug the new formulation Patent given जैसे fever कम करने की the drug paracetamol Patent समाप्‍त be . 
paracetamol tablets गोली को मीठा बनाने के लिए उसमें sugar put तो उसे patent कराया जा सकता है मीठे paracetamol tablets patent देने से the next 20 years this medicine बनाने का एकाधिकार the applicant company it . 
The common intelligence बताती है कि paracetamol चीनी डालने को an invention called . 
such kinds ordinary inventions The government रोक लगाना चाहती है , परंतु डब्लूटीओ के ट्रिप्स समझौतों में said कि such kinds ordinary inventions patent given . 
इसलिए the government ऐसा such an amendment करने में hesitating . 
इस समस्या पर consider करने के लिए The government आर ए माशेलकर की the chairmanship a committee गठित की थी . 
The committee कहा गया था कि वह बताए कि original inventions patent देना trips be या नहीं ? विषय महत्त्वपूर्ण है . 
This kind lodged a drug company Chennai High court दायर किया गया है . 
कैंसर रोधक दवा पर The government patent given . 
The government कहना है कि the drug all the elements उपलब्ध थे और ordinary amendment करके उन्हें patent पुन : प्रस्तुत किया गया है . 
The Mashelkar committee the decision दिया कि the ordinary inventions patent देना चाहिए अन्यथा the trips law violate it . 
The committee argued दिया कि India वर्तमान में अधिकतर रिसर्च मौलिक नहीं , बल्कि मामूली किस्म के हैं . 
यदि ordinary inventions पेटेंट करने पर ban लगा दिया जायेगा तो भारतीय कंपनियां पिछड़ जायेंगी . 
The Mashelkar committee भारतीय ड्रग कंपनियों द्वारा रिसर्च क्षमता को हासिल करने को more importance दिया और महंगी दवा के the citizens पड़ने वाले the ill effects कम . 
a long time भारतीय कंपनियों का विकास हो या न हो , the Indian citizens तत्काल adverse effects अवश्य पड़ेगा . 
सौभाग्य है कि Mashelkar committee चिंतन को America the Supreme court खारिज कर दिया है . 
The system given कि patent pure research given . 
अमेरिका कंपनी The American company Teliflex दो पूर्व के two previous inventions जोड़ दिया . 
The Supreme court said कि this invention patent given क्योंकि it मौलिक original discovery नहीं है . 
इस प्रकार के The uses incorporated be और इन्हें invention called . 
this decision America पेटेंट कानूक का revised हो गया है . 
अभी तक arrangement was कि the applicant मात्र यह दिखाना है कि he a new technique या वस्तु की खोज की है . 
The investigation the depth newness जरूरी was not . 
यदि वह the newness सामान्य प्रक्रिया में सहज ही it तो भी उसे patent कराया जा सकता था . 
Patent law the rich countries prosperity the basis है . 
वर्तमान में 90 % अधिक पेटेंट the rich countries हैं . 
these patented goods हमें महंगा selling वे huge profit earn . 
हमारे सामने दो रास्ते खुले हैं . 
One way यह है कि हम उनके अधर्म में शरीक be अपनी कंपनियों को encourage दे सकते हैं कि वे भी ordinary reforms करके patent हासिल करें और the citizens high price वसूल करें . 
The other way है कि the patent law बदलने के efforts करें . 
यदि trips rules common reforms the patent give जरूरी है तो trips law खारिज करने का प्रयास किया जाये . 
हमें the rich countries ill behavior हिस्सेदार be उनके ill behavior तोड़ने का efforts करना चाहिए .

food security बनाए रखने के the area नई चुनौतियों और अवसरों के साथ The 21st century शुरुआत हो चुकी है . 
प्रमुख चुनौतियां हैं - climatic change पेट्रोलियम आधारित ऊर्जा की बढ़ती high prices fuel production farms बदलता स्वरूप , कृषि की agricultural progress आवश्यक the required ecology होती क्षति और निर्बाध रूप से पनपते incessantly increasing insecticides . 
जहां तक climatic change the question है , वहां increasing temperature घटती decreasing rains बार बार पड़ता drought बाढ़ की increasing घटनाएं और अंटार्कटिक तथा region बर्फ की चादरों के पिघलने से चढ़ता water level few worrying aspects हैं .

these opportunities और चुनौतियों का face करने के लिए विशेष रूप से शोध की शुरुआत करनी होगी .

पिछली शताब्दी के सातवें दसक में came the Green Revolution देश जितना गर्व करें कम है . 
People आज भी remember है कि कभी every year गल्ले की lack remained . 
that time अगर the village देहातों में you जाते तो देखते कि few farmers छोड़कर लगभग सारे लोगों के पास no grains नहीं होता था . 
ये सारे लोग farms labors किया करते और labors उन्हें the little grain मिलता जिससे वे गुजर बसर किया करते . 
the year जिन महीनों में खेत farm labors less work कम होता उन दिनों उनकी दशा और दयनीय होती . 
those days जब the people खाने के the lack insulted जिंदगी जी कर ऊब गए थे , revolution बयार आहिस्ता आहिस्ता बहने लगी . 
उन्हीं दिनों एक महान कृषि वैज्ञानिक डाक्‍टर a great agriculture scientist Doctor Norman Borlaug the leadership Green revolution came . 
उनके साथ भारत के वैज्ञानिक Indian scientist Swaminathan was . 
crops बहुत अधिक होने लगीं . 
जहां only rice हुआ करता था , वहां Wheat फसल लहलहाने लगी . 
लेकिन पिछले लगभग 15 सालों से the Green Revolution कुछ अवांछनीय फल सामने आने लगे हैं . 
Punjab जो कभी state था , today इसके चपेट में बुरी तरह trapped . 
irrigation जमीन से इतना पानी निकाला जा चुका है जो years All the groundwater जमा हो पाया था . 
सऊदियों के अनुसार उनके their country the area खेती it लेकिन वह विश्‍व का छठा सबसे बड़ा खाद्य the sixth biggest food exporter है . 
कीड़ा मार दवाओं का the use कम करने के लिए some people neem चीजों से बने products the use करने की सलाह देते हैं तो some people ऐसी जींस वाले plants बनाने की कोशिश में हैं जिनसे कीड़ों को एलर्जी है . 
revolution approaching approaching आ रही है , जिसमें यह सब कुछ होगा . 
जिन सीमान्त और small farmers India food grains the production आत्मनिर्भर बनाया , वे आज विपन्न हैं .

this condition the farmers बाहर निकालने के लिए और उसे आर्थिक दृष्‍टि से सुदृढ़ बनाने के लिए the NDA government सोमपाल की the chairmanship 6 सदस्यों का national farmer commission गठित किया . 
the commission its work started किया था कि The government changed .

The Swaminathan commission नवम्बर 2004 से अक्‍तूबर 2006 के दरम्यान five reports प्रस्तुत कीं . 
2000 पृष्‍ठों की the five reports farming और farmers the development recommendations हैं . 
इसकी recommendation यह है कि farmer 's produce न्यूनतम समर्थन मूल्य लागत खर्च से 50 % ज्यादा be . 
इसलिए the government इस वर्ष wheat the minimum support price 650 रुपये से बढ़ाकर 750 रुपये प्रति क्विंटल किया है . 
और इसी के साथ 100 रुपये प्रति क्विंटल बोनस देने से 100 rs bonus wheat the minimum support price 650 रुपये से 850 रुपये प्रति क्विंटल बढ़ने से the minimum support price 30 % price growth हुई है , जिसका किसानों को लाभ होगा .

अभी 9 से interest give . 
खाद , manure , seeds और insecticide खर्च production खर्च का 50 % है . 
The commission recommended की है कि encouraging biological farming प्रोत्साहन देने से उनका खर्च कम decrease और the income बढ़ेगी . 
कृषि विज्ञानियों का say है कि the production much difference नहीं पड़ता . 
यूरोपीय संघ के the European union countries 1990 से ही Biological farming प्रोत्साहन दिया जा रहा है . 
यदि biological farming करने वाले the farmers प्रति एकड़ 3500 से 4000 रुपये दिये जायें , तो उनका The production बढ़ेगा और income .
